BUT THE FINANCIAL RESTRUCTURING IS INTENDED TO KEEP THE COMPANY GOING WITHOUT ADDITIONAL BORROWING UNTIL NINETEEN NINETY OR NINETEEN NINETY ONE HE SAID
ANALYSTS ALSO SAID THEY HADN'T EXPECTED LOWER OPERATING PROFITS FOR THE COMPANY'S INDUSTRIES GROUP AND FOR THE BROADCASTING SEGMENT
WESTINGHOUSE OFFICIALS TOLD ANALYSTS THAT OPERATING PROFIT IN THE INDUSTRIES GROUP FELL FIFTEEN PERCENT TO TWENTY PERCENT HURT IN PART BY WEAK RESULTS IN CANADIAN OPERATIONS
A SHARP DROP IN OPERATING PROFIT FROM THE BROADCASTING GROUP'S PRODUCTION COMPANY CONTRIBUTED TO THE SLIGHTLY LOWER OPERATING EARNINGS OVERALL FOR THAT SEGMENT
KEMP'S CAMPAIGN TAKES ON AN INCREASINGLY DESPERATE TONE
IN ONE SURE SIGN OF A CANDIDACY IN TROUBLE HE LASHES OUT AT CRITICISM FROM A LIGHTLY REGARDED T. V. COMMENTATOR
EVEN SOME SUPPORTERS NOW SAY PRIVATELY THAT HE SHOULD AIM FOR THE VICE PRESIDENTIAL NOMINATION
BUT HIS LONGTIME HOSTILITIES WITH DOLE LEAVE A SPOT ON A BUSH TICKET AS ABOUT THE ONLY POSSIBILITY
THOSE LANDS HAVE BECOME WORTH MUCH MORE THAN THE TRANSPORTATION AND ENERGY CONCERN NEEDS FOR THE RAILROAD AND THE COMPANY HAD BEEN TRYING TO FREE ITSELF FROM THE LIENS
LAST SPRING BURLINGTON AGREED TO PAY REMAINING BONDHOLDERS A TOTAL OF THIRTY FIVE POINT FIVE MILLION DOLLARS IN RETURN FOR PERMISSION TO REMOVE THE COVENANTS
A JUDGE APPROVED THE AGREEMENT IN NOVEMBER AND IT BECAME FINAL JANUARY TWELVE
AFTER DEDUCTING NONRECURRING ITEMS THE U. S. X. STEEL UNIT NONETHELESS APPEARED TO TURN IN ONE OF ITS MOST PROFITABLE QUARTERS SINCE THE NINETEEN SIXTIES
ON A PER TON BASIS PRETAX PROFIT DOUBLED TO ABOUT THIRTY SIX DOLLARS FROM EIGHTEEN DOLLARS IN THE THIRD QUARTER
HOWEVER THE PERFORMANCE FELL FAR SHORT OF U. S. X. CHAIRMAN DAVID R- RODERICK'S PREDICTION OF FIFTY DOLLARS PLUS PER TON PROFIT
TEXAS OF COURSE IS WHERE THE MOST TROUBLE IS TO BE FOUND
LENDERS THERE LIKE TO BLAME THE SO CALLED OIL PATCH RECESSION
BUT THE PROBLEM IN FACT IS BAD BANKING IN A FEW CASES EVEN CORRUPT BANKING
SOME PARTS OF TEXAS THE DALLAS FORT
WORTH AREA FOR EXAMPLE HAVEN'T HAD ANYTHING THAT LEGITIMATELY COULD BE CALLED A RECESSION
THE MAIN REASON SO MANY LENDERS ARE IN TROUBLE IS AN OLD FASHIONED FAILING AMONG BANKERS A WEAKNESS FOR REAL ESTATE SPECULATION
AS A RESULT THE GOVERNMENT IS TALKING OF HIGHER FARM PRICES
BUT HIGHER FARM PRICES WOULD ADD TO AN ALREADY STEEP INFLATION RATE
SO BEIJING OFFICIALS REPORTEDLY TALK OF TYING WAGES TO INFLATION AN IDEA REMINISCENT OF THE WAGE INDEXATION TRIED IN SOME LATIN AMERICAN NATIONS SEVERAL YEARS AGO WITH DISASTROUS RESULTS
SECRETARIES ARE ALSO EASY TARGETS FOR A HUG ESPECIALLY IN HOLLYWOOD
I'VE SEEN A WRITER WALK INTO AN OFFICE AND PULL A SECRETARY UP AGAINST HIM
SHE DOESN'T KNOW WHAT TO DO SAYS CHARLES FRIES CHAIRMAN OF FRIES ENTERTAINMENT INCORPORATED
NOT TO WORRY SAYS H. FLINT RANNEY A LOCAL REAL ESTATE AGENT
WE HAVE A GREAT SENSE OF HUMOR HE SAYS
WE'LL TAKE ALMOST ANYTHING
BESIDES HE ADDS NEW YORKERS COME HERE ALL THE TIME WE (PARENTHESES JUST )UN-PARENTHESES WOULDN'T WANT THEM TO LIVE HERE
ONE BIG PLAY LAST YEAR WAS LEISURE
ANOTHER WAS UNDERVALUED ASSETS EVEN THOUGH NO ONE CAN RECALL A JAPANESE COMPANY BEING BROKEN UP FOR ITS ASSETS
ONCE YOU GET THAT THEME THE LEVEL OF THE P. E. RATIO DOESN'T MEAN A DAMN SAYS MR. ROBINS
IT'S ALL A BIT OF A MIRAGE
YET ONE THAT SO FAR HAS WORKED
BUT OTHER EVIDENCE ON THE FLAPS IS CONFLICTING
ONE OF THE CREW MEMBERS CAN BE HEARD ON THE COCKPIT VOICE RECORDER CALLING OUT FLAPS FIFTEEN FIFTEEN THE CORRECT POSITION FOR THE FLAPS
AND THE RECORDER INDICATES THAT A COCKPIT ALARM THAT SHOULD HAVE ALERTED THE CREW TO IMPROPERLY SET FLAPS DIDN'T GO OFF
WHAT BOTHERS THESE PEOPLE IS NOT THAT MRS. THATCHER POSES A DANGER TO THE SO CALLED UNIFIED EUROPEAN MARKET
MRS. THATCHER IS NOT OPPOSED TO THIS
BRITAIN'S OWN MARKETS ARE MORE OPEN THAN THOSE OF MOST EUROPEAN COUNTRIES LONDON IS WAY AHEAD OF THEM ON CAPITAL MOVEMENT HAVING ABOLISHED EXCHANGE CONTROLS ALTOGETHER
THE CAUSE OF THE OUTRAGE IS THAT EUROPEAN UNITY IS THE DEVICE THROUGH WHICH THE REGULATORS AND SOCIALISTS HOPE TO EXPAND THEIR GRIP ON THE CONTINENT
NOW HIS LAUGHTER IS GONE
BECAUSE OF DRUGS HE IS DEAD
AND EVERY DAY MY HEART BREAKS A LITTLE MORE
ON THE SURFACE THE TRADE REPORT LOOKED ENCOURAGING
THE NATION'S SEASONALLY ADJUSTED TRADE DEFICIT NARROWED TO EIGHT POINT SEVENTEEN BILLION DOLLARS IN JUNE THE LOWEST MONTHLY DEFICIT SINCE DECEMBER NINETEEN EIGHTY FOUR
WHAT'S MORE THE MAY TRADE DEFICIT WAS REVISED DOWN TO TEN POINT OH TWO BILLION DOLLARS FROM THE TEN POINT TWENTY FOUR BILLION DOLLARS ORIGINALLY REPORTED
SO FAR ILLEGAL FOREIGN WORKERS AREN'T TAKEN AS A JOB THREAT BY JAPANESE WORKERS
BUT JAPANESE UNEMPLOYMENT IS AT HISTORICALLY HIGH LEVELS BECAUSE OF THE YEN'S STRENGTH POSING A KNOTTY PROBLEM FOR THE GOVERNMENT
MANY JAPANESE COMPANIES IN SUCH INDUSTRIES AS STEEL AND SHIPBUILDING ARE CUTTING THEIR LABOR FORCES
IN THE PAST FILIPINOS IN MANY RURAL AREAS PREFERRED THE DISCIPLINED TERROR OF THE N. P. A. TO THE RANDOM EXCESSES OF THE COUNTRY'S MILITARY
WITH THE CHANGE OF GOVERNMENT LAST YEAR A MILD IMPROVEMENT IN MILITARY BEHAVIOR AND THE DETECTION OF THE MINDANAO SLAUGHTERS SOME FILIPINOS ARE CHANGING THEIR MINDS
DIPLOMATS AND POLITICAL ANALYSTS SAY THEY DON'T KNOW IF THE TREND PRESAGES SIGNIFICANT POPULAR RESISTANCE TO THE COMMUNISTS OR JUST ADDITIONAL TURMOIL IN THE PHILIPPINE COUNTRYSIDE
THERE IS A WIDE VARIATION IN THINKING ABOUT HOW SICK ONE IS AND HOW IMPORTANT TIME OFF IS IN ORDER TO GET WELL
THE PATIENTS' RESPONSIBILITIES OUTSIDE OF WORK ALSO VARY
IT'S HARD TO SAY TO WHAT DEGREE THESE FACTORS SHOULD INFLUENCE DISABILITY STATUS
MOST PHYSICIANS PROBABLY CONSIDER THEM IMPORTANT
IN CLEVELAND HIGBEE CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER ROBERT BROADBENT SAYS THE RETAILER HAS BENEFITED FROM ITS PARENT'S FINANCIAL EXPERTISE
ALTHOUGH IT WILL RETAIN CONTROL INDUSTRY EQUITY IS PLANNING TO TAKE HIGBEE PUBLIC AGAIN PROBABLY IN JUNE
MEANWHILE SAYS MR. BROADBENT THEY'VE MADE US MORE INQUISITIVE ABOUT ACQUISITIONS OURSELVES
THE LOAN IS PART OF A SEVENTY FIVE MILLION DOLLAR PLAN TO EXPAND THE MINE'S RESERVES AND ALLOW IT TO KEEP OPERATING UNTIL NINETEEN NINETY FOUR
WITHOUT THE EXPANSION THE MINE WAS THREATENED WITH CLOSURE NEXT YEAR
CLOSURE WOULD MEAN THE LOSS OF SEVEN HUNDRED AND FIFTEEN JOBS

WITHIN AN HOUR BARCLAYS P. L. C. LLOYDS BANK P. L. C. AND THE LONDON UNIT OF CITICORP INCREASED THEIR BASE RATES
THE BARCLAYS BOOST TOOK EFFECT IMMEDIATELY WHILE THE OTHER TWO BANKS' MOVES WERE EFFECTIVE AT THE CLOSE OF BUSINESS
SIMILAR INCREASES BY NATIONAL WESTMINSTER BANK P. L. C. AND MIDLAND BANK P. L. C. GO INTO EFFECT TODAY
BASE RATES ARE THE BENCHMARK FOR COMMERCIAL LENDING IN BRITAIN
THE FOLLOWING OFFICERS DIRECTORS AND LARGE STOCKHOLDERS OF COMPANIES REPORTED CHANGES IN HOLDINGS UNDER THE SECURITIES EXCHANGE ACT OF NINETEEN THIRTY FOUR
THOSE IDENTIFIED AS BENEFICIAL OWNERS HOLD AT LEAST TEN PERCENT OF A COMPANY'S EQUITY SECURITIES
UNLESS OTHERWISE NOTED CHANGES INVOLVED DIRECT HOLDINGS OF A COMMON STOCK AND TOOK PLACE IN MAY NINETEEN EIGHTY EIGHT
COMPANIES ARE LISTED WHERE TRANSACTIONS GENERALLY AGGREGATE TEN THOUSAND SHARES OR ONE HUNDRED THOUSAND DOLLARS
ANOTHER CONDITION IS THAT TOPEKA GROUP A UNIT OF DULUTH MINNESOTA BASED MINNESOTA POWER AND LIGHT COMPANY EXERCISE ITS OPTION TO BUY DELTONA'S UTILITY *SUBSIDIARIES*
BASED ON CURRENT BOOK VALUE THE SUBSIDIARIES WOULD FETCH THIRTY TWO POINT FIVE MILLION DOLLARS IN CASH PLUS PREFERRED STOCK IN ONE OF THE UTILITY UNITS
TOPEKA SAID IT INTENDS TO EXERCISE THE OPTION
THE BIGGEST HURDLE WAS TO FIND THE FUNDS TO MEET THE COST OF RECONSTRUCTION INCLUSIVE OF THE ISSUE OF STAMPS
HOWEVER THE RESPONSE TO THE GOVERNMENT'S INTERNATIONAL APPEAL FOR ASSISTANCE HAS BEEN EXTREMELY HEARTWARMING
THE FUNDS REQUIRED FOR PUBLIC SECTOR ASSISTANCE HAVE BEEN REALIZED AND THE FURTHER AMOUNT REQUIRED IS EXPECTED TO FLOW FROM THE PROCEEDS OF OVERSEAS REINSURANCE OF PROPERTY DAMAGE
TO BEGIN WITH COMPANIES HAVE BEEN DOING A GOOD JOB OF MANAGING INVENTORIES
IN THE PAST BUSINESSES HAVE TENDED TO BECOME INCREASINGLY OPTIMISTIC AS EXPANSIONS PERSISTED
WHEN SALES EVENTUALLY SLOWED INVENTORIES QUICKLY REACHED EXCESSIVE LEVELS
COMPANIES THEREUPON CUT THEIR BUYING INDUSTRIAL PRODUCTION DECLINED AND A RECESSION WAS UNDER WAY
THIRTY ONE TEAMS OF NINETEEN REPRESENTING BUSINESSES SCHOOLS AND ASSORTED OTHER GROUPS SIGNED UP FOR THE FIRST LOCAL COMPETITION
FOR WEEKS DRUMS WERE HEARD ALONG THE WILLAMETTE AS TEAMS PRACTICED
BOATS FULL OF MEN AND WOMEN IN BUSINESS SUITS FRESH FROM WORK OR HAPPY HOUR WERE NOT AN UNCOMMON SIGHT
THESE MIXED FEELINGS OF FRUSTRATION WITH AND GRATITUDE TOWARD THE AUTHORITIES ARE PART OF THE EVERYDAY LIFE OF A FOREIGNER DOING BUSINESS IN KOREA
IN FACT SUCH CONTRADICTIONS ARE WHAT SEEM TO MAKE THE KOREAN WORLD GO ROUND
A WESTERN BUSINESSMAN NEEDS TO BE READY FOR THEM
HERE ARE A FEW HARD LEARNED FACTS OF KOREAN BUSINESS LIFE
BUT MANY LOCAL BUSINESSES THAT DEPEND ON TOURISM AREN'T CONVINCED
THEY ARGUE THAT A COMMERCIAL MINE MIGHT GET PLAYED OUT IN A FEW YEARS
AND THEY FEAR THAT MANY TOURISTS WHO TREK HERE FOR THE TANTALIZING PROSPECT OF FINDING A DIAMOND IN THE FIELD WILL TAKE THEIR VACATIONS ELSEWHERE
THE COURT WAS SPLIT ON BOTH THE WILLIAMS ACT AND COMMERCE CLAUSE
JUSTICE LEWIS POWELL ACKNOWLEDGED THAT THE NINETEEN EIGHTY TWO CASE OF EDGAR VERSUS
M. I. T. E. SUGGESTED THAT ANY STATE LAW THAT FAVORED TARGETS MORE THAN DID THE WILLIAMS ACT WOULD BE INVALID BECAUSE CONGRESS HAD PREEMPTED LOCAL REGULATIONS
THE COURT BACKTRACKED HERE TO SAY STATE LAWS MIGHT BE O. K. IF THEY HELP THE WILLIAMS ACT'S PURPOSE BY HEAPING EVEN MORE BURDENS ON ACQUIRERS
IT HAS RELIEVED AT LEAST SOME OF THE FRUSTRATION FELT BY THE FARMERS SAYS PETER BRENT A MEMBER OF A FARM ACTIVIST GROUP

WITH A REBOUND IN THE STOCK MARKET INVESTORS' FEARS ABOUT A RECESSION COOLED AND THE BOND MARKET SLUMPED

DESPITE THE DECLINE IN BONDS THE FEDERAL RESERVE SYSTEM WILL CONTINUE TO MAKE GOOD ON ITS PROMISE TO PROVIDE AMPLE LIQUIDITY THROUGH ITS OPEN MARKET OPERATIONS
DESPITE ALL OF THE UNCERTAINTY THAT SURROUNDED BRITISH PETROLEUM'S JUMBO OFFERING THERE WASN'T THAT MUCH TURMOIL IN THE MARKET WHEN SHARES BEGAN TO TRADE FRIDAY
B. P.'S PARTIALLY PAID AMERICAN DEPOSITARY SHARES CLOSED UNCHANGED AT SEVENTEEN AND A QUARTER WITH THIRTEEN POINT TWO MILLION TRADED
IT WAS THE BIG BOARD'S MOST ACTIVE ISSUE
UNTIL NOW *NASDAQ* OR OTHER N. A. S. D.'S AUTOMATED QUOTATION SYSTEMS HAS PROVIDED COMPUTER TERMINALS WITH PRICE QUOTATIONS ON ALL ISSUES
MOST BIG TRADES HOWEVER ARE NEGOTIATED BY TELEPHONE AND THEN RECORDED IN THE SYSTEM'S COMPUTERS
ONLY THE SMALL ORDER SYSTEM HAS PROVIDED TRADERS WITH THE ABILITY TO EXECUTE TRADES BY COMPUTER RATHER THAN BY TELEPHONE
STILL THE COMPANY INSIDERS SAID THE RESTRUCTURING WAS ENTIRELY MR. ASKERS'S PLAN AND WASN'T FORCED ON HIM BY THE I. B. M. BOARD
A DIRECTOR SAID THE BOARD LEARNED OF THE PLAN AT ITS MEETING LAST TUESDAY
<NOISE> JOHN FOUND EVERYTHING WAS COMING ONTO HIS DESK AND HE HAD MORE THAN HE COULD COPE WITH ANOTHER DIRECTOR SAID
HE WANTED AN ORGANIZATION WHICH RESOLVED MORE PROBLEMS BEFORE THEY GOT TO HIM
THE E. P. A. PROPOSED MINIMUM STANDARDS FOR MUNICIPAL TRASH DUMPS THAT THE AGENCY ESTIMATED WILL COST EIGHT HUNDRED AND EIGHTY SEVEN MILLION DOLLARS A YEAR
THE PROPOSED RULES WOULD REQUIRE ABOUT SIX THOUSAND DUMPS TO INSTALL GROUNDWATER MONITORING SYSTEMS
THEY WOULD ALSO CLOSE SOME DUMPS AND PUT SPECIAL CONDITIONS ON OTHERS IN CERTAIN AREAS
HOPING TO PREVENT LONG COSTLY DISPUTES OVER WHAT DOCUMENTS DEFENDANTS HAVE TO SURRENDER JUDGES GRANT BLANKET PROTECTIVE ORDERS
THE ORDERS TYPICALLY BAR PUBLIC DISSEMINATION OF RECORDS AND DEPOSITIONS EVEN AFTER A SETTLEMENT OR VERDICT
PLAINTIFFS' LAWYERS GENERALLY HAVEN'T BALKED AS LONG AS THEY CAN GET THE INFORMATION THEY NEED TO PREPARE FOR THEIR TRIALS

MR. BERNSTEIN NOTED THAT RANDOM HOUSE HAS EXPANDED IN OTHER DIRECTIONS NOTABLY IN TRADE PUBLISHING
TRADE BOOKS ARE ALL BOOKS SOLD DIRECTLY TO CONSUMERS IN BOOK STORES AND THROUGH MAIL ORDERS
ANSWER YES WITHOUT QUESTION
IT'S MY SENSE THAT THERE WAS A TIME WHEN PEOPLE THOUGHT THEY COULD TRADE ON INSIDE INFORMATION WITHOUT ABSOLUTE IMPUNITY
AND THAT'S NO LONGER TRUE
NOW I AM CERTAIN THAT THERE ARE STILL PEOPLE WHO THINK THEY CAN TRADE ON INSIDE INFORMATION AND GET AWAY WITH IT BECAUSE THEY'RE SMARTER THAN THE AVERAGE PERSON
THERE WILL ALWAYS BE THOSE PEOPLE
BUT I THINK THAT THE ACTIONS HAVE HAD A SIGNIFICANT EFFECT ON CONDUCT
THIS GROWING RELIANCE ON THIRD PARTIES TO SELL PRODUCTS COULD HINDER H. P.'S ABILITY TO MANAGE ITS BUSINESS AND MAKE THE COMPANY'S STOCK LESS ATTRACTIVE TO INVESTORS

TODAY H. P. HAS LESS CONTROL OVER ITS FUTURE

MY FEAR OF FAILURE MAY BE GREATER IN SOME RESPECTS

WELL THAT'S NOT EXACTLY TRUE
I'M NOT THE SAME PERSON I WAS

HOWEVER THESE LEGISLATORS ARE WORRIED ABOUT THE DETAILS THAT MIGHT BE INCLUDED IN THE REPORT
ALSO SINCE MILITARY CONTRACTS BETWEEN JERUSALEM AND PRETORIA ARE SECRET AND IT ISN'T KNOWN WHETHER THE PACTS CONTAIN RENEWAL CLAUSES IT WILL BE DIFFICULT TO MONITOR ISRAELI COMPLIANCE

SO OUR WILLIAM MCGURN INQUIRED INTO HOW MANY HAVE BEEN EXPORTED FROM KOREA TO JAPAN

THIS WAS DOWN FROM NINETEEN EIGHTY FIVE WHEN EXPORTS REACHED ONE SOLD TO MITSUBISHI
TO DO THE JOB S. C. I. HAS ASSEMBLED WHAT ANALYSTS CALL A CRACK MANAGEMENT TEAM
PRESIDENT EUGENE SAPP RUNS THE COMPANY ON A DAY TO DAY BASIS AND HE DOES SO IN A NO FRILLS ATMOSPHERE
FOR EXAMPLE COMPANY CARS PLANES AND COUNTRY P- CLUB MEMBERSHIPS ARE TABOO
ON FRIDAY SHEARSON LEHMAN BROTHERS INCORPORATED SAID IT IS EASING PROGRAM TRADING FOR ITS OWN ACCOUNT

I THINK IT'S A PERFECTLY HONORABLE PROFESSION

THE PRODUCT IS AN LEGITIMATE HEDGING PRODUCT AND A LEGITIMATE WAY TO ADD LIQUIDITY TO THE MARKET
UNLIKE TRADITIONAL WHOLE LIFE POLICIES IN WHICH THE PREMIUM AND DEATH BENEFIT ARE FIXED UNIVERSAL LIFE GIVES HOLDERS CONSIDERABLE LATITUDE TO VARY THEIR PAYMENTS AND BENEFITS
BUT IT HAS LIMITED GUARANTEES AND MUCH INVESTMENT RISK IS TRANSFERRED TO THE HOLDER
PREMIUM DOLLARS ARE INVESTED IN THE SAVING PORTION OF THE PLAN AND MONEY IS DEDUCTED PERIODICALLY TO PAY FOR ADMINISTRATIVE EXPENSES AND THE INSURANCE COVERAGE

DAVID HOCKNEY HAS BEEN A KIND OF WUNDERKIND ON THE INTERNATIONAL ART SCENE SINCE HE BURST UPON IT IN HIS NATIVE BRITAIN IN THE LATE NINETEEN FIFTIES
HE IS NOW FIFTY YEARS OLD AND THIS MID CAREER RETROSPECTIVE AT THE LOS ANGELES COUNTY MUSEUM MAKES CLEAR ONCE AGAIN HOW PRECOCIOUS AND PROLIFIC HE HAS BEEN

FOR ALTHOUGH MR. HOCKNEY'S TALENT AND ORIGINALITY ARE GENERALLY ACKNOWLEDGED HE IS REGARDED IN SOME QUARTERS AS MORE OF A GIFTED ILLUSTRATOR THAN A MAJOR ARTIST
AND SINCE IN RECENT YEARS HIS WORK HAS TENDED TO BE INCREASINGLY DECORATIVE A CHRONOLOGICAL ARRANGEMENT WAS APPARENTLY THOUGHT TO BE TOO RISKY

THE FIRST WAS A COMPOSITE TAPE THAT BROUGHT INFORMATION FROM VARIOUS MARKET CENTERS ONTO ONE TICKER TAPE
A COMPOSITE QUOTATION DISPLAY SYSTEM SOON FOLLOWED ALLOWING CUSTOMERS AND BROKERS TO SEE QUOTES FROM ALL MARKETS ON A SINGLE SCREEN
AND AN INTERNATIONAL MARKET TRADING SYSTEM ALLOWED ORDERS COMING TO VARIOUS EXCHANGE FLOORS TO FLOW FROM ONE EXCHANGE TO ANOTHER QUICKLY EASILY AND AT NO COST

<NOISE> FOR AUTHORS AND PUBLISHERS A NEW COMPETITOR IN THE BOOK CLUB FIELD IS A GODSEND

FURTHERMORE A BOOK CLUB IMPRIMATUR ON A BOOK GIVES IT ENORMOUS CACHET WITH BOOKSTORE MANAGERS

THUS HIGHER BIDDING NARROWS THE INVESTOR'S RETURN WHILE LOWER BIDDING WIDENS IT
THE PERCENTAGE RATES ARE CALCULATED ON A THREE HUNDRED AND SIXTY DAY YEAR WHILE THE COUPON EQUIVALENT YIELD IS BASED ON A THREE HUNDRED AND SIXTY FIVE DAY YEAR

AND AS THE CANADIAN UNIT RISES IT LURES MORE FOREIGN INVESTMENT PARTICULARLY FROM JAPAN WHICH ADDS TO ITS STRENGTH
THE TREASURY RULES HOWEVER CONTAIN MODIFICATIONS OF THE S. E. C. RULES DESIGNED TO IMPROVE PROTECTION OF PARTIES INVOLVED IN REPURCHASE AGREEMENTS
<NOISE> IN SUCH AGREEMENTS CALLED REPOS ONE PARTY SELLS GOVERNMENT SECURITIES TO ANOTHER WITH THE UNDERSTANDING THAT THE SELLER WILL REPURCHASE THEM LATER AT A SPECIFIED PRICE
THE PROPOSED MODIFICATIONS WOULD APPLY TO GOVERNMENT SECURITIES BROKERS OR DEALERS THAT ARE ALREADY REGISTERED AS WELL AS TO NEWLY REGISTERED ENTITIES
NEVERTHELESS INTEREST RATES FELL ON SHORT TERM TREASURY BILLS SOLD YESTERDAY AT THE GOVERNMENT'S WEEKLY AUCTION
THE AVERAGE RATE ON NEW THIRTEEN WEEK BILLS DECLINED TO FIVE POINT FIFTY NINE PERCENT FROM FIVE POINT EIGHTY ONE PERCENT AT LAST WEEK'S SALE
THE AVERAGE RATE ON NEW TWENTY SIX WEEK BILLS FELL TO FIVE POINT NINETY NINE PERCENT FROM SIX POINT ONE PERCENT THE PREVIOUS WEEK

TO BE SURE A FEW COMPANIES ARE TRYING TO USE THE OLYMPICS TO MAKE THE TRANSITION FROM A SUBCONTRACTOR TO AN INTERNATIONALLY KNOWN BRAND

IT PAID FOUR POINT FIVE MILLION DOLLARS IN CASH AND GOODS TO BE AN OFFICIAL SPONSOR OF THE GAMES AND HAS BEEN HIGHLIGHTING THE LOGO IN ITS ADVERTISING

VIEWERS AND CRITICS SAY THE HUGE LOAD OF ADS AND AIRTIME IS PART OF THE PROBLEM
<NOISE> COMMERCIAL CLUTTER SEEMS GREATER THAN IN PREVIOUS OLYMPICS BROADCASTS MANY CRITICS SAY
THE COVERAGE BETWEEN ADS SOME COMPLAIN IS FRAGMENTED AND SHIFTY JUMPING TOO QUICKLY AMONG MYRIAD SPORTS
ACTUAL EVENTS AS OPPOSED TO TAPED PROFILES PREVIEWS AND REPORTS TAKE UP LESS THAN HALF OF THE AIRTIME
MANY HEADLINE EVENTS DON'T APPEAR UNTIL AFTER MIDNIGHT
THE STUDY WAS PART OF CORNELL'S RESPONSE TO CALLS BY LOCAL POLITICIANS THAT IT SHOULD HELP MORE IN TOMPKINS COUNTY
WHEN THE SCHOOLS WERE RANKED BY OPERATING BUDGET OR BY VALUE OF BUILDINGS CORNELL'S ONE POINT TWO MILLION DOLLAR PAYMENTS WERE FOUND TO BE NEAR THE BOTTOM OF THE LIST
<NOISE> IN PER STUDENT PAYMENTS CORNELL RANKED SEVENTH AT SEVENTY DOLLARS
MR. DELCHAMPS SAID THIRTY PERCENT OF THE COMPANY'S STOCK OUTSTANDING IS HELD BY PEOPLE WHO HAVE AGREED NOT TO SELL THEIR HOLDINGS BEFORE OCTOBER THIRTY FIRST
ANOTHER TWENTY FIVE PERCENT IS HELD UNDER THE COMPANY'S EMPLOYEE STOCK OWNERSHIP PLAN
MOST OF THE PEOPLE IN THE FORMER CATEGORY ARE EXPECTED TO EXTEND THE NO SELL AGREEMENT FOR ANOTHER YEAR HE SAID
THE LOWER VOLATILITY COULD BE ESPECIALLY IMPORTANT RIGHT NOW WHEN THE COURSE OF INTEREST RATES SEEMS ESPECIALLY CLOUDY

<NOISE> AFTER THAT HOWEVER THEY SAY RATES COULD FALL AGAIN PERHAPS SHARPLY AS ECONOMIC GROWTH SLOWS IN NINETEEN EIGHTY NINE

HE CLEARLY COMMANDS THE DEMOCRATS' MOST LOYAL CONSTITUENCY

IN APRIL DREXEL AGREED TO PAY SIX HUNDRED AND FIFTY MILLION DOLLARS AND PLEAD GUILTY TO SIX FELONY COUNTS RELATED TO A FEDERAL INSIDER TRADING INVESTIGATION
THE PLEA AGREEMENT WAS MADE IN CONJUNCTION WITH A BROAD SETTLEMENT OF SECURITIES LAW VIOLATIONS WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION
BECAUSE THE FIRM AGREED THAT IT COMMITTED FELONIES SECURITIES COMMISSIONERS IN MOST STATES CAN AUTOMATICALLY REVOKE DREXEL'S LICENSE TO DO BUSINESS
WHY THIS INCREDIBLE DIVERSION OF EFFORT TO "QUOTE CRIMES "UNQUOTE THAT OFTEN ARE NOT CLEARLY DEFINED BY STATUTE AND WHERE IDENTIFIABLE VICTIMS ARE SELDOM FOUND
MAYBE TOO MANY OF TODAY'S PROSECUTORS WERE INFLUENCED BY THE PREVAILING COUNTERCULTURE SUSPICIONS OF MIDDLE CLASS MORALITY DURING THEIR LAW SCHOOL DAYS
BUT ANOTHER ANSWER IS SIMPLER IT IS EASIER TO EXTRACT PLEA BARGAINS FROM TRADERS WITH A MERE MENTION OF RICO THAN FROM REAL FELONS

<NOISE> IT WAS THE BIG BOARD'S MOST ACTIVE ISSUE
DURING THE PAST SEVERAL DAYS CORPORATIONS AND OTHER BIG INVESTORS HAVE REFRAINED FROM LENDING TREASURY BONDS AND NOTES TO SECURITIES DEALERS FOR BRIEF PERIODS
THAT IN TURN HAS FORCED MANY DEALERS TO REFRAIN FROM SELLING BORROWED SECURITIES OR AMASSING SO CALLED SHORT POSITIONS
"QUOTE IT'S HARD TO SHORT ANYTHING IN THIS MARKET AT THE MOMENT "UNQUOTE SAID A TRADER AT A LARGE GOVERNMENT SECURITIES DEALER
MOST ANALYSTS SAID THE INTERNATIONAL OPERATIONS OF THE TWO BANKS MAKE A GOOD FIT
GENERALE DE BANQUE HAS A STRONG NETWORK IN AFRICA WHILE AMRO HAS MORE OPERATIONS IN THE MIDDLE EAST AND FAR EAST
AND WHILE GENERALE DE BANQUE HAS AN IMPORTANT COMMERCIAL BANKING OPERATION AMRO HAS MORE EXPERIENCE IN BROKERAGE AND INVESTMENT SERVICES FOR ITS CLIENTS
THINGS ARE A BIT DULLER THIS YEAR

MY HIGH SCHOOL'S ADMINISTRATION WOULD TOO

BENETTON DENIES ALL CHARGES ON THE SPECIFIC ACCUSATIONS BY UNHAPPY STORE OWNERS AND STEADFASTLY MAINTAINS THAT IT ISN'T A FRANCHISE OPERATION AND THUS ISN'T SUBJECT TO FRANCHISE REQUIREMENTS
STORE OWNERS IT SAYS ARE LICENSEES BECAUSE THEY OWN THEIR STORES AND DON'T PAY ROYALTIES TO BENETTON AS FRANCHISEES TYPICALLY DO
ALTHOUGH IT ACKNOWLEDGES THAT A FEW STORE OWNERS HAVE COMPLAINED IT BLAMES ANY PROBLEMS ON THE OWNERS THEMSELVES OR ON ITS FIELD REPRESENTATIVES WHO DEAL DIRECTLY WITH THEM

THE MARKET FOR HOME GEAR IS GROWING AS SPENDING SHIFTS FROM APPAREL TO THE HOME SAYS KURT BARNARD OF THE RETAIL MARKETING REPORT NEW YORK
HE SAYS SALES AT HOME RELATED STORES ARE GROWING NINETY ONE PERCENT FASTER THAN AT DEPARTMENT STORES AND SEVENTY FIVE PERCENT FASTER THAN AT APPAREL STORES
THE TREND IS MAKING THE MARKET "QUOTE LESS DEPENDENT ON HOUSING MARKET CYCLES SAYS CARL STEIDTMANN CHIEF ECONOMIST OF MANAGEMENT HORIZONS DUBLIN OHIO
WHILE SECOND QUARTER HOUSING STARTS WERE DOWN THIRTY PERCENT FROM TWO YEARS AGO FURNITURE SALES WERE UP EIGHTEEN PERCENT HE SAYS
THESE MIXED FEELINGS OF FRUSTRATION WITH AND GRATITUDE TOWARD THE AUTHORITIES ARE PART OF THE EVERYDAY LIFE OF A FOREIGNER DOING BUSINESS IN KOREA
IN FACT SUCH CONTRADICTIONS ARE WHAT SEEM TO MAKE THE KOREAN WORLD GO ROUND
A WESTERN BUSINESSMAN NEEDS TO BE READY FOR THEM
HERE ARE A FEW HARD LEARNED FACTS OF KOREAN BUSINESS LIFE

IT COSTS KUWAIT ABOUT A DOLLAR TO PUMP A BARREL OF OIL AND ANOTHER FIFTY CENTS TO BRING IT TO EUROPE
THE PRODUCTION COST OF NORTH SEAS OIL BY CONTRAST RUNS BETWEEN EIGHT AND THIRTEEN DOLLARS A BARREL
THE BIG DIFFERENCE DISTURBS EUROPEAN OIL MEN
THE QUESTION WAS WHAT FORM THIS CONFLICT WOULD TAKE
THE CIVIL WAR WAS FINALLY FOUGHT OVER MAINTAINING THE UNION
BUT WHAT IF THERE HAD BEEN NO UNION
WHAT IF THE SOUTH HAD BEEN A SEPARATE NATION

I WOULDN'T BET AGAINST IT

S. D. I. PERPETUATES THE ILLUSION THAT MORE WEAPONS EQUALS MORE SECURITY
OUR DEPENDENCE UPON VIOLENCE TO RESOLVE CONFLICT IS A SHORT RUN SOLUTION TO A LONG TERM PROBLEM

<NOISE> THIS MEANS THAT JAPANESE FARMERS HAVE TREMENDOUS CONTROL OVER JAPANESE POLITICS
FOOD PRICES IN JAPAN TAKE FORTY PERCENT OR MORE OF THE AVERAGE PERSON'S WAGE
WITH HOUSING TAKING ANOTHER FORTY PERCENT AND THE FACT THAT THE JAPANESE ARE GREAT SAVERS THEY ARE LEFT WITH ALMOST NO DISCRETIONARY INCOME
THIS IS WHY THEY CANNOT DEVELOP A DOMESTIC MARKET
THEY DON'T HAVE MONEY TO SPEND EXCEPT A SMALL AMOUNT OF SAVINGS THAT THEY SPEND ONLY ON SPECIAL OCCASIONS OR FOR UNUSUAL BARGAINS

<NOISE> AGENCIES GENERALLY DON'T USE UNDERCOVER TESTERS POSING AS PROSPECTIVE TENANTS AS THEY DO IN RACE DISCRIMINATION COMPLAINTS THEY FEAR THAT THE TESTER COULD BE ATTACKED
INSTEAD THEY TRY TO BUILD CASES ON THE TESTIMONY OF CURRENT AND FORMER TENANTS

GENERALLY THERE'S NO LIMIT ON HOW MUCH OF THEIR FUNDS EMPLOYEES CAN BORROW IF THEIR ACCOUNTS TOTAL TEN THOUSAND DOLLARS OR LESS
<NOISE> FOR LARGER ACCOUNTS EMPLOYEES ARE RESTRICTED TO BORROWING HALF THE TOTAL BUT NO MORE THAN FIFTY THOUSAND DOLLARS
<NOISE> LOANS MUST BE REPAID WITHIN FIVE YEARS UNLESS THE MONEY GOES TOWARD BUYING A PRINCIPAL RESIDENCE IN WHICH CASE LONGER REPAYMENT TERMS CAN BE ARRANGED
BORROWED FUNDS AREN'T TAXED
BUT A WITHDRAWAL IS TREATED AS TAXABLE INCOME AND IS SUBJECT TO AN ADDITIONAL TEN PERCENT PENALTY TAX

BUT THE DEPARTMENT IS VERY CLOSE TO REACHING ITS LIMITS ON ISSUING LONG TERM DEBT AND THUS HAS ASKED CONGRESS TO INCREASE ITS AUTHORITY

IN RECENT MONTHS SPICER HAS CUT ITS ONE THOUSAND MEMBER U. S. STAFF BY TEN PERCENT IN AN EFFORT TO CUT COSTS
MR. BERNSTEIN SAID THAT A MERGER OF THE TWO FIRMS WORLD WIDE WOULD CREATE AN INTERNATIONAL ORGANIZATION WITH ONE BILLION IN ANNUAL REVENUE
"QUOTE WE BELIEVE SPICER IS A VERY GOOD NICHE FIRM BUT OUR MERGER DISCUSSIONS ARE VERY EARLY AT THIS POINT "UNQUOTE HE SAID

WHY SHOULD FOREIGN IMPORTS BE A BETTER MEASURE OF U. S. EXPORTS
AND WHY ARE THE EXPORT DATA SO BAD
<NOISE> IMPORT DATA ARE DIRECTLY COLLECTED BY A SINGLE GOVERNMENT AGENCY THEY PROVIDE REVENUE FROM TARIFFS AND THEY PROVIDE POLITICALLY IMPORTANT MEASURES OF GOODS SUBJECT TO QUOTAS
THESE ASPECTS OF IMPORT ACCOUNTING ENCOURAGE GOVERNMENT AGENTS TO AMASS ACCURATE IMPORT DATA
CONVERSELY FOR EXPORTS SELF INTEREST INDUCES UNDERREPORTING
THERE IS NO SHORTAGE OF EXAMPLES

ECONOMISTS SAID THAT THE NEW INDEX HAS THE ADVANTAGE OF BEING A MORE RELIABLE READING <NOISE> AND THE DISADVANTAGE OF COMING OUT ONLY ONCE A QUARTER RATHER THAN EVERY MONTH
NEWSPAPERS' COSTS ARE UP SHARPLY THIS YEAR LARGELY BECAUSE OF HIGHER NEWSPRINT PRICES THE INDUSTRY'S BIGGEST COST BEHIND LABOR EXPENSES
SINCE OCTOBER NINETEEN EIGHTY SIX PRICES HAVE RISEN THREE TIMES BY A TOTAL OF ABOUT TWENTY ONE PERCENT
NEWSPAPERS HAVE RESPONDED BY USING LIGHTER WEIGHT PAPER TRIMMING PAGE SIZE AND CUTTING THE SPACE FOR NEWS

AND THOSE WHO HAVE NOT YET DEVELOPED AIDS CAN TAKE STEPS TO GUARD AGAINST OTHER DISEASES SUCH AS HERPES AND HEPATITIS THAT ARE BELIEVED TO ACCELERATE ITS ONSET

IN ADDITION TO A LARGE FUEL LOAD FOR THE FLIGHT TO PHOENIX ARIZONA THE FLIGHT WAS JAMMED WITH PASSENGERS

LATE LAST NIGHT THE ASSOCIATED PRESS REPORTED THAT THE GIRL WAS IDENTIFIED BY HER GRANDFATHER
HER FATHER MOTHER AND BROTHER WERE PASSENGERS ON THE NORTHWEST AIRLINER AND DIED IN THE CRASH

THEY COULDN'T HAVE A BETTER PERSON ON THE JOB AT THIS TIME MR. RUDER SAYS
I COME WITH NO BAGGAGE WITH NO PRECONCEIVED IDEAS ABOUT THE BEST REGULATORY METHOD OR THE BEST WAY THE MARKET SHOULD OPERATE
I COME WITH VERY STRONG *CONCEPTUAL* SKILLS WITH VERY STRONG HISTORICAL KNOWLEDGE OF THE RELATIONSHIP OF THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION TO THE REGULATION OF THE SECURITIES MARKETS

OF COURSE IF THE APPEAL FAILS MANY VENTURES COULD BE JEOPARDIZED OR SCRATCHED
BUT IF IT SUCCEEDS COMPANIES THAT HAVEN'T DISMANTLED OR SCALED BACK THEIR RESEARCH EFFORTS COULD SUDDENLY BE AHEAD OF THE COMPETITION

ITS NET INCOME CLIMBED FIVE POINT ONE PERCENT EVEN THOUGH GAINS FROM ASSET SALES CONTRIBUTED THIRTY FOUR CENTS A SHARE TO YEAR EARLIER PROFIT

THESE MIXED FEELINGS OF FRUSTRATION WITH AND GRATITUDE TOWARD THE AUTHORITIES ARE PART OF THE EVERYDAY LIFE OF A FOREIGNER DOING BUSINESS IN KOREA
IN FACT SUCH CONTRADICTIONS ARE WHAT SEEM TO MAKE THE KOREAN WORLD GO ROUND
A WESTERN BUSINESSMAN NEEDS TO BE READY FOR THEM
HERE ARE A FEW HARD LEARNED FACTS OF KOREAN BUSINESS LIFE
<NOISE> THE TRASH
PROOFS OF PURCHASE AND SALES RECEIPTS THAT HAD BEEN TURNED IN FOR CONSUMER PRODUCT REBATES AND ALREADY PAID
THE WOMEN RESUBMITTED THOUSANDS OF THE REBATES AND CAMOUFLAGED THEIR TRAIL BY VARYING THEIR NAMES AND USING POSTAL BOXES ALL OVER THE COUNTRY

FOOD PRICES IN JAPAN TAKE FORTY PERCENT OR MORE OF THE AVERAGE PERSON'S WAGE
WITH HOUSING TAKING ANOTHER FORTY PERCENT AND THE FACT THAT THE JAPANESE ARE GREAT SAVERS THEY ARE LEFT WITH ALMOST NO DISCRETIONARY INCOME
THIS IS WHY THEY CANNOT DEVELOP A DOMESTIC MARKET
THEY DON'T HAVE ENOUGH MONEY TO SPEND EXCEPT A SMALL AMOUNT OF SAVINGS <NOISE> THAT THEY SPEND ONLY ON SPECIAL OCCASIONS OR FOR UNUSUAL BARGAINS

THE UNITED NATIONS WHOSE GARBAGE BILL IS FORTY TWO THOUSAND DOLLARS A MONTH IS SERVED BY NATIONAL CARTING COMPANY WHICH WON THE PICKUP RIGHTS EIGHT YEARS AGO
LAST DECEMBER THE U. N. DIDN'T ATTEMPT TO SOLICIT BIDS
IT SIMPLY EXTENDED ITS CONTRACT WITH NATIONAL CARTING
SOLICITING BIDS IN THIS PARTICULAR INDUSTRY IS NOT THE WAY TO GO A U. N. SPOKESMAN SAYS IMPLYING THAT IT IS FUTILE
BUT CRITICS CHARGED THAT THE COLLAR ACTUALLY ADDED TO VOLATILITY BY MAKING IT MORE DIFFICULT FOR INDEX ARBITRAGERS TO DO THEIR BUSINESS
MANY TRADERS ARGUE THAT SUCH ARBITRAGE HAS THE EFFECT OF SMOOTHING OUT VOLATILITY IN THE MARKETS

WHAT IS MEANT BY THAT IS THAT AMERICANS APPARENTLY OWN FEWER ASSETS ABROAD THAN FOREIGNERS OWN IN THE U. S.
MANY PEOPLE HAVE POINTED OUT THAT THESE CALCULATIONS ARE SPURIOUS BECAUSE THE ASSETS ARE NOT ALL VALUED ON THE SAME BASIS
IF ALL ASSETS WERE VALUED AT TODAY'S PRICES THE NET DEBT OF THE U. S. WOULD CERTAINLY BE MUCH SMALLER THAN IT NOW APPEARS AND MIGHT BE A NET ASSET

FOR INVESTORS HIGH RATIOS ARE CLEARLY OF CONCERN
IT *CUTS* INTO POTENTIAL RETURN EVEN WHEN A FUND IS DOING WELL
AND IT LEAVES A FUND WITH LESS OF A CUSHION IN CASE PERFORMANCE SOURS

MR. ZEHNDER PLAYS DOWN THIS CRITICISM
<NOISE> HE POINTS TO THE FACT THAT CREDIT SUISSE LEADS IN THE NUMBER OF PUBLICLY LISTED BONDS LAUNCHED BUT LAGS IN THE NUMBER OF UNLISTED NOTES IT ISSUED

IT OWNS ITS LOS ANGELES AND SAN FRANCISCO BOTTLERS FOR INSTANCE MAKING THE CENTRAL CALIFORNIA TERRITORY A GOOD FIT

<NOISE> IT IS QUITE POSSIBLE SCIENTISTS SPECULATE THAT DURING ATTEMPTS TO REPAIR THE ARTERY WALL THE BODY AT SOME POINT TRIES TO DISSOLVE A BLOOD CLOT

IN SUCH AGREEMENTS CALLED REPOS ONE PARTY SELLS GOVERNMENT SECURITIES TO ANOTHER WITH THE UNDERSTANDING THAT THE SELLER WILL REPURCHASE THEM LATER AT A SPECIFIED PRICE

THE MARKET FOR HOME GEAR IS GROWING AS SPENDING SHIFTS <NOISE> FROM APPAREL TO THE HOME SAYS KURT BARNARD OF THE RETAIL MARKETING REPORT NEW YORK
HE SAYS SALES AT HOME RELATED STORES ARE GROWING NINETY S- ONE PERCENT FASTER THAN AT DEPARTMENT STORES AND SEVENTY FIVE PERCENT FASTER THAN AT APPAREL STORES
THE TREND IS MAKING THE MARKET LESS DEPENDENT ON HOU:SING MARKET CYCLES SAYS CARL STEIDTMANN CHIEF ECONOMIST OF MANAGEMENT HORIZONS DUBLIN OHIO
WHILE SECOND QUARTER HOUSING STARTS WERE DOWN THIRTY PERCENT FROM TWO YEARS AGO FURNITURE SALES WERE UP EIGHTEEN PERCENT HE SAYS
THESE MIXED FEELINGS OF FRUSTRATION WITH AND GRATITUDE TOWARD THE AUTHORITIES ARE PART OF THE EVERYDAY LIFE OF A FOREIGNER DOING BUSINESS IN KOREA
IN FACT SUCH CONTRADICTIONS ARE WHAT SEEM TO MAKE THE KOREAN WORLD GO ROUND
A WESTERN BUSINESSMAN NEEDS TO BE READY FOR THEM
HERE ARE A FEW HARD LEARNED FACTS OF KOREAN BUSINESS LIFE
MR. GRANT WAS TRAVELING AND UNAVAILABLE FOR COMMENT
OTHER OFFICIALS OF GRANT BROADCASTING AREN'T AUTHORIZED TO COMMENT ON ANY ASPECTS OF THE CASE AIDES TO MR. GRANT SAID
THE COMPANY'S BANKRUPTCY CASE LAWYER IN PHILADELPHIA WASN'T AVAILABLE FOR COMMENT
MR. SHLENKER COULDN'T BE REACHED
BECAUSE OF THAT SOME WALL STREET PROFESSIONALS THINK THE STOCK LOOKS RATHER EXPENSIVE
IT HAS TRIPLED SINCE NINETEEN EIGHTY FIVE LARGELY ON TAKEOVER SPECULATION
IT CURRENTLY TRADES AT ABOUT NINE TIMES CASH FLOW SAYS ALAN GAINES OF GAINES BERLAND AN INSTITUTIONAL BROKERAGE FIRM
THAT'S ABOUT A THIRTY PERCENT PREMIUM TO QUALITY OIL COMPANIES LIKE ROYAL DUTCH PETROLEUM EXXON AND MOBIL HE SAYS
TO THESE ENDS K. P. C. ENJOYS A HUGE ECONOMIC ADVANTAGE
IT COSTS KUWAIT ABOUT A DOLLAR TO PUMP A BARREL OF OIL AND ANOTHER FIFTY CENTS TO BRING IT TO EUROPE
THE PRODUCTION COST OF NORTH SEA OIL BY CONTRAST RUNS BETWEEN EIGHT DOLLARS AND THIRTEEN DOLLARS A BARREL
THE BIG DIFFERENCE DISTURBS EUROPEAN OIL MEN
<NOISE> THE QUESTION WAS WHAT FORM THIS CONFLICT WOULD TAKE
THE CIVIL WAR WAS FINALLY FOUGHT OVER MAINTAINING THE UNION
BUT WHAT IF THERE HAD BEEN NO UNION
WHAT IF THE SOUTH HAD BEEN A SEPARATE NATION
WOULD SOUTHERNERS BLACK OR WHITE HAVE EVER ACHIEVED FULL EQUALITY IF THEY HAD BEEN INCORPORATED INTO THE UNION AS A CONQUERED PROVINCE
OR WHAT IF THE WAR HAD BEEN AVOIDED AND SLAVERY JUST DRIFTED ON AND ON
<NOISE> WOULD THE SOUTH HAVE BECOME ANOTHER SOUTH AFRICA
I WOULDN'T BET AGAINST IT
IT STILL ISN'T CLEAR WHAT FORM THE INCREASES WILL TAKE OR WHEN THEY WILL GO INTO EFFECT
<NOISE> SOME CARRIERS SAID THEY PLAN TO RAISE FARES SUNDAY AND OTHERS SAID THEY WILL ACT A WEEK LATER
<NOISE> SOME AIRLINES ALSO SAID THE INCREASES WON'T AFFECT THEIR LOWEST DISCOUNT FARES
IN ADDITION LAURENTIAN SAID BERNHARD M. KOCH THIRTY THREE WAS NAMED VICE PRESIDENT AND CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER
HE SUCCEEDS JOHN STROM WHO TRANSFERRED TO A LAURENTIAN CAPITAL UNIT
PREVIOUSLY MR. KOCH WAS DIRECTOR OF INTERNAL AUDIT AT LAURENTIAN GROUP CORPORATION AND IMPERIAL LIFE ASSURANCE COMPANY OF CANADA MAJORITY SHAREHOLDERS OF LAURENTIAN CAPITAL
BUT THEY MAY NOT BE TRYING HARD ENOUGH OR AT LEAST NOT IN THE RIGHT WAYS
THEY NEED ONLY LISTEN TO THE GROUP OF EIGHT WOMEN GATHERED HERE FOR A DISCUSSION OF WHAT THEY LIKE AND WHAT THEY DON'T ABOUT THE LATEST TRENDS IN FASHION RETAILING
MANUFACTURERS WOULD SWIFTLY LEARN THAT THEIR CLOTHES OFTEN AREN'T RIGHT FOR WOMEN WHO WORK WHILE RETAILERS WOULD FIND THAT THEY HAVEN'T SUFFICIENTLY TAKEN INTO ACCOUNT THEIR CUSTOMERS' BUSY LIVES
<NOISE> NEW YORK CITY'S BOARD OF EDUCATION WOULD DISAGREE
MY HIGH SCHOOL'S ADMINISTRATION WOULD TOO
ALSO MY UNION THE UNITED FEDERATION OF TEACHERS AND EVERY REPUBLICAN AND DEMOCRAT WHO HAS EVER RUN FOR PUBLIC OFFICE ANYWHERE
AND MOST VEHEMENTLY OF ALL THE LEAGUE OF WOMEN VOTERS

<NOISE> THAT FIGURE INCLUDES A THIRTEEN MILLION DOLLAR GAIN FROM INTERCOMPANY INCOME TAX BENEFITS UNDER THE CORPORATION'S TAX SHARING AGREEMENT
<NOISE> IN THE YEAR AGO QUARTER TEXAS COMMERCE HAD A LOSS OF THIRTEEN POINT FIVE MILLION DOLLARS WHICH INCLUDED A SPECIAL CHARGE FROM THE RESTRUCTURING
CHEMICAL ACQUIRED TEXAS COMMERCE IN MAY NINETEEN EIGHTY SEVEN
THE RICHMOND VIRGINIA MEDIA CONCERN SAID SALES AND PROFITS FROM ITS NEWSPRINT OPERATIONS WERE AHEAD OF YEAR EARLIER LEVELS
ITS CABLE SYSTEM CONTINUED TO GAIN SUBSCRIBERS NOW TOTALING MORE THAN ONE HUNDRED AND FIFTY SEVEN THOUSAND
REVENUE PER SUBSCRIBER IS EXCEEDING FORECASTS MEDIA GENERAL SAID ADDING THAT IT PLANS TO INCREASE RATES AN AVERAGE OF EIGHT PERCENT BEGINNING IN JANUARY
PRICES GRADUALLY MOVED HIGHER THROUGH MIDAFTERNOON WHEN THE MARKET PEAKED AND THEN STARTED ITS RETREAT

<NOISE> THEY'VE BEEN PEELING OFF SOME STOCK TO TAKE ADVANTAGE OF BETTER PRICES HE SAID
DURING THE SPRING AND SUMMER THE FED NUDGED UP SHORT TERM INTEREST RATES TO RESTRAIN THE ECONOMY
BUT WORRIED AS ALWAYS ABOUT BECOMING A POLITICAL FOOTBALL THE FED TRIED TO KEEP A LOW PROFILE IN THE WEEKS BEFORE THE ELECTION
THAT STRATEGY WAS HELPED BY AN APPARENT SLOWDOWN IN ECONOMIC GROWTH IN THE THIRD QUARTER WHICH EASED INFLATION WORRIES AND ALLOWED THE FED TO STOP PUSHING UP RATES
<NOISE> IN THE YEAR EARLIER QUARTER THE LA JOLLA CALIFORNIA INDUSTRIAL AND INVESTMENT CONCERN HAD A RESTATED LOSS OF FIFTY SEVEN MILLION DOLLARS
THE RESULTS WERE RESTATED TO REFLECT DISCONTINUED OPERATIONS AND THE CONSOLIDATION OF ITS SIGNAL LANDMARK HOLDINGS INC. UNIT A REAL ESTATE DEVELOPER <NOISE>

THAT IS DEAD WRONG
WE HAVE BEEN IN CONSULTATIONS WITH JAPAN ON THIS ISSUE SINCE NOVEMBER LONG BEFORE PRESENT TRADE LEGISLATION WAS INTRODUCED
THE PRESIDENT'S ACTION WAS THE CULMINATION OF THAT PROCESS AND IT HAD NOTHING WHATSOEVER TO DO WITH TRADE BILLS
PRESIDENT REAGAN BELIEVES THAT PEOPLE AND NATIONS SHOULD HONOR THEIR OBLIGATIONS
THERE IS NOTHING PROTECTIONIST ABOUT THAT
SUCH COST CUTTING EFFORTS HAVE WORSENED LABOR DISPUTES WHICH HAVE IN TURN PITTED NON UNION PILOTS AGAINST PRO UNION PILOTS
FIRST OFFICER GUY CASEY WAS ONCE A CAPTAIN AT CONTINENTAL BUT LOST HIS SENIORITY DURING THE BITTER STRIKE THERE IN NINETEEN EIGHTY THREE WHICH HE HAD HELPED TO ORGANIZE
HE SAYS HE WANTS TO PUT THE EXPERIENCE BEHIND HIM
ANALYSTS ALSO SAID THEY HADN'T EXPECTED LOWER OPERATING PROFITS FOR THE COMPANY'S INDUSTRIES GROUP AND FOR THE BROADCASTING SEGMENT
WESTINGHOUSE OFFICIALS TOLD ANALYSTS THAT OPERATING PROFIT IN THE INDUSTRIES GROUP FELL FIFTEEN PERCENT TO TWENTY PERCENT HURT IN PART BY WEAK RESULTS IN CANADIAN OPERATIONS
A SHARP DROP IN OPERATING PROFIT FROM THE BROADCASTING GROUP'S PRODUCTION COMPANY CONTRIBUTED TO THE SLIGHTLY LOWER OPERATING EARNINGS OVERALL FOR THAT SEGMENT
THE SPOKESMAN ALSO SAID THE LEAGUE'S OWNERS ARE COMMITTED TO PLAYING WITH THEIR CURRENT REPLACEMENT ROSTERS FOR THE REST OF THE SEASON INCLUDING THE SUPER BOWL IF NECESSARY
THAT MAY BE THE CASE IF MR. UPSHAW CAN BE TAKEN AT HIS WORD
HE HAS SAID THAT THE PLAYERS WILL REMAIN ON STRIKE FOR THE DURATION IF THE UNION'S OFFER WAS REJECTED

A SENIOR NATO DIPLOMAT ACCUSED THE SOVIETS OF TRYING TO SEDUCE THE GERMANS AWAY FROM US

WHAT'S WRONG WITH THAT
GENERALLY THERE'S NO LIMIT ON HOW MUCH OF THEIR FUNDS EMPLOYEES CAN BORROW IF THEIR ACCOUNTS TOTAL TEN THOUSAND DOLLARS OR LESS
FOR LARGER ACCOUNTS EMPLOYEES ARE RESTRICTED TO BORROWING HALF THE TOTAL BUT NO MORE THAN FIFTY THOUSAND DOLLARS
LOANS MUST BE REPAID WITHIN FIVE YEARS UNLESS THE MONEY GOES TOWARD BUYING A PRINCIPAL RESIDENCE IN WHICH CASE LONGER REPAYMENT TERMS CAN BE ARRANGED
BORROWED FUNDS AREN'T TAXED
BUT A WITHDRAWAL IS TREATED AS TAXABLE INCOME AND IS SUBJECT TO AN ADDITIONAL TEN PERCENT PENALTY TAX

HE ALSO WAS REQUIRED TO GO TO NINETY MEETINGS OF ALCOHOLICS ANONYMOUS OR NARCOTICS ANONYMOUS IN NINETY DAYS

ULTIMATELY THE DEBT IS PAID WITH FUNDS GENERATED BY THE ACQUIRED COMPANY'S OPERATIONS <NOISE> OR THE SALE OF ITS ASSETS

THE DOLLAR'S FALL HAS PUSHED UP THE PRICE OF IMPORTS CAUSING THE DEFICIT TO SWELL EVEN AS THE VOLUME OF NON OIL IMPORTS HAS RECEDED

A LIMITED STRIKE TARGETED AT KEY PLANTS A STRATEGY FOR THE U. A. W. USED A WEEK AGAINST G. M. IN NINETEEN EIGHTY FOUR WOULD BUFFER THE IMPACT
A STRIKE AGAINST A SECOND COMPANY IN CANADA WHERE THE CANADIAN AUTO WORKERS UNION IS BARGAINING INDEPENDENTLY THIS YEAR FOR THE FIRST TIME COULD BROADEN THE DAMAGE
THE C. A. W. HAS INDICATED IT WILL TARGET A DIFFERENT AUTO MAKER THAN THE U. A. W. AND IT HAS A WIDER SELECTION
CHRYSLER CORPORATION IS NEGOTIATING IN CANADA THIS YEAR ALTHOUGH ITS U. S. CONTRACT DOESN'T EXPIRE UNTIL NINETEEN EIGHTY EIGHT
BUT THE EXPERIENCE SHOWED THERE WAS A MUCH BIGGER VIEWER AUDIENCE AND MARKET THAN HOME SHOPPING HAD REALIZED
BOTH M. C. I. AND HOME SHOPPING QUICKLY ADDED CAPACITY
BEFORE THE DELUGE TWO HUNDRED THOUSAND CALLS WAS CONSIDERED A HEAVY DAY
NOW AS MANY AS ONE POINT FIVE MILLION CALLS ARE HANDLED A DAY MR. TROUPE SAYS
ONE DAY THOSE WORDS HAUNTED THIS LAND OF IMMENSE SUFFERING
ONE DAY SAY THE PEASANT FARMERS THE FOURTEEN YEAR BUSH WAR AGAINST ANTI GOVERNMENT REBELS WILL BE OVER
ONE DAY DROUGHT WILL DISAPPEAR FROM OUR LAND
ONE DAY THE ECONOMY WILL RECOVER
ONE DAY WE WILL BE ABLE TO FEED OURSELVES
THE THIRD WORLD DEBT PROBLEM MOREOVER WAS RELATIVELY STABLE IN NINETEEN EIGHTY ONE
THE HIGH INTEREST RATES PRODUCED BY MR. VOLCKER'S TIGHT MONEY IN FACT HELPED START THE PROBLEM ON ITS WAY TO A CRISIS
THE DEBT SITUATION AND WHAT HIGH INTEREST RATES AND A U. S. RECESSION MIGHT DO TO IT HAS TO BE MUCH IN MR. GREENSPAN'S MIND
MR. HEFTER OF JEFFERIES SAYS INVESTORS ARE BASICALLY PICKING SOME STOCKS IN WHICH THEY HAVE SITUATIONS GOING THAT THEY HAVE A DEFINITE IDEA ABOUT
BUT IN GENERAL THE WAIT AND SEE ATTITUDE IS STILL VERY PREVALENT OUT THERE
THERE IS NO REAL PRESSURE TO JUMP INTO THE MARKET RIGHT NOW
<NOISE> THE POTENTIAL REWARD IS SIMPLY NOT WORTH THE RISK AN A. M. GENERAL SPOKESMAN SAID
IF YOU DID A CASH FLOW CHART IT LOOKED AWFUL UNTIL WA:Y OUT IN THE FUTURE
UNACCEPTABLY AWFUL
THEN THERE IS THE DECEMBER PRESIDENTIAL ELECTION
THE FAVORITE CARLOS ANDRES PEREZ NATIONALIZED THE COUNTRY'S MINERAL RESOURCES WHEN LAST IN OFFICE IN NINETEEN SEVENTY FIVE
THAT DOESN'T INSPIRE CONFIDENCE
NOR DOES THAT MASS OF SMALL DIGGERS
AMSTRAD IS THE LARGEST EUROPEAN SUPPLIER OF HOME COMPUTERS AND A MAJOR VENDOR OF BUSINESS PERSONAL COMPUTERS
IT JOINS MANY PERSONAL COMPUTER MAKERS WORLD WIDE REPORTING DIFFICULTIES FROM CHIP SHORTAGES
FOR SEVERAL MONTHS MUCH OF THE WORLD'S SUPPLY OF DRAM CHIPS HAS BEEN PINCHED PARTLY BY A SEMICONDUCTOR TRADE PACT
EDUCATION IS THE OPPORTUNITY THROUGH STUDYING A VARIETY OF SUBJECTS TO GAIN INFORMATION AND THE DEXTERITY TO USE YOUR WITS AND YOUR EXPRESSION
EDUCATION PREPARES YOU TO BE SOMEONE MORE THAN TO DO SOMETHING
<NOISE> EDUCATION IS WHAT PREPARES YOU TO HEAR MORE WHEN YOU LISTEN TO REACH DEEPER WHEN YOU THINK TO SAY MORE WHEN YOU SPEAK
THE APPARENT INCONSISTENCY IS JUSTIFIED MAINTAINED ROBERT BURGER CHEVROLET GENERAL MANAGER GIVEN THE GROWING DIFFICULTY IN LAUNCHING MODELS IN AN INCREASINGLY COMPETITIVE FIELD
IN ESTABLISHING PRODUCTS WITH CONSUMERS HE SAID IT'S EASIER TO FOCUS AD DOLLARS AND MARKETING EFFORTS IF THERE'S ONLY ONE NAME TO PROMOTE
CHEVROLET IS USING THE SAME APPROACH WITH ITS GEO LINE OF IMPORT CARS THAT DEBUTS THIS FALL
THE RICHMOND VIRGINIA MEDIA CONCERN SAID SALES AND PROFIT FROM ITS NEWSPRINT OPERATIONS WERE AHEAD OF YEAR EARLIER LEVELS
ITS CABLE SYSTEM CONTINUED TO GAIN SUBSCRIBERS NOW TOTALING MORE THAN A HUNDRED AND FIFTY SEVEN THOUSAND
REVENUE PER SUBSCRIBER IS EXCEEDING FORECASTS MEDIA GENERAL SAID ADDING THAT IT PLANS TO INCREASE RATES AN AVERAGE OF EIGHT PERCENT BEGINNING IN JANUARY
THE AGREEMENT'S IMPACT IN THE U. S. MAY BE QUITE LIMITED
MANY U. S. FOOD COMPANIES ALREADY HAVE REMOVED TROPICAL OILS FROM THEIR PRODUCTS UNDER PRESSURE FROM CONSUMERS AND HEALTH ORGANIZATIONS
THEY AREN'T LIKELY TO PUT THE OILS BACK IN AND RISK LOSING SALES
CHARLES ALLMON EDITOR AND PUBLISHER OF GROWTH STOCK OUTLOOK IS ANOTHER BEAR WHO DOESN'T HEDGE HIS BEARISHNESS
THIS MARKET IS DISCONNECTED FROM REALITY HE CONTENDS
IT'S A SPECULATORS' MARKET NOT AN INVESTORS' MARKET AND SOONER OR LATER IT'S GOING TO COME TO AN IGNOMINIOUS END
MR. ALLMON WONDERS AT THE WIDESPREAD OPTIMISM IN THE FACE OF HIGHER OIL PRICES AND A BURGEONING MONEY SUPPLY WHICH HE SEES AS CERTAIN PRECURSORS OF INFLATION
CONTINENTAL'S SPOKESMAN CONCEDED THE AIRLINE WAS SLOW IN SOME REFUNDS BUT HE SAID THE PROBLEM STEMMED FROM ITS MERGER WITH PEOPLE EXPRESS EARLIER THIS YEAR
THAT CARRIER HAD MORE THAN TWENTY FIVE THOUSAND TICKETS THAT NEEDED TO BE REFUNDED WHEN ITS OPERATIONS WERE JOINED WITH CONTINENTAL'S THE SPOKESMAN SAID
HE INSISTED THAT MOST OF THE REFUNDS WERE COMPLETED
THE THIRTY EIGHT YEAR OLD DOCTRINE A CREATION OF THE F. C. C. REQUIRES BROADCASTERS AIRING CONTROVERSIAL MATERIAL TO GIVE OPPONENTS FREE AIR TIME TO RESPOND
SUPPORTERS OF THE DOCTRINE SAY ENSURES THAT MINORITY VIEWPOINTS RECEIVE A HEARING ON TELEVISION AND RADIO
BUT DETRACTORS SAY THE REQUIREMENT VIOLATES THE FIRST AMENDMENT RIGHTS OF BROADCASTERS AND INHIBITS THEM FROM RUNNING PROVOCATIVE PROGRAMS
THIRD QUARTER SALES TRAILED THE YEAR EARLIER PERIOD'S ONE POINT ONE MILLION DOLLARS A SPOKESMAN SAID
FOR THE YEAR AGO QUARTER SPECTRAN REPORTED A NET LOSS OF THREE POINT FOUR MILLION DOLLARS
FOR THE FIRST HALF OF NINETEEN EIGHTY SEVEN SPECTRAN REPORTED A NET LOSS OF TWO POINT TWO MILLION DOLLARS ON SALES OF ONE POINT FIVE MILLION DOLLARS
FRANKFURT SHARES TUMBLED IN RESPONSE TO THE WEAKER DOLLAR AND THE DECLINE ON WALL STREET WEDNESDAY BROKERS SAID
MANY BLUE CHIP ISSUES LOST AS MUCH AS TWO PERCENT WITH A FEW DROPPING AS MUCH AS FOUR PERCENT
FINANCIAL SHARES WERE HIT HARDEST AMID FEARS OF HIGHER INTEREST RATES
DECEMBER DELIVERY GOLD SETTLED AT FOUR HUNDRED EIGHTY TWO DOLLARS AND SEVENTY CENTS FOR A DECLINE OF TWELVE DOLLARS AND EIGHTY CENTS
DECEMBER SILVER FELL THIRTY THREE POINT THREE CENTS TO SIX POINT SIX FOUR FIVE DOLLARS
JANUARY PLATINUM WAS DOWN THIRTEEN DOLLARS AND SIXTY CENTS TO FOUR HUNDRED NINETY DOLLARS AND FORTY CENTS
THEIR PROTOTYPE OF FUTURE MONEY IS A REVOLUTIONARY PLASTIC BANK NOTE THAT SPORTS A THREE DIMENSIONAL HOLOGRAM
HOLOGRAMS HAVE BEEN USED ON CREDIT CARDS FOR SEVERAL YEARS TO FOIL FORGERS
BUT AUSTRALIAN MONETARY AUTHORITIES BELIEVE THEY ARE THE FIRST TO INCORPORATE SUCH A DEVICE ON A BANK NOTE
THEY HOPE IT WILL PUT COUNTERFEITERS OUT OF BUSINESS
JUST HOW FAR AIRBUS WANTS TO TAKE COLLABORATION TALKS REMAINS UNCLEAR
THE U. S. FOR TWO AND A HALF YEARS HAS BEEN CALLING FOR AN END TO AIRBUS GOVERNMENT SUBSIDIES AND IS THREATENING A TRADE WAR OVER THE ISSUE
THERE IS SUSPICION IN U. S. INDUSTRY AND GOVERNMENT THAT THE LATEST EFFORT IS A POLITICAL EXERCISE TO COOL AMERICAN COMPLAINTS ABOUT SUBSIDIES AND AVERT A TRADE WAR
THE DAY THAT TRADE PRESSURES EVAPORATE AIRBUS'S INTEREST IN MCDONNELL DOUGLAS COOPERATION IS OVER SAYS ONE U. S. AEROSPACE EXECUTIVE
HOW SERIOUS AND PATIENT INVESTOR INTEREST IS WILL BE TESTED NEXT MONTH

THE AGENCY HOPES TO REALIZE ITS TARGET PRICE OF THIRTEEN MILLION DOLLARS

BUT THE BOESKY FUND HAS ALREADY SOLD NEARLY ALL ITS STOCK POSITIONS AND A QUICKER DISSOLUTION HAS APPEARED LIKELY FOR SOME TIME

THE EIGHT AND THREE QUARTER PERCENT NOTES WILL MATURE IN NINETEEN NINETY TWO
PROCEEDS WILL BE USED TO REFINANCE AND RETIRE DEBT AND FOR GENERAL PURPOSES
LONE STAR BASED IN GREENWICH CONNECTICUT IS A PRODUCER OF CEMENT AND OTHER CONSTRUCTION MATERIALS
STILL HE WOULD HAVE PREFERRED THERE BE NO BIDS AT ALL
THE COMPANY'S POLICY FOR EIGHTY FIVE YEARS HAS BEEN TO BE INDEPENDENT AND GROW AND WE HAVE SUCCEEDED HE SAYS
WE ARE EVALUATING THE OFFERS FOR THE COMPANY AND FOR THE SHAREHOLDERS BUT WE PROFOUNDLY REGRET THE SITUATION
THIS IS THE FIRST TEST FOR MR. RUDER'S ABILITY TO ADJUDICATE BETWEEN THE AGENCY'S PROSECUTORS AND ECONOMISTS WHICH CAN BE A FULL TIME JOB
AS USUAL IN THE RECENT PAST THE ECONOMISTS HAVE THE BETTER ARGUMENT HERE
THERE IS NO GOOD REASON TO OUTLAW THE OPEN MARKET PURCHASES OF SHARES IN ANY CASE AND ESPECIALLY NOT WHERE NONPROFESSIONAL SHAREHOLDERS ARE THE BIG WINNERS
THE AUCTION HOUSE SAID THIS WAS THE FIRST TIME THAT THE TOP TEN ART WORKS ALL SOLD FOR MORE THAN ONE MILLION DOLLARS EACH <NOISE>
RECORDS WERE SET FOR SIX ARTISTS INCLUDING MARC CHAGALL CLAUDE MONET AND PIERRE AUGUSTE RENOIR
THE TOP PRICE WAS FIVE POINT THREE MILLION DOLLARS FOR A RENOIR PAINTING OF A YOUNG WOMAN
ABANDONING A NUCLEAR POWER PLANT COST A UTILITY A BUNDLE
BUT STATE REGULATORS APPROVED A RATE INCREASE TO COVER THE COSTS
NOW THE I. R. S. RULES THAT THE UTILITY IS ALSO ENTITLED TO A LOSS DEDUCTION FOR THE COSTS OF THE ABANDONED PLANT
STANLEY NABI EXECUTIVE VICE PRESIDENT OF BESSEMER SAID THEY'RE NOT REDUCING THEIR OFFER IF YOU CALCULATE THE OFFER'S VALUE AS OF THURSDAY'S CLOSE
I FIGURE IT WAS WORTH SIXTY FIVE DOLLARS AND EIGHTY FIVE CENTS A SHARE ON THURSDAY
WITH FRIDAY'S REVISION IT'S WORTH SIXTY EIGHT DOLLARS A SHARE
THE REVISED TERMS ARE NO LESS ATTRACTIVE THAN THE ORIGINAL TERMS IN THE POST CRASH MARKET
NEVERTHELESS FIRST OPTIONS STILL LETS CUSTOMERS SUCH AS JAMES F. HART TRADE IN NAKED OUT OF THE MONEY PUTS AND CALLS
MR. HART SAYS FIRST OPTIONS HASN'T SOUGHT TO REIN HIM IN
OTHER BROKERAGE FIRMS HOWEVER HAVE CURBED OR HALTED UNHEDGED OPTIONS TRADING SINCE THE CRASH
ANOTHER BAROMETER OF THE ECONOMY'S FUTURE COURSE CALLED THE LONG LEADING COMPOSITE IS COMPILED BY COLUMBIA UNIVERSITY'S CENTER FOR INTERNATIONAL BUSINESS CYCLE RESEARCH
THE COLUMBIA COMPOSITE HAS SIGNALED RECESSIONS ON THE AVERAGE BY FOURTEEN MONTHS A SOMEWHAT LONGER LEAD TIME THAN FOR THE COMMERCE INDEX
IT IS NO SURPRISE ACCORDINGLY THAT THE COLUMBIA COMPOSITE REACHED A PEAK BEFORE THE COMMERCE INDEX IN JULY
SINCE THEN THE COMPOSITE HAS FALLEN WITH LITTLE INTERRUPTION
COMPUTERVISION THE PIONEER IN THE COMPUTERIZED DESIGN MARKET HAS HAD POOR FINANCIAL RESULTS IN RECENT YEARS AS IT REVAMPED ITS AGED PRODUCT LINE
HOWEVER RECENTLY IT HAS REPORTED BETTER THAN EXPECTED EARNINGS
ALTHOUGH IT HAS SLIPPED FROM FIRST TO THIRD IN SIZE IN THE INDUSTRY IT RETAINS A SUBSTANTIAL BASE OF CUSTOMERS

FRENCH PRESIDENT MITTERRAND NAMED A LONGTIME SOCIALIST RIVAL MICHEL ROCARD AS PRIME MINISTER

MITTERRAND IS SEEKING TO REALIGN FRANCE AROUND THE CENTER LEFT
IMPERIAL SAYS IT HAS HAD TERRIFIC UNSOLICITED INTEREST IN THE MATERIAL FROM ALL AREAS OF PLASTICS USES
BUT THE COST OF MANUFACTURING THE NATURAL PLASTIC IS PROHIBITIVELY EXPENSIVE FIFTEEN DOLLARS A POUND COMPARED WITH ROUGHLY SIXTY FIVE CENTS A POUND FOR CONVENTIONAL PLASTIC
HOWEVER THE COMPANY SAYS IT HOPES TO REDUCE MANUFACTURING COSTS ENOUGH TO BEGIN MARKETING THE PLASTIC IN TWO TO FIVE YEARS

I CAN SEE A NUMBER CLOSE TO TEN DOLLARS FOR NINETEEN NINETY ONE SAYS MR. KOZLOFF
THESE MIXED FEELINGS OF FRUSTRATION WITH AND GRATITUDE TOWARD THE AUTHORITIES ARE PART OF THE EVERYDAY LIFE OF A FOREIGNER DOING BUSINESS IN KOREA
IN FACT SUCH CONTRADICTIONS ARE WHAT SEEM TO MAKE THE KOREAN WORLD GO ROUND
A WESTERN BUSINESSMAN NEEDS TO BE READY FOR THEM
HERE ARE A FEW HARD LEARNED FACTS OF KOREAN BUSINESS LIFE
THE TRASH
PROOFS OF PURCHASE AND SALES RECEIPTS THAT HAD BEEN TURNED IN FOR CONSUMER PRODUCT REBATES AND ALREADY PAID
THE WOMEN RESUBMITTED THOUSANDS OF THE REBATES AND CAMOUFLAGED THEIR TRAIL BY VARYING THEIR NAMES AND USING POSTAL BOXES ALL OVER THE COUNTRY
UNLIKE MORE ECLECTIC RAIDERS MR. TRUMP HAS SO FAR STUCK TO REAL ESTATE
RESORTS HAS BIG UNDEVELOPED LAND HOLDINGS IN ATLANTIC CITY
ALLEGIS' WESTIN PLAZA HOTEL WHICH HE SEEMS TO WANT COULD BE WORTH TWICE AS MUCH IF MADE INTO CONDOMINIUMS HE SAYS
HUMANA TRIED TO DEFEND ITSELF THROUGH DIVERSIFICATION AS DID THE OTHER LARGE CHAINS HOSPITAL CORPORATION OF AMERICA AMERICAN MEDICAL INTERNATIONAL INCORPORATION AND NATIONAL MEDICAL ENTERPRISES INCORPORATION
THE IDEA WAS THAT IF A HOSPITAL OWNER ALSO HAD AN INSURANCE PLAN IT COULD STEER PATIENTS TO ITS INSTITUTIONS THROUGH FINANCIAL INCENTIVES
THE PATIENT POOL MIGHT SHRINK BUT THE COMPANY COULD GRAB A BIGGER PART OF IT
LAST MONTH AUTO SALES FELL ONE POINT FOUR PERCENT AFTER RISING FIVE POINT SEVEN PERCENT IN AUGUST
SALES OF BUILDING MATERIALS INCREASED ONE POINT TWO PERCENT AFTER A ZERO POINT FOUR PERCENT DROP
OVERALL SALES OF DURABLE GOODS WHICH ARE INTENDED TO LAST THREE YEARS OR MORE FELL ZERO POINT NINE PERCENT AFTER RISING THREE POINT ONE PERCENT IN AUGUST
WALL STREET IN GENERAL HAS BEEN CONCERNED ABOUT G. M. IN RECENT WEEKS BECAUSE OF ITS NEW LABOR CONTRACT
THE THREE YEAR PACT INCLUDES A JOB SECURITY PROGRAM THAT PREVENTS LAYOFFS EXCEPT DURING A SALES DROP PREVENTS PLANT CLOSINGS AND SLOWS ATTRITION
MANY ANALYSTS PREDICT THE PROVISIONS WILL HAMPER G. M.'S EFFORTS TO RESTRUCTURE OPERATIONS AND SHED UNCOMPETITIVE PLANTS PARTICULARLY IN PARTS OPERATIONS
MY CABDRIVER EYES ME IN HIS REAR VIEW MIRROR
HIS REACTION SEEMS A LITTLE HOSTILE BUT I DON'T CARE I AM FEELING POSITIVELY VICE PRESIDENTIAL
I AM ABOUT TO BECOME GEORGE BUSH FOR A NIGHT
YOU CAN TOO

ON MARCH TWENTY SEVENTH MR. ONGPIN REACHED A DEAL
THE ROAD NAMED WEST STREET IS A NARROW STRIP OF RED GRAVEL
IT IS LIKE THE PROVERBIAL RAILROAD TRACKS IN AMERICA THAT SEPARATE THE RICH SIDE OF TOWN FROM THE POOR
THE PHYSICAL DISTANCE MAY NOT BE GREAT BUT THE MENTAL GAP IS
THE INDICATED TIGHTNESS IN U. S. GASOLINE OUGHT TO PREVENT THE REFINERS' FLAT OUT PRODUCTION FROM LEADING TO A PRODUCT PRICE WAR
<NOISE> THE DECLINE IN CRUDE PRICES EVENTUALLY WILL END HOWEVER
OR PRODUCT PRICES COULD AGAIN BECOME LINKED TO THOSE FOR CRUDE
AND GASOLINE DEMAND USUALLY DROPS AFTER LABOR DAY
BUT MR. RANDOL SUGGESTS THAT A TREND TOWARD PERMANENTLY IMPROVED REFINER MARGINS IS SUSTAINABLE
THROUGH ITS U. S. FINANCE SUBSIDIARY TOYOTA HAS ISSUED COMMERCIAL PAPER IN THE U. S. AND PRIVATELY PLACED MEDIUM TERM NOTES
IT HAS ALSO RAISED MORE THAN TWO BILLION DOLLARS IN THE EUROMARKETS BUT SO FAR HAS AVOIDED ISSUING STRAIGHT DEBT IN THE PUBLIC U. S. MARKET
THE SAME IS TRUE OF MOST JAPANESE COMPANIES

THE DRUG AZIDOTHYMIDINE OR A. Z. T. IS THE FIRST PRESCRIPTION DRUG FOR ACQUIRED IMMUNE DEFICIENCY SYNDROME TO GET FEDERAL FOOD AND DRUG ADMINISTRATION APPROVAL
A. Z. T. IS MARKETED UNDER THE NAME RETROVIR BY BURROUGHS WELLCOME COMPANY AT AN ANNUAL RETAIL DOSAGE COST OF ABOUT TEN THOUSAND DOLLARS
IT ALSO IS THE MOST EXPENSIVE PRESCRIPTION DRUG PROMPTING FEARS THAT SOME I- INSURERS WHO NORMALLY PROVIDE PRESCRIPTION DRUG COVERAGE WILL BALK AT ITS PRICE
MR. BOTHA ALSO MUST RULE ON THE FATE OF THE GROUP AREAS ACT
VIOLATIONS OF THE ACT ARE RAMPANT BUT THERE WERE ONLY FOUR PROSECUTIONS UNDER IT IN NINETEEN EIGHTY SIX ONE IN NINETEEN EIGHTY FIVE AND NONE THE YEAR BEFORE
A RECENT POLL BY THE AFRIKAANS NEWSPAPER RAPPORT FOUND THAT ONLY TWENTY SEVEN PERCENT OF SURVEYED WHITES WANT THE ACT RETAINED
MORE THAN TWENTY FOUR PERCENT WANT IT SCRAPPED COMPLETELY WHILE ANOTHER THIRTY FOUR PERCENT WANT EACH LOCAL COMMUNITY OR PROPERTY OWNER TO DECIDE WHO CAN RENT OR BUY HOUSING
ON THE BIG BOARD VOLUME ROSE TO TWO HUNDRED AND TWENTY POINT FIVE MILLION SHARES FROM A HUNDRED AND SIXTY EIGHT POINT SIX MILLION THURSDAY
BUT THE ACTIVITY WAS LESS THAN ON PREVIOUS TRIPLE WITCHING DAYS AND MUCH OF THE TRADING WAS PACKED INTO THE OPENING AND CLOSING MINUTES OF THE SESSION
MORE THAN THIRTY ONE MILLION SHARES CHANGED HANDS IN THE FINAL MINUTE
THE PEOPLE WHO ATTENDED THE EVENTS LOVE THEM
THE CITIZENS OF THE NEW YORK METROPOLITAN AREA ARE STILL TALKING ABOUT WHAT A TERRIFIC FEELING THE WEEKEND ENGENDERED IN EVERYONE
THE STATE OF NEW YORK WAS SO HAPPY THAT IT IS USING A PHOTO FROM LIBERTY WEEKEND IN ADVERTISEMENTS TO ATTRACT BUSINESS TO THE STATE
THOSE WHO WATCHED THE EVENTS ON TELEVISION MORE THAN ONE HUNDRED MILLION AMERICANS LOVE THEM
PEOPLE IN FIFTY ONE FOREIGN COUNTRIES ENJOYED THE EVENTS VIA TELEVISION
THE FRENCH WERE SO IMPRESSED BY THE CELEBRATION THEY THANKED THE U. S. IN AN AD IN A NEW YORK NEWSPAPER
<NOISE> IN THE END THERE IS LITTLE THE U. S. CAN DO TO CONTROL EVENTS IN SOUTH AFRICA
THE ADMINISTRATION'S SIX YEAR CONSTRUCTIVE ENGAGEMENT POLICY DESIGNED TO COAX PRETORIA TOWARD DISMANTLING APARTHEID DIDN'T SUCCEED
AND SANCTIONS IN THE SHORT RUN WON'T DAMAGE SOUTH AFRICA'S SELF RELIANT ECONOMY
BUT THE PERCEPTION OF INACTION HAS DIPLOMATIC COSTS FOR THE U. S. AND SO FOR THE TIME BEING SANCTIONS SEEM TO BE THE BEST BET
THE NINETEEN SEVENTY TWO A. B. M. TREATY REQUIRES A REVIEW EVERY FIVE YEARS
COMMUNIQUES ANNOUNCING COMPLETION OF THE FIRST AND SECOND REVIEWS WERE ISSUED ON NOVEMBER FOURTH NINETEEN SEVENTY SEVEN AND NOVEMBER NINTH NINETEEN EIGHTY TWO
THE THIRD REVIEW WAS DUE BY OCTOBER THIRD NINETEEN EIGHTY SEVEN
THE MOST OPTIMISTIC ESTIMATES ARE NOW THAT IT WILL START SOMETIME AFTER THE FIRST OF THE YEAR
THE REAGAN ADMINISTRATION IN SHORT IS CONSPIRING WITH THE SOVIETS TO VIOLATE THE REVIEW PROVISIONS OF THE TREATY
IT IS SAD BUT TRUE THAT INTERNATIONAL SPORTING EXTRAVAGANZAS HAVE COME TO BE CONDUCTED AMID THE SORT OF SECURITY OTHERWISE RESERVED FOR THE TRAVELS OF HEADS OF STATE
THE SWISS HOCKEY COACH WAS QUOTED AS SAYING THAT HIS PLAYERS WERE SURPRISED THEY DIDN'T HAVE TO SHOW THEIR PASSES AT THE BLUE LINE WHEN THEY BACK CHECKED
HAVING THE BAR PATTERN ON MY PASS CHECKED ELECTRONICALLY ABOUT ONE THOUSAND TIMES MADE ME FEEL LIKE A TOOTHPASTE CARTON LEAVING A SUPERMARKET
ANYONE WHO ACCEPTS THE JOB OF INVESTIGATING THE SPEAKER SHOULD BE PREPARED TO TAKE SOME HEAT
LAST WEEK COMMON CAUSE CALLED FOR AN INVESTIGATION OF MR. WRIGHT'S FINANCES
THE SPEAKER RETALIATED IN A PUBLIC STATEMENT AND HIS MINIONS IN THE LEADERSHIP SAID THE GROUP WAS DEAD ON CAPITOL HILL
THIS WAS ROUGH ON ALL DEBTORS DOMESTIC AS WELL AS INTERNATIONAL
BUT NO ONE PROPOSED SOLUTIONS FOR DOMESTIC DEBTORS AS GRAND AS THOSE OFFICIALLY OFFERED FOR THIRD WORLD DEBTORS
THE FIRST PART OF THE OFFICIAL PROPOSAL WAS TO REDUCE THE IN- INTEREST BURDEN OF THE DEVELOPING COUNTRIES
SECOND PROMOTE WORLD ECONOMIC RECOVERY
THIRD NEW LOANS SHOULD BE MADE TO THE DEBTOR NATIONS BY THE BANKS THE INTERNATIONAL MONETARY FUND THE WORLD BANK AND EXPORT CREDIT AGENCIES
IN ANY CASE A RETURN TO MARKET DISCIPLINE IS INEVITABLE
FINANCIAL HISTORY HAS WITNESSED A THOUSAND BOOMS AND BUSTS
<NOISE> WITHIN RECENT MEMORY WE HAVE SEEN THE JUNK EQUITIES OF THE SIXTIES THE HEATED THIRD WORLD LENDING OF THE SEVENTIES AND THE THRIFT CRISIS OF THE EIGHTIES
THESE PROBLEMS OF THE RECENT PAST PALE IN SCOPE NEXT TO THE PERVASIVENESS AND TOTAL DOLLARS INVOLVED IN THE CURRENT CRAZE
IF THE PARTICIPANTS IN THIS CRAZE AWAKEN NOW THE CORRECTION MAY STILL BE WITHIN TOLERABLE LIMITS FOR THE COUNTRY
IF NOT ALL OF AMERICA WILL PAY THE PENALTY BECAUSE THE DEBT IS HUGE AND WIDELY HELD AND THE BANKING STRUCTURE'S INTEGRITY WOULD BE AT STAKE
WITH THE U. S. GOVERNMENT AS ITS PRIME CUSTOMER TRACOR WAS HELPLESS WHEN DEFENSE SPENDING SLOWED
INTERNALLY MR. INMAN SAYS HE DISCOVERED THAT EXPENSES COULDN'T BE CUT AS EASILY AS BANKERS HAD FORECAST
AND FEES WERE HIGHER THAN EXPECTED
MR. INMAN CALLS IT ALL PART OF MY EDUCATION
THE OPERATING RATE IS STILL KIND OF LOW BUT IT'S COMING BACK SAID PRISCILLA LUCE SENIOR ECONOMIST AT WHARTON ECONOMETRIC FORECASTING ASSOCIATES IN PHILADELPHIA
THERE IS SOME CAUSE FOR OPTIMISM
SHE SAID EXPORT GAINS HAVE SPURRED SOME OF THE IMPROVEMENT
IT'S SO SHUNNED THAT ALTHOUGH MOST MANAGERS GOING UP THE LADDER ARE OCCASIONALLY REQUIRED TO FIRE ONCE HAVING ASCENDED TO THE TOP THEY DELEGATE THE JOB
ANDREW SHERWOOD A NEW YORK MANAGEMENT CONSULTANT SAYS THAT ONLY ABOUT FIVE PERCENT OF CHIEF EXECUTIVES DO THEIR OWN FIRING
THESE ARE PEOPLE WHO ARE COMPULSIVE BUILDERS HE SAYS
THEY LIKE ACQUIRING COMPANIES MAKING PROFITS GO UP AND RECRUITING PEOPLE
FIRING ISN'T WHAT THEY'RE EMOTIONALLY GEARED FOR
THEY FIND IT REPUGNANT
DEFENDERS OF THE FOOTNOTE ARGUE THAT IT MAKES SENSE AS TAX POLICY
WHY THEY ASK SHOULD WEALTHY BEST SELLING AUTHORS GET SUBSTANTIAL TAX DEFERRALS WHILE MOM AND POP MANUFACTURERS FOR EXAMPLE CAN'T
AS A RULE OF TAXES IT'S A GOOD RULE BECAUSE YOU DON'T WANT PEOPLE TAKING DEDUCTIONS BEFORE THEY GET THE INCOME SAYS ONE CONGRESSIONAL AIDE
IT'S THE TIME VALUE OF MONEY PRINCIPLE
MR. AMMAN FORTY NINE YEARS OLD SAID HE BELIEVES WESTERN UNION'S DEBT AND EQUITY HOLDERS WILL SUPPORT THE RESTRUCTURING
HE ADDED THAT THE RESTRUCTURING MUST BE COMPLETED IN THE NEXT FEW WEEKS BECAUSE THE COMPANY IS RUNNING SHORT OF CASH
WESTERN UNION HAS SAID THAT IF ITS PLANS ARE DEFEATED IT WILL FILE FOR REORGANIZATION UNDER CHAPTER ELEVEN OF THE FEDERAL BANKRUPTCY LAWS
THE CONFRONTATION IN FEDERAL COURT MAY BREAK NEW GROUND IN BANKRUPTCY LAW
OTHER COURTS NOTABLY THE ONE IN CHARGE OF THE MANVILLE CORPORATION CHAPTER ELEVEN PROCEEDINGS HAVE SET UP TRUST FUNDS TO PAY LARGE CLASSES OF INJURY VICTIMS
BUT MANVILLE'S TWO POINT FIVE BILLION DOLLARS TO THREE BILLION DOLLAR TRUST INCLUDES PROVISIONS THAT ALLOW IT TO EXPAND IF FUNDS PROVE INADEQUATE TO PAY ASBESTOS RELATED CLAIMS
SO FAR NO JUDGE HAS ATTEMPTED TO FIX AN ABSOLUTE CAP ON A GROUP OF CLAIMS AS HUGE AND UNCERTAIN AS THOSE FACING ROBINS
ANOTHER BANK TRADER ATTRIBUTES THE DOLLAR'S REBOUND TO FEDERAL OFFICIALS' INCREASED OPENNESS ABOUT THEIR ACTIVITIES
THEY'RE TRYING TO GET THE BIGGEST BANG FOR THE BUCK RIGHT NOW THE TRADER SAYS
THEY WANT PEOPLE TO RUN OUT AND SAY THE FED'S BUYING THE FED'S BUYING
THAT'S WHAT'S SIGNIFICANTLY DIFFERENT ABOUT THE FED'S INTERVENTION THIS YEAR
DOW PRESIDENT FRANK POPOFF SAID IN A STATEMENT THAT BOTH PRICE AND VOLUME INCREASES BOLSTERED EARNINGS
THE COMPANY'S STRONG COST CONTAINMENT EFFORTS ALSO HELPED
COSTS REMAIN STABLE VOLUME HAS INCREASED AND THERE IS NO WEAKNESS APPARENT IN EITHER THE PRODUCT LINES OR GEOGRAPHICAL AREAS MR. POPOFF SAID
FOR ONE HUNDRED YEARS WYOMING HAS BEEN RIDING A ROLLER COASTER
WHEN COMMODITY PRICES RISE PEOPLE RUSH TO WYOMING FOR SHORT TERM WORK AT BOOM TOWN PAY
GOVERNMENT REVENUES LARGELY UNDERWRITTEN BY ENERGY COMPANY TAXES EXPLODE
WHEN COMMODITY PRICES SOAR PEOPLE PULL OUT OFTEN WITH THEIR MOBILE HOMES TRAILING BEHIND
AND REVENUES SLUMP
BUT MR. PETERSON SAYS THERE STILL IS AN IMAGE PROBLEM
IF WE HAVEN'T WORKED WITH A COMPANY BEFORE THE NATURAL REACTION IS WHY THE HELL ARE YOU BRINGING IN ACCOUNTANTS TO WORK IN THE PLANT
YET WE PROBABLY HAVE THE LARGEST MANUFACTURING CONSULTING PRACTICE IN THE WORLD
HOPING TO PREVENT LONG COSTLY DISPUTES OVER WHAT DOCUMENTS DEFENDANTS HAVE TO SURRENDER JUDGES GRANT BLANKET PROTECTIVE ORDERS
THE ORDERS TYPICALLY BAR PUBLIC DISSEMINATION OF RECORDS AND DEPOSITIONS EVEN AFTER A SETTLEMENT OR VERDICT
PLAINTIFFS' LAWYERS GENERALLY HAVEN'T BALKED AS LONG AS THEY CAN GET THE INFORMATION THEY NEED TO PREPARE FOR THEIR TRIALS
IN THE NEW CONSUMERIST CHILE THIS IS A MAN WHO DOESN'T EVEN OWN A CAR
THE SON OF A RETIRED AIR FORCE OFFICER HE LIVES QUIETLY WITH HIS WIFE AND TWO DAUGHTERS IN A SMALL HOUSE IN SANTIAGO
HE PREFERS THE SCIENTIFIC AMERICAN TO THE WEEKLY NEWS MAGAZINES
HIS TRAINING WAS AS A MINING ENGINEER NOT AS AN ECONOMIST
AMONG HIS RECENT READING THE EYE OF THE FLY
THE APPOINTMENT CONTINUED TO LANGUISH AND ON JUNE FIRST DOCTOR SULLIVAN CALLED MR. FULTON AND SUGGESTED THAT HE WITHDRAW HIS NAME FROM CONSIDERATION
DOCTOR SULLIVAN HAD CONCLUDED THAT EVEN IF HE PUSHED THE FULTON NOMINATION THROUGH THE WHITE HOUSE AND THE SENATE THE PRICE OF VICTORY WOULD BE TOO HIGH
HE WOULD HAVE INCURRED THE WRATH OF THE RIGHT TO LIFE MOVEMENT AND I WOULD HAVE BEEN THE ENEMY MR. FULTON SAYS
BUT TEXAS AMERICAN MAY HAVE ITS PROBLEMS WITH THE PROPOSED COMBINATION OF REPUBLICBANK AND INTERFIRST

<NOISE> MR. RUDER SAID THAT AN EFFECTIVE REGULATORY FRAMEWORK FOR A GLOBAL MARKET SHOULD INCLUDE EFFICIENT SYSTEMS FOR DISSEMINATING MARKET DATA ON PRICES AND TRADING VOLUME AND FOR EXECUTING TRADES

<NOISE> THE NEW GOVERNMENT HAS STARTED TO LOWER PERSONAL INCOME TAXES AND AT THE SAME TIME IT HAS BEGUN TO BRING ITS OWN SPENDING UNDER CONTROL
IN THE NINETEEN EIGHTY SEVEN BUDGET THE HIGHEST RATE OF INCOME TAX WAS LOWERED TO FIFTY EIGHT PERCENT FROM SIXTY FIVE PERCENT
THIS IS PART OF A WORLD WIDE MOVEMENT THAT FRANCE MUST FOLLOW TO KEEP ITS MOST ENERGETIC AGGRESSIVE AND BRIGHT YOUNG PEOPLE AND TO ATTRACT INVESTORS
THE NEW TAX LAW'S LIMITS ON RETIREMENT BENEFITS FOR EXECUTIVES SPUR GREATER INTEREST IN CERTAIN TRUSTS THAT HELP SAFEGUARD DEFERRED COMPENSATION UNTIL RETIREMENT TIME
SUCH TRUSTS AREN'T COMPLETELY INVIOLATE CREDITORS CAN CLAIM THE MONEY AFTER A BANKRUPTCY FOR INSTANCE
BUT THEY ARE CONSIDERED BETTER THAN A MERE PROMISE TO THE EXECUTIVE
<NOISE> THE DIET IS A ONE HOUSE LEGISLATURE APPORTIONED BY DISTRICT RATHER THAN POPULATION LIKE THE SENATE AS OPPOSED TO THE HOUSE
THIS MEANS THAT JAPANESE FARMERS HAVE TREMENDOUS CONTROL OVER JAPANESE POLITICS
<NOISE> FOOD PRICES IN JAPAN TAKE FORTY PERCENT OR MORE OF THE AVERAGE PERSON'S WAGE
WITH HOUSING TAKING ANOTHER FORTY PERCENT AND THE FACT THAT THE JAPANESE ARE GREAT SAVERS THEY ARE LEFT WITH ALMOST NO DISCRETIONARY INCOME
THIS IS WHY THEY CANNOT DEVELOP A DOMESTIC MARKET
THEY DON'T HAVE MONEY TO SPEND EXCEPT A SMALL AMOUNT OF SAVINGS THAT THEY SPEND ONLY ON SPECIAL OCCASIONS OR FOR UNUSUAL BARGAINS
<NOISE> CONSEQUENTLY LLOYD'S AND SOME BROKERS MAY BE FORCED TO INCREASE THEIR SHARE OF THE SETTLEMENT PAYMENT

<NOISE> LLOYD'S DECLINED TO SPECULATE ABOUT HOW MUCH ITS CONTRIBUTION MIGHT INCREASE

THIS IN TURN HAS LED TO CALLS FROM FINANCIERS AND POLITICIANS FOR CLOSER REGULATION OF THIS HUGE MARKET

<NOISE> IT'S BEEN SUCH A PESSIMISTIC ATMOSPHERE IN THE PAST COUPLE OF WEEKS

I OFTEN THINK OBSERVED MS. BERGEN THAT IF DOSTOEVSKI HAD BEEN A SINGER HE'D HAVE SOUNDED LIKE RAY CHARLES

THIS PROVISION WOULDN'T RAISE ANY MONEY IN THE CURRENT FISCAL YEAR AND SENATOR BENTSEN WANTED SOMETHING THAT WOULD ALLOW A QUICKER END TO THE DIESEL TAX COLLECTION
THE TEXAS DEMOCRAT PLANS TO OFFER HIS SUBSTITUTION WHEN THE TAX PACKAGE REACHES THE SENATE FLOOR

THE NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF *REALTORS* IS THROWING SEVERAL PARTIES AND PROUDLY BOASTS THAT EIGHTY NINE OF ITS MEMBERS ARE DELEGATES OR ALTERNATES TO THIS CONVENTION
DISCUSSION OF THIS SUBJECT BETTER DESCRIBED AS BROODING ABOUT IT IS FILLED WITH MISCONCEPTIONS
ONE OF THESE IS THE GREAT CONCERN WITH THE U. S. HAVING BECOME A NET DEBTOR
WHAT IS MEANT BY THAT IS THAT AMERICANS APPARENTLY OWN FEWER ASSETS ABROAD THAN FOREIGNERS OWN IN THE U. S.
MANY PEOPLE HAVE POINTED OUT THAT THESE CALCULATIONS ARE SPURIOUS BECAUSE THE ASSETS ARE NOT ALL VALUED ON THE SAME BASIS
IF ALL ASSETS WERE VALUED AT TODAY'S PRICES THE NET DEBT OF THE U. S. WOULD CERTAINLY BE MUCH SMALLER THAN IT NOW APPEARS AND MIGHT BE A NET ASSET
INVESTORS TAKING PART IN THE FINANCING WILL LEND VENEZUELA ONE BILLION IN EXCHANGE FOR MONTHLY PAYMENTS FROM THE NEW YORK TRUST FUND
THOSE PAYMENTS WILL BE SET WHEN THE FINANCING IS COMPLETED WHICH IS EXPECTED IN MID DECEMBER
THE INTEREST RATE WILL BE BASED ON THE FIVE YEAR U. S. TREASURY BOND RATE PLUS A STILL UNDECIDED INTEREST RATE MARGIN THE VENEZUELAN OFFICIAL SAID
INVESTORS CONTINUE TO FLOCK TO THE MORE CONSERVATIVE STOCK PORTFOLIOS

RATES ARE DETERMINED BY THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN THE PURCHASE PRICE AND FACE VALUE
THUS HIGHER BIDDING NARROWS THE INVESTOR'S RETURN WHILE LOWER BIDDING WIDENS IT
THE PERCENTAGE RATES ARE CALCULATED ON A THREE HUNDRED AND SIXTY DAY YEAR WHILE THE COUPON EQUIVALENT YIELD IS BASED ON A THREE HUNDRED AND SIXTY FIVE DAY YEAR
THE LASTEST DISCLOSURES ARE AN OUTGROWTH OF THAT PROBE

THE DRUG AZIDOTHYMIDINE OR A. Z. T. IS THE FIRST PRESCRIPTION DRUG FOR ACQUIRED IMMUNE DEFICIENCY SYNDROME TO GET FEDERAL FOOD AND DRUG ADMINISTRATION APPROVAL
A. Z. T. IS MARKETED UNDER THE NAME RETROVIR BY BURROUGHS WELLCOME COMPANY AT AN ANNUAL RETAIL DOSAGE COST OF ABOUT TEN THOUSAND DOLLARS
IT ALSO IS THE MOST EXPENSIVE PRESCRIPTION DRUG PROMPTING FEARS THAT SOME INSURERS WHO NORMALLY PROVIDE PRESCRIPTION DRUG COVERAGE WILL BALK AT ITS PRICE

THE CAUSE OF THE OUTRAGE IS THAT EUROPEAN UNITY IS THE DEVICE THROUGH WHICH THE REGULATORS AND SOCIALISTS HOPE TO EXPAND THEIR GRIP ON THE CONTINENT
RATES ARE DETERMINED BY THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN THE PURCHASE PRICE AND FACE VALUE
THUS HIGHER BIDDING NARROWS THE INVESTOR'S RETURN WHILE LOWER BIDDING WIDENS IT
THE PERCENTAGE RATES ARE CALCULATED ON A THREE HUNDRED AND SIXTY DAY YEAR WHILE THE COUPON EQUIVALENT YIELD <NOISE> IS BASED ON A THREE HUNDRED AND SIXTY FIVE DAY YEAR

IT'S TRUE AS A METAPHOR FOR THE HUMAN AND COSMIC MYSTERIES
IT'S ONLY WHEN YOU'RE STUCK ON THE METAPHOR THAT YOU GET IN TROUBLE

THE NEW SERVICE DIFFERS FROM THE SHUTTLE IN SEVERAL WAYS
IT WON'T HAVE THE BACKUP PLANES THAT THE SHUTTLE USED TO ACCOMMODATE PASSENGER OVERFLOW

BUT HIS LONGTIME HOSTILITIES WITH DOLE LEAVE A SPOT ON A BUSH TICKET AS ABOUT THE ONLY POSSIBILITY

BUT THE PROBLEM IN FACT IS BAD BANKING IN A FEW CASES EVEN CORRUPT BANKING

BUT HIGHER FARM PRICES WOULD ADD TO AN ALREADY STEEP INFLATION RATE

IN THE PAST FILIPINOS IN MANY RURAL AREAS PREFERRED THE DISCIPLINED TERROR OF THE N. P. A. TO THE RANDOM EXCESSES OF THE COUNTRY'S MILITARY
WITH THE CHANGE OF GOVERNMENT LAST YEAR A MILD IMPROVEMENT IN MILITARY BEHAVIOR AND THE DETECTION OF THE MINDANAO SLAUGHTERS SOME FILIPINOS ARE CHANGING THEIR MINDS

THERE IS A WIDE VARIATION IN THINKING ABOUT HOW SICK ONE IS AND HOW IMPORTANT TIME OFF IS IN ORDER TO GET WELL
THE PATIENTS' RESPONSIBILITIES OUTSIDE OF WORK ALSO VARY
IT'S HARD TO SAY TO WHAT DEGREE THESE FACTORS SHOULD INFLUENCE DISABILITY STATUS
<NOISE> MOST PHYSICIANS PROBABLY CONSIDER THEM IMPORTANT

MEANWHILE SAYS MR. BROADBENT THEY'VE MADE US MORE INQUISITIVE ABOUT ACQUISITIONS OURSELVES

WITHOUT THE EXPANSION THE MINE WAS THREATENED WITH CLOSURE NEXT YEAR
CLOSURE WOULD MEAN THE LOSS OF SEVEN HUNDRED AND FIFTEEN JOBS

<NOISE> WITHIN AN HOUR BARCLAYS P. L. C. LLOYDS BANK P. L. C. AND THE LONDON UNIT OF CITICORP INCREASED THEIR BASE RATES
THE BARCLAYS BOOST TOOK EFFECT IMMEDIATELY WHILE THE OTHER TWO BANKS' MOVES WERE EFFECTIVE AT THE CLOSE OF BUSINESS
SIMILAR INCREASES BY NATIONAL WESTMINSTER BANK P. L. C. AND MIDLAND BANK P. L. C. GO INTO EFFECT TODAY
BASE RATES ARE THE BENCHMARK FOR COMMERCIAL LENDING IN BRITAIN
THE FOLLOWING OFFICERS DIRECTORS AND LARGE STOCKHOLDERS OF COMPANIES REPORTED CHANGES IN HOLDINGS UNDER THE SECURITIES EXCHANGE ACT OF NINETEEN THIRTY FOUR
THOSE IDENTIFIED AS BENEFICIAL OWNERS HOLD AT LEAST TEN PERCENT OF A COMPANY'S EQUITY SECURITIES
UNLESS OTHERWISE NOTED CHANGES INVOLVED DIRECT HOLDINGS OF COMMON STOCK AND TOOK PLACE IN MAY NINETEEN EIGHTY EIGHT
COMPANIES ARE LISTED WHERE TRANSACTIONS GENERALLY AGGREGATE TEN THOUSAND SHARES OR ONE HUNDRED THOUSAND DOLLARS

BASED ON CURRENT BOOK VALUE THE SUBSIDIARIES WOULD FETCH THIRTY TWO POINT FIVE MILLION DOLLARS IN CASH PLUS PREFERRED STOCK IN ONE OF THE UTILITY UNITS
TOPEKA SAID IT INTENDS TO EXERCISE THE OPTION
THE BIGGEST HURDLE WAS TO FIND THE FUNDS TO MEET THE COST OF RECONSTRUCTION INCLUSIVE OF THE ISSUE OF STAMPS
HOWEVER THE RESPONSE TO THE GOVERNMENT'S INTERNATIONAL APPEAL FOR ASSISTANCE HAS BEEN EXTREMELY HEARTWARMING
THE FUNDS REQUIRED FOR PUBLIC SECTOR ASSISTANCE HAVE BEEN REALIZED AND THE FURTHER AMOUNT REQUIRED IS EXPECTED TO FLOW FROM THE PROCEEDS OF OVERSEAS REINSURANCE OF PROPERTY DAMAGE
TO BEGIN WITH COMPANIES HAVE BEEN DOING A GOOD JOB OF MANAGING INVENTORIES
IN THE PAST BUSINESSES HAVE TENDED TO BECOME INCREASINGLY OPTIMISTIC AS EXPANSIONS PERSISTED
WHEN SALES EVENTUALLY SLOWED INVENTORIES QUICKLY REACHED EXCESSIVE LEVELS
COMPANIES THEREUPON CUT THEIR BUYING INDUSTRIAL PRODUCTION DECLINED AND A RECESSION WAS UNDER WAY
THIRTY ONE TEAMS OF NINETEEN REPRESENTING BUSINESSES SCHOOLS AND ASSORTED OTHER GROUPS SIGNED UP FOR THE FIRST LOCAL COMPETITION
FOR WEEKS DRUMS WERE HEARD ALONG THE WILLAMETTE AS THE TEAMS PRACTICED
BOATS FULL OF MEN AND WOMEN IN BUSINESS SUITS FRESH FROM WORK OR HAPPY HOUR WERE NOT AN UNCOMMON SIGHT
THESE MIXED FEELINGS OF FRUSTRATION WITH AND GRATITUDE TOWARD THE AUTHORITIES ARE PART OF THE EVERYDAY LIFE OF A FOREIGNER DOING BUSINESS IN KOREA
<NOISE> IN FACT SUCH CONTRADICTIONS ARE WHAT SEEM TO MAKE THE KOREAN WORLD GO ROUND
A WESTERN BUSINESSMAN NEEDS TO BE READY FOR THEM
HERE ARE A FEW HARD LEARNED FACTS OF KOREAN BUSINESS LIFE
BUT MANY LOCAL BUSINESSES THAT DEPEND ON TOURISM AREN'T CONVINCED
THEY ARGUE THAT A COMMERCIAL MINE MIGHT GET PLAYED OUT IN A FEW YEARS
AND THEY FEAR THAT MANY TOURISTS WHO TREK HERE FOR THE TANTALIZING PROSPECT OF FINDING A DIAMOND IN THE FIELD WILL TAKE THEIR VACATIONS ELSEWHERE
THE COURT WAS SPLIT ON BOTH THE WILLIAMS ACT AND COMMERCE CLAUSE
JUSTICE LEWIS POWELL ACKNOWLEDGED THAT THE NINETEEN EIGHTY TWO CASE OF EDGAR V.
MITE SUGGESTED THAT ANY STATE LAW THAT FAVORED TARGETS MORE THAN DID THE WILLIAMS ACT WOULD BE INVALID BECAUSE CONGRESS HAD PREEMPTED LOCAL REGULATIONS
THE COURT BACKTRACKED HERE TO SAY STATE LAWS MIGHT BE O. K. IF THEY HELP THE WILLIAMS ACT'S PURPOSE BY HEAPING EVEN MORE BURDENS ON ACQUIRERS
IT HAS RELIEVED AT LEAST SOME OF THE FRUSTRATION FELT BY THE FARMERS SAYS PETER BRENT A MEMBER OF A FARM ACTIVIST GROUP

UNTIL NOW NASDAQ OR THE N. A. S. D.'S AUTOMATED QUOTATION SYSTEM HAS PROVIDED COMPUTER TERMINALS WITH PRICE QUOTATIONS ON ALL ISSUES
MOST BIG TRADES HOWEVER ARE NEGOTIATED BY TELEPHONE AND THEN RECORDED INTO THE SYSTEM'S COMPUTERS
ONLY THE SMALL ORDER SYSTEM HAS PROVIDED TRADERS WITH THE ABILITY TO EXECUTE TRADES BY COMPUTER RATHER THAN BY TELEPHONE
STILL COMPANY INSIDERS SAID THE RESTRUCTURING WAS ENTIRELY MR. AKERS'S PLANS AND WASN'T FORCED ON HIM BY THE I. B. M. BOARD
A DIRECTOR SAID THE BOARD LEARNED OF THE PLAN AT ITS MEETING LAST TUESDAY
JOHN FOUND EVERYTHING WAS COMING ONTO HIS DESK AND HE HAD MORE THAN HE COULD COPE WITH ANOTHER DIRECTOR SAID
HE WANTED AN ORGANIZATION WHICH RESOLVED MORE PROBLEMS BEFORE THEY GOT TO HIM
THE E. P. A. PROPOSED MINIMUM STANDARDS FOR FOR MUNICIPAL TRASH DUMPS THAT THE AGENCY ESTIMATED WILL COST EIGHT HUNDRED AND EIGHTY SEVEN MILLION A YEAR
THE PROPOSED RULES WOULD REQUIRE ABOUT SIX THOUSAND DUMPS TO INSTALL GROUNDWATER MONITORING SYSTEMS
THEY WOULD ALSO CLOSE SOME DUMPS AND PUT SPECIAL CONDITIONS ON OTHERS IN CERTAIN AREAS
HOPING TO PREVENT LONG COSTLY DISPUTES OVER WHAT DOCUMENTS DEFENDANTS HAVE TO SURRENDER JUDGES GRANT BLANKET PROTECTIVE ORDERS
THE ORDERS TYPICALLY BAR PUBLIC DISSEMINATION OF RECORDS AND DEP- DEPOSITIONS EVEN AFTER A SETTLEMENT OR VERDICT
PLAINTIFFS' LAWYERS GENERALLY HAVEN'T BALKED AT THIS AS LONG AS THEY CAN GET THE INFORMATION THEY NEED TO PREPARE FOR THEIR TRIALS
RANDOM HOUSE A SUBSIDIARY OF THE NEWHOUSE FAMILY'S ADVANCE PUBLICATIONS INCORPORATED SAID THE MOVE WILL TAKE IT OUT OF THE TEXTBOOK PUBLISHING BUSINESS
THE TWO DIVISIONS TOGETHER ACCOUNTED FOR ABOUT EIGHTY MILLION TO NINETY MILLION IN ANNUAL SALES SAID ROBERT L. BERNSTEIN RANDOM HOUSE CHAIRMAN
MR. BERNSTEIN NOTED THAT RANDOM HOUSE HAS EXPANDED IN OTHER DIRECTIONS NOTABLY IN TRADE PUBLISHING
TRADE BOOKS ARE ALL BOOKS SOLD DIRECTLY TO CONSUMERS IN BOOK STORES AND THROUGH MAIL ORDERS
A. YES WITHOUT QUESTION
IT'S MY SENSE THAT THERE WAS A TIME WHEN PEOPLE THOUGHT THEY COULD TRADE ON INSIDE INFORMATION WITH ABSOLUTE IMPUNITY
AND THAT'S NO LONGER TRUE
NOW I AM CERTAIN THAT THERE ARE STILL PEOPLE WHO THINK THEY CAN TRADE ON INSIDE INFORMATION AND GET AWAY WITH IT BECAUSE THEY'RE SMARTER THAN THE AVERAGE PERSON
THERE WILL ALWAYS BE THOSE PEOPLE
BUT I THINK THAT THE ACTIONS HAVE HAD A *SIGNIFICANT* EFFECT ON CONDUCT
THIS GROWING RELIANCE ON THIRD PARTIES TO SELL PRODUCTS COULD HINDER HEWLETT PACKARD'S ABILITY TO MANAGE ITS BUSINESS AND MAKE THE COMPANY'S STOCK LESS ATTRACTIVE TO INVESTORS
YOU BOUGHT H. P. STOCK IN THE PAST BECAUSE IT HAD MORE CONTROL OVER ITS DESTINY THAN OTHER ELECTRONICS FIRMS MR. WU SAID
TODAY H. P. HAS LESS CONTROL OVER ITS FUTURE
A SPOKESWOMAN FOR ASHLAND SAID WE HAVE BEEN OUTRAGED BY THIS ENTIRE INCIDENT

ASHLAND WAS SHOCKED TO LEARN OF MRS. ATKINS'S INVOLVEMENT THE SPOKESWOMAN SAID
THE WORD IS TERROR
MY FEAR OF FAILURE MAY BE GREATER IN SOME RESPECTS
PEOPLE SAY ADVERSITY IS GOOD FOR YOU
WELL THAT'S NOT EXACTLY TRUE
I'M NOT THE SAME PERSON I WAS
TRADING VOLUME HAS BEEN LETHARGIC FOR THE PAST FEW WEEKS PARTLY REFLECTING CONFUSION ABOUT THE ECONOMIC OUTLOOK
*IMPORTANT* CLUES ARE EXPECTED TO EMERGE FRIDAY WHEN THE LABOR DEPARTMENT REPORTS EMPLOYMENT FIGURES FOR FEBRUARY
MANY ANALYSTS EXPECT THE STATISTICS TO INDICATE THAT THE ECONOMY REMAINS WEAK AND THAT LOWER INTEREST RATES LIE AHEAD
BUT THE EMPLOYMENT STATISTICS ARE VERY DIFFICULT TO PREDICT AND INDIVIDUAL ESTIMATES VARY WIDELY
BUT SOME INDUSTRY ANALYSTS ARE SKEPTICAL ABOUT S. H. V.'S INTENTIONS
THERE'S SOMETHING GOING ON THERE SAID HUMPHREY HARRISON AN ANALYST AT COUNTY SECURITIES
I'M NOT SURE WHAT THE END GAME IS BUT I DOUBT THEY S. H. V. WILL REMAIN AT TWENTY EIGHT PERCENT
MR. REINHARD REMEMBERS AN INDIAN COMMERCIAL TWO YEARS A- AGO AT THE PRESTIGIOUS CANNES FESTIVAL NO RELATION TO THE FILM FESTIVAL THERE
IT SHOWED A CLOSE UP OF A FLATULENT ELEPHANT'S BACKSIDE WHILE AN ANNOUNCER EXPLAINED THE SOUND IN PLAIN LANGUAGE
THE COMMERCIAL PLUGGED AN ANTACID FOR HUMANS
IT DIDN'T WIN
TEXACO FILED FOR CHAPTER ELEVEN PROTECTION CITING THE BURDEN OF ITS TEN POINT THREE MILLION LEGAL BATTLE WITH PENNZOIL
THE BANKRUPTCY LAW CASE THE LARGEST IN HISTORY CAME AFTER BOTH FIRMS APPARENTLY REMAINED ABOUT TWO BILLION APART IN SETTLEMENT TALKS
THOUGH THE FILING COMPLICATES THE BATTLE MOST EXPERTS BELIEVE NEITHER COMPANY WILL EMERGE THE WINNER
BUT THE OIL WORKERS HAD A CANDIDATE TOO AND AS THE PRIMARY DREW NEAR STRANGE THINGS STARTED HAPPENING IN EBANO
NEIGHBORHOODS WITH TAP WATER SUDDENLY FOUND THEMSELVES CUT OFF
PHONES RANG WITH DEATH THREATS
THE WORLD IS MADE UP OF OPTIMISTS AND PESSIMISTS SAYS MR. STONE
IN THIS INDUSTRY IN THIS STATE THEY'RE MOSTLY PESSIMISTS
I MAY BE THE LAST OPTIMIST BUT I'M SURE I'M RIGHT
LOCAL NEWSPAPERS YESTERDAY SAID THE GOVERNMENT MAY QUALIFY THE DECISION TO SIGN THE RESTRUCTURING AGREEMENT
BUT OFFICIAL SOURCES SAID THE SIGNING IS LIKELY TO TAKE PLACE DURING THE LAST WEEK IN SEPTEMBER
THE SIGNING DEADLINE IS OCTOBER FIRST

BUT AT LEAST THE MARKET DIDN'T CRASH
NO FINAL BUDGET DECISIONS HAVE BEEN MADE AT THE WHITE HOUSE

BUT IT'S ALREADY CLEAR THAT THE ADMINISTRATION HAS INCREASED ITS EMPHASIS ON EDUCATION
I THINK IT'S A PERFECTLY HONORABLE PROFESSION
IF MORE OF US DID IT THE OPPORTUNITIES WOULD GET SMALLER BECAUSE MORE FIRMS WOULD BE COMPETING TO CLOSE THE SAME SPREADS HE SAYS
THE PRODUCT IS A *LEGITIMATE* HEDGING PRODUCT AND A LEGITIMATE WAY TO ADD LIQUIDITY TO TH- THE MARKET

BUT THE BOESKY FUND HAS ALREADY SOLD NEARLY ALL ITS STOCK POSITIONS AND A QUICKER DISSOLUTION HAS APPEARED LIKELY FOR SOME TIME

THESE ANALYSTS ARGUE THAT THE INCREASE WAS ENGINEERED BY THE FED
NEARLY ALL THE GAINERS WERE COMPANIES THAT SELL TO CUSTOMERS OTHER THAN PERSONAL COMPUTER MAKERS

YOU HAVE TO PINCH YOURSELF TO REMEMBER THAT THE INFLATION RUNNING NEAR ZERO IN APRIL IS NOW RUNNING BELOW ZERO

THESE HOLDINGS RANGE FROM MORE THAN ONE POINT FOUR BILLION DOLLARS OF I. B. M. TO JUST SIX HUNDRED AND SEVENTY THREE THOUSAND DOLLARS OF ALLIS CHALMERS CORPORATION
WHAT THIS SHOW REALLY IS THEN IS AN HOMAGE TO THE LATE SPANISH MASTER
IF ONE ACCEPTS THE SHOW ON THAT BASIS IT IS SUCCESSFUL DESPITE ITS GAPS

AFTER THAT HIS WORK WAS SOMEWHAT UNEVEN

WE THINK OUR BACKGROUND WILL HELP US COME UP WITH SOLUTIONS HE SAYS

I DON'T WANT TO RUN IT OUT THERE AND BE DEFEATED AGAIN
MR. WRIGHT SHOULD BE LESS TIMID IN HIS CONVICTIONS
AFTER ALL HE ISN'T THE ONE WHO HAS TO RISK GETTING HIT OVER THE HEAD WITH A METAL PIPE
PILLSBURY'S LOSS COMPARES WITH EARNINGS OF FORTY EIGHT POINT FIVE MILLION DOLLARS OR FIFTY SIX CENTS A SHARE IN THE YEAR EARLIER QUARTER
REVENUE FELL TWO PERCENT IN THE LATEST PERIOD TO ONE POINT FIVE ZERO BILLION DOLLARS FROM ONE POINT FIVE THREE BILLION DOLLARS
THE REVENUE DECLINE CAME FROM PILLSBURY'S RESTAURANT BUSINESS
IF DOCTOR HAMMER WERE TO DIE TOMORROW THE CHECK TO HIS FOUNDATION WOULD BE MORE THAN NINETEEN MILLION DOLLARS
BUT OCCIDENTAL AND DOCTOR HAMMER APPARENTLY DON'T FORESEE AN IMMEDIATE USE OF THE CLAUSE THAT WILL BENEFIT THE FOUNDATION
THE CHAIRMAN'S EMPLOYMENT CONTRACT RUNS AT LEAST TO FEBRUARY FIRST NINETEEN NINETY EIGHT AT WHICH TIME DOCTOR HAMMER WILL BE NINETY NINE
AFTER THAT THE CONTRACT AUTOMATICALLY EXTENDS INDEFINITELY
BUT GENERAL PINOCHET IS MORE LIKELY TO SUPPORT WHICHEVER CIVILIAN CANDIDATE PLEDGES TO RETAIN HIS ANTI COMMUNIST POLICIES AND SUCH A PERSON HAS A GOOD CHANCE OF WINNING
CHILE A PROTECTIONIST BACKWATER IN THE EARLY NINETEEN SEVENTIES NOW HAS A DYNAMIC AND OPEN EXPORT CAPABLE ECONOMY
MOST VOTERS APPROVE OF THIS TRANSFORMATION AS SHOWN BY THE FACT THAT ALMOST NONE OF THE SIXTEEN CURRENT OPPOSITION PARTIES CALL FOR A REVERSAL OF CURRENT ECONOMIC POLICIES
THE ALLENDE CHAOS IS STILL VIVIDLY REMEMBERED
DETAILS ARE STILL MURKY ABOUT THE REST OF THE CREDITS
ITALIAN OFFICIALS SAY THAT ROME'S DECISION TO GRANT ABOUT A SEVEN HUNDRED AND SEVENTY FIVE MILLION DOLLAR GUARANTEE OF EXPORT CREDITS WAS PRIMARILY A POLITICAL RATHER THAN A BANKING DECISION
BRITAIN'S MIDLAND BANK HAS ANNOUNCED PLANS FOR A ONE BILLION POUND CREDIT LINE ALTHOUGH SOME BRITISH BANKS MAY BE GETTING COLD FEET ABOUT PARTICIPATING
FRENCH BANKS HAVE YET TO ANNOUNCE THEIR PLANS OFFICIALLY BUT ARE SAID TO BE CONSIDERING LOANS OF TWO BILLION DOLLARS
WITH THE U. S. GOVERNMENT AS ITS PRIME CUSTOMER TRACOR WAS HELPLESS WHEN DEFENSE SPENDING SLOWED
INTERNALLY MR. INMAN SAYS HE DISCOVERED THAT EXPENSES COULDN'T BE CUT AS EASILY AS BANKERS HAD FORECAST
AND FEES WERE HIGHER THAN EXPECTED
MR. INMAN CALLS IT ALL PART OF MY EDUCATION
THE CRACK EPIDEMIC HAS JUST ABOUT SILENCED LIBERAL OPPOSITION TO TOUGH LAW AND ORDER POLICIES
IT IS OBVIOUSLY RIDICULOUS TO TALK ABOUT REHABILITATING AN UZI TOTING DRUG PUSHER WHO MAKES FIVE THOUSAND DOLLARS A WEEK
HIS PROBLEM IS NOT LACK OF SELF ESTEEM
THERE IS NOTHING A SOCIAL WORKER IS GOING TO BE ABLE TO DO FOR HIM ESPECIALLY SINCE THE SOCIAL WORKER IS TOO AFRAID TO VENTURE INTO HIS NEIGHBORHOOD
AT W. F. I. A. RUNNING THE FORMULA LAST JANUARY THIRTIETH MEANT BUYING MORE THAN TWO HUNDRED THOUSAND SHARES OF REEBOK QUICKLY
THAT'S BECAUSE W. F. I. A. LIKES TO OWN ALL THE STOCKS IN THE S. AND P. FIVE HUNDRED INDEX IN AMOUNTS SCALED TO THEIR MARKET WEIGHT
THOSE HOLDINGS RANGE FROM MORE THAN ONE POINT FOUR BILLION DOLLARS OF I. B. M. TO JUST SIX HUNDRED AND SEVENTY THREE THOUSAND DOLLARS OF ALLIS CHAMBERS CORP.

THAT CARRIER HAD MORE THAN TWENTY FIVE THOUSAND TICKETS THAT NEEDED TO BE REFUNDED WHEN ITS OPERATIONS WERE JOINED WITH CONTINENTAL'S THE SPOKESMAN SAID
HE INSISTED THAT MOST OF THE REFUNDS WERE COMPLETED

HE DECLINED TO ELABORATE
