HE ADDED THAT THE PARAGRAPHS OF THE ORDER THAT WERE UPHELD CONTINUE TO PROHIBIT EMULEX FROM USING TRADE SECRETS THAT DIGITAL SAYS WERE STOLEN FROM IT
THE HUGE GAP TO A LARGE EXTENT IS A PRICE PHENOMENON
THE DOLLAR'S FALL HAS PUSHED UP THE PRICE OF IMPORTS CAUSING THE DEFICIT TO SWELL EVEN AS THE VOLUME OF NON OIL IMPORTS HAS RECEDED
BUT LONG BEFORE NOW THESE HIGHER PRICES WERE SUPPOSED TO LEAD TO IMPROVEMENT IN THE MONTHLY MERCHANDISE TRADE DEFICIT AS WELL
BIDS TOTALING THREE HUNDRED AND SEVENTY SIX MILLION DOLLARS WERE SUBMITTED
ACCEPTED BIDS RANGE FROM SEVEN POINT ONE FIVE PERCENT TO SEVEN POINT ONE SEVEN THREE PERCENT
THE BANK HOLDING COMPANY SLATED ANOTHER FIFTY MILLION DOLLAR SALE NEXT TUESDAY
BUT FOR MOST MUTUAL FUND INVESTORS THE TAX BITE THIS YEAR WILL BE BIGGER THAN EVER
HOLDERS ARE TAXED ON ONE HUNDRED PERCENT OF REALIZED CAPITAL GAINS UNDER THE NEW TAX LAW FOR INSTANCE
PREVIOUSLY SIXTY PERCENT WAS EXCLUDED FROM TAXATION
ANY GAIN CREDITED TO INVESTORS BY THEIR FUND IS CONSIDERED REALIZED WHETHER THE HOLDER ACTUALLY SELLS ANY FUND SHARES OR NOT
ARTICLES BEGIN APPEARING ABOUT THE RISE OF THE RELIGIOUS RIGHT A GROUP THAT SEEMED TO BE DEALT WITH MORE AS ANTHROPOLOGY THAN JOURNALISM
AFTER WATCHING EVANGELICAL T. V. MINISTERS NORMAN LEAR BEGAN SPENDING HIS FORTUNE ON A GROUP CALLED PEOPLE FOR THE AMERICAN WAY
MUCH OF THIS SWAMP CREATURE TREATMENT CAME TO A HEAD IN THE NINETEEN EIGHTY SIX LAWSUITS OVER CREATIONISM AND SECULAR HUMANISM IN SCHOOL TEXTS
THE ESTABLISHMENT MADE VIRTUALLY NO EFFORT TO PUSH BELOW THE SURFACE OF THESE GRIEVANCES
IT'S A WELCOME DEVELOPMENT IN THE FACE OF VERY SIGNIFICANT INVENTORY OVERHANG SAYS MORGAN STANLEY'S MR. ROACH
A SLOWING OF GROWTH IN PRODUCTION GIVES COMPANIES THE ABILITY TO WORK OFF SOME INVENTORY
AND ECONOMISTS NOTE THAT THE STEADY OPERATING RATE INDICATES CONTINUED STRENGTH IN THE MANUFACTURING SECTOR

THE STOCK COMPONENT MAKES IT DIFFICULT TO DETERMINE THE VALUE OF THE TOTAL BID WHICH HAS BEEN WIDELY ESTIMATED AT ABOUT SIX POINT THREE BILLION DOLLARS
MACY'S HO(WEVER)- ADVISERS HOWEVER PRIVATELY VALUE IT AT BETWEEN SEVENTY THREE DOLLARS AND SEVENTY FOUR DOLLARS A SHARE OR COMPARABLE TO CAMPEAU'S PROPOSAL

IT IS LIKE THE PROVERBIAL RAILROAD TRACKS IN AMERICA THAT SEPARATE THE RICH SIDE OF TOWN FROM THE POOR
THE PHYSICAL DISTANCE MAY NOT BE GREAT BUT THE MENTAL GAP IS

DURING ANY REPAIR PROCESS BLOOD CLOTS ARE CONSISTENTLY BEING FORMED AND DISSOLVED
IT IS QUITE POSSIBLE SCIENTISTS SPECULATE THAT DURING ATTEMPTS TO REPAIR THE ARTERY WALL THE BODY AT SOME POINT TRIES TO DISSOLVE A BLOOD CLOT
BUT IT MISTAKENLY GRABS PROTEIN A. INSTEAD OF *PLASMINOGEN* PULLING IT WITH ITS BAG OF FAT AND CHOLESTEROL INTO THE ARTERY WALL
THIS THWARTS THE REPAIR PROCESS AND BEGINS A VICIOUS CYCLE DRAWING MORE AND MORE CHOLESTEROL INTO THE DAMAGED AREA
AND IN FACT MICROSCOPIC BLOOD CLOTS AND BITS OF L. P. A. ARE FOUND IN THE MISHMASH OF THE DEPOSITS
HOWEVER HE LEAVES PRIME AT A DIFFICULT TIME

BUT IT STILL REPRESENTS A LIMITATION ON THE MARKET

<NOISE> FOR ALTHOUGH MR. HOCKNEY'S TALENT AND ORIGINALITY ARE GENERALLY ACKNOWLEDGED HE IS REGARDED IN SOME QUARTERS AS MORE OF A GIFTED ILLUSTRATOR THAN A MAJOR ARTIST
AND SINCE IN RECENT YEARS HIS WORK HAS TENDED TO BE INCREASINGLY DECORATIVE A CHRONOLOGICAL ARRANGEMENT WAS APPARENTLY THOUGHT TO BE TOO RISKY

THUS HIGHER BIDDING NARROWS THE INVESTOR'S RETURN WHILE LOWER BIDDING WIDENS IT
THE PERCENTAGE RATES ARE CALCULATED ON A THREE HUNDRED AND SIXTY DAY YEAR WHILE THE COUPON EQUIVALENT YIELD IS BASED ON A THREE HUNDRED AND SIXTY FIVE DAY YEAR

THE MOST PROVOCATIVE HYPOTHESIS HAS IT THAT MR. SILVA HERZOG HAS HIMSELF BECOME A CANDIDATE AGAIN
WE ARE AWARE OF OUR INTERNATIONAL OBLIGATIONS AND WE WILLINGLY ACCEPT THEM THE BANKER OBSERVES
BUT THE BUNDESBANK HE ASSERTS HAS TO BE VERY CAUTIOUS IN SETTING ITS MONETARY POLICY
FROM OUR POINT OF VIEW WE ALREADY HAVE A PERMISSIVE POLICY HE SAYS
MR. WRIGHT DIDN'T LIST THOSE EARNINGS ON NINETEEN EIGHTY SEVEN PERSONAL FINANCIAL DISCLOSURE FORMS
ATTORNEY DANIEL SWILLINGER SAID AT A MINIMUM HE SHOULD HAVE DISCLOSED THIS THE SIX THOUSAND AND FIVE HUNDRED DOLLAR ESCROW AS AN ASSET

THE ONE ELEMENT OF SUSPENSE REMAINS THE SELECTION OF A RUNNING MATE FOR VICE PRESIDENT BUSH'S PRESIDENTIAL CAMPAIGN
BUSH MANAGERS INSIST THEY WON'T DISCLOSE THE VICE PRESIDENTIAL NOMINEE'S IDENTITY UNTIL THURSDAY MORNING
REAGAN ARRIVED AT THE CONVENTION SITE LAST NIGHT AND PREPARED FOR HIS FAREWELL SPEECH TO THE PARTY TONIGHT

<NOISE> IT IS A CRUCIAL TIME IN WHICH BUSH MUST ATTEMPT TO MOVE OUT FROM UNDER REAGAN'S SHADOW AND ESTABLISH HIS OWN IDENTITY
THE DECISION TO INTERRUPT THE OLYMPIC COVERAGE COULD MEAN A POTENTIAL ADVERTISING REVENUE LOSS OF EIGHT MILLION DOLLARS ACCORDING TO MICHAEL GARTNER PRESIDENT OF N. B. C. NEWS
THE DEBATES WOULDN'T BE INTERRUPTED BY ADS
AFTER SOME SECOND GUESSING ON THEIR EARLIER DECISION TO SKIP THE PRESIDENTIAL DEBATE MR. GARTNER SAID NETWORK OFFICIALS CHANGED THEIR MINDS YESTERDAY
<NOISE> EIGHT MILLION BUCKS ISN'T SOMETHING YOU WANT TO KISS AWAY BUT YOU SWALLOW HARD AND DO WHAT YOU THINK IS RIGHT MR. GARTNER SAID
A FEDERAL JURY IN LOS ANGELES CONVICTED A FORMER MEXICAN POLICE OFFICER OF THE NINETEEN EIGHTY FIVE KIDNAP AND MURDER OF A U. S. DRUG AGENT AND A PILOT
RAUL LOPEZ ALVAREZ TWENTY NINE WAS THE FIRST OF THREE ALLEGED MEMBERS OF A MEXICAN DRUG RING TO BE CONVICTED IN THE CASE
SENTENCING WAS SCHEDULED FOR NEXT MONTH
WE LOVE THESE HORSES HE SAYS
WE HAVE A RECESSION BUT MANY PEOPLE ARE RICH
IF YOU HAVE A HOUSE AND PICTURES YOU WANT A HORSE AN ARABIAN HORSE
EXACTLY LIKE AMERICA
IF YOU DON'T HAVE AN ARABIAN HORSE YOU CANNOT MEET MR. ARMAND HAMMER
IF YOU HAVE AN ARABIAN HORSE HE IS YOUR FRIEND
<NOISE> WHEN THE HOUSE AND SENATE APPROVED THE TAX BILL EARLY SATURDAY LAWMAKERS DIDN'T MENTION THE LAST MINUTE PROVISIONS AND CONGRESSIONAL STAFFERS DESCRIBED THEM AS TECHNICAL
WHILE THE ESTIMATED REVENUE OF ALMOST ONE HUNDRED MILLION DOLLARS OVER THREE YEARS IS RELATIVELY SMALL <NOISE> THE PROVISIONS MIGHT BE PERCEIVED AS AN ANTI TAKEOVER PUSH BY CONGRESS
THEY COULD HAVE THE EFFECT OF SLOWING CERTAIN TAKEOVER ACTIVITY CONGRESSIONAL SOURCES ACKNOWLEDGED OVER THE WEEKEND
TO BE SURE ON A LOT OF SCORES THE SUMMIT WAS A SUCCESS
ECONOMIC COOPERATION WAS ADVANCED WITH BUSINESSMEN SIGNING AGREEMENTS FOR ABOUT THIRTY CONTRACTS AND SEVERAL JOINT VENTURES
HUMAN RIGHTS TOO MAY HAVE TAKEN A STEP FORWARD IF MR. GORBACHEV LIVES UP TO HIS PROMISE TO RELEASE ALL POLITICAL PRISONERS BY YEAR'S END
LAFARGE ALSO NAMED ROBERT W. MURDOCH FORTY FOUR PRESIDENT AND CHIEF OPERATING OFFICER
<NOISE> MR. FRANCOIS PREVIOUSLY HELD THE POST OF PRESIDENT THE POST OF CHIEF OPERATING OFFICER IS NEW
MR. MURDOCH HAD BEEN PRESIDENT OF CANADA CEMENT LAFARGE LAFARGE CORPORATION'S CANADIAN UNIT
THE NASDAQ O. T. C. COMPOSITE INDEX ROSE TWO POINT TWO SIX TO FOUR TWENTY NINE POINT ZERO ZERO
IN THE O. T. C. MARKET THERE WERE ONE THOUSAND TWO HUNDRED AND NINETY THREE ISSUES ADVANCING AND NINE HUNDRED AND EIGHTY NINE DECLINING
VOLUME ROSE TO ONE HUNDRED AND SEVENTY POINT FOUR MILLION SHARES FROM ONE HUNDRED AND FIFTY FIVE POINT SEVEN MILLION WEDNESDAY
THE AMERICAN STOCK EXCHANGE MARKET VALUE INDEX ROSE THREE POINT ONE SEVEN TO THREE TWENTY NINE POINT FOUR SEVEN
BOTH THE NASDAQ AND AMEX INDEXES SURPASSED RECORDS SET WEDNESDAY
U. S. BANK REGULATIONS ARE ANOTHER STUMBLING BLOCK
CURRENTLY BANKS CAN'T OWN MORE THAN NINETEEN POINT NINE PERCENT OF A NON FINANCIAL COMPANY AND CAN ONLY BE PASSIVE INVESTORS
UNLESS THESE RESTRICTIONS ARE DROPPED BANKS ARE LIKELY TO BE SWAPPING MAINLY FOR EQUITY IN FINANCIAL INSTITUTIONS
THOSE AREN'T ALWAYS APPEALING OR EVEN AVAILABLE
MEXICO NATIONALIZED ITS BANKS FIVE YEARS AGO
<NOISE> AND IN BRAZIL CENTRAL BANK FIGURES SHOW THAT ONE OUT OF EVERY SEVEN BANK LOANS IS PAST DUE EIGHT TIMES THE DELINQUENCY RATE OF A YEAR EARLIER
THE STOCK SPLIT WILL BE DISTRIBUTED ON OR ABOUT JULY SECOND TO HOLDERS OF RECORD ON JUNE TWENTY SIXTH
AFTER THE DIVIDEND THE COMPANY WILL HAVE ABOUT SEVEN POINT EIGHT MILLION SHARES OUTSTANDING
THE COMPANY SAID IT WILL DISCONTINUE PAYING THE PREVIOUS REGULAR QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND OF FIFTEEN CENTS A SHARE AFTER THE STOCK DIVIDEND IS PAID TO CONSERVE CASH FOR FUTURE ACQUISITIONS
THE CASH DIVIDEND LAST WAS PAID MAY FIFTEENTH
WITH LESS REGULATORY AND POLITICAL PRESSURE CONRAIL WAS ABLE TO ABANDON ABOUT FIVE THOUSAND MILES OF TRACK BETWEEN NINETEEN EIGHTY ONE AND NINETEEN EIGHTY SIX
ABOUT HALF OF THAT HAS BEEN TAKEN UP BY SHORT LINE RAILROADS NONUNION RAILROADS THAT HAVE CONTINUED TO PROVIDE THE SERVICE AT A LESSER COST
THEY BRING THE BUSINESS TO US AND WE HANDLE IT AS A TRUNK LINE
BURMAH A BRITISH OIL COMPANY AND S. H. V. A DUTCH ENERGY CONCERN SAID THEY WOULD PROCEED WITH THEIR OFFER ONLY IF CALOR ENDORSED THE BID
<NOISE> A SPOKESMAN FOR BURMAH SAID THAT THE PROPOSAL MADE YESTERDAY WAS FINAL AND THAT BURMAH AND S. H. V. WOULDN'T CONTEMPLATE A HOSTILE OFFER
HE ALSO RULED OUT THE POSSIBILITY THAT BURMAH MIGHT LAUNCH A BID ON ITS OWN
IVAN TOMS ISN'T IN A FESTIVE MOOD AS HE CONTEMPLATES HIS IMPENDING CONFRONTATION WITH THE MILITARY
I KNOW IT WILL BE HORRIFIC HE SAYS STARING DOWN AT HIS LUNCH BUT IT IS IMPORTANT TO TAKE THIS STAND
I THINK INDIVIDUALS CAN MAKE A DIFFERENCE
THE BUDGET HOWEVER WILL NOT MANAGE ITSELF
SOME WAY MUST BE FOUND TO PUT IT ON COURSE
IN OUR HISTORY AN IMPASSE OVER POLICY HAS BEEN BROKEN OCCASIONALLY BY SOME SORT OF NATIONAL COMMISSION AND IT IS TIME FOR ONE AGAIN
SUCH A COMMISSION RESOLVED THE SOCIAL SECURITY PROBLEM EARLIER IN THIS DECADE
IN THE JOHNSON YEARS A COMMISSION'S PROPOSALS WERE THE MEANS FOR RESTRUCTURING THE BUDGET
STILL EARLIER IT WAS A COMMISSION THAT RECOMMENDED THE CREATION OF THE FEDERAL RESERVE SYSTEM
THIS APPROACH ENABLES THE PRESIDENT AND MEMBERS OF CONGRESS TO AVOID SOME FLAK BY MERELY IMPLEMENTING WHAT THE COMMISSION TOLD US TO DO
THUS THE BOARD SAID IT WOULD BE RELUCTANT TO GIVE BANK OF NEW YORK MORE THAN ONE EXTENSION OF THE INITIAL NINETY DAYS TO CONSUMMATE THE MERGER
NORMALLY EXTENSIONS OF THE NINETY DAY RULE ARE GRANTED FREELY
BUT IN THE PENDING MERGER THE BOARD WANTS TO AVOID A LONG AND FRUITLESS STRUGGLE SAID MICHAEL BRADFIELD THE FED'S GENERAL COUNSEL
ONE OF THE MORE DIRECT READINGS ON INFLATION WILL COME IN FRIDAY'S REPORT ON CONSUMER PRICES WHICH ARE EXPECTED NOT SURPRISINGLY TO BE HIGHER
ANALYSTS EXPECT AN INCREASE OF ABOUT FOUR TENTHS OF A PERCENT IN THE APRIL CONSUMER PRICE INDEX ON THE HEELS OF A FIVE TENTHS OF A PERCENT JUMP THE PREVIOUS MONTH
THE PRICE INCREASES ARE EXPECTED PRETTY MUCH ACROSS THE BOARD AS COMMODITIES AND SERVICES ARE RISING AT ABOUT A FOUR PERCENT ANNUAL RATE
BUT THERE IS ALWAYS THE RISK THAT REVIVING A CLASSIC SLOGAN OR SPOKESMAN WILL BACKFIRE AND CREATE AN OLD FASHIONED IMAGE FOR A BRAND
TO GUARD AGAINST THAT MARKETERS TEND TO GIVE THEIR RECYCLED ADS A CONTEMPORARY TWIST
THE CAPTAIN RAID OF NINETEEN EIGHTY EIGHT FOR EXAMPLE HAS RIPPLING MUSCLES AND A FUTURISTIC LOOK
AND A WOMAN IN ONE OF THE NEW NESTEA SPOTS DOESN'T JUST TUMBLE INTO A SWIMMING POOL SHE FALLS ONTO AN EXERCISE MAT THAT TURNS INTO A POOL
<NOISE> PRICES AT THE MASS RETAIL LEVEL HOWEVER HAVEN'T RISEN MUCH IN A DECADE PARTLY BECAUSE BIG RETAILERS USE TENNIS BALLS TO LURE SHOPPERS
I REMEMBER PURCHASING A CAN OF BALLS FOR TWO DOLLARS IN NINETEEN SIXTY SEVEN SAYS WALTER L. HENRY A PITTSBURGH RECREATIONAL PLAYER
TWO WEEKS AGO I PICKED UP A CAN FOR A DOLLAR EIGHTY NINE

BUT AS INTEREST RATES RISE IN CANADA THE CANADIAN DOLLAR IS GAINING ON ITS U. S. COUNTERPART TRADERS AND ANALYSTS SAY
AND AS THE CANADIAN UNIT RISES IT LURES MORE FOREIGN INVESTMENT PARTICULARLY FROM JAPAN WHICH ADDS TO ITS STRENGTH
THE TREASURY RULES HOWEVER CONTAIN MODIFICATIONS OF THE S. E. C. RULES DESIGNED TO IMPROVE PROTECTION OF PARTIES INVOLVED IN REPURCHASE AGREEMENTS
IN SUCH AGREEMENTS CALLED REPOS ONE PARTY SELLS GOVERNMENT SECURITIES TO ANOTHER WITH THE UNDERSTANDING THAT THE SELLER WILL REPURCHASE THEM LATER AT A SPECIFIED PRICE
<NOISE> THE PROPOSED MODIFICATIONS WOULD APPLY TO GOVERNMENT SECURITIES BROKERS OR DEALERS THAT ARE ALREADY REGISTERED AS WELL AS TO NEWLY REGISTERED ENTITIES
<NOISE> NEVERTHELESS INTEREST RATES FELL ON SHORT TERM TREASURY BILLS SOLD YESTERDAY AT THE GOVERNMENT'S WEEKLY AUCTION
THE AVERAGE RATE ON NEW THIRTEEN WEEK BILLS DECLINED TO FIVE POINT FIVE NINE PERCENT FROM FIVE POINT EIGHT ONE PERCENT AT LAST WEEK'S SALE
THE AVERAGE RATE ON NEW TWENTY SIX WEEK BILLS FELL TO FIVE POINT NINE NINE PERCENT FROM SIX POINT ONE PERCENT THE PREVIOUS WEEK

HE ADDED THAT PAN AM NONETHELESS TURNED IN ONE OF THE BEST PERFORMANCES AMONG MAJOR CARRIERS
HE PREDICTED THE NEXT REPORT WILL SHOW A REBOUND FOR THE AIRLINE IN FEBRUARY
TO BE SURE A FEW COMPANIES ARE TRYING TO USE THE OLYMPICS TO MAKE THE TRANSITION FROM A *SUBCONTRACTOR* TO AN INTERNATIONALLY KNOWN BRAND
KUKJE CORPORATION SHIFTED FROM PRODUCING NIKE SHOES TO DEVELOPING ITS OWN PRO SPECS LINE OF ATHLETIC SHOES FIVE YEARS AGO
IT PAID FOUR POINT FIVE MILLION DOLLARS IN CASH AND GOODS TO BE AN OFFICIAL SPONSOR OF THE GAMES AND HAS BEEN HIGHLIGHTING THE LOGO IN ITS ADVERTISING
KUKJE HOPES THE OLYMPICS WILL HELP GIVE PRO SPECS A FOOTHOLD IN EUROPE
VIEWERS AND CRITICS SAY THE HUGE LOAD OF ADS AND AIRTIME IS PART OF THE PROBLEM
COMMERCIAL CLUTTER SEEMS GREATER THAN IN PREVIOUS OLYMPICS BROADCASTS MANY CRITICS SAY
THE COVERAGE BETWEEN ADS SOME COMPLAIN IS FRAGMENTED AND SHIFTY JUMPING TOO QUICKLY AMONG MYRIAD SPORTS
ACTUAL EVENTS AS OPPOSED TO TAPED PROFILES PREVIEWS AND REPORTS TAKE UP LESS THAN HALF OF THE AIRTIME
MANY HEADLINE EVENTS DON'T APPEAR UNTIL AFTER MIDNIGHT
THE STUDY WAS PART OF CORNELL'S RESPONSE TO CALLS BY LOCAL POLITICIANS THAT IT SHOULD HELP MORE IN TOMPKINS COUNTY

IN PER STUDENT PAYMENTS CORNELL RANKED SEVENTH AT SEVENTY DOLLARS
<NOISE> MR. DELCHAMPS SAID THIRTY PERCENT OF THE COMPANY'S STOCK OUTSTANDING IS HELD BY PEOPLE WHO HAVE AGREED NOT TO SELL THEIR HOLDINGS BEFORE OCTOBER THIRTY FIRST
ANOTHER TWENTY FIVE PERCENT IS HELD UNDER THE COMPANY'S EMPLOYEE STOCK OWNERSHIP PLAN
MOST OF THE PEOPLE IN THE FORMER CATEGORY ARE EXPECTED TO EXTEND THE NO SELL AGREEMENT FOR ANOTHER YEAR HE SAID

HE CLEARLY COMMANDS THE DEMOCRATS' MOST LOYAL CONSTITUENCY
IT IS NEVER WISE TO IGNORE THOSE YOU CAN DEPEND ON SAYS SONIA JARVIS OF THE NATIONAL COALITION ON BLACK VOTER PARTICIPATION
<NOISE> IN APRIL DREXEL AGREED TO PAY SIX HUNDRED AND FIFTY MILLION DOLLARS AND PLEAD GUILTY TO SIX FELONY COUNTS RELATED TO A FEDERAL INSIDER TRADING INVESTIGATION
<NOISE> THE PLEA AGREEMENT WAS MADE IN CONJUNCTION WITH A BROAD SETTLEMENT OF SECURITIES LAW VIOLATIONS WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION
BECAUSE THE FIRM AGREED THAT IT COMMITTED FELONIES SECURITIES COMMISSIONERS IN MOST STATES CAN AUTOMATICALLY REVOKE DREXEL'S LICENSE TO DO BUSINESS
WHY THIS INCREDIBLE DIVERSION OF EFFORT TO CRIMES THAT OFTEN ARE NOT CLEARLY DEFINED BY STATUTE AND WHERE IDENTIFIABLE VICTIMS ARE SELDOM FOUND
MAYBE TOO MANY OF TODAY'S PROSECUTORS WERE INFLUENCED BY THE PREVAILING COUNTERCULTURE SUSPICIONS OF MIDDLE CLASS MORALITY DURING THEIR LAW SCHOOL DAYS
<NOISE> BUT ANOTHER ANSWER IS SIMPLER IT IS EASIER TO EXTRACT PLEA BARGAINS FROM TRADERS WITH A MERE MENTION OF R. I. C. O. THAN FROM REAL FELONS
AS A LONGTIME MEMBER OF THE ANAHEIM CALIFORNIA
REDEVELOPMENT COMMISSION THE RETIRED FOOD COMPANY EXECUTIVE TOOK PRIDE IN HELPING HIS CITY GROW
BUT HE ALSO LOVED THE FREE SILVER PASS THAT DISNEYLAND GAVE HIM EVERY YEAR AS ONE OF NEARLY ONE THOUSAND LOCAL NOTABLES SO HONORED
DESPITE ALL THE UNCERTAINTY THAT SURROUNDED BRITISH PETROLEUM'S JUMBO OFFERING THERE WASN'T THAT MUCH TURMOIL IN THE MARKET WHEN SHARES BEGAN TO TRADE FRIDAY
B. P.'S PARTIALLY PAID AMERICAN DEPOSITARY SHARES CLOSED UNCHANGED AT SEVENTEEN AND A QUARTER WITH THIRTEEN POINT TWO MILLION TRADED
<NOISE> IT WAS THE BIG BOARD'S MOST ACTIVE ISSUE
DURING THE PAST SEVERAL DAYS CORPORATIONS AND OTHER BIG INVESTORS HAVE REFRAINED FROM LENDING TREASURY BONDS AND NOTES TO SECURITIES DEALERS FOR BRIEF PERIODS
THAT IN TURN HAS FORCED MANY DEALERS TO REFRAIN FROM SELLING BORROWED SECURITIES OR AMASSING SO CALLED SHORT POSITIONS
IT'S HARD TO SHORT ANYTHING IN THIS MARKET AT THE MOMENT SAID A TRADER AT A LARGE GOVERNMENT SECURITIES DEALER
<NOISE> MOST ANALYSTS SAID THE INTERNATIONAL OPERATIONS OF THE TWO BANKS MAKE A GOOD FIT
GENERALE DE BANQUE HAS A STRONG NETWORK IN AFRICA WHILE AMRO HAS MORE OPERATIONS IN THE MIDDLE EAST AND FAR EAST
AND WHILE GENERALE DE BANQUE HAS AN IMPORTANT COMMERCIAL BANKING OPERATION AMRO HAS MORE EXPERIENCE IN BROKERAGE AND INVESTMENT SERVICES FOR ITS CLIENTS
THINGS ARE A BIT DULLER THIS YEAR
MR. BILZERIAN HAS SENT HIS BOY TO A LITTLE LEAGUE TEAM IN FARAWAY MINNESOTA WHERE THE FAMILY SPENDS ITS SUMMERS AND ISN'T COACHING A TEAM THIS YEAR <NOISE>
ALL THE ACTION APPARENTLY WILL BE IN THE COURTROOM

MY HIGH SCHOOL'S ADMINISTRATION WOULD TOO
ALSO MY UNION THE UNITED FEDERATION OF TEACHERS AND EVERY REPUBLICAN AND DEMOCRAT WHO HAS EVER RUN FOR PUBLIC OFFICE ANYWHERE
<NOISE> AND MOST VEHEMENTLY OF ALL THE LEAGUE OF WOMEN VOTERS
BENETTON DENIES ALL CHARGES ON THE SPECIFIC ACCUSATIONS BY UNHAPPY STORE OWNERS AND STEADFASTLY MAINTAINS THAT IT ISN'T A FRANCHISE OPERATION AND THUS ISN'T SUBJECT TO FRANCHISE REQUIREMENTS
STORE OWNERS IT SAYS ARE LICENSEES BECAUSE THEY OWN THEIR STORES AND DON'T PAY ROYALTIES TO BENETTON AS FRANCHISES TYPICALLY DO
ALTHOUGH IT ACKNOWLEDGES THAT A FEW STORE OWNERS HAVE COMPLAINED IT BLAMES ANY PROBLEMS ON THE OWNERS THEMSELVES OR ON ITS FIELD REPRESENTATIVES WHO DEAL DIRECTLY WITH THEM

<NOISE> BUT THIS IS A VERY LIVELY MARKET AND WE HAVEN'T GIVEN UP YET
THE MARKET FOR HOME GEAR IS GROWING AS SPENDING SHIFTS FROM APPAREL TO THE HOME SAYS KURT BARNARD OF THE RETAIL MARKETING REPORT NEW YORK
HE SAYS SALES AT HOME RELATED STORES ARE GROWING NINETY ONE PERCENT FASTER THAN AT DEPARTMENT STORES AND SEVENTY FIVE PERCENT FASTER THAN AT APPAREL STORES
<NOISE> THE TREND IS MAKING THE MARKET LESS DEPENDENT ON HOUSING MARKET CYCLES SAYS CARL STEIDTMANN CHIEF ECONOMIST OF MANAGEMENT HORIZONS DUBLIN OHIO
WHILE SECOND QUARTER HOUSING STARTS WERE DOWN THIRTY PERCENT FROM TWO YEARS AGO FURNITURE SALES WERE UP EIGHTEEN PERCENT HE SAYS
THESE MIXED FEELINGS OF FRUSTRATION WITH AND GRATITUDE TOWARD THE AUTHORITIES ARE PART OF THE EVERYDAY LIFE OF A FOREIGNER DOING BUSINESS IN KOREA
IN FACT SUCH CONTRADICTIONS ARE WHAT SEEM TO MAKE THE KOREAN WORLD GO ROUND
A WESTERN BUSINESSMAN NEEDS TO BE READY FOR THEM
HERE ARE A FEW HARD LEARNED FACTS OF KOREAN BUSINESS LIFE

I WOULDN'T BET AGAINST IT

IN MOST CASES THE AGENCY SELLS THE FAILED BANK TO ANOTHER INSTITUTION ALONG WITH THE GOOD LOANS
THE F. D. I. C. PURCHASES THE BAD LOANS AND TRIES TO SALVAGE WHATEVER IT CAN
FOR INVESTORS THE PARTNERSHIPS ARE ONLY AS ATTRACTIVE AS THE UNDERLYING BUYOUTS

GENERALLY THERE'S NO LIMIT ON HOW MUCH OF THEIR FUNDS EMPLOYEES CAN BORROW IF THEIR ACCOUNTS TOTAL TEN THOUSAND OR LESS
FOR LARGER ACCOUNTS EMPLOYEES ARE RESTRICTED TO BORROWING HALF THE TOTAL BUT NO MORE THAN FIFTY THOUSAND
<NOISE> LOANS MUST BE REPAID WITHIN FIVE YEARS UNLESS THE MONEY GOES TOWARD BUYING A PRINCIPAL RESIDENCE IN WHICH CASE LONGER REPAYMENT TERMS CAN BE ARRANGED
BORROWED FUNDS AREN'T TAXED
BUT A WITHDRAWAL IS TREATED AS TAXABLE INCOME AND IS SUBJECT TO AN ADDITIONAL TEN PERCENT PENALTY TAX

THOUGH THERE ISN'T A CURE FOR AIDS PROPONENTS ARGUE THAT THOSE WHO TEST POSITIVE CAN BE OFFERED TREATMENTS TO PROLONG THEIR LIVES
FOR INSTANCE THEY CAN TAKE MEDICATION TO PREVENT CATCHING THE KIND OF PNEUMONIA THAT MOST COMMONLY LEADS TO THE DEATH OF AIDS SUFFERERS
AND THOSE WHO HAVE NOT YET DEVELOPED AIDS CAN TAKE STEPS TO GUARD AGAINST OTHER DISEASES SUCH AS HERPES AND HEPATITIS THAT ARE BELIEVED TO ACCELERATE ITS ONSET

THEY BUY FOOD FOR THE ELDERLY AND SNEAKERS FOR KIDS MAKING WARY ALLIES OF BOTH
THEY SPONSOR PICNICS WHERE THEY PUT UP HUGE BANNERS FLAUNTING THEIR NAMES AND COLORS
MR. MINOLI THE U. S. GENERAL MANAGER SAYS BENETTON RECENTLY DROPPED ITS STRATEGY OF SATURATING THE MARKET WITH SMALL STORES
NOW IT IS CONCENTRATING ON PROFESSIONALISM AND THE SERVICING OF EXISTING STORES HE SAYS
NEW STORES WILL BE LARGER OUTLETS CALLED UNITED COLORS THAT WILL OFFER A MUCH BROADER RANGE OF MERCHANDISE
BENETTON PLANS TO HAVE TEN UNITED COLORS SHOPS OPERATING IN THE U. S. BY NEXT SPRING
MR. MINOLI ALSO ESTIMATES THAT AS MANY AS ONE HUNDRED SMALLER BENETTON STORES MAY CLOSE IN THE NEXT FIVE YEARS

THE HUGE GAP TO A LARGE EXTENT IS A PRICE PHENOMENON

THE DEBT SITUATION AND WHAT HIGH INTEREST RATES AND A U. S. RECESSION MIGHT DO TO IT HAS TO BE MUCH IN MR. GREENSPAN'S MIND

BUT IN GENERAL THE WAIT AND SEE ATTITUDE IS STILL VERY PREVALENT OUT THERE
THERE IS NO REAL PRESSURE TO JUMP INTO THE MARKET RIGHT NOW

THE THIRTY EIGHT YEAR OLD DOCTRINE A CREATION OF THE F. C. C. REQUIRES BROADCASTERS AIRING CONTROVERSIAL MATERIAL TO GIVE OPPONENTS FREE AIR TIME TO RESPOND
SUPPORTERS OF THE DOCTRINE SAY IT ENSURES THAT MINORITY VIEWPOINTS RECEIVE A HEARING ON TELEVISION AND RADIO
BUT DETRACTORS SAY THE REQUIREMENT VIOLATES THE FIRST AMENDMENT RIGHTS OF BROADCASTERS AND INHIBITS THEM FROM RUNNING PROVOCATIVE PROGRAMS

THESE MIXED FEELINGS OF FRUSTRATION WITH AND GRATITUDE TOWARD THE AUTHORITIES ARE PART OF THE EVERYDAY LIFE OF A FOREIGNER DOING BUSINESS IN KOREA
IN FACT SUCH CONTRADICTIONS ARE WHAT SEEM TO MAKE THE KOREAN WORLD GO ROUND
A WESTERN BUSINESSMAN NEEDS TO BE READY FOR THEM
HERE ARE A FEW HARD LEARNED FACTS OF KOREAN BUSINESS LIFE
THE TRASH
PROOFS OF PURCHASE AND SALES RECEIPTS THAT HAD BEEN TURNED IN FOR CONSUMER PRODUCT REBATES AND ALREADY PAID
THE WOMEN RESUBMITTED THOUSANDS OF THE REBATES AND CAMOUFLAGED THEIR TRAIL BY VARYING THEIR NAMES AND USING POSTAL BOXES ALL OVER THE COUNTRY
UNLIKE MORE ECLECTIC RAIDERS MR. TRUMP HAS SO FAR STUCK TO REAL ESTATE
RESORTS HAS BIG UNDEVELOPED LAND HOLDINGS IN ATLANTIC CITY
ALLEGIS' WESTIN PLAZA HOTEL WHICH HE SEEMS TO WANT COULD BE WORTH TWICE AS MUCH IF MADE INTO CONDOMINIUMS HE SAYS
HUMANA TRIED TO DEFEND ITSELF THROUGH DIVERSIFICATION AS DID THE OTHER LARGE CHAINS HOSPITAL CORPORATION OF AMERICA AMERICAN MEDICAL INTERNATIONAL INCORPORATED AND NATIONAL MEDICAL ENTERPRISES INCORPORATED
THE IDEA WAS THAT IF A HOSPITAL OWNER ALSO HAD AN INSURANCE PLAN IT COULD STEER PATIENTS TO ITS INSTITUTIONS THROUGH FINANCIAL INCENTIVES
THE PATIENT POOL MIGHT SHRINK BUT THE COMPANY COULD GRAB A BIGGER PART OF IT
LAST MONTH AUTO SALES FELL ONE POINT FOUR PERCENT AFTER RISING FIVE POINT SEVEN PERCENT IN AUGUST
SALES OF BUILDING MATERIALS INCREASED ONE POINT TWO PERCENT AFTER A POINT FOUR PERCENT DROP
OVERALL SALES OF DURABLE GOODS WHICH ARE INTENDED TO LAST THREE YEARS OR MORE FELL POINT NINE PERCENT AFTER RISING THREE POINT ONE PERCENT IN AUGUST
WALL STREET IN GENERAL HAS BEEN CONCERNED ABOUT G. M. IN RECENT WEEKS BECAUSE OF ITS NEW LABOR CONTRACT
THE THREE YEAR PACT INCLUDES A JOB SECURITY PROGRAM THAT PREVENTS LAYOFFS EXCEPT DURING A SALES DROP PREVENTS PLANT CLOSINGS AND SLOWS ATTRITION
MANY ANALYSTS PREDICT THE PROVISIONS WILL HAMPER G. M.'S EFFORTS TO RESTRUCTURE OPERATIONS <NOISE> AND SHED <NOISE> UNCOMPETITIVE PLANTS PARTICULARLY IN PARTS OPERATIONS

THE ROAD NAMED WEST STREET IS A NARROW STRIP OF RED GRAVEL
IT IS LIKE THE PROVERBIAL RAILROAD TRACKS IN AMERICA THAT SEPARATE THE RICH SIDE OF TOWN FROM THE POOR
THE PHYSICAL DISTANCE MAY NOT BE GREAT BUT THE MENTAL GAP IS
THE INDICATED TIGHTNESS IN U. S. GASOLINE OUGHT TO PREVENT THE REFINERS' FLAT OUT PRODUCTION FROM LEADING TO A PRODUCT PRICE WAR
THE DECLINE IN CRUDE PRICES EVENTUALLY WILL END HOWEVER
OR PRODUCT PRICES COULD AGAIN BECOME LINKED TO THOSE FOR CRUDE
AND GASOLINE DEMAND USUALLY DROPS AFTER LABOR DAY
BUT MR. RANDOL SUGGESTS THAT A TREND TOWARD PERMANENTLY IMPROVED REFINER MARGINS IS SUSTAINABLE
THROUGH ITS U. S. FINANCE SUBSIDIARY TOYOTA HAS ISSUED COMMERCIAL PAPER IN THE U. S. AND PRIVATELY PLACED MEDIUM TERM NOTES
IT HAS ALSO RAISED MORE THAN TWO BILLION DOLLARS IN THE EUROMARKETS BUT SO FAR HAS AVOIDED ISSUING STRAIGHT DEBT IN THE PUBLIC U. S. MARKET
THE SAME IS TRUE OF MOST JAPANESE COMPANIES

THE DRUG AZIDOTHYMIDINE OR A. Z. T. IS THE FIRST PRESCRIPTION DRUG FOR ACQUIRED IMMUNE DEFICIENCY SYNDROME TO GET FEDERAL FOOD AND DRUG ADMINISTRATION APPROVAL
A. Z. T. IS MARKETED UNDER THE NAME RETROVIR BY BURROUGHS WELLCOME COMPANY AT AN ANNUAL RETAIL DOSAGE COST OF ABOUT TEN THOUSAND DOLLARS
IT ALSO IS THE MOST EXPENSIVE PRESCRIPTION DRUG PROMPTING FEARS THAT SOME INSURERS WHO NORMALLY PROVIDE PRESCRIPTION DRUG COVERAGE WILL BALK AT ITS PRICE
MR. BOTHA W- ALSO MUST RULE ON THE FATE OF THE GROUP AREAS ACT
VIOLATIONS OF THE ACT ARE RAMPANT BUT THERE WERE ONLY FOUR PROSECUTIONS UNDER IT IN NINETEEN EIGHTY SIX ONE IN NINETEEN EIGHTY FIVE AND NONE THE YEAR BEFORE
A RECENT POLL BY THE AFRIKAANS NEWSPAPER RAPPORT FOUND THAT ONLY TWENTY SEVEN PERCENT OF SURVEYED WHITES WANT THE ACT RETAINED
MORE THAN TWENTY FOUR PERCENT WANT IT SCRAPPED COMPLETELY WHILE ANOTHER THIRTY FOUR PERCENT WANT EACH LOCAL COMMUNITY OR PROPERTY OWNER TO DECIDE WHO CAN RENT OR BUY HOUSING
ON THE BIG BOARD VOLUME ROSE TO TWO HUNDRED TWENTY POINT FIVE MILLION SHARES FROM ONE HUNDRED SIXTY EIGHT POINT SIX MILLION THURSDAY
BUT THE ACTIVITY WAS LESS THAN ON THE PREVIOUS TRIPLE WITCHING DAYS AND MUCH OF THE TRADING WAS PACKED INTO THE OPENING AND CLOSING MINUTES OF THE SESSION
MORE THAN THIRTY ONE MILLION SHARES CHANGED HANDS IN THE FINAL MINUTE
PEOPLE WHO ATTENDED THE EVENTS LOVED THEM
THE CITIZENS OF NEW YORK METROPOLITAN AREA ARE STILL TALKING ABOUT WHAT A TERRIFIC FEELING THE WEEKEND ENGENDERED IN EVERYONE
THE STATE OF NEW YORK WAS SO HAPPY THAT IT IS USING A PHOTO FROM LIBERTY WEEKEND IN ADVERTISEMENTS TO ATTRACT BUSINESS TO THE STATE
THOSE WHO WATCHED THE EVENTS ON TELEVISION MORE THAN ONE HUNDRED MILLION AMERICANS LOVED THEM
PEOPLE IN FIFTY ONE FOREIGN COUNTRIES ENJOYED THE EVENTS VIA TELEVISION
THE FRENCH WERE SO IMPRESSED BY THE CELEBRATION THEY THANKED THE U. S. IN AN AD IN A NEW YORK NEWSPAPER
IN THE END THERE IS LITTLE THE U. S. CAN DO TO CONTROL EVENTS IN SOUTH AFRICA
THE ADMINISTRATION'S SIX YEAR CONSTRUCTIVE ENGAGEMENT POLICY DESIGNED TO COAX PRETORIA TOWARD DISMANTLING APARTHEID DIDN'T SUCCEED
AND SANCTIONS IN THE SHORT RUN WON'T DAMAGE SOUTH AFRICA'S SELF RELIANT ECONOMY
BUT THE PERCEPTION OF INACTION HAS DIPLOMATIC COSTS FOR THE U. S. AND SO FOR THE TIME BEING SANCTIONS SEEM TO BE THE BEST BET
THE NINETEEN SEVENTY TWO A. B. M. TREATY REQUIRES A REVIEW EVERY FIVE YEARS
COMMUNIQUES ANNOUNCING COMPLETION OF THE FIRST AND SECOND REVIEWS WERE ISSUED ON NOVEMBER FOUR NINETEEN SEVENTY SEVEN AND NOVEMBER NINE NINETEEN EIGHTY TWO
THE THIRD REVIEW WAS DUE BY OCTOBER THIRD NINETEEN EIGHTY SEVEN
THE MOST OPTIMISTIC ESTIMATES ARE NOW THAT IT WILL START SOMETIME AFTER THE FIRST OF THE YEAR
THE REAGAN ADMINISTRATION IN SHORT IS CONSPIRING WITH THE SOVIETS TO VIOLATE THE REVIEW PROVISIONS OF THE TREATY
IT IS SAD BUT TRUE THAT INTERNATIONAL SPORTING EXTRAVAGANZAS HAVE COME TO BE CONDUCTED AMID THE SORT OF SECURITY OTHERWISE RESERVED FOR THE TRAVELS OF HEADS OF STATE
THE SWISS HOCKEY COACH WAS QUOTED AS SAYING THAT HIS PLAYERS WERE SURPRISED THAT THEY DIDN'T HAVE TO SHOW THEIR PASSES AT THE BLUE LINE WHEN THEY BACK CHECKED
HAVING THE BAR PATTERN ON MY PASS CHECKED ELECTRONICALLY ABOUT ONE THOUSAND TIMES MADE ME FEEL LIKE A TOOTHPASTE CARTON LEAVING A SUPERMARKET
<NOISE> ANYONE WHO ACCEPTS THE JOB OF INVESTIGATING THE SPEAKER SHOULD BE PREPARED TO TAKE SOME HEAT
LAST WEEK COMMON CAUSE CALLED FOR AN INVESTIGATION OF MR. WRIGHT'S FINANCES
THE SPEAKER RETALIATED IN A PUBLIC STATEMENT AND HIS MINIONS IN THE LEADERSHIP SAID THE GROUP WAS DEAD ON CAPITOL HILL

BUT NO ONE PROPOSED SOLUTIONS FOR DOMESTIC DEBTORS AS GRAND AS THOSE OFFICIALLY OFFERED FOR THIRD WORLD DEBTORS

IN ANY CASE A RETURN TO MARKET DISCIPLINE IS INEVITABLE
FINANCIAL HISTORY HAS WITNESSED A THOUSAND BOOMS AND BUSTS

S. E. C. CHAIRMAN DAVID RUDER PRESENTED THE UNANIMOUS POSITION OF THE FIVE MEMBER COMMISSION AT A MEETING YESTERDAY OF SECURITY REGULATORS IN MELBOURNE AUSTRALIA
MR. RUDER SAID THAT AN EFFECTIVE REGULATORY FRAMEWORK FOR A GLOBAL MARKET SHOULD INCLUDE EFFICIENT SYSTEMS FOR DISSEMINATING MARKET DATA ON PRICES AND TRADING VOLUME AND FOR EXECUTING TRADES
HE ADDED THAT ULTIMATELY ALL COUNTRIES SHOULD SET UP AUTOMATED SYSTEMS FOR CLEARING AND SETTLING EQUITY AND DEBT TRANSACTIONS AND THAT MANY SUCH SYSTEMS SHOULD BE LINKED
THE GOVERNMENT SOURCE WHO REQUESTED *ANONYMITY* SAID THE MEASURE WOULD ALLOW FOR THE CONFISCATION OF FUNDS IN ADDITION TO FINES AND IMPRISONMENT
LOCAL PRESS REPORTS SAID THAT FINES OF UP TO FIFTY MILLION LUXEMBOURG FRANCS (PARENTHESES ONE POINT FOUR MILLION DOLLARS AND PRISON TERMS OF UP TO FIVE YEARS COULD BE IMPOSED
THE PROPOSED LAW IS EXPECTED TO GAIN PARLIAMENTARY APPROVAL AND GO INTO EFFECT NEXT YEAR
THE COMMUNISTS COULDN'T SOLVE POLAND'S ECONOMIC PROBLEMS SO THEY NEEDED TO BRING IN SOLIDARITY HE SAID
IN CHINA TOO THE CONSERVATIVE LEADERS CAN'T OVERCOME OUR ECONOMIC DIFFICULTIES
THEY WILL NEED OUR HELP
THE NEW GOVERNMENT HAS STARTED TO LOWER PERSONAL INCOME TAXES AND AT THE SAME TIME IT HAS BEGUN TO BRING ITS OWN SPENDING UNDER CONTROL
IN THE NINETEEN EIGHTY SEVEN BUDGET THE HIGHEST RATE OF INCOME TAX WAS LOWERED TO FIFTY EIGHT PERCENT FROM SIXTY FIVE PERCENT
THIS IS PART OF A WORLD WIDE MOVEMENT THAT FRANCE MUST FOLLOW TO KEEP ITS MOST ENERGETIC AGGRESSIVE AND BRIGHT YOUNG PEOPLE AND TO ATTRACT INVESTORS
THE NEW TAX LAW'S LIMITS ON RETIREMENT BENEFITS FOR EXECUTIVES SPUR GREATER INTEREST IN CERTAIN TRUSTS THAT HELP SAFEGUARD DEFERRED COMPENSATION UNTIL RETIREMENT TIME
SUCH TRUSTS AREN'T COMPLETELY INVIOLATE CREDITORS CAN CLAIM THE MONEY AFTER A BANKRUPTCY FOR EXAMPLE
BUT THEY ARE CONSIDERED BETTER THAN A MERE PROMISE TO THE EXECUTIVE
THE DIET IS A ONE HOUSE LEGISLATURE APPOINTED BY DISTRICT RATHER THAN POPULATION LIKE THE SENATE AS OPPOSED TO THE HOUSE
THIS MEANS THAT JAPANESE FARMERS HAVE TREMENDOUS CONTROL OVER JAPANESE POLITICS
FOOD PRICES IN JAPAN TAKE FORTY PERCENT OR MORE OF THE AVERAGE PERSON'S WAGE
WITH HOUSING TAKING ANOTHER FORTY PERCENT AND THE FACT THAT THE JAPANESE ARE GREAT SAVERS THEY ARE LEFT WITH ALMOST NO DISCRETIONARY INCOME
THIS IS WHY THEY CANNOT DEVELOP A DOMESTIC MARKET
THEY DON'T HAVE MONEY TO SPEND EXCEPT A SMALL AMOUNT OF SAVINGS THAT THEY SPEND ONLY ON SPECIAL OCCASIONS OR FOR UNUSUAL BARGAINS
CONSEQUENTLY LLOYD'S AND SOME BROKERS MAY BE FORCED TO INCREASE THEIR SHARE OF THE SETTLEMENT PAYMENT
YESTERDAY MINET HOLDINGS P. L. C. SAID ITS PLANNED NUMBER TEN POINT FIVE MILLION CONTRIBUTION COULD RISE TO NUMBER TWELVE POINT FIVE MILLION
LLOYD'S DECLINED TO SPECULATE HOW MUCH ITS CONTRIBUTION MIGHT INCREASE

IN WASHINGTON TWENTY ONE JUMP STREET HAS BEEN THE NUMBER ONE OR NUMBER TWO SHOW IN ITS TIME PERIOD ACCORDING TO MR. KELLNER
MARRIED WITH CHILDREN HAS REGULARLY SCORED HIGHER THAN ONE OR TWO OF THE OFFERINGS ON THE THREE NETWORKS HE ADDS
IN NEW YORK SOME FOX PROGRAMS HAVE ALSO GARNERED HIGHER RATINGS THAN SHOWS ON THE THREE NETWORKS
AS PREVIOUSLY REPORTED THE INVESTIGATION OF MATTHEWS AND WRIGHT HAS LED TO AN UNPRECEDENTED EXAMINATION OF THE LARGELY UNREGULATED SEVEN HUNDRED AND THIRTY BILLION MUNICIPAL BOND MARKET
THIS IN TURN HAS LED TO CALLS FROM FINANCIERS AND POLITICIANS FOR CLOSER REGULATION OF THIS HUGE MARKET
THE INVESTIGATION CENTERS ON WHETHER BOND ISSUES SOLD AS *TAX* EXEMPT BY MATTHEWS AND WRIGHT AND OTHER UNDERWRITERS ACTUALLY WARRANT TAX EXEMPT STATUS
MOST ARAB STATES BROKE OFF RELATIONS WITH EGYPT WHEN THAT COUNTRY SIGNED A PEACE TREATY WITH ISRAEL EIGHT YEARS AGO
OMAN SUDAN AND SOMALIA DIDN'T CUT RELATIONS WITH EGYPT
JORDAN AND DJIBOUTI DID BUT HAVE SINCE RESTORED RELATIONS
MR. PERRY FIFTY FIVE YEARS OLD JOINED CANADAIR IN MAY NINETEEN EIGHTY FOUR AND IS IN CHARGE OF SALES OF THE COMPANY'S CHALLENGER BUSINESS JET
MR. PERRY WASN'T AVAILABLE FOR COMMENT BUT A CANADAIR SPOKESWOMAN SAID THE INDICTMENT WAS QUITE A SHOCK BOTH TO THE COMPANY AND TO MR. PERRY
HE'S AN OUTSTANDING EXECUTIVE SHE SAID
JIM POYNER AN ANALYST WITH RAUSCHER PIERCE REFENES INCORPORATED IN DALLAS SAID THEY THE GROUP MAY RUN INTO SOME RESISTANCE FROM OUTSIDE SHAREHOLDERS
THE COMPANY IS WORTH AT LEAST A FEW DOLLARS PER SHARE MORE THAN THIS
I THINK IF ANOTHER COMPANY WERE TRYING TO BUY STERLING THEY'D HAVE TO PAY MORE THAN THIS
THE CONTINUING PROSPECT OF LOWER INTEREST RATES SENT STOCK PRICES UP SHARPLY
THE DOW JONES INDUSTRIAL AVERAGE CLOSED UP TWENTY EIGHT POINT ONE EIGHT POINTS AT ONE THOUSAND NINE HUNDRED FIFTY EIGHT POINT TWO TWO
VOLUME ON THE NEW YORK STOCK EXCHANGE TOTALED TWO HUNDRED AND ELEVEN POINT NINE MILLION SHARES UP FROM ONE HUNDRED AND SIXTY SIX POINT FOUR MILLION SHARES TRADED TUESDAY
ADVANCING ISSUES LED DECLINERS ONE THOUSAND FIFTY FOUR TO FOUR HUNDRED EIGHTY THREE
IN A STATEMENT NYMEX EFFECTIVELY TOLD COMEX TO BACK OFF
AND IT SUGGESTED THAT COMEX IS TO BLAME FOR THE DELAY SPECIFICALLY THE FACT THAT MR. BRODY NEXT MONTH WILL RELINQUISH HIS CHAIRMANSHIP TO AN EXCHANGE MEMBER
MR. BRODY WILL REMAIN PRESIDENT AND CHIEF EXECUTIVE
STILL MS. FREEDMAN NOTED THAT A BRIGHT FORECAST FOR HIRING ISN'T NECESSARILY ALL GOOD NEWS
THE INCREASING USE OF LABOR MAY BE BECAUSE OF A TREMENDOUS BOOM IN THE OUTPUT OF GOODS AND SERVICES SHE SAID
BUT IT ALSO MIGHT BE BECAUSE YOU AREN'T IMPROVING THE EFFICIENCY WITH WHICH YOU USE THE LABOR FORCE THE PRODUCTIVITY
RICHARD ROSLUND A VICE PRESIDENT OF BLOCK TRADING AT KIDDER PEABODY SAID THE FED'S CHAIRMAN'S REMARKS GAVE THE MARKET A REASON TO ADOPT A MORE POSITIVE OUTLOOK
PEOPLE ARE JUST LOOKING FOR ANYTHING TO GRASP ON HE SAID
IT'S BEEN SUCH A PESSIMISTIC ATMOSPHERE IN THE PAST COUPLE OF WEEKS
ANALYSTS SAY THEY EXPECT P. AND G'S MOMENTUM TO CARRY INTO NINETEEN NINETY AND BEYOND AND MANY RAISED THEIR FISCAL NINETEEN NINETY ESTIMATES
BRENDA LEE LANDRY OF MORGAN STANLEY RAISED HER ESTIMATE TO EIGHT DOLLARS AND THIRTY CENTS FROM AN EARLIER ESTIMATE OF EIGHT DOLLARS AND FIFTEEN CENTS
KIDDER'S MR. FREEDMAN AND JOSEPH KOZLOFF AT DREXEL BURNHAM LAMBERT RAISED THEIR ESTIMATES TO EIGHT DOLLARS AND FIFTY CENTS A SHARE FROM EIGHT DOLLARS AND TWENTY FIVE CENTS
I CAN SEE A NUMBER CLOSE TO TEN DOLLARS FOR NINETEEN NINETY ONE SAYS MR. KOZLOFF

FROM MR. CASEY'S AND MR. GATES'S TESTIMONY IT REMAINS UNCLEAR HOW SPECIFIC LIEUTENANT COLONEL NORTH WAS AT THE OCTOBER LUNCHEON
CRITICS OF THE DIRECTOR HAVE ARGUED THAT HE FOLLOWED A CALCULATED PATTERN OF REMOVING HIMSELF FROM KNOWLEDGE OF WHAT THE FORMAL NATIONAL SECURITY COUNCIL STAFF MEMBER WAS DOING
MR. CASEY HAS CAST HIMSELF AS TAKING ORDERS IN SOME CASES FROM THE LIEUTENANT COLONEL A SOURCE SAID
MORE GENERALLY WITHIN THE C. I. A. OPERATIVES ARE VAGUE ABOUT WHAT THEY OBSERVED OF THE PRIVATE SUPPLY NETWORK
ONE NORTH KOREAN ASSERTION DOES HAVE A CERTAIN SCARY CREDIBILITY TO IT
NORTH KOREA SAYS THAT BLOWING UP AN EXPENSIVE DAM TO FLOOD THE SOUTH WOULD BE A WASTE OF GOOD EXPLOSIVES
TO DO THE JOB WOULD TAKE A BLAST EQUIVALENT TO A NUCLEAR BOMB
<NOISE> BETTER TO DROP IT DIRECTLY ON SEOUL
THAT WOULD BE A HUNDRED TIMES BETTER IN DESTRUCTIVE EFFECT SAYS LI CHOONG SUNG THE VICE CHAIRMAN OF THE NORTH KOREAN POWER COMMISSION
FARM BANKS ACCOUNT FOR A MAJOR PORTION OF THE RISING NUMBERS OF BANK FAILURES
OF THE ONE HUNDRED THIRTY EIGHT FEDERALLY INSURED BANKS THAT FAILED LAST YEAR FIFTY NINE HAD MADE MORE THAN A QUARTER OF THEIR LOANS IN AGRICULTURE
MORE THAN HALF OF THESE FARM BANKS WERE IN KANSAS IOWA MISSOURI AND NEBRASKA
EVEN LESS APPRECIATED IS THE TURMOIL THAT OFTEN RESULTS FOR WOMEN

BUT HE SAID IT'S BALANCED AT FIFTEEN DOLLARS TO SIXTEEN DOLLARS A BARREL
THAT IS TWO DOLLARS TO THREE DOLLARS A BARREL LESS THAN THE EXPORTERS WERE RECEIVING LAST YEAR
IF THERE IS A REDUCTION IN SUPPLY AS A RESULT OF THE JOINT MEETINGS PRICES WILL SHOOT UP MR. HAMM SAID
CARBIDE'S SABOTAGE THEORY IS WEAKENED PARTLY BECAUSE IT HASN'T DISCLOSED ALL ITS EVIDENCE
THOUGH ITS ATTORNEYS SAY THEY HAVE INTERVIEWED THE ALLEGED SABOTEUR EXTENSIVELY THEY WON'T DISCLOSE HIS NAME OR WHEREABOUTS OR DESCRIBE HIM
THEY ALSO DECLINE TO SAY WHETHER THEY UNDERSTAND HIS MOTIVES OR HAVE ANY WITNESSES
STANFORD NOW CHOOSES NOT TO REQUIRE ITS UNDERGRADUATES TO STUDY THEIR WESTERN HERITAGE BUT THAT HISTORY DOES YIELD CERTAIN LESSONS
ONE OF THEM IS THAT MINORITIES THAT DO NOT RESPOND EFFECTIVELY TO ATTACKS FROM THE MAJORITY MERELY ENCOURAGE FURTHER ASSAULTS
PERHAPS THE HOOVER OVERSEERS SHOULD KEEP THAT IN MIND WHEN THEY PONDER THE LATEST AFFRONT TO GLENN CAMPBELL NEXT YEAR
THE OFFER IS A BRILLIANT DEFENSE CONTRIVED BY SANTA FE'S INVESTMENT BANKERS AT SALOMON BROTHERS AND GOLDMAN SACHS
THE SIXTY THREE DOLLAR A SHARE PRICE WILL HANG OVER THE NEGOTIATIONS LIKE SMOG OVER LOS ANGELES
AND THOUGH MR. DINGHAM WILL OFFER PACKAGE AFTER PACKAGE THAT SEEM TO ADD UP TO SIXTY THREE DOLLARS HE DOESN'T REALLY PLAN TO MEET THE ASKING PRICE
INSTEAD HE HOPES TO PERSUADE SANTA FE TO TAKE LESS
SEPARATELY JUDGE BROWNING ISSUED A RULING ON THE AWARD OF ANY DAMAGES IN THE CASE
FOR CLAIMS IN THE FEDERAL CASE THE STANDARD OF DAMAGE IS OUT OF POCKET OR INVESTORS' LOSS ON THE BONDS
FOR WASHINGTON STATE CLAIMS THE STANDARD IS RECISSION WHICH COULD MEAN *REPAYING* BONDHOLDERS THEIR PURCHASE PRICE
THE DISPUTE IS A CLASSIC CONFRONTATION BETWEEN MARKET PHILOSOPHIES
WASHINGTON BELIEVES THAT JAPAN PROFITS FROM FREE U. S. MARKETS AND SHOULD RECIPROCATE WITH COMPLETELY FREE JAPANESE MARKETS
TOKYO GOVERNMENT BUREAUCRATS CLAIM TO FAVOR FREE MARKETS IN PRACTICE THEY OFTEN ARE LOATH TO RELINQUISH COMPLETE CONTROL ESPECIALLY IN PROMISING INDUSTRIES
LONG A SECRETIVE PARTNERSHIP PROUDFOOT NOW AIMS TO MUSCLE ITS WAY TOWARD THE TOP OF THE CONSULTING INDUSTRY
IT HAS THE FINANCIAL BACKING OF A BIG BRITISH INVESTMENT FIRM M. I. M. BRITANNIA LIMITED AND WENT PUBLIC LAST YEAR
IT USED THE TWO HUNDRED AND TWENTY ONE MILLION DOLLARS IN PROCEEDS TO BUY OUT A HANDFUL OF OLDER PARTNERS
ALEXANDER PROUDFOOT P. L. C. WHICH IS LISTED ON THE LONDON STOCK EXCHANGE IS CURRENTLY LOOKING FOR OTHER CONSULTING FIRMS TO ACQUIRE TO BROADEN ITS PRACTICE
FINALLY SOME PREDICT STATES WILL TAKE THE LEAD IN EXPANDING BANK POWERS
ALREADY TWENTY TWO STATES GIVE THEIR BANKS MORE FREEDOM THAN FEDERALLY CHARTERED BANKS HAVE TO ENGAGE IN INSURANCE AND REAL ESTATE

THE UNITED NATIONS WHOSE GARBAGE BILL IS FORTY TWO THOUSAND DOLLARS A MONTH IS SERVED BY NATIONAL CARTING COMPANY WHICH WON THE PICKUP RIGHTS EIGHT YEARS AGO

BUT CRITICS CHARGED THAT THE COLLAR ACTUALLY ADDED TO THE VOLATILITY BY MAKING IT MORE DIFFICULT FOR INDEX ARBITRAGERS TO DO THEIR BUSINESS
MANY TRADERS ARGUE THAT SUCH ARBITRAGE HAS THE EFFECT OF SMOOTHING OUT VOLATILITY IN THE MARKETS

THE SCENE THE ANNUAL NORMAN MAILER COCKTAIL PARTY AND FIST FIGHT
CANDICE BERGEN AND WOODY ALLEN HAD JUST JOINED A GROUP OF PSEUDO INTELLECTUALS AND WERE RAMBLING WITH THE BEST OF THEM
I OFTEN THINK OBSERVED MS. BERGEN THAT IF DOSTOEVSKI HAD BEEN A SINGER HE'D HAVE SOUNDED LIKE RAY CHARLES
THE OTHER NON WINNERS MOST NOTABLY EXXON WERE IN MANY WAYS AS NOTEWORTHY AS THE WINNERS
IT IS BELIEVED THAT EXXON WAS OUTBID FOR SEVERAL RESERVE PACKAGES LEAVING IT WITH A LOT OF CASH THAT COULD STILL BE EARMARKED FOR ACQUISITIONS

AN EXXON SPOKESWOMAN SAID IT WAS COMPANY POLICY NOT TO COMMENT ON ANYTHING TO DO WITH ACQUISITIONS

GOLDMAN SACHS AND COMPANY WAS THE LEAD UNDERWRITER
STILL HE WOULD HAVE PREFERRED THERE TO BE NO BIDS AT ALL

WE ARE EVALUATING THE OFFERS FOR THE COMPANY AND FOR THE SHAREHOLDERS BUT WE PROFOUNDLY REGRET THE SITUATION

THAT IN TURN HAS FORCED MANY DEALERS TO REFRAIN FROM SELLING BORROWED SECURITIES OR AMASSING SO CALLED SHORT POSITIONS
IT'S HARD TO SHORT ANYTHING IN THIS MARKET AT THE MOMENT SAID A TRADER AT A LARGE GOVERNMENT SECURITIES DEALER
MR. ANTONIU DENIES ANY WRONGDOING
I DON'T HAVE ANYTHING TO WORRY ABOUT THE FORMER INVESTMENT BANKER SAYS
I HAVE ALWAYS FOLLOWED THE ADVICE OF MY LAWYER AND ACCOUNTANTS
HE SAYS THAT HE HAS COOPERATED IN AN INQUIRY BY FLORIDA OFFICIALS BUT THAT HE ISN'T AWARE THE MATTER HAS BEEN REFERRED TO THE ATTORNEY GENERAL'S OFFICE

WHERE CAN WE FIND SOME CLUES TO THE ANSWER OR AT LEAST A POSSIBLE ANSWER TO THIS QUESTION

WE'LL SEE
WHAT SEEMS MORE LIKELY IS THAT EITHER A PRESIDENT OR THE COURTS OR BOTH SOMEDAY WILL HAVE TO RESCUE THE VETO BY FORCING CONGRESS TO GIVE UP ITS ARROGANT WAYS

BUT THERE IS A NEED FOR CLARITY
THESE GUIDELINES WILL SERVE AS *REASSURANCE* TO OUR MANAGERS
SENATOR BENTSEN'S CORPORATE TAX PROPOSAL WOULD REPLACE A PROVISION IN THE COMMITTEE BILL ALLOWING THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE TO WITHHOLD REFUNDS FROM TAXPAYERS WHO HAVE DEFAULTED ON GOVERNMENT LOANS
THIS PROVISION WOULDN'T RAISE ANY MONEY IN THE CURRENT FISCAL YEAR AND SENATOR BENTSEN WANTED SOMETHING THAT WOULD ALLOW A QUICKER END TO THE DIESEL TAX COLLECTION
THE TEXAS DEMOCRAT PLANS TO OFFER HIS SUBSTITUTION WHEN THE TAX PACKAGE REACHES THE SENATE FLOOR
MAKERS WORLD WIDE HAVE BEEN RACING TO DEVELOP COMPACT DISK RECORDERS
MANY BIG JAPANESE STEREO MAKERS INCLUDING NAMES LIKE S:ANYO AND SONY HAVE BEEN WORKING FOR YEARS TO DEVELOP SOMETHING AKIN TO TANDY'S NEW TECHNOLOGY
LIKE TANDY'S THOSE MACHINES ARE ABOUT TWO YEARS AWAY ANALYSTS SAY
COMPACT DISK RECORDERS THAT STORE COMPUTER DATA RATHER THAN SOUND ARE EXPECTED OUT THIS YEAR
UNION PACIFIC CORPORATION HAS ROLLED TWO CLUB CARS INTO TOWN TO ENTERTAIN DEMOCRATS
THE COMPANY IS HEADED BY DREW LEWIS FREQUENTLY A TROUBLESHOOTER FOR THE REPUBLICANS
THE NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF REALTORS IS THROWING SEVERAL PARTIES AND PROUDLY BOASTS THAT EIGHTY NINE OF ITS MEMBERS ARE DELEGATES OR *ALTERNATES* TO THIS CONVENTION
DISCUSSION OF THIS SUBJECT BETTER DESCRIBED AS BROODING ABOUT IT I- IS FILLED WITH MISCONCEPTIONS
ONE OF THESE IS THE GREAT CONCERN WITH THE U. S. HAVING BECOME A NET DEBTOR
WHAT IS MEANT BY THIS IS THAT AMERICANS APPARENTLY OWN FEWER ASSETS ABROAD THAN FOREIGNERS OWN IN THE U. S.
MANY PEOPLE HAVE POINTED OUT THAT THESE CALCULATIONS ARE SPURIOUS BECAUSE THE ASSETS ARE NOT ALL VALUED ON THE SAME BASIS
IF ALL ASSETS WERE VALUED AT TODAY'S PRICES THE NET DEBT OF THE U. S. WOULD CERTAINLY BE SMALLER THAN IT NOW APPEARS AND MIGHT BE A NET ASSET
INVESTORS TAKING PART IN THE FINANCING WILL LEND VENEZUELA ONE BILLION DOLLARS IN EXCHANGE FOR MONTHLY PAYMENTS FROM THE NEW YORK TRUST FUND
THOSE PAYMENTS WILL BE SET WHEN THE FINANCING IS COMPLETED WHICH IS EXPECTED IN MID DECEMBER
THE INTEREST RATE WILL BE BASED ON THE FIVE YEAR U. S. TREASURY BOND RATE PLUS A STILL UNDECIDED INTEREST RATE MARGIN THE VENEZUELAN OFFICIAL SAID <NOISE>
INVESTORS CONTINUE TO FLOCK TO THE MORE CONSERVATIVE STOCK PORTFOLIOS

BUT TYCO'S DAY AFTER CHRISTMAS LAUNCH IS UNUSUAL

AND OVERALL THE NASDAQ COMPOSITE INDEX IS UP THIRTEEN PERCENT THIS YEAR TWICE AS MUCH AS THE DOW JONES INDUSTRIAL AVERAGE
ALSO THEY NOTE THE TINY STOCKS THAT GENERALLY TRADE UNDER THREE DOLLARS A SHARE HAVE ALWAYS TAKEN A BIG PERCENTAGE MOVES UP OR DOWN WHEN THEY MOVE AT ALL
THESE MIXED FEELINGS OF FRUSTRATION WITH AND GRATITUDE TOWARD AUTHORITIES ARE PART OF THE EVERYDAY LIFE OF A FOREIGNER DOING BUSINESS IN KOREA
IN FACT SUCH CONTRADICTIONS ARE WHAT SEEM TO MAKE THE KOREAN WORLD GO ROUND
A WESTERN BUSINESSMAN NEEDS TO BE READY FOR THEM
HERE ARE A FEW HARD LEARNED FACTS OF KOREAN BUSINESS LIFE
THERE ARE ALSO BROKER FINDERS THAT GET FEES MERELY FOR MATCHING BORROWERS AND LENDERS OF STOCK
BROKER FINDERS CAN ALSO INCLUDE THE BROKERAGE FIRMS THEMSELVES
THE GOVERNMENT IS INVESTIGATING WHETHER ALL THE PAYMENTS THAT FLY TO AND FROM SUCH BROKER FINDERS ARE LEGITIMATE
WE ARE EXTREMELY SELECTIVE SAID PAUL SUCKOW DIRECTOR OF FIXED INCOME AT OPPENHEIMER MANAGEMENT CORPORATION
I DON'T THINK SOME ISSUES ARE GOING TO MAKE IT HE SAID

<NOISE> BUT GOVERNMENT OWNED FIXED CAPITAL SUFFERS ALONG WITH PRIVATELY OWNED PLANT AND EQUIPMENT WHEN ECONOMIC POLICIES DISCOURAGE LONG TERM INVESTMENT
THE GREATEST SCOURGE OF INVESTMENT IS OF COURSE INFLATION WHICH EXPLAINS WHY THE NATIONAL INFRASTRUCTURE SUFFERED PARTICULARLY DURING THE NINETEEN SEVENTIES
USER FEES SIMPLY COULD NOT KEEP UP WITH THE SOARING COSTS OF LOANS AND CONSTRUCTION
HIGHWAY CONSTRUCTION HAD THE ADDED PROBLEM OF REDUCED YIELDS FROM GASOLINE TAXES BROUGHT ABOUT BY ENERGY SHORTAGES AND SHORTAGE ENFORCED CONSERVATION
THE MEASURE WAS A BOLD MOVE FOR A PRESIDENT WHO HAS TO COME TO VIEW INERTIA AS THE BEST FORM OF SECURITY
THE SUSPENSION EFFECTIVELY WILL SLASH SALARIES AND CUT AN ESTIMATED EIGHT POINT THREE BILLION DOLLARS FROM FEDERAL SPENDING THIS YEAR
THE AIM IS TO HOLD THE BUDGET DEFICIT TO FOUR POINT NINE PERCENT OF ECONOMIC OUTPUT DOWN FROM A PROJECTED SEVEN PERCENT
THIS IT IS HOPED WILL HELP STOP HIGH INFLATION FROM SPIRALING INTO HYPERINFLATION
THE THINK TANK MEASURED EXPENSE RATIOS WHICH ARE A FUND'S OPERATING COSTS AS A PERCENTAGE OF ASSETS
FOR INVESTORS HIGH RATIOS ARE CLEARLY OF CONCERN
IT CUTS INTO POTENTIAL RETURN EVEN WHEN A FUND IS DOING WELL
AND IT LEAVES A FUND WITH LESS OF A CUSHION IN CASE PERFORMANCE SOURS
ALMOST UNNOTICED IN THE DISCUSSIONS OF THE PROCUREMENT SCANDAL IS THE FACT THAT THIS ELABORATE INDEED TORTUOUS SYSTEM SEEMS TO HAVE WORKED AT LEAST ON ITS OWN TERMS
NOBODY WAS ABLE TO THROW A CONTRACT DIRECTLY
INSTEAD WHAT SEEMS CONTRACTORS SEEM TO HAVE DONE IS TO BUY INSIDE INFORMATION THAT WOULD ALLOW THEM TO PREPARE A BETTER PROPOSAL

<NOISE> IN A RELATED MATTER A REVIEW COMMISSION ADMINISTRATIVE LAW JUDGE ON OCTOBER EIGHTEENTH THREW OUT OSHA CITATIONS AGAINST MORRELL
THE CITATIONS ISSUED IN APRIL NINETEEN EIGHTY SEVEN CHARGED RECORD KEEPING VIOLATIONS
THE OFFICIAL DISALLOWED OSHA'S INSTANCE BY INSTANCE CITATION WHICH PROPOSED A TOTAL FINE OF SIX HUNDRED AND NINETY THOUSAND DOLLARS

TO CURB DOMESTIC CONSUMPTION AND SALVAGE THE TRADE SURPLUS BRAZIL'S ECONOMIC PLANNERS RECENTLY IMPOSED A TOUGH PACKAGE OF TAX AND PRICE INCREASES
THE RESULT BRAZILIANS LAST WEEK RIOTED IN THE STREETS OF BRASILIA IN THE WORST VIOLENCE IN THE COUNTRY'S CAPITAL IN ITS TWENTY SIX YEAR HISTORY
AND A GENERAL STRIKE HAS BEEN TENTATIVELY SET FOR DECEMBER TWELVE
RATES ARE DETERMINED BY THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN THE PURCHASE PRICE AND FACE VALUE
THUS HIGHER BIDDING NARROWS THE INVESTOR'S RETURN WHILE LOWER BIDDING WIDENS IT
THE PERCENTAGE RATES ARE CALCULATED ON A THREE SIXTY DAY YEAR WHILE THE COUPON EQUIVALENT YIELD IS BASED ON A THREE SIXTY FIVE DAY YEAR
THE LASTEST DISCLOSURES ARE AN OUTGROWTH OF THAT PROBE
ALREADY THE DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION HAS ACCUSED DELTA AIRLINES AND EASTERN AIRLINES OF ENGAGING IN UNREALISTIC SCHEDULING AT ATLANTA'S HARTSFIELD AIRPORT
THE CARRIERS DENY THIS BUT THE GOVERNMENT HAS EXPANDED ITS PROBE

A. Z. T. IS MARKETED UNDER THE NAME RETROVIR BY BURROUGHS WELLCOME COMPANY AT AN ANNUAL RETAIL DOSAGE COST OF ABOUT TEN THOUSAND DOLLARS
IT IS ALSO THE MOST EXPENSIVE PRESCRIPTION DRUG PROMPTING FEARS THAT SOME INSURERS WHO NORMALLY PROVIDE PRESCRIPTION DRUG COVERAGE WILL BALK AT ITS PRICE
NOW THE ISSUE IS IN THE HOUSE'S LAP

WHAT BOTHERS THESE PEOPLE IS NOT THAT MRS. THATCHER POSES A DANGER TO THE SO CALLED UNIFIED EUROPEAN MARKET
MRS. THATCHER IS NOT OPPOSED TO THIS
BRITAIN'S OWN MARKETS ARE MORE OPEN THAN THOSE OF MOST EUROPEAN COUNTRIES LONDON IS WAY AHEAD OF THEM ON CAPITAL MOVEMENT HAVING ABOLISHED EXCHANGE CONTROLS ALTOGETHER
THE CAUSE OF THE OUTRAGE IS THAT EUROPEAN UNITY IS THE DEVICE THROUGH WHICH THE REGULATORS AND SOCIALISTS HOPE TO EXPAND THEIR GRIP ON THE CONTINENT
RATES ARE DETERMINED BY THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN THE PURCHASE PRICE AND FACE VALUE
THUS HIGHER BIDDING NARROWS THE INVESTOR'S RETURN WHILE LOWER BIDDING WIDENS IT
THE PERCENTAGE RATES ARE CALCULATED ON A THREE HUNDRED AND SIXTY DAY YEAR WHILE THE COUPON EQUIVALENT YIELD IS BASED ON A THREE HUNDRED AND SIXTY FIVE DAY YEAR
LAST YEAR SPONSORS OF A STRONG ACID RAIN BILL CLAIMED TO HAVE A TENTATIVE ONE VOTE MAJORITY ON THE COMMITTEE IN FAVOR OF THEIR BILL
THE MEASURE WAS CO SPONSORED BY ONE THIRD OF THE HOUSE AND SUPPORT APPEARED TO BE GROWING
REPRESENTATIVE DINGELL WHOSE DISTRICT'S STEEL AND AUTO INDUSTRIES OPPOSED THE BILL BOTTLED IT UP IN THE COMMITTEE
THE F. S. L. I. C. FUND IS SUPPOSED TO COVER INSURED DEPOSITS OF EIGHT HUNDRED AND NINETY BILLION IN THE NATION'S THREE THOUSAND FEDERALLY INSURED THRIFTS
EVEN THE BANK BOARD'S STATED ONE POINT NINE BILLION DOLLAR OF RESERVES IS THE LOWEST RATIO OF RESERVES TO DEPOSITS EVER
ALSO PENDING ARE REQUESTS FOR MORE THAN TWO BILLION DOLLARS IN LOANS TO TROUBLED THRIFTS

THESE WEALTHY LANDLORDS GOT BIGGER AND MORE POWERFUL AND THAT LED TO THE BREAKDOWN OF THE HAN EMPIRE
THE OWNERS BECAME POWERFUL LORDS AND THE GUARDS IN THE TOWERS BECAME PRIVATE ARMIES
RICK BRIGGS PRESIDENT OF THE UNION SAID FALCONBRIDGE'S LATEST PROPOSALS ON *CONTRACTING* OUT ARE NOT ENCOURAGING
THE PROPOSALS WERE PRESENTED YESTERDAY AFTER A TWO DAY RECESS IN THE TALKS
ABOUT FORTY PERCENT OF FALCONBRIDGE'S NICKEL OUTPUT COMES FROM ITS SUDBURY OPERATIONS
DETAILS ARE STILL MURKY ABOUT THE REST OF THE CREDITS
ITALIAN OFFICIALS SAY THAT ROME'S DECISION TO GRANT ABOUT A SEVEN HUNDRED AND SEVENTY FIVE MILLION DOLLAR GUARANTEE OF EXPORT CREDITS WAS PRIMARILY A POLITICAL RATHER THAN A BANKING DECISION
BRITAIN'S MIDLAND BANK HAS ANNOUNCED PLANS FOR A NUMBER ONE BILLION CREDIT LINE THOUGH SOME BRITISH BANKS MAY BE GETTING COLD FEET ABOUT PARTICIPATING
FRENCH BANKS HAVE YET TO ANNOUNCE THEIR PLANS OFFICIALLY BUT ARE SAID TO BE CONSIDERING LOANS OF TWO BILLION DOLLARS
THE FED REPORT GAVE NO HINT THAT MAKERS OF CAPITAL EQUIPMENT EXPECT DEMAND FOR THEIR WARES TO FALL OFF
PRODUCTION OF BUSINESS EQUIPMENT THOUGH REDUCED BY THE DROP IN AUTO AND TRUCK PRODUCTION GREW ZERO POINT TWO PERCENT IN JULY AFTER REMAINING FLAT IN JUNE
THE FED ATTRIBUTED THE INCREASE TO STEPPED UP PRODUCTION OF COMMERCIAL AND FACTORY EQUIPMENT AS WELL AS AIRCRAFT
OUTPUT OF INDUSTRIAL MATERIALS ALSO REBOUNDED IN JULY AFTER DROPPING FOR TWO MONTHS
IT'S KIND OF LIKE EATING PEANUTS ISN'T IT SAID MR. MURPHY
ONCE YOU START IT'S TOUGH TO STOP
THE UMPTEENTH SOUNDS OF LEAD SMACKING METAL AND A RIFLE BEING COCKED SERVED AS A QUICK ANSWER TO HIS QUESTION
THEY HAVE PUT IN A LOT OF MONEY BUT IS THAT ENOUGH
NOBODY KNOWS SAID MR. BRAY
IN OCTOBER WE THOUGHT THERE WOULD BE ENOUGH BUT BETWEEN OCTOBER AND NOW IT'S PROVEN TO BE NOT ENOUGH
WHO KNOWS HOW MUCH IT WILL BE
WITH THE SPEAKER BEHIND IT GEPHARDT WILL PASS ON THE HOUSE FLOOR SAID REPRESENTATIVE DONALD PEASE DEMOCRAT FOR OHIO
ADDED REPRESENTATIVE BRIAN DONNELLY DEMOCRAT FOR MASSACHUSETTS ON THE SPEAKER'S REMARKS IT COMES AS NO SURPRISE
HE FEELS STRONGLY THAT OUR TRADING PARTNERS WON'T TAKE US SERIOUSLY UNLESS HIT OVER THE HEAD WITH A PROVISION LIKE GEPHARDT
ENERGY EXPERTS CONSIDER AMOCO AND EXXON AMONG THE INDUSTRY'S HEALTHIEST COMPANIES FINANCIALLY WITH STRONG CREDIT RATINGS AND LOW DEBT
AMOCO'S FINANCIAL STATEMENTS SHOW IT HAD FOUR HUNDRED AND FORTY ONE MILLION DOLLARS IN CASH AND MARKETABLE SECURITIES ON HAND AT THE CLOSE OF NINETEEN EIGHTY SIX
IN RECENT TALKS WITH ANALYSTS AMOCO OFFICIALS HAVE SAID THE COMPANY IS WELL POSITIONED FINANCIALLY IF IT DECIDES TO MAKE AN ACQUISITION
IF THE PROPOSED TRANSACTION IS COMPLETED COCA COLA WILL BE LEFT WITH HUGE BORROWING CAPACITY
COCA COLA SAID ITS PRO FORMA DEBT WOULD BE REDUCED TO ABOUT NINE PERCENT OF TOTAL CAPITAL
THE COMPANY'S DEBT WAS TWENTY SIX PERCENT OF CAPITAL AT THE END OF THE SECOND QUARTER ITS TARGET RATIO IS THIRTY FIVE PERCENT
THE UNION SAID THE ENGINEERS WERE LEAVING THEIR VESSELS WHEN THEY DOCKED
LATE YESTERDAY NINETEEN SHIPS WERE REPORTED TO BE TIED UP BECAUSE OF THE STRIKE
THE UNION WHICH REPRESENTS ENGINEERS ON ABOUT EIGHTY GREAT LAKES SHIPS HAS BEEN WITHOUT A CONTRACT SINCE MAY THIRTY FIRST
THE FORECAST IS A BIT ROSIER THAN THAT OF MOST PRIVATE ANALYSTS
IN ITS LATEST SURVEY BLUE CHIP ECONOMIC INDICATORS CONSENSUS FORECAST PUTS GROWTH AT ONE POINT EIGHT PERCENT THIS YEAR
MORE THAN THREE FOURTHS OF THE ECONOMISTS POLLED EXPECT A RECESSION TO START BEFORE THE END OF NINETEEN EIGHTY NINE
AS OF APRIL FIRST ALL INTEREST INCOME WILL BE TAXED AT TWENTY PERCENT
EXEMPTIONS INCLUDE SINGLE MOTHERS THE HANDICAPPED AND THOSE OVER SIXTY FIVE YEARS OLD
OTHER EXCEPTIONS INCLUDE FUNDS SET ASIDE FOR HOUSING AND PENSIONS
THE POINT A POINT MR. CAMPBELL KEEPS RETURNING TO IS THAT EVERY RELIGION IS TRUE
IT'S TRUE AS A *METAPHOR* FOR THE HUMAN AND COSMIC MYSTERIES
IT'S ONLY WHEN YOU'RE STUCK ON THE METAPHOR THAT YOU GET IN TROUBLE
MR. HOWARD NOT ONLY HELPED THE FLEDGLING PUBLIC COMPANIES DRUM UP INTEREST IN THEIR SHARES HE HELPED INVEST THE CAPITAL THEY RAISED IN THE PUBLIC OFFERINGS
IN MANY CASES THE BANKS HE ADVISED INVESTED LARGE AMOUNTS IN EACH OTHER
AND THEY LENT FUNDS TO OTHER CLIENTS OF MR. HOWARD WHO SOMETIMES INVESTED IN THE SAME STOCKS
<NOISE> ACQUIRED IN NINETEEN SEVENTY NINE FRIENDLY REPORTED MODEST GROWTH UNTIL LAST YEAR WHEN LABOR SHORTAGES AND LOWER CUSTOMER TRAFFIC HURT THE CHAIN
THE UNIT IMPROVED SALES WITH HIGHER PRICES NEW STORE OPENINGS AND THE ACQUISITION OF TWO SMALL RESTAURANT CHAINS DURING THE SECOND HALF OF NINETEEN EIGHTY SIX
HOWEVER FRIENDLY'S NINETEEN EIGHTY SEVEN PRETAX OPERATING PROFIT OF FORTY FIVE POINT SIX MILLION DOLLARS WAS BELOW THE PREVIOUS YEAR'S FIFTY POINT FOUR MILLION DOLLARS

STATE RUN RADIO MONITORED IN BANGKOK REPORTED VIOLENT INCIDENTS IN MANDALAY

MAYBE HE HAS TOO BECAUSE HE'S UPPED THE ANTE
HE HAS NOW BRANDED NOT ONLY THE REPUBLICANS BUT ALSO THE DEMOCRATS AS IMPERIALISTS BECAUSE BOTH PARTIES HAVE TALKED RECENTLY ABOUT HELPING THE CONTRAS

IT USUALLY CONSISTS OF THREE YEAR NOTES TEN YEAR NOTES AND THIRTY YEAR BONDS
BUT THE DEPARTMENT IS VERY CLOSE TO REACHING ITS LIMIT ON ISSUING LONG TERM DEBT AND THUS HAS ASKED CONGRESS TO INCREASE ITS AUTHORITY
CONGRESS STILL HASN'T COMPLETED WORK ON THE ISSUE WHICH IS PART OF THE TAX BILL PASSED LATE TUESDAY BY THE SENATE

SO IN NINETEEN FIFTY ONE THE SWANSON COMPANY BEGAN SELLING FROZEN POT PIES TURKEY CHICKEN AND MEAT
THE FIRST PRODUCTION ORDER CALLED FOR TWENTY THOUSAND PIES
SOON IT WAS TWO HUNDRED AND FIFTY THOUSAND A DAY

STRIKES ALSO WERE THREATENED IN GEORGIA
<NOISE> FIRST OF ALL THE POLICY CONSERVATIVES WILL PURSUE THEIR UNFINISHED AGENDA OF DEREGULATION IN AREAS FROM FINANCIAL SERVICES TO REGULATION AS A DRAG ON U. S. INTERNATIONAL COMPETITIVENESS
THEY SAY THE ADMINISTRATION MISSED ITS CHANCE AND ALLOWED THE DEREGULATORY CAMPAIGN TO BE ALL BUT ABORTED BY CONTROVERSY OVER ANNE GORSUCH AND JIM WATT
THEY THINK THEIR GENERAL CASE IN THIS AREA IS OVERWHELMING
THEY WILL GIVE IT NEW APPLICATIONS AND CARRY IT TO NEW FORUMS
THE NEW SERVICE DIFFERS FROM THE SHUTTLE IN SEVERAL WAYS
IT WON'T HAVE THE BACKUP PLANES THAT THE SHUTTLE USES TO ACCOMMODATE PASSENGER OVERFLOW
THE NEW FLIGHTS WILL INCLUDE ADVANCE SEAT SELECTION AND FIRST CLASS AND COACH SERVICE WHICH THE SHUTTLE DOESN'T
SHUTTLE FLIGHTS DEPART ON THE HOUR THE NEW SERVICE WILL OPERATE ON THE HALF HOUR
MR. GITTIS SAID THE LAWSUITS WOULD HAVE LITTLE INFLUENCE ON THE RESPONSE OF REVLON'S BOARD TO THE TENDER OFFICE
HE SAID MACANDREWS AND FORBES RATHER THAN REVLON IS BORROWING THE MONEY NEEDED TO ACQUIRE REVLON AND TAKE IT PRIVATE

STILL MR. JOSEPHS AND OTHERS THINK THAT THE CHANGES WILL BE GOOD FOR THE FARM ECONOMY IN GENERAL

THE NEW UNIONS ARE GROWING MORE ADVERSARIAL
COMPANIES KEEP ASKING THE GOVERNMENT TO SMASH THE UNIONS

THE ONLY NEW ISSUE PRICED YESTERDAY WAS FIVE HUNDRED FIFTY MILLION OF A TWELVE YEAR SENIOR SUBORDINATED DEBENTURES FROM U. S. G. *CORPORATION*

THE OFFERING IS PART OF U. S. G.'S RECAPITALIZATION PLAN
MR. ZEHNDER PLAYS DOWN THIS CRITICISM
HE POINTS TO THE FACT THAT CREDIT SUISSE LEADS IN THE NUMBER OF PUBLICLY LISTED BONDS LAUNCHED BUT LAGS IN THE NUMBER OF UNLISTED NOTES IT ISSUED
THIS IS SIGNIFICANT HE SAYS BECAUSE BOND ISSUES PAY HIGHER COMMISSIONS THAN UNLISTED NOTES
IN CONTRAST SENATOR BENTSEN CAMPAIGNED LAST WEEK IN A HALF EMPTY PLANE TO A MEASURED CADENCE
HE PORTRAYS GOVERNOR DUKAKIS AS A PRAGMATIC CAN DO EXECUTIVE
AND HE OFFERS HIMSELF A BUSINESS ORIENTED SENATE FINANCE COMMITTEE CHAIRMAN AND FORMER INSURANCE EXECUTIVE AS EVIDENCE OF THAT MODERATION
THE RECURRING WORDS OF HIS SPEECHES ARE THE WORDS OF THE BOARDROOM COMPETENCE HANDS ON MANAGEMENT ENHANCED RECOVERY
MR. KIDDER INSISTS THERE IS CAUSE FOR HOPE
<NOISE> GOOD TEACHERS PUT SNAGS IN THE RIVER OF CHILDREN PASSING BY AND OVER THE YEARS THEY REDIRECT HUNDREDS OF LIVES

BUT WHAT HE NOTICES AT THE FIFTH GRADE SCIENCE FAIR SEEMS MORE SIGNIFICANT
THE RESULTS OF THAT PAINFUL CHARADE DON'T REFLECT SOCIAL STATUS ETHNIC BACKGROUND OR TEACHING TECHNIQUE THEY REFLECT THE CONTRIBUTION OF EACH CHILD'S PARENTS

MR. FREIMAN WOULDN'T ELABORATE
THAT MAY BE BUT THERE ARE TOUGH CALLS

BESIDES SOMEONE WHO TRULY FEELS DISABLED MAY AS A RESULT ACTUALLY BE DISABLED

DANIEL J. GILMARTIN WAS NAMED PRESIDENT AND CHIEF OPERATING OFFICER OF FRANK'S NURSERY AND CRAFTS DETROIT A UNIT OF THIS SPECIALTY RETAILER
THE POSTS HAD BEEN VACANT SINCE EARLY NINETEEN EIGHTY SEVEN

THEN IN NINETEEN EIGHTY FOUR NATIONAL UNION JOINED THE MARKET
ITS POLICY FOR STATE JUDGES THE BIGGEST CLIENTS COSTS EIGHT HUNDRED DOLLARS A YEAR FOR A ONE MILLION POLICY WITH NO DEDUCTIBLE

THE UTILITY WILL BEGIN PAYING INTEREST IN CASH AFTER SEABROOK GOES INTO SERVICE MR. BAYLESS SAID
MR. HARRISON SAID THE COMPANY DOESN'T KNOW HOW LONG IT WILL TAKE TO LEAP THE POLITICAL HURDLES THAT ARE BLOCKING SEABROOK
BUT THE FINANCIAL RESTRUCTURING IS INTENDED TO KEEP THE COMPANY GOING WITHOUT ADDITIONAL BORROWING UNTIL NINETEEN NINETY OR NINETEEN NINETY ONE HE SAID
ANALYSTS ALSO SAID THEY HADN'T EXPECTED LOWER OPERATING PROFITS FOR THE COMPANY'S INDUSTRIES GROUP AND FOR THE BROADCASTING SEGMENT
WESTINGHOUSE OFFICIALS TOLD ANALYSTS THAT OPERATING PROFIT IN THE INDUSTRIES GROUP FELL FIFTEEN PERCENT TO TWENTY PERCENT HURT IN PART BY WEAK RESULTS IN CANADIAN OPERATIONS
A SHARP DROP IN OPERATING PROFIT FROM THE BROADCASTING GROUP'S PRODUCTION COMPANY CONTRIBUTED TO THE SLIGHTLY LOWER OPERATING EARNINGS OVERALL FOR THAT SEGMENT
<NOISE> KEMP'S CAMPAIGN TAKES ON AN INCREASINGLY DESPERATE TONE
IN ONE SURE SIGN OF A CANDIDACY IN TROUBLE HE LASHES OUT AT CRITICISM FROM A LIGHTLY REGARDED T. V. COMMENTATOR
EVEN SOME SUPPORTERS NOW SAY PRIVATELY THAT HE SHOULD AIM FOR THE VICE PRESIDENTIAL NOMINATION
BUT HIS LONGTIME HOSTILITIES WITH DOLE LEAVE A SPOT ON A BUSH TICKET AS ABOUT THE ONLY POSSIBILITY
THOSE LANDS HAVE BECOME WORTH MUCH MORE THAN THE TRANSPORTATION AND ENERGY CONCERN NEEDS FOR THE RAILROAD AND THE COMPANY HAD BEEN TRYING TO FREE ITSELF FROM THE L- LIENS
LAST SPRING BURLINGTON AGREED TO PAY REMAINING BONDHOLDERS A TOTAL OF THIRTY FIVE POINT FIVE MILLION IN RETURN FOR PERMISSION TO REMOVE THE COVENANTS
A JUDGE APPROVED THE AGREEMENT IN NOVEMBER AND IT BECAME FINAL JANUARY TWELFTH
AFTER DEDUCTING NONRECURRING ITEMS THE U. S. X. STEEL UNIT NONETHELESS APPEARED TO TURN IN ONE OF ITS MOST PROFITABLE QUARTERS SINCE THE NINETEEN SIXTIES
ON A PER TON BASIS PRETAX PROFIT DOUBLED TO ABOUT THIRTY SIX DOLLARS FROM EIGHTEEN DOLLARS IN THE THIRD QUARTER
HOWEVER THE PERFORMANCE FELL FAR SHORT OF U. S. X. CHAIRMAN DAVID RODERICK'S PREDICTION OF FIFTY DOLLAR PLUS PER TON PROFIT
TEXAS OF COURSE IS WHERE THE MOST TROUBLE IS TO BE FOUND
LENDERS THERE LIKE TO BLAME THE SO CALLED OIL PATCH RECESSION
BUT THE PROBLEM IN FACT IS BAD BANKING IN A FEW CASES EVEN CORRUPT BANKING
SOME PARTS OF TEXAS THE DALLAS FORT
WORTH AREA FOR EXAMPLE HAVEN'T HAD ANYTHING THAT LEGITIMATELY COULD BE CALLED A RECESSION
THE MAIN REASON SO MANY LENDERS ARE IN TROUBLE IS AN OLD FASHIONED FAILING AMONG BANKERS A WEAKNESS FOR REAL ESTATE SPECULATION
AS A RESULT THE GOVERNMENT IS TALKING OF HIGHER FARM PRICES
BUT HIGHER FARM PRICES WOULD ADD TO AN ALREADY STEEP INFLATION RATE
SO BEIJING OFFICIALS REPORTEDLY TALK OF TYING WAGES TO INFLATION AN IDEA REMINISCENT OF THE WAGE INDEXATION TRIED IN SOME LATIN AMERICAN NATIONS SEVERAL YEARS AGO WITH DISASTROUS RESULTS
SECRETARIES ARE ALSO EASY TARGETS FOR A HUG ESPECIALLY IN HOLLYWOOD
I'VE SEEN A WRITER WALK INTO AN OFFICE AND PULL A SECRETARY UP AGAINST HIM
SHE DOESN'T KNOW WHAT TO DO SAYS CHARLES FRIES CHAIRMAN OF FRIES ENTERTAINMENT INCORPORATED
NOT TO WORRY SAYS H. FLINT RANNEY A LOCAL REAL ESTATE AGENT
WE HAVE A GREAT SENSE OF HUMOR HE SAYS
WE'LL TAKE ALMOST ANYTHING
BESIDES HE ADDS NEW YORKERS COME HERE ALL THE TIME WE JUST WOULDN'T WANT THEM TO LIVE HERE
ONE BIG PLAY LAST YEAR WAS LEISURE
ANOTHER WAS UNDERVALUED ASSETS EVEN THOUGH NO ONE CAN RECALL A JAPANESE COMPANY BEING BROKEN UP FOR ITS ASSETS
ONCE YOU GET THAT THEME THE LEVEL OF THE P. /SLASH E. RATIO DOESN'T MEAN A DAMN SAYS MR. ROBINS
IT'S ALL A BIT OF A MIRAGE
YET ONE THAT SO FAR HAS WORKED
BUT OTHER EVIDENCE ON THE FLAPS IS CONFLICTING
ONE OF THE CREW MEMBERS CAN BE HEARD ON THE COCKPIT VOICE RECORDING CALLING OUT FLAPS FIFTEEN FIFTEEN THE CORRECT POSITION FOR THE FLAPS
AND THE RECORDER INDICATES THAT A COCKPIT ALARM THAT SHOULD HAVE ALERTED THE CREW TO IMPROPERLY SET FLAPS DIDN'T GO OFF
WHAT BOTHERS THESE PEOPLE IS NOT THAT MRS. THATCHER POSES A DANGER TO THE SO CALLED UNIFIED EUROPEAN MARKET
MRS. THATCHER IS NOT OPPOSED TO THIS
BRITAIN'S OWN MARKETS ARE MORE OPEN THAN THOSE OF MOST EUROPEAN COUNTRIES LONDON IS WAY AHEAD OF THEM ON CAPITAL MOVEMENT HAVING ABOLISHED EXCHANGE CONTROLS ALTOGETHER
THE CAUSE OF THE OUTRAGE IS THAT EUROPEAN UNITY IS THE DEVICE THROUGH WHICH THE REGULATORS AND SOCIALISTS HOPE TO EXPAND THEIR GRIP ON THE CONTINENT
NOW HIS LAUGHTER IS GONE
BECAUSE OF DRUGS HE IS DEAD
AND EVERY DAY MY HEART BREAKS A LITTLE MORE
ON THE SURFACE THE TRADE REPORT LOOKED ENCOURAGING
THE NATION'S SEASONALLY ADJUSTED TRADE DEFICIT NARROWED TO EIGHT POINT SEVENTEEN BILLION IN JUNE THE LOWEST MONTHLY DEFICIT SINCE DECEMBER NINETEEN EIGHTY FOUR
WHAT'S MORE THE MAY TRADE DEFICIT WAS REVISED DOWN TO TEN POINT OH TWO BILLION FROM THE TEN POINT TWENTY FOUR BILLION ORIGINALLY REPORTED
SO FAR ILLEGAL FOREIGN WORKERS AREN'T TAKEN AS A JOB THREAT BY JAPANESE WORKERS
BUT JAPANESE UNEMPLOYMENT IS AT HISTORICALLY HIGH LEVELS BECAUSE OF THE YEN'S STRENGTH POSING A KNOTTY PROBLEM FOR THE GOVERNMENT
MANY JAPANESE COMPANIES IN SUCH INDUSTRIES AS STEEL AND SHIPBUILDING ARE CUTTING THEIR LABOR FORCES
IN THE PAST FILIPINOS IN MANY RURAL AREAS PREFERRED THE DISCIPLINED TERROR OF THE N. P. A. TO THE RANDOM EXCESSES OF THE COUNTRY'S MILITARY
WITH THE CHANGE OF GOVERNMENT LAST YEAR A MILD IMPROVEMENT IN MILITARY BEHAVIOR AND THE DETECTION OF THE MINDANAO SLAUGHTERS SOME FILIPINOS ARE CHANGING THEIR MINDS
DIPLOMATS AND POLITICAL ANALYSTS SAY THEY DON'T KNOW IF THE TREND PRESAGES SIGNIFICANT POPULAR RESISTANCE TO THE COMMUNISTS OR JUST ADDITIONAL TURMOIL IN THE PHILIPPINE COUNTRYSIDE
THERE IS A WIDE VARIATION IN THINKING ABOUT HOW SICK ONE IS AND HOW IMPORTANT TIME OFF IS IN ORDER TO GET WELL
THE PATIENTS' RESPONSIBILITIES OUTSIDE OF WORK ALSO VARY
IT'S HARD TO SAY TO WHAT DEGREE THESE FACTORS SHOULD INFLUENCE DISABILITY STATUS
MOST PHYSICIANS PROBABLY CONSIDER THEM IMPORTANT
IN CLEVELAND HIGBEE CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER ROBERT BROADBENT SAYS THE RETAILER HAS BENEFITED FROM ITS PARENT'S FINANCIAL EXPERTISE
ALTHOUGH IT WILL RETAIN CONTROL INDUSTRIAL EQUITY IS PLANNING TO TAKE HIGBEE PUBLIC AGAIN PROBABLY IN JUNE
MEANWHILE SAYS MR. BROADBENT THEY'VE MADE US MORE INQUISITIVE ABOUT ACQUISITIONS OURSELVES
THE LOAN IS PART OF A SEVENTY FIVE MILLION DOLLAR PLAN TO EXPAND THE MINE'S RESERVES AND ALLOW IT TO KEEP OPERATING UNTIL NINETEEN NINETY FOUR
WITHOUT THE EXPANSION THE MINE WAS THREATENED WITH CLOSURE NEXT YEAR
CLOSURE WOULD MEAN THE LOSS OF SEVEN HUNDRED AND FIFTEEN JOBS
ADMINISTRATION OFFICIALS ARE CONCERNED BY INTELLIGENCE REPORTS THAT SUGGEST IRAN IS THINKING ABOUT ORGANIZING TERRORIST STRIKES AGAINST AMERICAN WEST EUROPEAN AND ARAB TARGETS
THE ADMINISTRATION HAS ALERTED EMBASSIES AND MILITARY BASES OF AN INCREASED THREAT
ADMINISTRATION OFFICIALS SAY INTELLIGENCE ALSO SHOWS THAT IRAN HAS LAID THE GROUNDWORK FOR TERRORISM IN THE UNITED STATES
WITHIN AN HOUR BARCLAYS P. L. C. LLOYDS BANK P. L. C. AND THE LONDON UNIT OF CITICORP INCREASED THEIR BASE RATES
THE BARCLAYS BOOST TOOK EFFECT IMMEDIATELY WHILE THE OTHER TWO BANKS' MOVES WERE EFFECTIVE AT THE CLOSE OF BUSINESS
SIMILAR INCREASES BY NATIONAL WESTMINSTER BANK P. L. C. AND MIDLAND BANK P. L. C. GO INTO EFFECT TODAY
BASE RATES ARE THE BENCHMARK FOR COMMERCIAL LENDING IN BRITAIN
THE FOLLOWING OFFICERS DIRECTORS AND LARGE STOCKHOLDERS OF COMPANIES REPORTED CHANGES IN HOLDINGS UNDE(R)- UNDER THE SECURITIES EXCHANGE ACT OF NINETEEN THIRTY FOUR
THOSE IDENTIFIED AS BENEFICIAL OWNERS HOLD AT LEAST TEN PERCENT OF A COMPANY'S EQUITY SECURITIES
UNLESS OTHERWISE NOTED CHANGES INVOLVED DIRECT HOLDINGS OF COMMON STOCK AND TOOK PLACE IN MAY NINETEEN EIGHTY EIGHT
COMPANIES ARE LISTED WHERE TRANSACTIONS GENERALLY AGGREGATE TEN THOUSAND SHARES OR A HUNDRED THOUSAND DOLLARS
ANOTHER CONDITION IS THAT TOPEKA GROUP A UNIT OF DULUTH MINNESOTA BASED MINNESOTA POWER AND LIGHT COMPANY EXERCISE ITS OPTION TO BUY DELTONA'S UTILITY SUBSIDIARIES
BASED ON CURRENT BOOK VALUE THE SUBSIDIARIES WOULD FETCH THIRTY TWO POINT FIVE MILLION IN CASH PLUS PREFERRED STOCK IN ONE OF THE UTILITY UNITS
TOPEKA SAID IT INTENDS TO EXERCISE THE OPTION
THE BIGGEST HURDLE WAS TO FIND THE FUNDS TO MEET THE COST OF RECONSTRUCTION INCLUSIVE OF THE ISSUE OF STAMPS
HOWEVER THE RESPONSE TO THE GOVERNMENT'S INTERNATIONAL APPEAL FOR ASSISTANCE HAS BEEN EXTREMELY HEARTWARMING
THE FUNDS REQUIRED FOR PUBLIC SECTOR ASSISTANCE HAVE BEEN REALIZED AND THE FURTHER AMOUNT REQUIRED IS EXPECTED TO FLOW FROM THE PROCEEDS OF THE OVERSEAS REINSURANCE OF PROPERTY DAMAGE
TO BEGIN WITH COMPANIES HAVE BEEN DOING A GOOD JOB OF MANAGING INVENTORIES
IN THE PAST BUSINESSES HAVE TENDED TO BECOME INCREASINGLY OPTIMISTIC AS EXPANSIONS PERSISTED
WHEN SALES EVENTUALLY SLOWED INVENTORIES QUICKLY REACHED EXCESSIVE LEVELS
COMPANIES THEREUPON CUT THEIR BUYING INDUSTRIAL PRODUCTION DECLINED AND A RECESSION WAS UNDER WAY
THIRTY ONE TEAMS OF NINETEEN REPRESENTING BUSINESSES SCHOOLS AND ASSORTED OTHER GROUPS SIGNED UP FOR THE FIRST LOCAL COMPETITION
FOR WEEKS DRUMS WERE HEARD ALONG THE WILLAMETTE AS THE TEAMS PRACTICED
BOATS FULL OF MEN AND WOMEN IN BUSINESS SUITS FRESH FROM WORK OR HAPPY HOUR WERE NOT AN UNCOMMON SIGHT
THESE MIXED FEELINGS OF FRUSTRATION WITH AND GRATITUDE TOWARD THE AUTHORITIES ARE PART OF THE EVERYDAY LIFE OF A FOREIGNER DOING BUSINESS IN KOREA
IN FACT SUCH CONTRADICTIONS ARE WHAT SEEM TO MAKE THE KOREAN WORLD GO ROUND
A WESTERN BUSINESSMAN NEEDS TO BE READY FOR THEM
HERE ARE A FEW HARD LEARNED FACTS OF KOREAN BUSINESS LIFE
BUT MANY LOCAL BUSINESSES THAT DEPEND ON TOURISM AREN'T CONVINCED
THEY ARGUE THAT A COMMERCIAL MINE MIGHT GET PLAYED OUT IN A FEW YEARS
AND THEY FEAR THAT MANY TOURISTS WHO TREK HERE FOR THE TANTALIZING PROSPECT OF FINDING A DIAMOND IN THE FIELD WILL TAKE THEIR VACATIONS ELSEWHERE
THE COURT WAS SPLIT ON BOTH THE WILLIAMS ACT AND COMMERCE CLAUSE
JUSTICE LEWIS POWELL ACKNOWLEDGED THAT THE NINETEEN EIGHTY TWO CASE OF EDWARD VERSUS
MITE SUGGESTED THAT ANY STATE LAW THAT FAVORED TARGETS MORE THAN DID THE WILLIAMS ACT WOULD BE INVALID BECAUSE CONGRESS HAD PREEMPTED LOCAL REGULATIONS
THE COURT BACKTRACKED HERE TO SAY STATE LAWS MIGHT BE O. K. IF THEY HELP THE WILLIAMS ACT'S PURPOSE BY HEAPING EVEN MORE BURDENS ON ACQUIRERS
IT HAS RELIEVED AT LEAST SOME OF THE FRUSTRATION FELT BY THE FARMERS SAYS PETER BRENT A MEMBER OF A FARM ACTIVIST GROUP
IF THEY GO TO MEDIATION AT LEAST THE LENDER HAS TO LISTEN
NEARLY A DOZEN OTHER STATES HAVE INQUIRED INTO IOWA'S PROGRAM
AND MANDATORY MEDIATION MODELED ON IOWA'S PROGRAM IS CURRENTLY BEING CONSIDERED BY THE CALIFORNIA AND MISSOURI LEGISLATURES
OGILVY IS THE NATION'S FIFTH LARGEST ADVERTISING AGENCY WITH NINETEEN EIGHTY SIX BILLINGS OF THREE POINT TWO BILLION
ROUGHLY HALF OF THOSE BILLINGS COME FROM OUTSIDE THE UNITED STATES MR. ROMAN SAID
AGENCIES TRADITIONALLY HAVE TAKEN FIFTEEN PERCENT OF BILLINGS AS A COMMISSION
L. T. V. HAS SAID REPEATEDLY SINCE ITS FILING THAT IT WOULD FIGHT ANY CREDITOR MOVE TO EITHER REORGANIZE THE UNIT SEPARATELY OR FORCE ITS SALE
CREDITORS ON THE OTHER HAND HAVE DISCUSSED THE IDEA ALMOST SINCE THE DAY OF L. T. V.'S FILING
AND THE PENSION AGENCY THE BANKS AND THE COMMITTEE REPRESENTING UNSECURED CREDITORS HAVE RECENTLY BEEN HOLDING SERIOUS DISCUSSIONS ON THE ISSUE

BUT WHILE THE BUDGET GAVE A BOOST TO THE MARKETS IT ALSO PRESAGED GREATER AUSTERITY FOR THE NATION AS A WHOLE
TO MR. HAWKE THAT IS AS IT SHOULD BE
AUSTRALIANS HAVE GOT TO RECOGNIZE THAT WE AREN'T OUT OF THE WOODS YET HE SAYS
WE'VE GOT ENORMOUS PROBLEMS AND WE HAVE TO LEARN TO LIVE WITHIN OUR RESOURCES

THEY WOULD ALSO CLOSE SOME DUMPS AND PUT SPECIAL CONDITIONS ON OTHERS IN CERTAIN AREAS
HOPING TO PREVENT LONG COSTLY DISPUTES OVER WHAT DOCUMENTS DEFENDANTS HAVE TO SURRENDER JUDGES GRANT BLANKET PROTECTIVE ORDERS
THE ORDERS TYPICALLY BAR PUBLIC DISSEMINATION OF RECORDS AND DEPOSITIONS EVEN AFTER A SETTLEMENT OR VERDICT

PILLSBURY'S LOSS COMPARES WITH EARNINGS OF FORTY EIGHT POINT FIVE MILLION DOLLARS OR FIFTY SIX CENTS A SHARE IN THE YEAR EARLIER QUARTER
REVENUE FELL TWO PERCENT IN THE LATEST PERIOD TO ONE POINT FIVE BILLION DOLLARS FROM ONE POINT FIVE THREE BILLION DOLLARS
THE REVENUE DECLINE CAME FROM PILLSBURY'S RESTAURANT BUSINESS
IF DOCTOR HAMMER WERE TO DIE TOMORROW THE CHECK TO HIS FOUNDATION WOULD BE MORE THAN NINETEEN MILLION DOLLARS
BUT OCCIDENTAL AND DOCTOR HAMMER APPARENTLY DON'T FORESEE AN IMMEDIATE USE OF THE CLAUSE THAT WILL BENEFIT THE FOUNDATION
THE CHAIRMAN'S EMPLOYMENT CONTRACT RUNS AT LEAST TO FEBRUARY FIRST NINETEEN NINETY EIGHT AT WHICH TIME DOCTOR HAMMER WILL BE NINETY NINE
AFTER THAT THE CONTRACT AUTOMATICALLY EXTENDS INDEFINITELY
BUT THE GENERAL PINOCHET IS MORE LIKELY TO SUPPORT WHICHEVER CIVILIAN CANDIDATE PLEDGES TO RETAIN HIS ANTI COMMUNIST POLICIES AND SUCH A PERSON HAS A GOOD CHANCE OF WINNING
CHILE A PROTECTIONIST BACKWATER IN THE EARLY NINETEEN SEVENTIES NOW HAS A DYNAMIC AND OPEN EXPORT CAPABLE ECONOMY
MOST VOTERS APPROVE OF THIS TRANSFORMATION AS SHOWN BY THE FACT THAT ALMOST NONE OF THE SIXTEEN CURRENT OPPOSITION PARTIES CALL FOR A REVERSAL OF CURRENT ECONOMIC POLICIES
THE ALLENDE CHAOS IS STILL VIVIDLY REMEMBERED
DETAILS ARE STILL MURKY ABOUT THE REST OF THE CREDITS
ITALIAN OFFICIALS SAY THAT ROME'S DECISION TO GRANT ABOUT A SEVEN HUNDRED SEVENTY FIVE MILLION DOLLAR GUARANTEE OF EXPORT CREDITS WAS PRIMARILY A POLITICAL RATHER THAN A BANKING DECISION
BRITAIN'S MIDLAND BANK HAS ANNOUNCED PLANS FOR A ONE BILLION DOLLAR CREDIT LINE THOUGH SOME BRITISH BANKS MAY BE GETTING COLD FEET ABOUT PARTICIPATING
FRENCH BANKS HAVE YET TO ANNOUNCE THEIR PLANS OFFICIALLY BUT ARE SAID TO BE CONSIDERING LOANS OF TWO BILLION DOLLARS
WITH THE U. S. GOVERNMENT AS ITS PRIME CUSTOMER TRACOR WAS HELPLESS WHEN DEFENSE SPENDING SLOWED
<NOISE> INTERNALLY MR. INMAN SAYS HE DISCOVERED THAT EXPENSES COULDN'T BE CUT AS EASILY AS BANKERS HAD FORECAST
AND FEES WERE HIGHER THAN EXPECTED
MR. INMAN CALLS IT ALL PART OF MY EDUCATION
THE CRACK EPIDEMIC HAS JUST ABOUT SILENCED LIBERAL OPPOSITION TO TOUGH LAW AND ORDER POLICIES
IT IS OBVIOUSLY RIDICULOUS TO TALK ABOUT REHABILITATING AN UZI TOTING DRUG PUSHER WHO MAKES FIVE THOUSAND DOLLARS A WEEK
HIS PROBLEM IS NOT LACK OF SELF ESTEEM
THERE IS NOTHING A SOCIAL WORKER IS GOING TO BE ABLE TO DO FOR HIM ESPECIALLY SINCE THE SOCIAL WORKER IS TOO AFRAID TO VENTURE INTO HIS NEIGHBORHOOD
AT W. F. I. A. RUNNING THE FORMULA LAST JANUARY THIRTIETH MEANT BUYING MORE THAN TWO HUNDRED THOUSAND SHARES OF REEBOK QUICKLY
THAT'S BECAUSE W. F. I. A. LIKES TO OWN ALL THE STOCKS IN THE S. AND P. FIVE HUNDRED INDEX IN AMOUNTS SCALED TO THEIR MARKET WEIGHT
THOSE HOLDINGS RANGE FROM MORE THAN ONE POINT FOUR BILLION DOLLARS OF I. B. M. TO JUST SIX HUNDRED AND SEVENTY THREE THOUSAND DOLLARS OF ALLIS CHALMERS CORPORATION
CONTINENTAL'S SPOKESMAN CONCEDED THE AIRLINE WAS SLOW IN SOME REFUNDS BUT HE SAID THE PROBLEM STEMMED FROM ITS MERGER WITH PEOPLE EXPRESS EARLIER THIS YEAR
THAT CARRIER HAD MORE THAN TWENTY FIVE THOUSAND TICKETS THAT NEEDED TO BE REFUNDED WHEN ITS OPERATIONS WERE JOINED WITH CONTINENTAL'S THE SPOKESMAN SAID
HE INSISTED THAT MOST OF THE REFUNDS WERE COMPLETED

HE DECLINED TO ELABORATE
A DIGITAL SPOKESMAN SAID THE COURT ACTION DOESN'T CHANGE THE STATUS QUO
THE PART OF THE RULING THAT WAS OVERTURNED HASN'T BEEN IN EFFECT SINCE LAST JANUARY WHEN EMULEX OBTAINED THE STAY HE SAID
HE ADDED THAT THE PARAGRAPHS OF THE ORDER THAT WERE UPHELD CONTINUE TO PROHIBIT EMULEX FROM USING TRADE SECRETS THAT DIGITAL SAYS WERE STOLEN FROM IT
THE HUGE GAP TO A LARGE EXTENT IS A PRICE PHENOMENON
THE DOLLAR'S FALL HAS PUSHED UP THE PRICE OF IMPORTS CAUSING THE DEFICIT TO SWELL EVEN AS THE VOLUME OF NON OIL IMPORTS HAS RECEDED
BUT LONG BEFORE NOW THESE HIGHER PRICES WERE SUPPOSED TO LEAD TO IMPROVEMENT IN THE MONTHLY MERCHANDISE TRADE DEFICIT AS WELL
BIDS TOTALING THREE HUNDRED AND SEVENTY SIX MILLION DOLLARS WERE SUBMITTED
ACCEPTED BIDS RANGED FROM SEVEN POINT ONE FIVE PERCENT TO SEVEN POINT ONE SEVEN THREE PERCENT
THE BANK HOLDING COMPANY SLATED ANOTHER FIFTY MILLION DOLLAR SALE NEXT TUESDAY
BUT FOR MOST MUTUAL FUND INVESTORS THE TAX BITE THIS YEAR WILL BE BIGGER THAN EVER
HOLDERS ARE TAXED ON A HUNDRED PERCENT OF REALIZED CAPITAL GAINS UNDER THE NEW TAX LAW FOR INSTANCE
PREVIOUSLY SIXTY PERCENT WAS EXCLUDED FROM TAXATION
ANY GAIN CREDITED TO INVESTORS BY THEIR FUND IS CONSIDERED REALIZED WHETHER THE HOLDER ACTUALLY SELLS ANY FUND SHARES OR NOT
ARTICLES BEGAN APPEARING ABOUT THE RISE OF THE RELIGIOUS RIGHT A GROUP THAT SEEMED TO BE DEALT WITH MORE AS ANTHROPOLOGY THAN JOURNALISM
AFTER WATCHING EVANGELICAL T. V. MINISTERS NORMAN LEAR BEGAN SPENDING HIS FORTUNE ON A GROUP CALLED PEOPLE FOR THE AMERICAN WAY
MUCH OF THIS SWAMP CREATURE TREATMENT CAME TO A HEAD IN THE NINETEEN EIGHTY SIX LAWSUIT OVER CREATIONISM AND SECULAR HUMANISM IN SCHOOL TEXTS
THE ESTABLISHMENT MADE VIRTUALLY NO EFFORT TO PUSH BELOW THE SURFACE OF THESE GRIEVANCES
IT'S A WELCOME DEVELOPMENT IN THE FACE OF A VERY SIGNIFICANT INVENTORY OVERHANG SAYS MORGAN STANLEY'S MR. ROACH
A SLOWING OF GROWTH IN PRODUCTION GIVES COMPANIES THE ABILITY TO WORK OFF SOME INVENTORY
AND ECONOMISTS NOTE THAT THE STEADY OPERATING RATE INDICATES CONTINUED STRENGTH IN THE MANUFACTURING SECTOR
MACY IS OFFERING SEVENTY SEVEN DOLLARS AND THIRTY CENTS A SHARE FOR EIGHTY PERCENT OF FEDERATED'S SHARES PLUS STOCK IN A COMBINED FEDERATED MACY FOR THE REMAINDER
THE STOCK COMPONENT MAKES IT DIFFICULT TO DETERMINE THE VALUE OF THE TOTAL BID WHICH HAS BEEN WIDELY ESTIMATED AT ABOUT SIX POINT THREE BILLION DOLLARS
MACY'S ADVISERS HOWEVER PRIVATELY VALUE IT AT BETWEEN SEVENTY THREE DOLLARS AND SEVENTY FOUR DOLLARS A SHARE OR COMPARABLE TO CAMPEAU'S PROPOSAL
THE ROAD NAMED WEST STREET IS A NARROW STRIP OF RED GRAVEL
IT IS LIKE THE PROVERBIAL RAILROAD TRACKS IN AMERICA THAT SEPARATE THE RICH SIDE OF TOWN FROM THE POOR
THE PHYSICAL DISTANCE MAY NOT BE GREAT BUT THE MENTAL GAP IS
IN TAIPEI THERE WERE NEWSPAPER REPORTS THAT THE MINISTRY OF FINANCE TURNED DOWN A PROPOSAL TO ALLOW BUSINESS BANKS TO SET UP BRANCHES IN OTHER CITIES
TRADING VOLUME HIT A RECORD AT FIVE HUNDRED AND TWENTY FOUR MILLION SHARES COMPARED WITH THE FOUR HUNDRED AND FORTY NINE MILLION SHARES IN THE PREVIOUS SESSION

PATTEN RETAINS LAND SPECIALISTS WHO KNOW THE REGULATORY ROPES AND HOW TO GET SUBDIVISIONS APPROVED
IN AT LEAST TWO INSTANCES PATTEN SPECIALISTS HAVE BEEN ON TOWN PLANNING BOARDS WHERE PATTEN HAD PROJECTS PENDING THOUGH THEY ABSTAINED FROM VOTING
IN MAINE A KEY SPOKESMAN IS A FORMER STATE LEGISLATOR
STEW LEONARD WHO RUNS STEW LEONARD'S A LARGE GROCERY STORE IN NORWALK CONNECTICUT ACCOMMODATED ALL FOUR OF HIS CHILDREN THIS WAY
HE FIRST NAMED HIS OLDEST SON PRESIDENT
THEN HE SET UP A BAKERY BUSINESS IN THE STORE FOR HIS DAUGHTER
FOR HIS YOUNGER SON HE CREATED AN OPEN AIR FARMER'S MARKET IN DANBURY CONNECTICUT WHERE HE ALSO IS BUILDING A SUPERMARKET FOR THE SON TO RUN
AND MR. LEONARD'S OTHER DAUGHTER
SHE BECAME DIRECTOR OF THE COMPANY'S HUMAN RESOURCES DEPARTMENT
THEN THERE'S BEEN BAD LUCK AND BAD PLANNING

BUT RAMPANT BRAZILIAN INFLATION SENT FOX PRICES SOARING AND VOLKSWAGEN FAILED TO OFFER AN OPTIONAL AUTOMATIC TRANSMISSION

THE MARKETS SEEM DETERMINED TO MAKE AS MANY ECONOMISTS LOOK AS STUPID AS THEY POSSIBLY CAN

THE GRAND METROPOLITAN OPERATIONS WHICH WERE ACQUIRED BY THAT COMPANY IN NINETEEN EIGHTY HAVE ENJOYED A GOOD REPUTATION IN THE INDUSTRY
BUT PEPSICO FEELS ITS TERRITORIES CAN BE BETTER EXPLOITED DUE TO THEIR PROXIMITY TO EXISITING COMPANY OWNED BOTTLERS
IT OWNS ITS LOS ANGELES AND SAN FRANCISCO BOTTLERS FOR INSTANCE MAKING THE CENTRAL CALIFORNIA TERRITORY A GOOD FIT
IT ALSO ALREADY OWNS ITS BOTTLERS IN CENTRAL AND NORTHERN FLORIDA AND PART OF GEORGIA

DURING ANY REPAIR PROCESS BLOOD CLOTS ARE CONSTANTLY BEING FORMED AND DISSOLVED
IT IS QUITE POSSIBLE SCIENTISTS SPECULATE THAT DURING ATTEMPTS TO REPAIR THE ARTERY WALL THE BODY AT SOME POINT TRIES TO DISSOLVE A BLOOD CLOT
BUT IT MISTAKENLY GRABS PROTEIN A. INSTEAD OF PLASMINOGEN PULLING IT WITH ITS BAGS OF FAT AND CHOLESTEROL INTO THE ARTERY WALL
THIS THWARTS THE REPAIR PROCESS AND BEGINS A VICIOUS CYCLE DRAWING MORE AND MORE CHOLESTEROL INTO THE DAMAGED AREA
AND IN FACT MICROSCOPIC BLOOD CLOTS AND BITS OF L. P. A. ARE FOUND IN THE MISHMASH OF THE DEPOSITS
HOWEVER HE LEAVES PRIME AT A DIFFICULT TIME

THOSE PARTNERSHIPS ARE THEN MANAGED BY INDIVIDUAL PORTFOLIO MANAGERS

THE TEN PERCENT NOTES WERE PRICED AT PAR AND THE RETURN IS POINT SEVEN TWO OF A PERCENTAGE POINT ABOVE THE RATE OF COMPARABLE TREASURY NOTES
THE NOTES ARE RATED DOUBLE A. THREE BY MOODY'S INVESTORS SERVICE INCORPORATED AND DOUBLE A. MINUS BY STANDARD AND POOR'S CORPORATION
LAST MONTH AUTO SALES FELL ONE POINT FOUR PERCENT AFTER RISING FIVE POINT SEVEN PERCENT IN AUGUST
SALES OF BUILDING MATERIALS INCREASED ONE POINT TWO PERCENT AFTER A POINT FOUR PERCENT DROP
