THE DOW JONES INDUSTRIALS FELL EIGHTEEN POINT TWO FOUR POINTS TO NINETEEN FORTY FIVE POINT TWO NINE
O. T. C. ISSUES GENERALLY WERE FLAT
ASKED ABOUT THE SITUATION A FIRST BOSTON SPOKESMAN SAID OUR RELATIONSHIP WITH CAMPEAU HAS NOT CHANGED
WE ARE CAMPEAU'S BANKER OF RECORD
OUR PEOPLE HAVE BEEN LIVING WITH BOB CAMPEAU FOR THE LAST COUPLE OF DAYS
UNFAIR OR NOT THE QUESTIONS ARE BEING ASKED ABOUT THE REVOLUTION'S ROUTE AND ITS GOALS HOW MUCH VIOLENCE WILL THERE BE
WILL WHITES HAVE POLITICAL RIGHTS
HOW MANY WHITES WILL LOSE THEIR JOBS
HOW COMMUNIST IS THE A. N. C.
HOW MUCH WILL THE GOVERNMENT CONTROL THE ECONOMY
ONE ANALYST NOTED THAT BIG WEST GERMAN BANKS ARE SLOWLY LIQUIDATING THE VAST INVENTORIES OF SHARES BOUGHT IN THE WEEKS AND MONTHS AFTER THE OCTOBER STOCK MARKET CRASH
THEY'RE DOING IT VERY SLOWLY AND CAREFULLY AND TAKING ADVANTAGE OF MARKET UPTICKS SAID THE ANALYST
BUT IT STILL REPRESENTS A LIMITATION ON THE MARKET
STEVEN EINHORN CHIEF PORTFOLIO STRATEGIST FOR GOLDMAN SACHS AND COMPANY URGES A MORE CAUTIOUS APPROACH
HE HAS BEEN ARGUING FOR MONTHS THAT THE STOCK MARKET IS TRAPPED IN AN ECONOMIC BOX THAT WILL LIMIT ANY RALLIES
FOR ONE THING HE ISN'T YET CONVINCED THE ECONOMY IS SLOWING
AND IF IT REALLY IS HE SAYS INVESTORS SHOULD THINK THROUGH THE IMPLICATIONS
ONE OF THE FOUR BUSINESSES INCLUDED IN THE LOCKUP OPTION GRANTED TO K. K. R. IS MACMILLAN'S DIRECTORY DIVISION WHICH CONSISTS OF WHO'S WHO AND NATIONAL REGISTER PUBLISHING
THUS IT WASN'T IMMEDIATELY CLEAR WHY INTERNATIONAL THOMSON MIGHT BE LOOKING AT THE OPERATION EVEN THOUGH IT IS INCLUDED IN THE LOCKUP OPTION
A SPOKESMAN FOR K. K. R. ALSO DECLINED COMMENT
DISDAIN FOR THE C. WORD IS NOTHING NEW IN THE CHEMICAL INDUSTRY
SAINT LOUIS BASED MONSANTO COMPANY DROPPED CHEMICAL FROM ITS NAME IN NINETEEN SIXTY FOUR WHEN THE COMPANY DIVERSIFIED INTO OTHER BUSINESSES
BUT MONSANTO ALSO WANTED TO DISTANCE ITSELF FROM THE PUBLIC OUTCRY AGAINST CHEMICAL COMPANIES IN GENERAL
THERE'S A SCHOOL OF THOUGHT THAT SAYS IF YOU'VE GOT THAT WORD IN YOUR NAME YOU'RE A TARGET FOR TROUBLE A MONSANTO OFFICIAL SAYS
IN A RELATED MATTER A REVIEW COMMISSION ADMINISTRATIVE LAW JUDGE ON OCTOBER EIGHTEENTH THREW OUT OSHA CITATIONS AGAINST MORRELL
THE CITATIONS ISSUED IN APRIL NINETEEN EIGHTY SEVEN CHARGED RECORD KEEPING VIOLATIONS
THE OFFICIAL DISALLOWED OSHA'S INSTANCE BY INSTANCE CITATION WHICH PROPOSED A TOTAL FINE OF SIX HUNDRED AND NINETY THOUSAND DOLLARS
THE OFFICIAL ALSO SAID OSHA DIDN'T ISSUE THE CITATION WITHIN THE SIX MONTHS SPECIFIED BY LAW FROM THE TIME AN OFFICIAL INSPECTION BEGINS
MR. LAROCHE A PROVIDENCE RHODE ISLAND BUSINESSMAN HOLDS A THIRTY PERCENT STAKE IN NEWPORT
HE OPPOSES THE UTILITY'S REORGANIZATION INTO A HOLDING COMPANY FORMAT WHICH HE CLAIMS ENTRENCHES NEWPORT'S MANAGEMENT AND HINDERS CHANGES THAT COULD INCREASE MARKET VALUE
LAST YEAR HE SUED NEWPORT IN AN ATTEMPT TO BLOCK FORMATION OF THE HOLDING COMPANY
THE LAWSUIT WAS UNSUCCESSFUL AND LAST WEEK NEWPORT SAID THAT ITS HOLDERS HAD APPROVED FORMATION OF THE NEW COMPANY
THE COMPANIES' SHARPLY IMPROVED RESULTS PROVIDED MORE EVIDENCE OF A REBOUND IN BOTH THE CHIP AND PERSONAL COMPUTER INDUSTRIES
THE RESULTS FOLLOW A REPORT LAST WEEK FROM THE SEMICONDUCTOR INDUSTRY ASSOCIATION THAT THE BELEAGUERED CHIP INDUSTRY IS EXPERIENCING AN UPTURN
IN MARCH THE INDUSTRY'S LEADING INDICATOR REACHED THE HIGHEST LEVEL SINCE NINETEEN EIGHTY FOUR
BUT JAMES COCHRANE CHIEF ECONOMIST FOR TEXAS COMMERCE BANKSHARES INC. HOUSTON SAID THAT EVEN COMPANIES WITH STRONG FOURTH QUARTER BUSINESS ARE NERVOUS ABOUT NEXT YEAR
WE FIND OUR CUSTOMERS WHO FORMULATED BUSINESS PLANS ARE NOT TAKING ACTION HE SAID
WE HAVE A PARADOX A VERY STRONG ECONOMY IN THE FOURTH QUARTER AND UNCERTAINTY ABOUT CONSUMER SPENDING AND NEW INVESTMENT NEXT YEAR HE ADDED

MINUTES LATER THERE WAS A DRENCHING RAIN
<NOISE> IN NINETEEN EIGHTY FOUR WHEN HE RETURNED MUCH OF THE FURNITURE WAS SOGGY AND MOLDY
STATE WORKERS ARE ANOTHER CONSTITUENCY
ONE IN FOUR WORKING PANAMANIANS OWES HIS LIVELIHOOD TO THE GOVERNMENT AND THE GENERAL EXPECTS HELP FROM ALL OF THEM

BUT JAY CHIAT CHAIRMAN OF CHIAT DAY ISN'T WORRIED

WE'RE NOT CHANGING BECAUSE OF ANY SALES SITUATION
<NOISE> MR. MIGNANELLI MEANWHILE SAYS HE'S BACKING CHIAT ONE HUNDRED PERCENT AND BELIEVES THAT MORE PEOPLE NOW RECOGNIZE THE NISSAN NAME
SOUTHWESTERN BELL HAS THIRTY DAYS TO CONTEST THE COMPLAINT
THE COMMISSION IS EXPECTED TO ISSUE A FINAL DECISION BY THE END OF THE YEAR
GENERALLY THOUGH THE AGENCY'S STAFF IS VIEWED AS AGGRESSIVE IN ITS RECOMMENDATIONS THE COMMISSION HAS USUALLY APPROVED FAR MORE MODEST CUTS FOR REGULATED COMPANIES
MR. BETHELL HAS AN EYE FOR THE FASHIONABLE AND FOR THE ABOMINABLE WHICH TODAY ARE OFTEN THE SAME THING
HE OBVIOUSLY RELISHES A GOOD FIGHT AND SAYING NO TO THE CULTURAL BARBARIANS AND THE CURRENT WISDOM
HE USES PIG BLADDER HAMMER AND TONGS AND SCALPEL AND HE IS ADEPT WITH THEM ALL AS THE ELECTRIC WINDMILL SHOWS
THE FED'S POSTURE THROUGH ALL OF THIS IS REMARKABLY SIMILAR TO THAT OF THE WILLIAM MCCHESNEY MARTIN FED OF THE MID NINETEEN FIFTIES
THERE WAS NEVER ANY QUESTION ABOUT MR. MARTIN'S PRIORITIES HE WAS FIRST OF ALL AN INFLATION FIGHTER AND THAT WAS CERTAINLY TO THE GOOD
BUT NO ONE WAS EVER SURE JUST HOW THE FED WOULD WAGE ITS INFLATION BATTLES
MR. MARTIN INDICATED HE WOULD LEAN AGAINST THE WIND WHEN HE SENSED INFLATION COMING AND HE DID
HE GOT RID OF THE INFLATION SURGE THAT BEGAN IN NINETEEN FIFTY SIX BUT IT TOOK THE DEEP NINETEEN FIFTY SEVEN FIFTY EIGHT RECESSION TO DO SO
REACTING TO THE EROSION OF CONFUCIAN VALUES MANY KOREANS ARE TURNING TO RELIGION ESPECIALLY CHRISTIANITY
BUDDHISM IS ENJOYING A RESURGENCE AS WELL
THEY'RE LOOKING FOR SOMETHING SAYS MR. SEO
OTHERS ARE LOOKING TO THE PAST
ON COLLEGE CAMPUSES STUDENTS ARE JOINING CLUBS TO LEARN TRADITIONAL KOREAN ARTS AND CRAFTS
MANY ANTI GOVERNMENT ANTI AMERICAN STUDENT DEMONSTRATIONS ARE CARRIED OUT TO THE BEAT OF TRADITIONAL KOREAN DRUMS

IN PER STUDENT PAYMENTS CORNELL RANKED SEVENTH AT SEVENTY DOLLARS

WE GIVE A LOOK LIKE A GENERATION BEFORE THEM LIVED HERE SAYS MR. MARDER
THAT'S WORTH MONEY

THE AVERAGE RATE ON NEW THIRTEEN WEEK TREASURY BILLS ROSE TO FIVE POINT EIGHT ONE PERCENT FROM FIVE POINT SEVEN PERCENT AT LAST WEEK'S SALE
THE AVERAGE RATE ON NEW TWENTY SIX WEEK BILLS FELL TO SIX POINT ONE PERCENT FROM SIX POINT ONE EIGHT PERCENT THE PREVIOUS WEEK
THE STOCK SPLIT WILL BE DISTRIBUTED ON OR ABOUT JULY SECOND TO HOLDERS OF RECORD ON JUNE TWENTY SIXTH
AFTER THE DIVIDEND THE COMPANY WILL HAVE ABOUT SEVEN POINT EIGHT MILLION SHARES OUTSTANDING
THE COMPANY SAID IT WILL DISCONTINUE PAYING THE PREVIOUS REGULAR QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND OF FIFTEEN CENTS A SHARE AFTER THE STOCK DIVIDEND IS PAID TO CONSERVE CASH FOR FUTURE ACQUISITIONS

I'M EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED

GIVEN THE PRICE OF THE STOCK IT'S A GOOD USE OF THE CASH SAID WILLIAM R. YOUNG AN ANALYST WITH DREXEL BURNHAM LAMBERT INCORPORATED
THEY'RE DEFINITELY UNDERVALUED
FOR A PREMIER CHEMICAL COMPANY TO CARRY SUCH A DISCOUNT NEAR THE END OF AN ECONOMIC CYCLE SEEMS SILLY TO ME
COMMISSION CHAIRMAN DENNIS PATRICK HOWEVER SAID HE THOUGHT THERE WOULD BE ECONOMIC INCENTIVES TO KEEP INDEPENDENT STATIONS ON CABLE SYSTEMS AS LONG AS THEY WERE POPULAR
MR. PATRICK ALSO SAID THAT "QUOTE ONE ORIGINAL CONCERN THAT NETWORK OWNERSHIP MIGHT IMPEDE THE GROWTH OF CABLE AS A COMPETITOR OBVIOUSLY DOESN'T MATTER ANYMORE "END-QUOTE
HOUSEHOLDS WITH CABLE T. V. HAVE INCREASED TO MORE THAN FORTY MILLION FROM ABOUT TEN MILLION IN NINETEEN SEVENTY SIX
HE SAID PRICE INCREASES SO FAR IN THE CURRENT QUARTER MORE THAN COMPENSATE FOR INCREASING RAW MATERIAL COSTS ESPECIALLY IN THE ETHYLENE OXIDE BUSINESS
CARBIDE'S CHIEF DERIVATIVE FROM ETHYLENE OXIDE ETHYLENE GLYCOL IS USED IN ANTI FREEZE AND POLYESTER FIBER
SHIPMENTS ALSO ARE HOLDING UP WELL SO FAR THOUGH THEY ARE EXPECTED TO DECLINE FOR SEASONAL REASONS AFTER THANKSGIVING HE SAID
CITICORP ATTRIBUTED THE DISSOLUTION OF THE PROJECT WHICH FOCUSED ON OIL AND PETROCHEMICALS TO THE SHARP DECLINE IN OIL PRICES IN THE PAST YEAR
A CITICORP SPOKESMAN SAID CURTAILMENTS IN TRADING OPERATIONS AT MAJOR OIL COMPANIES AND THE DROP IN THE DOLLAR VOLUME OF OIL TRADING HURT THE DEMAND FOR THE SERVICE
GEMCO HAD HOPED EVENTUALLY TO EXPAND THE BUSINESS TO INCLUDE OTHER COMMODITIES BUT THOSE PLANS HAVE BEEN DROPPED
I THINK WE'LL HAVE TO RATION HEALTH CARE AS THE BRITISH DO HE SAYS
HIGH TECHNOLOGY HEART SURGERY FOR EXAMPLE WOULD BE GIVEN TO YOUNG PATIENTS EXPECTED TO HAVE A PROMISING RESPONSE
BUT WITH AN OLD VERY SICK PATIENT WITH MULTIPLE DISEASES WE MIGHT NOT DO THE PROCEDURE
NO DOUBT MR. CHUN KNOWS HE HAS TO STEP DOWN
BUT THE POINT HERE IS THAT HE IS TRYING TO ARRANGE IT SO THAT HE WILL STILL WIELD THE REAL POWER FROM BEHIND THE SCENES EVEN AFTER HIS RESIGNATION
HIS REPEATED EXPRESSIONS FOR HIS WILLINGNESS TO STEP DOWN MUSTN'T BE SEEN AS AN EFFORT TO USHER IN SOME GENUINE DEMOCRATIC CHANGE IN KOREA
WHAT KOREA IS NOW SUFFERING TO OVERCOME IS MAINLY A POLITICAL NOT ECONOMIC PROBLEM
REFORMS THAT DO NOT CHANGE THE PRESENT POLITICAL SYSTEM ARE NOT REFORMS
THE STATE TEACHERS RETIREMENT SYSTEM OF OHIO HAS INVESTED IN REAL ESTATE FOR SEVERAL YEARS AND RECENTLY EXPANDED INTO TIMBERLAND
MOST OF OUR REAL ESTATE PORTFOLIO IS IN OFFICE AND RETAIL BUILDINGS SAYS STEPHEN A. MITCHELL DIRECTOR OF INVESTMENTS
BUT WITH THOSE YOU'VE GOT THE RISK OF LOCATION TENANTS AND THE ECONOMY
MEANWHILE PRICES HAVE DROPPED DRAMATICALLY IN TIMBERLAND
PRATT AND WHITNEY SAID LAST WEEK IT MIGHT LAY OFF EMPLOYEES AFTER THE FIRST OF THE YEAR BECAUSE OF DECREASED DEMAND FOR JET ENGINES AND PARTS
THE COMPANY DECLINED TO DISCUSS HOW MANY EMPLOYEES MIGHT BE LAID OFF OR IF THE LOSS WOULD BE PERMANENT OR TEMPORARY
BUT UNION OFFICIALS SAID THE COMPANY HAS "QUOTE TOSSED AROUND NUMBERS FROM SIXTEEN HUNDRED TO TWO THOUSAND
MR. KIELLEY PLANS TO USE EXISTING TOWERS PERRIN OFFICES TO OPEN BRANCHES OF BOTH CRESAP AND A SMALLER TOWERS PERRIN INSURANCE UNIT
WE'LL USE THE BENEFITS BUSINESS AS A BEACHHEAD HE SAYS
OPENING A CRESAP OFFICE IN TOKYO WHERE TOWERS PERRIN ALREADY HAS A BENEFITS OFFICE "QUOTE WOULD BE OF HIGHEST PRIORITY

THE U. S. TRADE DEFICIT CREATES PRESSURE FOR A LOWER DOLLAR
THE THREAT OF RISING INFLATION BECOMES GREATER AS THE DOLLAR WEAKENS AND AS CAPACITY CONSTRAINTS ASSOCIATED WITH THE LATE STAGE OF AN ECONOMIC BOOM PUSH UP WAGES AND PRICES

A YEAR EARLIER G. M. HUGHES HAD FIRST QUARTER PROFIT OF A HUNDRED AND SIXTEEN POINT TWO MILLION OR SEVENTY SEVEN CENTS A SHARE
PER SHARE EARNINGS FOR THE NINETEEN EIGHTY SEVEN AND NINETEEN EIGHTY SIX QUARTERS BENEFITED FROM THIRTY SEVEN POINT TWO MILLION OF GOOD WILL AMORTIZATION IN EACH PERIOD
THE GOOD WILL AMORTIZATION REPRESENTS THE AMOUNT ABOVE BOOK VALUE THAT G. M. PAID FOR HUGHES AIRCRAFT
THAT ACCOUNTING ADJUSTMENT REPRESENTS A CHARGE AGAINST G. M.'S EARNINGS
FEDERAL RESERVE BOARD SPOKESMAN JOSEPH *COYNE* SAID YESTERDAY'S ACTION WAS DONE "QUOTE ENTIRELY AT CITICORP'S INITIATIVE "CLOSE-QUOTE

THE PEOPLE WHO ATTENDED THE EVENTS LOVED THEM
THE CITIZENS OF THE NEW YORK METROPOLITAN AREA ARE STILL TALKING ABOUT WHAT A TERRIFIC FEELING THE WEEKEND ENGENDERED IN EVERYONE

WALL STREET IN GENERAL HAS BEEN CONCERNED ABOUT G. M. IN RECENT WEEKS BECAUSE OF ITS NEW LABOR CONTRACT
THE THREE YEAR PACT INCLUDES A JOB SECURITY PROGRAM THAT PREVENTS LAYOFFS EXCEPT DURING A SALES DROP PREVENTS PLANT CLOSINGS AND SLOWS ATTRITION
MANY ANALYSTS PREDICT THE PROVISIONS WILL HAMPER G. M.'S EFFORTS TO RESTRUCTURE OPERATIONS AND SHED UNCOMPETITIVE PLANTS PARTICULARLY IN PARTS OPERATIONS

JAMES L. WINOKUR OF PITTSBURGH IS AN ART EXPERT AND TRUSTEE OF CARNEGIE INSTITUTE
IN NINETEEN SEVENTY SEVEN AND AGAIN IN NINETEEN SEVENTY EIGHT HE DONATED TEN PERCENT INTERESTS IN FORTY FOUR ART WORKS TO CARNEGIE'S MUSEUM
EACH GIFT ENTITLED IT TO POSSESSION FOR A PROPORTIONAL PART OF A YEAR BUT THE MUSEUM DIDN'T EXERCISE ITS RIGHT
IN NINETEEN SEVENTY NINE WINOKUR DONATED HIS REMAINING EIGHTY PERCENT INTEREST IN FIVE WORKS THE MUSEUM THEN TOOK THOSE FIVE
WINOKUR VALUED THE ART HIMSELF AND TOOK PROPORTIONAL CHARITABLE DEDUCTIONS FOR EACH OF THE THREE YEARS
THE DISPUTE IS A CLASSIC CONFRONTATION BETWEEN MARKET PHILOSOPHIES
WASHINGTON BELIEVES THAT JAPAN PROFITS FROM FREE U. S. MARKETS AND SHOULD RECIPROCATE WITH COMPLETELY FREE JAPANESE MARKETS
TOKYO GOVERNMENT BUREAUCRATS CLAIM TO FAVOR FREE MARKETS IN PRACTICE THEY OFTEN ARE LOATH TO RELINQUISH COMPLETE CONTROL ESPECIALLY IN PROMISING INDUSTRIES
INVESTORS ALSO PREFER REMICS BACKED BY SWAP TEN PERCENT SECURITIES BECAUSE PREPAYMENTS ARE LESS VOLATILE
FREDDIE MAC PASSES THROUGH ACTUAL PREPAYMENTS ON SWAP MORTGAGE ISSUES WHILE IT ESTIMATES PREPAYMENTS ON THE CASH ISSUES
PREPAYMENTS ON FREDDIE MAC CASH ISSUES ARE MUCH MORE VOLATILE FROM MONTH TO MONTH THAN PREPAYMENTS ON THE SWAP ISSUES
THE IMPROVEMENT IN SEPTEMBER'S TRADE DEFICIT MOSTLY CAME ON THE EXPORT SIDE
BUT BECAUSE OF THE POSTAL STRIKE THE DEADLINE FOR REPORTING EXPORTS WAS EXTENDED BY TWO DAYS
THAT DATA WAS ALSO AFFECTED BY THE UNUSUAL AMOUNT OF PRECIOUS STONES AND AIRCRAFT RELATED ITEMS REPORTED IN SEPTEMBER
NOW QUICK RECOGNITION OF LOSSES IS NOT ONLY GOOD INVESTMENT STRATEGY BUT GOOD ECONOMIC STRATEGY
FULL DEDUCTIBILITY WOULD PROMOTE MOBILITY OF CAPITAL AND EFFICIENT PRICING OF ASSETS
IT WOULD OBVIOUSLY PROMOTE MORE VENTURE CAPITAL WITH HIGH GAINS AND HIGH RISKS
MERE INDEXING BY CONTRAST WOULD HELP THE BIG AND DULL INVESTMENTS WITH LOW RISKS AND HUMDRUM REWARDS
BUT IF FULL DEDUCTIBILITY OF LOSSES WOULD BE GOOD FOR ECONOMIC GROWTH IT WOULD BE BAD IN TWO OTHER WAYS
THE OPERATING RATE IS STILL KIND OF LOW BUT IT'S COMING BACK SAID PRISCILLA LUCE SENIOR ECONOMIST AT WHARTON ECONOMETRIC FORECASTING ASSOCIATES IN PHILADELPHIA
THERE IS SOME CAUSE FOR OPTIMISM
SHE SAID EXPORT GAINS HAVE SPURRED SOME OF THE IMPROVEMENT
TEXAS STARTED EVALUATING POTENTIAL S. S. C. SITES ABOUT FOUR YEARS AGO AND NOW HAS SOLID DATA ON SIX LOCATIONS SAYS DILLARD HAMMETT STATE ENERGY ADVISER
FOUR MORE COMMUNITIES HAVE SINCE ASKED TO BE INCLUDED

THERE'S PROBABLY ALSO A PSYCHOLOGICAL SIDE TO AUGUSTA NATIONAL'S ACCENT ON EXPERIENCE
THE COLOR THAT'S SECOND ONLY TO GREEN HEREABOUTS IS GRAY
IT CAN BE FOUND MOSTLY ON THE HEADS OF PARTICIPANTS AND SPECTATORS

THEY'RE MORE OF A BET ON WHICH WAY THE MARKET IS HEADED
IN THE TWO SELECTED AREAS THE STATE WILL ALLOW PROCUREMENT AND RETAIL PRICES TO RISE TO WHAT THE OPEN MARKET DEMANDS
THE SUBSIDY FOR CONSUMERS IS MEANT TO REDUCE THE STRAIN ON URBAN RESIDENTS
FARMERS OF COURSE WILL GET HIGHER PRICES FOR THEIR GRAIN FROM THE MARKET WHICH IN TURN SHOULD INDUCE THEM TO INCREASE PRODUCTION

SINCE MONDAY'S OPENING BELL N. C. N. B. SHARES HAVE JUMPED FOUR AND THREE EIGHTHS POINTS CLOSING AT TWENTY SEVEN AND SEVEN EIGHTHS YESTERDAY

REPRESENTATIVE BILL LOWERY REPUBLICAN CALIFORNIA WHO HAS BEEN OUTSPOKEN ABOUT THE IMPORTANCE OF SECURING A SECOND BOOSTER ROCKET SUPPLIER PRAISED THE PLAN
COMPETITION FUELS EXCELLENCE HE SAID AND THIS IS THE FIRST STEP TOWARD A SOLID ROCKET MOTOR WITH BETTER SAFETY PRECAUTIONS AND MORE EFFICIENT PRODUCTION
ENERGY EXPERTS CONSIDER AMOCO AND EXXON AMONG THE INDUSTRY'S HEALTHIEST COMPANIES FINANCIALLY WITH STRONG CREDIT RATINGS AND LOW DEBT
AMOCO'S FINANCIAL STATEMENTS SHOW IT HAD FOUR HUNDRED AND FORTY ONE MILLION DOLLARS IN CASH AND MARKETABLE SECURITIES ON HAND AT THE CLOSE OF NINETEEN EIGHTY SIX
IN RECENT TALKS WITH ANALYSTS AMOCO OFFICIALS HAVE SAID THE COMPANY IS WELL POSITIONED FINANCIALLY IF IT DECIDES TO MAKE AN ACQUISITION
MOREOVER A WESTERN FIRM HAS TO MAKE SOME CALCULATION OF WHETHER MR. GORBACHEV WILL SUCCEED IN HIS EFFORTS TO ACTIVATE THE SOVIET WORK FORCE
PAST EXPERIENCE AND CURRENT REPORTS INDICATE THAT HIS CHANCES AREN'T GOOD
ROWLAND EVANS AND ROBERT NOVAK REPORTED FROM MOSCOW LAST WEEK THAT PARTY APPARATCHIKS AND DISAFFECTED SOVIET WORKERS ALREADY ARE UNDERMINING REFORMS
THE GOVERNMENT FACES A KNOTTY SURPLUS PROBLEM
U. S. STORAGE BINS HOLD ROUGHLY AN EIGHT MONTH SUPPLY OF CORN AND A TEN MONTH SUPPLY OF WHEAT WHEN A THREE MONTH SUPPLY WOULD DO
MAKING MATTERS WORSE THE HARVEST RIPENING IN THE FIELDS PROMISES TO BE A MONSTER PORTENDING RECORD POST HARVEST SUPPLIES OF CORN AND A GLUT OF OTHER COMMODITIES

HUMANA TRIED TO DEFEND ITSELF THROUGH DIVERSIFICATION AS DID THE OTHER LARGE CHAINS HOSPITAL CORPORATION OF AMERICA AMERICAN MEDICAL INTERNATIONAL *INCORPORATED* AND NATIONAL MEDICAL ENTERPRISES *INCORPORATED*
THE IDEA WAS THAT IF A HOSPITAL OWNER ALSO HAD AN INSURANCE PLAN IT COULD STEER *PATIENTS* TO ITS INSTITUTIONS THROUGH FINANCIAL INCENTIVES
THE PATIENT POOL MIGHT SHRINK BUT THE COMPANY COULD GRAB A BIGGER PART OF IT
KEMP'S CAMPAIGN TAKES ON AN INCREASINGLY DESPERATE TONE
IN ONE SURE SIGN OF A CANDIDACY IN TROUBLE HE LASHES OUT AT CRITICISM FROM A LIGHTLY REGARDED T. V. COMMENTATOR
EVEN SOME SUPPORTERS NOW SAY PRIVATELY THAT HE SHOULD AIM FOR THE VICE PRESIDENTIAL NOMINATION
BUT HIS LONGTIME HOSTILITIES WITH DOLE LEAVE A SPOT ON A BUSH TICKET AS ABOUT THE ONLY POSSIBILITY
WE NEVER HAD ONE BEFORE MR. TIMBERS SAID
A CERTAIN PERCENTAGE OF OUR CLIENTS WOULD LIKE TO HAVE THAT OPTION
IT'S NOT NECESSARILY A MARKET CALL
MR. TIMBERS SAYS HE'S FAIRLY AMBIVALENT ABOUT THE PRICE OF GOLD NEAR TERM
HE DOES SEE HOWEVER HIGHER INFLATION OF FIVE PERCENT OR SO IN NINETEEN EIGHTY NINE UP FROM FOUR PERCENT THIS YEAR
A GOLD OPTION COULD BE A NICE ALTERNATIVE FOR FIXED INCOME INVESTORS SHOULD INFLATION FEARS ARISE MR. TIMBERS SAYS
BUT HE WARNS THAT COMPANIES SHOULD ASK HOW MUCH STOCK IS TOO MUCH

WITH THIS YEAR'S SMALL ACREAGE INCREASES WEATHER AND SPRING PLANTING CONDITIONS ARE MAJOR CONCERNS TO A MARKET THAT IS BEGINNING TO SHAKE OFF A HUGE SURPLUS

THE ONE ELEMENT OF SUSPENSE REMAINS THE SELECTION OF A RUNNING MATE FOR VICE PRESIDENT BUSH'S PRESIDENTIAL CAMPAIGN
BUSH MANAGERS INSIST THEY WON'T DISCLOSE THE VICE PRESIDENTIAL NOMINEE'S IDENTITY UNTIL THURSDAY MORNING
REAGAN ARRIVED AT THE CONVENTION SITE LAST NIGHT AND PREPARED FOR HIS FAREWELL SPEECH TO THE PARTY TONIGHT
THE PRESIDENT LEAVES FOR CALIFORNIA TOMORROW AND BUSH WILL ARRIVE TO TAKE CONTROL OF THE CONVENTION
IT IS A CRUCIAL TIME IN WHICH BUSH MUST ATTEMPT TO MOVE OUT FROM UNDER REAGAN'S SHADOW AND ESTABLISH HIS OWN IDENTITY
THE DECISION TO INTERRUPT THE OLYMPIC COVERAGE COULD MEAN A POTENTIAL ADVERTISING REVENUE LOSS OF EIGHT MILLION DOLLARS ACCORDING TO MICHAEL GARTNER PRESIDENT OF N. B. C. NEWS
<NOISE> THE DEBATES WOULDN'T BE INTERRUPTED BY ADS

EIGHT MILLION BUCKS ISN'T SOMETHING YOU WANT TO KISS AWAY BUT YOU SWALLOW HARD AND DO WHAT YOU THINK IS RIGHT MR. GARTNER SAID
A FEDERAL JURY IN LOS ANGELES CONVICTED A FORMER MEXICAN POLICE OFFICER OF THE NINETEEN EIGHTY FIVE KIDNAP AND MURDER OF A U. S. DRUG AGENT AND A PILOT
RAUL LOPEZ ALVAREZ TWENTY NINE WAS THE FIRST OF THREE ALLEGED MEMBERS OF A MEXICAN DRUG RING TO BE CONVICTED IN THE CASE
SENTENCING WAS SCHEDULED FOR NEXT MONTH
WE LOVE THESE HORSES HE SAYS
WE HAVE A RECESSION BUT MANY PEOPLE ARE RICH
IF YOU HAVE A HOUSE AND PICTURES YOU WANT A HORSE AN ARABIAN HORSE
EXACTLY LIKE AMERICA
IF YOU DON'T HAVE AN ARABIAN HORSE YOU CANNOT MEET MR. ARMAND HAMMER
IF YOU HAVE AN ARABIAN HORSE HE IS YOUR FRIEND
WHEN THE HOUSE AND SENATE APPROVED THE TAX BILL EARLY SATURDAY LAWMAKERS DIDN'T MENTION THE LAST MINUTE PROVISIONS AND CONGRESSIONAL STAFFERS DESCRIBED THEM AS TECHNICAL
WHILE THE ESTIMATED REVENUE OF ALMOST ONE HUNDRED MILLION DOLLARS OVER THREE YEARS IS RELATIVELY SMALL THE PROVISIONS MIGHT BE PERCEIVED AS AN ANTI TAKEOVER PUSH BY CONGRESS
THEY COULD HAVE THE EFFECT OF SLOWING CERTAIN TAKEOVER ACTIVITY CONGRESSIONAL SOURCES ACKNOWLEDGED OVER THE WEEKEND
TO BE SURE ON A LOT OF SCORES THE SUMMIT WAS A SUCCESS
ECONOMIC COOPERATION WAS ADVANCED WITH BUSINESSMEN SIGNING AGREEMENTS FOR ABOUT THIRTY CONTRACTS AND SEVERAL JOINT VENTURES
HUMAN RIGHTS TOO MAY HAVE TAKEN A STEP FORWARD IF MR. GORBACHEV LIVES UP TO HIS PROMISE TO RELEASE ALL POLITICAL PRISONERS BY YEAR'S END
LAFARGE ALSO NAMED ROBERT W. MURDOCH FORTY FOUR PRESIDENT AND CHIEF OPERATING OFFICER
MR. FRANCOIS PREVIOUSLY HELD THE POST OF PRESIDENT THE POST OF CHIEF OPERATING OFFICER IS NEW
MR. MURDOCH HAD BEEN PRESIDENT OF CANADA CEMENT LAFARGE LAFARGE CORPORATION'S CANADIAN UNIT
THE NASDAQ O. T. C. COMPOSITE INDEX ROSE TWO POINT TWO SIX TO FOUR TWO NINE POINT ZERO ZERO
IN THE O. T. C. MARKET THERE WERE ONE THOUSAND TWO HUNDRED AND NINETY THREE ISSUES ADVANCING AND NINE HUNDRED AND EIGHTY NINE DECLINING
VOLUME ROSE TO ONE HUNDRED AND SEVENTY POINT FOUR MILLION SHARES FROM ONE HUNDRED AND FIFTY FIVE POINT SEVEN MILLION WEDNESDAY
THE AMERICAN STOCK EXCHANGE MARKET VALUE INDEX ROSE THREE POINT ONE SEVEN TO THREE *TWO* NINE POINT FOUR SEVEN
BOTH THE NASDAQ AND AMEX INDEXES SURPASSED RECORDS SET WEDNESDAY
U. S. BANK REGULATIONS ARE ANOTHER STUMBLING BLOCK
CURRENTLY BANKS CAN'T OWN MORE THAN NINETEEN POINT NINE PERCENT OF A NON FINANCIAL COMPANY AND CAN ONLY BE PASSIVE INVESTORS
UNLESS THESE RESTRICTIONS ARE DROPPED BANKS ARE LIKELY TO BE SWAPPING MAINLY FOR EQUITY IN FINANCIAL INSTITUTIONS
THOSE AREN'T ALWAYS APPEALING OR EVEN AVAILABLE
MEXICO NATIONALIZED ITS BANKS FIVE YEARS AGO
AND IN BRAZIL CENTRAL BANK FIGURES SHOW THAT ONE OUT OF EVERY SEVEN BANK LOANS IS PAST DUE EIGHT TIMES THE DELINQUENCY RATE OF A YEAR EARLIER
THE STOCK SPLIT WILL BE DISTRIBUTED ON OR ABOUT JULY SECOND TO HOLDERS OF RECORD ON JUNE TWENTY SIXTH
AFTER THE DIVIDEND THE COMPANY WILL HAVE ABOUT SEVEN POINT EIGHT MILLION SHARES OUTSTANDING
THE COMPANY SAID IT WILL DISCONTINUE PAYING THE PREVIOUS REGULAR QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND OF FIFTEEN CENTS A SHARE AFTER THE STOCK DIVIDEND IS PAID TO CONSERVE CASH FOR FUTURE ACQUISITIONS
THE CASH DIVIDEND LAST WAS PAID MAY FIFTEENTH
WITH LESS REGULATORY AND POLITICAL PRESSURE CONRAIL WAS ABLE TO ABANDON ABOUT FIVE THOUSAND MILES OF TRACK BETWEEN NINETEEN EIGHTY ONE AND NINETEEN EIGHTY SIX
ABOUT HALF OF THAT HAS BEEN TAKEN UP BY SHORT LINE RAILROADS NONUNION RAILROADS THAT HAVE CONTINUED TO PROVIDE THE SERVICE AT A LESSER COST
THEY BRING THE BUSINESS TO US AND WE HANDLE IT AS A TRUNK LINE
BURMAH A BRITISH OIL COMPANY AND S. H. V. A DUTCH ENERGY CONCERN SAID THEY WOULD PROCEED WITH THEIR OFFER ONLY IF CALOR ENDORSED THE BID
A SPOKESMAN FOR BURMAH SAID THAT THE PROPOSAL MADE YESTERDAY WAS FINAL AND THAT BURMAH AND S. H. V. WOULDN'T CONTEMPLATE A HOSTILE OFFER
HE ALSO RULED OUT THE POSSIBILITY THAT BURMAH MIGHT LAUNCH A BID ON ITS OWN
IVAN TOMS ISN'T IN A FESTIVE MOOD AS HE CONTEMPLATES HIS IMPENDING CONFRONTATION WITH THE MILITARY
I KNOW IT WILL BE HORRIFIC HE SAYS STARING DOWN AT HIS LUNCH BUT IT IS IMPORTANT TO TAKE THIS STAND
I THINK INDIVIDUALS CAN MAKE A DIFFERENCE
THE BUDGET HOWEVER WILL NOT MANAGE ITSELF
SOME WAY MUST BE FOUND TO PUT IT ON COURSE
IN OUR HISTORY AN IMPASSE OVER POLICY HAS BEEN BROKEN OCCASIONALLY BY SOME SORT OF NATIONAL COMMISSION AND IT IS TIME FOR ONE AGAIN
SUCH A COMMISSION RESOLVED THE SOCIAL SECURITY PROBLEM EARLIER IN THIS DECADE
IN THE JOHNSON YEARS A COMMISSION'S PROPOSALS WERE THE MEANS FOR RESTRUCTURING THE BUDGET
STILL EARLIER IT WAS A COMMISSION THAT RECOMMENDED THE CREATION OF THE FEDERAL RESERVE SYSTEM
THIS APPROACH ENABLES THE PRESIDENT AND MEMBERS OF CONGRESS TO AVOID SOME FLAK BY MERELY IMPLEMENTING WHAT THE COMMISSION TOLD US TO DO
THUS THE BOARD SAID IT WOULD BE RELUCTANT TO GIVE BANK OF NEW YORK MORE THAN ONE EXTENSION OF THE INITIAL NINETY DAYS TO CONSUMMATE THE MERGER
NORMALLY EXTENSIONS OF THE NINETY DAY RULE ARE GRANTED FREELY
BUT IN THE PENDING MERGER THE BOARD WANTS TO AVOID A LONG AND FRUITLESS STRUGGLE SAID MICHAEL BRADFIELD THE FED'S GENERAL COUNSEL
ONE OF THE MORE DIRECT READINGS ON INFLATION WILL COME IN FRIDAY'S REPORT ON CONSUMER PRICES WHICH ARE EXPECTED NOT SURPRISINGLY TO BE HIGHER
ANALYSTS EXPECT AN INCREASE OF ABOUT POINT FOUR PERCENT IN THE APRIL CONSUMER PRICE INDEX ON THE HEELS OF A POINT FIVE PERCENT JUMP THE PREVIOUS MONTH
THE PRICE INCREASES ARE EXPECTED PRETTY MUCH ACROSS THE BOARD AS COMMODITIES AND SERVICES ARE RISING AT ABOUT A FOUR PERCENT ANNUAL RATE
BUT THERE IS ALWAYS THE RISK THAT REVIVING A CLASSIC SLOGAN OR SPOKESMAN WILL BACKFIRE AND CREATE AN OLD FASHIONED IMAGE FOR A BRAND
TO GUARD AGAINST THAT MARKETERS TEND TO GIVE THEIR RECYCLED ADS A CONTEMPORARY TWIST
<NOISE> THE CAPTAIN RAID OF NINETEEN EIGHTY EIGHT FOR EXAMPLE HAS RIPPLING MUSCLES AND A FUTURISTIC LOOK
AND A WOMAN IN ONE OF THE NEW NESTEA SPOTS DOESN'T JUST TUMBLE <NOISE> INTO A SWIMMING POOL SHE FALLS ONTO AN EXERCISE MAT THAT TURNS INTO A POOL
<NOISE> PRICES AT THE MASS RETAIL LEVEL HOWEVER HAVEN'T RISEN MUCH IN A DECADE PARTLY BECAUSE BIG RETAILERS USE TENNIS BALLS TO LURE SHOPPERS
I REMEMBER PURCHASING A CAN OF BALLS FOR TWO DOLLARS IN NINETEEN SIXTY SEVEN SAYS WALTER L. HENRY A PITTSBURGH RECREATIONAL PLAYER
TWO WEEKS AGO I PICKED UP A CAN FOR A DOLLAR AND EIGHTY NINE
REACTING TO A WAVE OF LABOR UNREST THE COMMUNIST GOVERNMENT ANNOUNCED THE SPECIAL AUGUST THIRTY FIRST SESSION WOULD REVIEW ECONOMIC POLICIES AND PERHAPS ADJUST NATIONAL PRICE AND INCOME POLICIES
THE INTERIOR MINISTER SAID AT LEAST TWENTY STRIKES HAVE BROKEN OUT AND AUTHORITIES EXTENDED A CURFEW AND DETAINED FORTY NINE PEOPLE NATIONWIDE
SOME WORKERS ENDED STRIKES YESTERDAY BUT OTHERS PREPARED FOR ASSAULTS BY TROOPS AND RIOT POLICE
A SMALLER MARKET SHARE STILL MEANS SUBSTANTIAL GROWTH WHEN THE ASSET POOL IS VASTLY EXPANDED NOTES GEORGE COLLINS PRESIDENT OF T. ROWE PRICE
NONETHELESS THE FIRM HAS BEEN PAYING MORE ATTENTION TO THE CONSUMER ASPECTS OF THE BUSINESS
RETAIL CLIENTS CURRENTLY ACCOUNT FOR ABOUT FIFTY SEVEN PERCENT OF THE TOTAL TWENTY TWO BILLION OF ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT AT T. ROWE PRICE
IN NINETEEN SEVENTY EIGHT RETAIL BUSINESS ACCOUNTED FOR ABOUT THIRTY FIVE PERCENT OF THE FIRM'S ASSETS
ALREADY ARBITRAGERS ESTIMATE INDUSTRYWIDE LOSSES IN THE TAKEOVER STOCK SELL OFF THAT FOLLOWED THE BOESKY NEWS AT BETWEEN ONE BILLION DOLLARS AND TWO BILLION DOLLARS

OTHERS WATCHED GLUMLY AS THEIR ANNUAL BONUSES WITHERED ALONG WITH PRICES OF TAKEOVER STOCKS

THE GOLD MINES INDEX FELL THIRTEEN POINT TWO TO FOUR HUNDRED AND FIFTY FOUR POINT TWO

MANY BLUE CHIP ISSUES LOST AS MUCH AS TWO PERCENT WITH A FEW DROPPING AS MUCH AS FOUR PERCENT

INEVITABLY SOME WILL SEEK A FOURTH ALTERNATIVE TO CONTINUE BORROWING FROM THE REST OF THE WORLD MAKING ONLY MARGINAL ADJUSTMENTS IN OUR ECONOMIC POLICIES
EARLIER THIS CENTURY THE BRITISH TAUGHT US THAT DEBT AND LEADERSHIP CANNOT LONG CO EXIST
EVENTUALLY AND THE MARKETS SEEM TO BE SAYING SOONER RATHER THAN LATER WE WILL HAVE TO CHOOSE
WE SAW IT WITH OIL AND WE'RE SEEING IT WITH GOLD SAYS JOHN DESSAUER AN ORLEANS MASSACHUSETTS MONEY MANAGER
WHEN THE PRICE GETS HIGH ENOUGH ALL THESE NEW RESERVES OPEN UP EVENTUALLY KNOCKING DOWN PRICES HE SAYS
HE ADDS THAT HE EXPECTS GOLD WILL SOON RETREAT TO BELOW FOUR HUNDRED DOLLARS

AN UPJOHN SPOKESWOMAN SAID THE COMPANY PLANNED TO MARKET ROGAINE TO WOMEN ALL ALONG

BUT AS THE INTEREST RATES RISE IN CANADA THE CANADIAN DOLLAR IS GAINING ON ITS U. S. COUNTERPART TRADERS AND ANALYSTS SAY
AND AS THE CANADIAN UNIT RISES IT LURES MORE FROM FOREIGN INVESTMENT PARTICULARLY FROM JAPAN WHICH ADDS TO ITS STRENGTH
THE TREASURY RULES HOWEVER CONTAIN MODIFICATIONS OF THE S. E. C. RULES DESIGNED TO IMPROVE THE PROTECTION OF PARTIES INVOLVED IN REPURCHASE AGREEMENTS
IN SUCH AGREEMENTS CALLED REPOS ONE PARTY SELLS GOVERNMENT SECURITIES TO ANOTHER WITH THE UNDERSTANDING THAT THE SELLER WILL REPURCHASE THEM LATER AT A SPECIFIED PRICE
THE PROPOSED MODIFICATIONS WOULD APPLY TO GOVERNMENT SECURITIES BROKERS OR DEALERS THAT ARE ALREADY REGISTERED AS WELL AS TO NEWLY REGISTERED ENTITIES
NEVERTHELESS INTEREST RATES FELL ON SHORT TERM TREASURY BILLS SOLD YESTERDAY AT THE GOVERNMENT'S WEEKLY AUCTION
THE AVERAGE RATE ON NEW THIRTEEN WEEK BILLS DECLINED TO FIVE POINT FIVE NINE PERCENT FROM FIVE POINT EIGHT ONE PERCENT AT LAST WEEK'S SALE
THE AVERAGE RATE ON NEW TWENTY SIX WEEK BILLS FELL FROM FIVE POINT NINE NINE PERCENT TO SIX POINT ONE PERCENT THE PREVIOUS WEEK
WE ARE AWARE OF OUR INTERNATIONAL OBLIGATIONS AND WE WILLINGLY ACCEPT THEM THE BANKER OBSERVES
BUT THE BUNDESBANK HE ASSERTS HAS TO BE VERY CAUTIOUS IN SETTING ITS MONETARY POLICY
FROM OUR POINT OF VIEW WE ALREADY HAVE A PERMISSIVE POLICY HE SAYS
DOUG IS MUCH MORE AGGRESSIVE IN THE MARKETPLACE SAYS JAMES E. SORENSON BATTELLE'S SENIOR VICE PRESIDENT FOR MANUFACTURING
HE GETS OUT AND HAS ONE ON ONE MEETINGS WITH CHIEF EXECUTIVES OF COMPANIES AND LEARNS WHERE THE MARKET IS GOING
BATTELLE MUST ANTICIPATE COMMERCIAL DEMAND FIVE TO EIGHT YEARS AHEAD MR. SORENSON ADDS

THE ACURA INTEGRA JUMPED THREE POINT FIVE PERCENT OR THREE HUNDRED AND SEVENTY DOLLARS TO TEN THOUSAND NINE HUNDRED AND FIFTEEN DOLLARS

AND THE LEGEND COUPE ROSE TWO POINT FIVE PERCENT OR FIVE HUNDRED AND SEVENTY NINE DOLLARS TO TWENTY THREE THOUSAND SIX HUNDRED SEVENTY FIVE DOLLARS

HE ADDED THAT PAN AM NONETHELESS TURNED IN ONE OF THE BEST PERFORMANCES AMONG MAJOR CARRIERS
HE PREDICTED THE NEXT REPORT WILL SHOW A REBOUND FOR THE AIRLINE IN FEBRUARY
TO BE SURE A FEW COMPANIES ARE TRYING TO USE THE OLYMPICS TO MAKE THE TRANSITION FROM A SUBCONTRACTOR TO AN INTERNATIONALLY KNOWN BRAND

IT PAID FOUR POINT FIVE MILLION DOLLARS IN CASH AND GOODS TO BE AN OFFICIAL SPONSOR OF THE GAMES AND HAS BEEN HIGHLIGHTING THE LOGO IN ITS ADVERTISING
KUKJE HOPES THE OLYMPICS WILL GIVE PRO SPECS A FOOTHOLD IN EUROPE
VIEWERS AND CRITICS SAY THE HUGE LOAD OF ADS AND AIRTIME IS PART OF THE PROBLEM
COMMERCIAL CLUTTER SEEMS GREATER THAN IN PREVIOUS OLYMPICS BROADCASTS MANY CRITICS SAY
THE COVERAGE BETWEEN ADS SOME COMPLAIN IS FRAGMENTED AND SHIFTY JUMPING TOO QUICKLY AMONG MYRIAD SPORTS
ACTUAL EVENTS AS OPPOSED TO TAPED PROFILES PREVIEWS AND REPORTS TAKE UP LESS THAN HALF OF THE AIRTIME
MANY HEADLINE EVENTS DON'T APPEAR UNTIL AFTER MIDNIGHT
THE STUDY WAS PART OF CORNELL'S RESPONSE TO CALLS BY LOCAL POLITICIANS THAT IT SHOULD HELP MORE IN TOMPKINS COUNTY

IN PER STUDENT PAYMENTS CORNELL RANKED SEVENTH AT SEVENTY DOLLARS

ANOTHER TWENTY FIVE PERCENT IS HELD UNDER THE COMPANY'S EMPLOYEE STOCK OWNERSHIP PLAN
MOST OF THE PEOPLE IN THE FORMER CATEGORY ARE EXPECTED TO EXTEND THE NO SELL AGREEMENT FOR ANOTHER YEAR HE SAID

IN APRIL DREXEL AGREED TO PAY SIX HUNDRED AND FIFTY MILLION DOLLARS AND PLEAD GUILTY TO SIX FELONY COUNTS RELATED TO A FEDERAL INSIDER TRADING INVESTIGATION
THE PLEA AGREEMENT WAS MADE IN CONJUNCTION WITH A BROAD SETTLEMENT OF SECURITIES LAW VIOLATIONS WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION
BECAUSE THE FIRM AGREED THAT IT COMMITTED FELONIES SECURITIES COMMISSIONERS IN MOST STATES CAN AUTOMATICALLY REVOKE DREXEL'S LICENSE TO DO BUSINESS
WHY THIS INCREDIBLE DIVERSION OF EFFORT TO CRIMES THAT ARE OFTEN NOT CLEARLY DEFINED BY STATUTE AND WHERE IDENTIFIABLE VICTIMS ARE SELDOM FOUND
MAYBE TOO MANY OF TODAY'S PROSECUTORS WERE INFLUENCED BY THE PREVAILING COUNTERCULTURE SUSPICIONS OF MIDDLE CLASS MORALITY DURING THEIR LAW SCHOOL DAYS
BUT ANOTHER ANSWER IS SIMPLER IT IS EASIER TO EXTRACT PLEA BARGAINS FROM TRADERS WITH A MERE MENTION OF R. I. C. O. THAN FROM REAL FELONS
AS A LONGTIME MEMBER OF THE ANAHEIM CALIFORNIA
REDEVELOPMENT COMMISSION THE RETIRED FOOD COMPANY EXECUTIVE TOOK PRIDE IN HELPING HIS CITY GROW
BUT HE ALSO LOVED THE FREE SILVER PASS THAT DISNEYLAND GAVE HIM EVERY YEAR AS ONE OF NEARLY ONE THOUSAND LOCAL NOTABLES SO HONORED
DESPITE ALL THE UNCERTAINTY THAT SURROUNDED BRITISH PETROLEUM'S JUMBO OFFERING THERE WASN'T THAT MUCH TURMOIL IN THE MARKET WHEN THE SHARES BEGAN TO TRADE FRIDAY
B. P.'S PARTIALLY PAID AMERICAN DEPOSITARY SHARES CLOSED UNCHANGED AT SEVENTEEN AND A QUARTER WITH THIRTEEN POINT TWO MILLION TRADED
IT WAS THE BIG BOARD'S MOST ACTIVE ISSUE
DURING THE PAST SEVERAL DAYS CORPORATIONS AND OTHER BIG INVESTORS HAVE REFRAINED FROM LENDING TREASURY BONDS AND NOTES TO SECURITIES DEALERS FOR BRIEF PERIODS
THAT IN TURN HAS FORCED MANY DEALERS TO REFRAIN FROM SELLING BORROWED SECURITIES OR AMASSING SO CALLED SHORT POSITIONS
IT'S HARD TO SHORT ANYTHING IN THIS MARKET AT THE MOMENT SAID A TRADER AT A LARGE GOVERNMENT SECURITIES DEALER
MOST ANALYSTS SAID THE INTERNATIONAL OPERATIONS OF THE TWO BANKS MAKE A GOOD FIT
GENERALE DE BANQUE HAS A STRONG NETWORK IN AFRICA WHILE AMRO HAS MORE OPERATIONS IN THE MIDDLE EAST AND FAR EAST
AND WHILE GENERALE DE BANQUE HAS AN IMPORTANT COMMERCIAL BANKING OPERATION AMRO HAS MORE EXPERIENCE IN BROKERAGE AND INVESTMENT SERVICES FOR ITS CLIENTS
THINGS ARE A BIT DULLER THIS YEAR
MR. BILZERIAN HAS SENT HIS BOY TO A LITTLE LEAGUE TEAM IN FARAWAY MINNESOTA WHERE THE FAMILY SPENDS ITS SUMMER AND ISN'T COACHING A TEAM THIS YEAR
ALL THE ACTION APPARENTLY WILL BE IN THE COURTROOM
IT'S A SITUATION WHERE WE ARE LEARNING OUR WAY WITH THE ALLANTE THE SPOKESMAN SAID
THE CAR IS DOING THE THINGS THAT WE WANT IT TO DO FOR US AS FAR AS GETTING VISIBILITY FOR THE DIVISION AND BEING AN IMAGE CAR
SINCE IT'S BEEN A NEW ENTITY FOR CADILLAC AND OUR DEALERS WE WEREN'T QUITE SURE WHAT THE ACTUAL SALES VOLUME WOULD BE
CAYTON WHO AT AGE SEVENTY HAS BEEN AROUND A BIT LONGER ISN'T QUITE SO SURE
ALL I CAN SAY IS THAT I HOPE MIKE'S MIND IS STRAIGHT HE SAYS
I ALSO HOPE THAT SOMEONE SOMEWHERE GIVES HIM SOME GOOD ADVICE BEFORE HE DOES SOMETHING VERY UNWISE
MR. VIET HAS BIGGER WORRIES
APART FROM UNCOOPERATIVE TARGETS THE PAPER AND ITS THIRTY TWO JOURNALISTS FACE A CHALLENGE TO BECOME MORE PROFESSIONAL HE SAYS
CRITICIZING SHORTCOMINGS ISN'T ENOUGH
WE HAVE TO RECOGNIZE ACHIEVEMENTS
WE HAVE TO DEVELOP JUDGMENT AND THAT ISN'T EASY
MR. CHATICHAI'S WEALTHY FAMILY BACKGROUND AND HIS FAMILY'S LARGE PROPERTY INTERESTS GIVE HIM A GOOD UNDERSTANDING OF THE BUSINESS COMMUNITY
FURTHER HE HAS GOOD RELATIONS WITH THE LARGE ETHNIC CHINESE COMMUNITY AND SERVES AS CHAIRMAN OF THE THAI CHINESE FRIENDSHIP ASSOCIATION
THAT'S IMPORTANT FOR THE COUNTRY'S BUSINESS ELITE MANY OF WHOM ARE ETHNIC CHINESE
AND IT DOESN'T APPEAR THAT CABLE OWNERS WILL RESIST THE CHANGE
A SPOKESMAN FOR THE NATIONAL CABLE TELEVISION ASSOCIATION SAID WE DON'T OPPOSE THE PROPOSAL IN PRINCIPLE
WE TAKE THE POSITION THAT THE MORE PEOPLE IN THE CABLE MARKET THE BETTER
NEW YORK CITY'S BOARD OF EDUCATION WOULD DISAGREE
MY HIGH SCHOOL'S ADMINISTRATION WOULD TOO
ALSO MY UNION THE UNITED FEDERATION OF TEACHERS AND EVERY REPUBLICAN AND DEMOCRAT WHO HAS EVER RUN FOR PUBLIC OFFICE ANYWHERE
AND MOST VEHEMENTLY OF ALL THE LEAGUE OF WOMEN VOTERS
BENETTON DENIES ALL CHARGES ON THE SPECIFIC ACCUSATIONS BY UNHAPPY STORE OWNERS AND STEADFASTLY MAINTAINS THAT IT ISN'T A FRANCHISE OPERATION AND THUS ISN'T SUBJECT TO FRANCHISE REQUIREMENTS
STORE OWNERS IT SAYS ARE LICENSEES BECAUSE THEY OWN THEIR STORES AND DON'T PAY ROYALTIES TO BENETTON AS FRANCHISEES TYPICALLY DO
ALTHOUGH IT ACKNOWLEDGES THAT A FEW STORE OWNERS HAVE COMPLAINED IT BLAMES ANY PROBLEMS ON THE OWNERS THEMSELVES OR ON ITS FIELD REPRESENTATIVES WHO DEAL DIRECTLY WITH THEM
DESPITE THE PROBLEM WITH THE CLARIDGE MR. WYNN DIDN'T RULE OUT AN EVENTUAL RETURN TO THE ATLANTIC CITY GAMBLING SCENE
IT'S DISAPPOINTING HE SAID OF THE FAILED PROPOSAL
BUT THIS IS A LIVELY MARKET AND WE HAVEN'T GIVEN UP YET
THE MARKET FOR HOME GEAR IS GROWING AS SPENDING SHIFTS FROM APPAREL TO THE HOME SAYS KURT BARNARD OF THE RETAIL MARKETING REPORT NEW YORK
HE SAYS SALES AT HOME RELATED STORES ARE GROWING NINETY ONE PERCENT FASTER THAN AT DEPARTMENT STORES AND SEVENTY FIVE PERCENT FASTER THAN AT APPAREL STORES
THE TREND IS MAKING THE MARKET LESS DEPENDENT ON HOUSING MARKET CYCLES SAYS CURT STEIDTMANN CHIEF ECONOMIST OF MANAGEMENT HORIZONS DUBLIN OHIO
WHILE SECOND QUARTER HOUSING STARTS WERE DOWN THIRTY PERCENT FROM TWO YEARS AGO FURNITURE SALES WERE UP EIGHTEEN PERCENT HE SAYS
THESE MIXED FEELINGS OF FRUSTRATION WITH AND GRATITUDE TOWARD THE AUTHORITIES ARE PART OF THE EVERYDAY LIFE OF A FOREIGNER DOING BUSINESS IN KOREA
IN FACT SUCH CONTRADICTIONS ARE WHAT SEEM TO MAKE THE KOREAN WORLD GO ROUND
A WESTERN BUSINESSMAN NEEDS TO BE READY FOR THEM
HERE ARE A FEW HARD LEARNED FACTS OF KOREAN BUSINESS LIFE
MR. GRANT WAS TRAVELING AND UNAVAILABLE FOR COMMENT
<NOISE> OTHER OFFICIALS OF GRANT BROADCASTING AREN'T AUTHORIZED TO COMMENT ON ANY ASPECTS OF THE CASE AIDES TO MR. GRANT SAID
<NOISE> THE COMPANY'S BANKRUPTCY CASE LAWYER IN PHILADELPHIA WASN'T AVAILABLE FOR COMMENT
MR. SHLENKER COULDN'T BE REACHED
BECAUSE OF THAT SOME WALL STREET PROFESSIONALS THINK THE STOCK LOOKS RATHER EXPENSIVE
IT HAS TRIPLED SINCE NINETEEN EIGHTY FIVE LARGELY ON TAKEOVER SPECULATION
IT CURRENTLY TRADES AT ABOUT NINE TIMES CASH FLOW SAYS ALAN GAINES OF GAINES BERLAND AN INSTITUTIONAL BROKERAGE FIRM
THAT'S ABOUT A THIRTY PERCENT PREMIUM TO QUALITY OIL COMPANIES LIKE ROYAL DUTCH PETROLEUM EXXON AND MOBIL HE SAYS
<NOISE> TO THESE ENDS K. P. C. ENJOYS A HUGE ECONOMIC ADVANTAGE
IT COSTS KUWAIT ABOUT A DOLLAR TO PUMP A BARREL OF OIL AND ANOTHER FIFTY CENTS TO BRING IT TO EUROPE
THE PRODUCTION COST OF NORTH SEA OIL BY CONTRAST RUNS BETWEEN EIGHT DOLLARS AND THIRTEEN DOLLARS A BARREL
THE BIG DIFFERENCE DISTURBS EUROPEAN OIL MEN
<NOISE> THE QUESTION WAS WHAT FORM THIS CONFLICT WOULD TAKE
THE CIVIL WAR WAS FINALLY FOUGHT OVER MAINTAINING THE UNION
BUT WHAT IF THERE HAD BEEN NO UNION
WHAT IF THE SOUTH HAD BEEN A SEPARATE NATION
WOULD SOUTHERNERS BLACK OR WHITE HAVE EVER ACHIEVED FULL EQUALITY IF THEY HAD BEEN INCORPORATED INTO THE UNION AS A CONQUERED PROVINCE
OR WHAT IF THE WAR HAD BEEN AVOIDED AND SLAVERY JUST DRIFTED ON AND ON
WOULD THE SOUTH HAVE BECOME ANOTHER SOUTH AFRICA
I WOULDN'T BET AGAINST IT <NOISE>
IT STILL ISN'T CLEAR WHAT FORM THE INCREASES WILL TAKE OR WHEN THEY WILL GO INTO EFFECT
SOME CARRIERS SAID THEY PLAN TO RAISE FARES SUNDAY AND OTHERS SAID THEY WILL ACT A WEEK LATER
SOME AIRLINES ALSO SAID THE INCREASES WON'T AFFECT THEIR LOWEST DISCOUNT FARES

THE NINETEEN SEVENTY TWO A. B. M. TREATY REQUIRES A REVIEW EVERY FIVE YEARS
COMMUNIQUES ANNOUNCING COMPLETION OF THE FIRST AND SECOND REVIEWS WERE ISSUED ON NOVEMBER FOUR NINETEEN SEVENTY SEVEN AND NOVEMBER NINE NINETEEN EIGHTY TWO
THE THIRD REVIEW WAS DUE BY OCTOBER THREE NINETEEN EIGHTY SEVEN
THE MOST OPTIMISTIC ESTIMATES ARE NOW THAT IT WILL START SOMETIME AFTER THE FIRST OF THE YEAR
THE REAGAN ADMINISTRATION IN SHORT IS CONSPIRING WITH THE SOVIETS TO VIOLATE THE REVIEW PROVISIONS OF THE TREATY

FOR EXAMPLE F. M. C. CORP.'S BRADLEY FIGHTING VEHICLE DEPENDS ON A SOPHISTICATED SENSOR SYSTEM FROM THE NETHERLANDS TO INFORM SOLDIERS OF POTENTIAL THREATS AND TARGETS
WITHOUT THIS PART TUCKED INTO THE TURRET OF THE ARMORED VEHICLE THE BRADLEY WOULD BE COMPARATIVELY HELPLESS ON THE BATTLEFIELD

THAT MOVE IS BEHIND CHRYSLER'S RECENT DECISIONS TO INCREASE PRODUCTION WHICH IN TURN WILL BOOST PROFIT FOR THE REST OF THE YEAR

THIS WOULD GUARANTEE THAT THE UTILITY WON'T HAVE TO PAY ANY FEDERAL TAXES FOR AT LEAST A DECADE

THE DIET IS A ONE HOUSE LEGISLATURE APPORTIONED BY DISTRICT RATHER THAN POPULATION LIKE THE SENATE AS OPPOSED TO THE HOUSE
THIS MEANS THAT JAPANESE FARMERS HAVE TREMENDOUS CONTROL OVER JAPANESE POLITICS
FOOD PRICES IN JAPAN TAKE FORTY PERCENT OR MORE OF THE AVERAGE PERSON'S WAGE
WITH HOUSING TAKING ANOTHER FORTY PERCENT AND THE FACT THAT THE JAPANESE ARE GREAT SAVERS THEY ARE LEFT WITH ALMOST NO DISCRETIONARY INCOME
THIS IS WHY THEY CANNOT DEVELOP A DOMESTIC MARKET
THEY DON'T HAVE MONEY TO SPEND EXCEPT A SMALL AMOUNT OF SAVINGS THAT THEY SPEND ONLY ON SPECIAL OCCASIONS OR FOR UNUSUAL BARGAINS

CRITICS OF INDEXING CHARGE THAT THE APPROACH LACKS IMAGINATION AND AMOUNTS TO SETTLING FOR MEDIOCRITY

GENERALLY THERE'S NO LIMIT ON HOW MUCH OF THEIR FUNDS EMPLOYEES CAN BORROW IF THEIR ACCOUNTS TOTAL TEN THOUSAND DOLLARS OR LESS
FOR LARGER ACCOUNTS EMPLOYEES ARE RESTRICTED TO BORROWING HALF THE TOTAL BUT NO MORE THAN FIFTY THOUSAND DOLLARS
<NOISE> LOANS MUST BE REPAID WITHIN FIVE YEARS UNLESS THE MONEY GOES TOWARD BUYING A PRINCIPAL RESIDENCE IN WHICH CASE LONGER REPAYMENT TERMS CAN BE ARRANGED
BORROWED FUNDS AREN'T TAXED
BUT A WITHDRAWAL IS TREATED AS TAXABLE INCOME AND IS SUBJECT TO AN ADDITIONAL TEN PERCENT PENALTY TAX

WHY SHOULD FOREIGN IMPORTS BE A BETTER MEASURE OF U. S. EXPORTS
AND WHY ARE THE EXPORT DATA SO BAD
IMPORT DATA ARE DIRECTLY COLLECTED BY A SINGLE GOVERNMENT AGENCY THEY PROVIDE REVENUE FROM TARIFFS AND THEY PROVIDE POLITICALLY IMPORTANT MEASURES OF GOODS SUBJECT TO QUOTAS
THESE ASPECTS OF IMPORT ACCOUNTING ENCOURAGE GOVERNMENT AGENTS TO AMASS ACCURATE IMPORT DATA
CONVERSELY FOR EXPORTS SELF INTEREST INDUCES UNDERREPORTING
THERE IS NO SHORTAGE OF EXAMPLES

TO MAKE THEM DIRECTLY COMPARABLE EACH INDEX IS BASED ON THE CLOSE OF NINETEEN SIXTY NINE EQUALING ONE HUNDRED
THE PERCENTAGE CHANGE IS SINCE YEAR END
BUT THE NEW LAW ALSO CONTAINS NEGATIVES FOR THE MUNICIPAL BONDS
FOR PEOPLE WHO MUST PAY THE ALTERNATIVE MINIMUM TAX THE PRIVATE PURPOSE VARIETY IS NOW SUBJECT TO TAX
AND THE LOWERING OF THE TAX BRACKETS MEANS THAT THE SHELTER FEATURE IS LESS CRUCIAL THAN IT ONCE WAS
IN BOTH THE HUNGARIAN AND SUEZ CRISIS THE UNITED STATES PROCEEDED IN ACCORD WITH THE RULE OF AVOIDING DIRECT CONFRONTATION WITH THE SOVIET UNION
IN THE HUNGARIAN AFFAIR THIS MEANT DOING NOTHING EXCEPT TALKING BECAUSE TAKING ANY PRACTICAL STEP WOULD AT ONCE HAVE MEANT A CONFRONTATION
IN THE SUEZ AFFAIR THE AVOIDANCE OF CONFRONTATION WENT ALL THE WAY TO COLLABORATION
BY CONTRAST THE INDUSTRIAL COMMUNIST NATIONS HAVE FERTILITY MODESTLY ABOVE REPLACEMENT
THIRD WORLD COUNTRIES HAVE A T. F. R. OF FOUR POINT ONE
THE U. S. HAD A T. R. F. OF THREE POINT EIGHT IN NINETEEN FIFTY SEVEN AT THE PEAK OF THE BABY BOOM

A DREXEL SPOKESMAN SAID HE EXPECTS THE FINANCING TO COME THROUGH A COMBINATION OF BANK LOANS AND HIGH YIELD BONDS
DREXEL FINANCED THE KOHLBERG KRAVIS BUY OUT OF BEATRICE LAST YEAR
I. R. E. HAS DOWNSIZED ITS REAL ESTATE SYNDICATION BUSINESS AND IS PRIMARILY A SAVINGS AND LOAN HOLDING COMPANY MR. LEVAN SAID
EARNINGS IN THE PAST WERE SOMEWHAT ERRATIC QUARTER TO QUARTER BECAUSE THE MAJOR BUSINESS WAS REAL ESTATE SYNDICATION
NOW THE S. AND L. HOLDING COMPANY IS THE MAIN BUSINESS WITH DOWN SIZED REAL ESTATE SYNDICATION
CORE EARNINGS ARE VERY CONSISTENT
ANOTHER OPTION WOULD BE GOING PRIVATE IN A LEVERAGED BUY OUT
BUT ANALYSTS SAID MANAGEMENT WOULDN'T PREFER SUCH A PLAN BECAUSE IT WOULD MEAN CURTAILING THE COMPANY'S AMBITIOUS STORE EXPANSION PROGRAM
IN A LEVERAGED BUY OUT A SMALL GROUP OF INVESTORS ACQUIRES A COMPANY IN A TRANSACTION FINANCED LARGELY WITH BORROWING
ULTIMATELY THE DEBT IS PAID WITH FUNDS GENERATED BY THE ACQUIRED COMPANY'S OPERATIONS OR THE SALE OF ITS ASSETS
PEOPLE HE POINTS OUT COME TO HIM NOW
THEY KNOW JESSE CAN DELIVER
THE BOTTOM LINE IS BECOMING IF YOU WANT SOMEBODY TO COMMUNICATE WITH YOUR CHILDREN GET JESSE
IF YOU WANT SOMEONE TO STAND WITH YOU AT A FARM AUCTION OR STAND WITH YOU AT A CLOSED FACTORY GATE GET JESSE
IT'S A REPUTATION WITH A GROWING CREDIBILITY TO IT
A SPOKESMAN FOR CRAY DESCRIBED THE M. I. T. DECISION AS GOOD NEWS
ASSUMING THE BIDDING DOES OPEN UP AGAIN IT MEANS THERE'S ROOM FOR TECHNICAL CONSIDERATIONS AND NOT CONSIDERATIONS BASED PURELY ON PRICE
THE SPOKESMAN SAID IT WOULD HAVE BEEN IMPOSSIBLE FOR CRAY TO INSTALL AND OPERATE A COMPLETE SUPERCOMPUTER SYSTEM AT THE PRICES M. I. T. WANTED TO PAY
BUT WHILE NICKEL AND ESPECIALLY COPPER QUOTES HAVE SINCE REBOUNDED ALUMINUM PRICES HAVE CONTINUED TO TUMBLE
IT SEEMS TO BE IN PEOPLE'S INTEREST TO KEEP THE PRICE DOWN RIGHT NOW SAYS ONE LONDON EXCHANGE TRADER
THIS WILL ULTIMATELY GIVE THEM MORE BUYING OPPORTUNITIES DOWN THE LINE
PRICES ON THE UPSCALE ACURA DIVISION'S BASE MODEL CARS JUMPED EVEN HIGHER THAN THE HONDA DIVISION'S PRICES
THE ACURA INTEGRA JUMPED THREE POINT FIVE PERCENT OR THREE HUNDRED AND SEVENTY DOLLARS TO TEN THOUSAND NINE HUNDRED AND FIFTEEN DOLLARS
THE LUXURY LEGEND SEDAN INCREASED IN PRICE TWO POINT FIVE PERCENT OR FIVE HUNDRED AND TWENTY FIVE DOLLARS TO TWENTY THREE THOUSAND SIX HUNDRED AND SEVENTY FIVE DOLLARS
AND THE LEGEND COUPE ROSE TWO POINT FIVE PERCENT OR FIVE HUNDRED AND SEVENTY NINE DOLLARS TO TWENTY THREE THOUSAND SIX HUNDRED AND SEVENTY FIVE DOLLARS
MR. PERONI AGREED THAT THE U. S. CURRENCY IS A POSITIVE FACTOR FOR STOCK PRICES
THE BETTER BEHAVIOR OF THE DOLLAR IS A BIG INCENTIVE FOR FOREIGN AND DOMESTIC INSTITUTIONS TO STICK BOTH FEET IN THE WATER HE SAID
HE PREDICTED THAT THE DOW JONES INDUSTRIALS COULD BE AS HIGH AS THE UPPER TWENTY TWO HUNDREDS BY THE END OF THE SUMMER

NOT LONG AGO TENNECO WAS CONSIDERED AN UNLIKELY RESTRUCTURING CANDIDATE
ITS HEAVY DEBTS AND DEPRESSED ENERGY AND FARM EQUIPMENT BUSINESSES MADE IT APPEAR IMMUNE TO RAIDERS
BUT THE COMPANY'S IMPROVING BUSINESS PROSPECTS AND ASSET VALUES HAVE CHANGED THAT

OF THE THREE HUNDRED AND FIFTY WHO RECEIVED THE PLACEBO FIVE POINT SEVEN PERCENT DIED

FOR HUNDREDS OF YEARS THE KURDS HAVE STRUGGLED TO ESTABLISH AN INDEPENDENT KURDISTAN IN A TERRITORY THAT STRADDLES PARTS OF TURKEY IRAQ AND IRAN
LIKE THE PALESTINIANS THE WORLD'S TWENTY MILLION KURDS SHARE A RELIGION A CULTURE A LANGUAGE AND A PASSION FOR AUTONOMY
NEARLY HALF LIVE IN TURKEY WHICH REFUSES EVEN TO RECOGNIZE THEM AS A DISTINCT NATIONAL MINORITY AND REFERS TO THEM ONLY AS MOUNTAIN TURKS
THOUGH THE KURDS OUTNUMBER THE PALESTINIANS BY A RATIO OF FIVE TO ONE THE KURDISH CAUSE HAS ATTRACTED LITTLE GLOBAL ATTENTION
THE RESULTS HAVE BEEN IMPRESSIVE
ANNUAL GROWTH OVER THE PAST THREE YEARS HAS BEEN MORE THAN FIVE PERCENT AND GROWTH IS EXPECTED TO EXCEED SIX PERCENT THIS YEAR

FEDERAL OFFICES WILL BE CLOSED AND THERE WON'T BE ANY REGULAR MAIL DELIVERIES
MANY STATE AND LOCAL GOVERNMENT OFFICES ALSO WILL BE CLOSED

ITS SAFETY DIRECTOR ALSO SPENT SEVERAL MONTHS VISITING DEALERS AND PROMOTING THE DEVICE

U. S. BANKS IN JAPAN CURRENTLY CAN TRADE IN SOME SECURITIES BUT ARE BASICALLY CONFINED TO DEALING WITH THE HUNDRED AND TWENTY LARGEST JAPANESE FINANCIAL INSTITUTIONS
THEY CAN'T DEAL WITH EARLIER RETAIL CUSTOMERS OR CORPORATIONS
THEY CAN UNDERWRITE JAPANESE GOVERNMENT BONDS BUT THE SHARE OF SUCH BUSINESS REMAINS VERY SMALL
THOUGH THERE ISN'T A CURE FOR AIDS PROPONENTS ARGUE THAT THOSE WHO TEST POSITIVE CAN BE OFFERED TREATMENTS TO PROLONG THEIR LIVES
FOR INSTANCE THEY CAN TAKE MEDICATION TO PREVENT CATCHING THE KIND OF PNEUMONIA THAT MOST COMMONLY LEADS TO THE DEATH OF AIDS SUFFERERS
AND THOSE WHO HAVE NOT YET DEVELOPED AIDS CAN TAKE STEPS TO GUARD AGAINST OTHER DISEASES SUCH AS HERPES AND HEPATITIS THAT ARE BELIEVED TO ACCELERATE ITS ONSET

NO LEVEL OF TECHNICAL SAFEGUARDS CAN MAKE A NUCLEAR FACILITY SAFE UNLESS IT HAS GOOD MANAGEMENT THE N. C. R. TOLD CONGRESS LAST YEAR
INDEED THE AGENCY RECENTLY HAS BEGUN TO CLOSE PLANTS BECAUSE OF MANAGEMENT NOT JUST MECHANICAL SHORTCOMINGS
IN APRIL FOR INSTANCE THE AGENCY ORDERED PHILADELPHIA ELECTRIC COMPANY TO TURN OFF ITS PEACH BOTTOM PLANT AFTER INSPECTORS FOUND OPERATORS ASLEEP AT THE CONTROLS

THE HIGH INTEREST RATES PRODUCED BY MR. VOLCKER'S TIGHT MONEY IN FACT HELPED START THE PROBLEM ON ITS WAY TO A CRISIS
THE DEBT SITUATION AND WHAT HIGH INTEREST RATES AND A U. S. RECESSION MIGHT DO TO IT HAS TO BE MUCH IN MR. GREENSPAN'S MIND
MR. HEFTER OF JEFFERIES SAYS INVESTORS ARE BASICALLY PICKING SOME STOCKS IN WHICH THEY HAVE SITUATIONS GOING THAT THEY HAVE A DEFINITE IDEA ABOUT
BUT IN GENERAL THE WAIT AND SEE ATTITUDE IS STILL VERY PREVALENT OUT THERE
THERE IS NO REAL PRESSURE TO JUMP INTO THE MARKET RIGHT NOW <NOISE>
THE POTENTIAL REWARD IS SIMPLY NOT WORTH THE RISK AN A. M. GENERAL SPOKESMAN SAID
IF YOU DID A CASH FLOW CHART IT LOOKED AWFUL UNTIL WAY OUT IN THE FUTURE
UNACCEPTABLY AWFUL
THEN THERE IS THE DECEMBER PRESIDENTIAL ELECTION
THE FAVORITE CARLOS ANDRES PEREZ NATIONALIZED THE COUNTRY'S MINERAL RESOURCES WHEN LAST IN OFFICE IN NINETEEN SEVENTY FIVE
THAT DOESN'T INSPIRE CONFIDENCE
NOR DOES THAT MASS OF SMALL DIGGERS
AMSTRAD IS THE LARGEST EUROPEAN SUPPLIER OF HOME COMPUTERS AND A MAJOR VENDOR OF BUSINESS PERSONAL COMPUTERS
IT JOINS MANY PERSONAL COMPUTER MAKERS WORLD WIDE <NOISE> REPORTING DIFFICULTIES FROM CHIP SHORTAGES
FOR SEVERAL MONTHS MUCH OF THE WORLD'S SUPPLY OF D. R. A. M. CHIPS HAS BEEN PINCHED PARTLY BY A SEMICONDUCTOR TRADE PACT
EDUCATION IS THE OPPORTUNITY THROUGH STUDYING A VARIETY OF SUBJECTS TO GAIN INFORMATION AND THE DEXTERITY TO USE YOUR WITS AND YOUR EXPRESSION
EDUCATION PREPARES YOU TO BE SOMEONE MORE THAN TO DO SOMETHING
EDUCATION IS WHAT PREPARES YOU TO HEAR MORE WHEN YOU LISTEN TO REACH DEEPER WHEN YOU THINK TO SAY MORE WHEN YOU SPEAK
THE APPARENT INCONSISTENCY IS JUSTIFIED MAINTAINED ROBERT BURGER CHEVROLET GENERAL MANAGER GIVEN THE GROWING DIFFICULTY IN LAUNCHING MODELS IN AN INCREASINGLY COMPETITIVE FIELD
IN ESTABLISHING PRODUCTS WITH CONSUMERS HE SAID IT'S EASIER TO FOCUS AD DOLLARS AND MARKETING EFFORTS IF THERE'S ONLY ONE NAME TO PROMOTE
CHEVROLET IS USING THE SAME APPROACH WITH ITS GEO LINE OF IMPORT CARS THAT DEBUTS THIS FALL
THE RICHMOND VIRGINIA MEDIA CONCERN SAID SALES AND PROFIT FROM ITS NEWSPRINT OPERATIONS WERE AHEAD OF YEAR EARLIER LEVELS
ITS CABLE SYSTEM CONTINUED TO GAIN SUBSCRIBERS NOW TOTALING MORE THAN ONE HUNDRED AND FIFTY SEVEN THOUSAND
REVENUE PER SUBSCRIBER IS EXCEEDING FORECASTS MEDIA GENERAL SAID ADDING THAT IT PLANS TO INCREASE RATES AN AVERAGE OF EIGHT PERCENT BEGINNING IN JANUARY
THIS AGREEMENT'S IMPACT IN THE U. S. MAY BE QUITE LIMITED
MANY U. S. FOOD COMPANIES ALREADY HAVE REMOVED TROPICAL OILS FROM THEIR PRODUCTS UNDER PRESSURE FROM CONSUMERS AND HEALTH ORGANIZATIONS
THEY AREN'T LIKELY TO PUT THE OILS BACK IN AND RISK LOSING SALES
CHARLES ALLMON EDITOR AND PUBLISHER OF GROWTH STOCK OUTLOOK IS ANOTHER BEAR WHO DOESN'T HEDGE HIS BEARISHNESS
THIS MARKET IS DISCONNECTED FROM REALITY HE CONTENDS
IT'S A SPECULATORS' MARKET NOT AN INVESTORS' MARKET AND SOONER OR LATER IT'S GOING TO COME TO AN IGNOMINIOUS END
MR. ALLMON WONDERS AT THE WIDESPREAD OPTIMISM IN THE FACE OF HIGHER OIL PRICES AND A BURGEONING MONEY SUPPLY WHICH HE SEES AS CERTAIN PRECURSORS OF INFLATION
CONTINENTAL'S SPOKESMAN CONCEDED THE AIRLINE WAS SLOW IN SOME REFUNDS <NOISE> BUT HE SAID THE PROBLEM STEMMED FROM ITS MERGER WITH PEOPLE EXPRESS EARLIER THIS YEAR
THAT CARRIER HAD MORE THAN TWENTY FIVE THOUSAND TICKETS THAT NEEDED TO BE REFUNDED WHEN ITS OPERATIONS WERE JOINED WITH CONTINENTAL'S THE SPOKESMAN SAID
HE INSISTED THAT MOST OF THE REFUNDS WERE COMPLETED
THE THIRTY EIGHT YEAR OLD DOCTRINE A CREATION OF THE F. C. C. REQUIRES BROADCASTERS AIRING CONTROVERSIAL MATERIAL TO GIVE OPPONENTS FREE AIR TIME TO RESPOND
SUPPORTERS OF THE DOCTRINE SAY IT ENSURES THAT MINORITY VIEWPOINTS RECEIVE A HEARING ON TELEVISION AND RADIO
BUT DETRACTORS SAY THE REQUIREMENT VIOLATES THE FIRST AMENDMENT RIGHTS OF BROADCASTERS AND INHIBITS THEM FROM RUNNING PROVOCATIVE PROGRAMS
THIRD QUARTER SALES TRAILED THE YEAR EARLIER PERIOD'S ONE POINT ONE MILLION DOLLARS A *SPOKESMAN* SAID
FOR THE YEAR AGO QUARTER SPECTRAN REPORTED A NET LOSS OF THREE POINT FOUR MILLION DOLLARS
FOR THE FIRST HALF OF NINETEEN EIGHTY SEVEN SPECTRAN REPORTED A NET LOSS OF TWO POINT TWO MILLION ON SALES OF ONE POINT FIVE MILLION
FRANKFURT SHARES TUMBLED IN RESPONSE TO THE WEAKER DOLLAR AND THE DECLINE ON WALL STREET WEDNESDAY BROKERS SAID
MANY BLUE CHIP ISSUES LOST AS MUCH AS TWO PERCENT WITH A FEW DROPPING AS MUCH AS FOUR PERCENT
FINANCIAL SHARES WERE HIT HARDEST AMID FEARS OF HIGHER INTEREST RATES
DECEMBER DELIVERY GOLD SETTLED AT FOUR HUNDRED EIGHTY TWO DOLLARS AND SEVENTY CENTS FOR A DECLINE OF TWELVE DOLLARS AND EIGHTY CENTS
DECEMBER SILVER FELL THIRTY THREE POINT THREE CENTS TO SIX DOLLARS POINT SIX FOUR FIVE
JANUARY PLATINUM WAS DOWN THIRTEEN DOLLARS AND SIXTY CENTS TO FOUR HUNDRED NINETY DOLLARS AND FORTY CENTS
THEIR PROTOTYPE OF FUTURE MONEY IS A REVOLUTIONARY PLASTIC BANK NOTE THAT SPORTS A THREE DIMENSIONAL HOLOGRAM
HOLOGRAMS HAVE BEEN USED ON CREDIT CARDS FOR SEVERAL YEARS TO FOIL FORGERS
BUT AUSTRALIAN MONETARY AUTHORITIES BELIEVE THEY ARE THE FIRST TO INCORPORATE SUCH A DEVICE ON A BANK NOTE
THEY HOPE IT WILL PUT COUNTERFEITERS OUT OF BUSINESS
JUST HOW FAR AIRBUS WANTS TO TAKE COLLABORATION TALKS REMAINS UNCLEAR
THE U. S. FOR TWO AND A HALF YEARS HAS BEEN CALLING FOR AN END TO AIRBUS GOVERNMENT SUBSIDIES AND IS THREATENING A TRADE WAR OVER THE ISSUE
THERE IS SUSPICION IN U. S. INDUSTRY AND GOVERNMENT THAT THE LATEST EFFORT IS A POLITICAL EXERCISE TO COOL AMERICAN COMPLAINTS ABOUT SUBSIDIES AND AVERT A TRADE WAR
THE DAY THAT TRADE PRESSURES EVAPORATE AIRBUS'S INTEREST IN MCDONNELL DOUGLAS COOPERATION IS OVER SAYS ONE U. S. AEROSPACE EXECUTIVE
HOW SERIOUS AND PATIENT INVESTOR INTEREST IS WILL BE TESTED NEXT MONTH
A GOVERNMENT OWNED INSURANCE AGENCY IS SET TO AUCTION OFF THE HYATT REGENCY MANILA
THE AGENCY HOPES TO REALIZE ITS TARGET PRICE OF THIRTEEN MILLION DOLLARS
MR. WRIGHT DIDN'T LIST THOSE EARNINGS ON NINETEEN EIGHTY SEVEN PERSONAL FINANCIAL DISCLOSURE FORMS
ATTORNEY DANIEL SWILLINGER SAID AT A MINIMUM HE SHOULD HAVE DISCLOSED THIS THE SIX THOUSAND FIVE HUNDRED DOLLAR ESCROW AS AN ASSET
MR. SWILLINGER COUNSELED REPRESENTATIVE NEWT GINGRICH REPUBLICAN FROM GEORGIA ON THE DRAFTING OF A COMPLAINT AGAINST MR. WRIGHT THAT HELPED TOUCH OFF THE ETHICS INVESTIGATION

ONE DAY DROUGHT WILL DISAPPEAR FROM OUR LAND

ONE DAY WE WILL BE ABLE TO FEED OURSELVES

MR. BOESKY FORMALLY HAS UNTIL APRIL FIRST NINETEEN EIGHTY EIGHT TO WIND UP HIS AFFAIRS UNDER AN AGREEMENT WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION
BUT THE BOESKY FUND HAS ALREADY SOLD NEARLY ALL ITS STOCK POSITIONS AND A QUICKER DISSOLUTION HAS APPEARED LIKELY FOR SOME TIME

THE EIGHT AND THREE QUARTER PERCENT NOTES WILL MATURE IN NINETEEN NINETY TWO
PROCEEDS WILL BE USED TO REFINANCE AND RETIRE DEBT AND FOR GENERAL PURPOSES
LONE STAR BASED IN GREENWICH CONNECTICUT IS A PRODUCER OF CEMENT AND OTHER CONSTRUCTION MATERIALS
STILL HE WOULD HAVE PREFERRED THERE BE NO BIDS AT ALL
THE COMPANY'S POLICY FOR EIGHTY FIVE YEARS HAS BEEN TO BE INDEPENDENT AND GROW AND WE HAVE SUCCEEDED HE SAYS
WE ARE EVALUATING THE OFFERS FOR THE COMPANY AND FOR THE SHAREHOLDERS BUT WE PROFOUNDLY REGRET THE SITUATION
THIS IS THE FIRST TEST FOR MR. RUDER'S ABILITY TO ADJUDICATE BETWEEN THE AGENCY'S PROSECUTORS AND ECONOMISTS WHICH CAN BE A FULL TIME JOB
AS USUAL IN THE RECENT PAST THE ECONOMISTS HAVE THE BETTER ARGUMENT HERE
THERE IS NO GOOD REASON TO OUTLAW THE OPEN MARKET PURCHASES OF SHARES IN ANY CASE AND ESPECIALLY NOT WHERE NONPROFESSIONAL SHAREHOLDERS ARE THE BIG WINNERS
THE AUCTION HOUSE SAID THIS WAS THE FIRST TIME THAT THE TOP TEN ART WORKS ALL SOLD FOR MORE THAN A MILLION DOLLARS EACH

THE TOP PRICE WAS FIVE POINT THREE MILLION FOR A RENOIR PAINTING OF A YOUNG WOMAN

HOWEVER RECENTLY IT HAS REPORTED BETTER THAN EXPECTED EARNINGS
ALTHOUGH IT HAS SLIPPED FROM FIRST TO THIRD IN SIZE IN THE INDUSTRY IT RETAINS A SUBSTANTIAL BASE OF CUSTOMERS

IMPERIAL SAYS IT HAS HAD TERRIFIC UNSOLICITED INTEREST IN THE MATERIAL FROM ALL AREAS OF PLASTICS USES

HOWEVER THE COMPANY SAYS IT HOPES TO REDUCE MANUFACTURING COSTS ENOUGH TO BEGIN MARKETING THE PLASTIC IN TWO TO FIVE YEARS

THESE MIXED FEELINGS OF FRUSTRATION WITH AND GRATITUDE TOWARD THE AUTHORITIES ARE PART OF THE EVERYDAY LIFE OF A FOREIGNER DOING BUSINESS IN KOREA
IN FACT SUCH CONTRADICTIONS ARE WHAT SEEM TO MAKE THE KOREAN WORLD GO ROUND
A WESTERN BUSINESSMAN NEEDS TO BE READY FOR THEM
HERE ARE A FEW HARD LEARNED FACTS OF KOREAN BUSINESS LIFE
THE TRASH
PROOFS OF PURCHASE AND SALES RECEIPTS THAT HAD BEEN TURNED IN FOR CONSUMER PRODUCT REBATES AND ALREADY PAID
THE WOMEN RESUBMITTED THOUSANDS OF THE REBATES AND CAMOUFLAGED THEIR TRAIL BY VARYING THEIR NAMES AND USING POSTAL BOXES ALL OVER THE COUNTRY
UNLIKE MORE ECLECTIC RAIDERS MR. TRUMP HAS SO FAR STUCK TO REAL ESTATE
RESORTS HAS BIG UNDEVELOPED LAND HOLDINGS IN ATLANTIC CITY
ALLEGIS' WESTIN PLAZA HOTEL WHICH HE SEEMS TO WANT COULD BE WORTH TWICE AS MUCH IF MADE INTO CONDOMINIUMS HE SAYS
HUMANA TRIED TO DEFEND ITSELF THROUGH DIVERSIFICATION AS DID THE OTHER LARGE CHAINS HOSPITAL CORPORATION OF AMERICA AMERICAN MEDICAL INTERNATIONAL INCORPORATED AND NATIONAL MEDICAL ENTERPRISES INCORPORATED
THE IDEA WAS THAT IF A HOSPITAL OWNER ALSO HAD AN INSURANCE PLAN IT COULD STEER PATIENTS TO ITS INSTITUTIONS THROUGH FINANCIAL INCENTIVES
THE PATIENT POOL MIGHT SHRINK BUT THE COMPANY COULD GRAB A BIGGER PART OF IT
LAST MONTH AUTO SALES FELL ONE POINT FOUR PERCENT AFTER RISING FIVE POINT SEVEN PERCENT IN AUGUST
SALES OF BUILDING MATERIALS INCREASED ONE POINT TWO PERCENT AFTER A ZERO POINT FOUR PERCENT DROP
OVERALL SALES OF DURABLE GOODS WHICH ARE INTENDED TO LAST THREE YEARS OR MORE FELL ZERO POINT NINE PERCENT AFTER RISING THREE POINT ONE IN AUGUST
WALL STREET IN GENERAL HAS BEEN CONCERNED ABOUT G. M. IN RECENT WEEKS BECAUSE OF ITS NEW LABOR CONTRACT
THE THREE YEAR PACT INCLUDES A JOB SECURITY PROGRAM THAT PREVENTS LAYOFFS EXCEPT DURING A SALES DROP PREVENTS PLANT CLOSINGS AND SLOWS ATTRITION
MANY ANALYSTS PREDICT THE PROVISIONS WILL HAMPER G. M.'S EFFORTS TO RESTRUCTURE OPERATIONS AND SHED UNCOMPETITIVE PLANTS PARTICULARLY IN PARTS OPERATIONS

HIS REACTION SEEMS A LITTLE HOSTILE BUT I DON'T CARE I AM FEELING POSITIVELY VICE PRESIDENTIAL
I AM ABOUT TO BECOME GEORGE BUSH FOR A NIGHT
YOU CAN TOO

THE ROAD NAMED WEST STREET IS A NARROW STRIP OF RED GRAVEL
IT IS LIKE THE PROVERBIAL RAILROAD TRACKS IN AMERICA THAT SEPARATE THE RICH SIDE OF TOWN FROM THE POOR <NOISE>
THE PHYSICAL DISTANCE MAY NOT BE GREAT BUT THE MENTAL GAP IS
THE INDICATED TIGHTNESS IN U. S. GASOLINE OUGHT TO PREVENT THE REFINERS' FLAT OUT PRODUCTION FROM LEADING TO A PRODUCT PRICE WAR
THE DECLINE IN CRUDE PRICES EVENTUALLY WILL END HOWEVER
OR PRODUCT PRICES COULD AGAIN BECOME LINKED TO THOSE FOR CRUDE
AND GASOLINE DEMAND USUALLY DROPS AFTER LABOR DAY
BUT MR. RANDOL SUGGESTS THAT A TREND TOWARD PERMANENTLY IMPROVED REFINER MARGINS IS SUSTAINABLE
THROUGH ITS U. S. FINANCE SUBSIDIARY TOYOTA HAS ISSUED COMMERCIAL PAPER IN THE U. S. AND PRIVATELY PLACED MEDIUM TERM NOTES
IT HAS ALSO RAISED MORE THAN TWO BILLION DOLLARS IN THE EUROMARKETS BUT SO FAR HAS AVOIDED ISSUING STRAIGHT DEBT IN THE PUBLIC U. S. MARKET
THE SAME IS TRUE OF MOST JAPANESE COMPANIES

THE DRUG AZIDOTHYMIDINE OR A. Z. T. IS THE FIRST PRESCRIPTION DRUG FOR ACQUIRED IMMUNE DEFICIENCY SYNDROME TO GET FEDERAL FOOD AND DRUG ADMINISTRATION APPROVAL
A. Z. T. IS MARKETED UNDER THE NAME RETROVIR BY BURROUGHS WELLCOME COMPANY AT AN ANNUAL RETAIL DOSAGE COST OF ABOUT TEN THOUSAND DOLLARS
IT ALSO IS THE MOST EXPENSIVE PRESCRIPTION DRUG PROMPTING FEARS THAT SOME INSURERS WHO NORMALLY PROVIDE PRESCRIPTION DRUG COVERAGE WILL BALK AT ITS PRICE
MR. BOTHA MUST ALSO RULE ON THE FATE OF THE GROUP AREAS ACT
VIOLATIONS OF THE ACT ARE RAMPANT BUT THERE WERE ONLY FOUR PROSECUTIONS UNDER IT IN NINETEEN EIGHTY SIX ONE IN NINETEEN EIGHTY FIVE AND NONE THE YEAR BEFORE
A RECENT POLL BY THE AFRIKAANS NEWSPAPER RAPPORT FOUND THAT ONLY TWENTY SEVEN PERCENT OF SURVEYED WHITES WANT THE ACT RETAINED
MORE THAN TWENTY FOUR PERCENT WANT IT SCRAPPED COMPLETELY WHILE ANOTHER THIRTY FOUR PERCENT WANT EACH LOCAL COMMUNITY OR PROPERTY OWNER TO DECIDE WHO CAN RENT OR BUY HOUSING
ON THE BIG BOARD VOLUME ROSE TWO HUNDRED TWENTY POINT FIVE MILLION SHARES FROM ONE HUNDRED SIXTY EIGHT POINT SIX MILLION THURSDAY
BUT THE ACTIVITY WAS LESS THAN ON PREVIOUS TRIPLE WITCHING DAYS AND MUCH OF THE TRADING WAS PACKED INTO THE OPENING AND CLOSING MINUTES OF THE SESSION
MORE THAN THIRTY ONE MILLION SHARES CHANGED HANDS IN THE FINAL MINUTE
THE PEOPLE WHO ATTENDED THE EVENTS LOVED THEM
THE CITIZENS OF THE NEW YORK METROPOLITAN AREA ARE STILL TALKING ABOUT WHAT A TERRIFIC FEELING THE WEEKEND ENGENDERED IN EVERYONE
THE STATE OF NEW YORK WAS SO HAPPY THAT IT IS USING A PHOTO FROM LIBERTY WEEKEND IN ADVERTISEMENTS TO ATTRACT BUSINESS TO THE STATE
THOSE WHO WATCHED THE EVENTS ON TELEVISION MORE THAN ONE HUNDRED MILLION AMERICANS LOVED THEM
PEOPLE IN FIFTY ONE FOREIGN COUNTRIES ENJOYED THE EVENTS VIA TELEVISION
THE FRENCH WERE SO IMPRESSED BY THE CELEBRATION THEY THANKED THE U. S. IN AN AD IN A NEW YORK NEWSPAPER
IN THE END THERE IS LITTLE THE U. S. CAN DO TO CONTROL EVENTS IN SOUTH AFRICA
THE ADMINISTRATION'S SIX YEAR CONSTRUCTIVE ENGAGEMENT POLICY DESIGNED TO COAX PRETORIA TOWARD DISMANTLING APARTHEID DIDN'T SUCCEED
AND SANCTIONS IN THE SHORT RUN WON'T DAMAGE SOUTH AFRICA'S SELF RELIANT ECONOMY
BUT THE PERCEPTION OF INACTION HAS DIPLOMATIC COSTS FOR THE U. S. AND SO FOR THE TIME BEING SANCTIONS SEEM TO BE THE BEST BET
THE NINETEEN SEVENTY TWO A. B. M. TREATY REQUIRES A REVIEW EVERY FIVE YEARS
COMMUNIQUES ANNOUNCING COMPLETION OF THE FIRST AND SECOND REVIEWS WERE ISSUED ON NOVEMBER FOURTH NINETEEN SEVENTY SEVEN AND NOVEMBER NINTH NINETEEN EIGHTY TWO
THE THIRD REVIEW WAS DUE BY OCTOBER THIRD NINETEEN EIGHTY SEVEN
THE MOST OPTIMISTIC ESTIMATES ARE NOW THAT IT WILL START SOMETIME AFTER THE FIRST OF THE YEAR
THE REAGAN ADMINISTRATION IN SHORT IS CONSPIRING WITH THE SOVIETS TO VIOLATE THE REVIEW PROVISIONS OF THE TREATY
IT IS SAD BUT TRUE THAT INTERNATIONAL SPORTING EXTRAVAGANZAS HAVE COME TO BE CONDUCTED AMID THE SORT OF SECURITY OTHERWISE RESERVED FOR THE TRAVELS OF HEADS OF STATE
THE SWISS HOCKEY COACH WAS QUOTED AS SAYING THAT HIS PLAYERS WERE SURPRISED THEY DIDN'T HAVE TO SHOW THEIR PASSES AT THE BLUE LINE WHEN THEY BACK CHECKED
HAVING THE BAR PATTERN ON MY PASS CHECKED ELECTRONICALLY ABOUT ONE THOUSAND TIMES MADE ME FEEL LIKE A TOOTHPASTE CARTON LEAVING A SUPERMARKET
ANYONE WHO ACCEPTS THE JOB OF INVESTIGATING THE SPEAKER SHOULD BE PREPARED TO TAKE SOME HEAT
LAST WEEK COMMON CAUSE CALLED FOR AN INVESTIGATION OF MR. WRIGHT'S FINANCES
THE SPEAKER RETALIATED IN A PUBLIC STATEMENT AND HIS MINIONS IN THE LEADERSHIP SAID THE GROUP WAS DEAD ON CAPITOL HILL
THIS WAS ROUGH ON ALL DEBTORS DOMESTIC AS WELL AS INTERNATIONAL
BUT NO ONE PROPOSED SOLUTIONS FOR DOMESTIC DEBTORS AS GRAND AS THOSE OFFICIALLY OFFERED FOR THIRD WORLD DEBTORS
THE FIRST PART OF THE OFFICIAL PROPOSAL WAS TO REDUCE THE INTEREST BURDEN OF THE DEVELOPING COUNTRIES
SECOND PROMOTE WORLD ECONOMIC RECOVERY
THIRD NEW LOANS SHOULD BE MADE TO THE DEBTOR NATIONS BY THE BANKS THE INTERNATIONAL MONETARY FUND THE WORLD BANK AND EXPORT CREDIT AGENCIES
IN ANY CASE A RETURN TO MARKET DISCIPLINE IS INEVITABLE
FINANCIAL HISTORY HAS WITNESSED A THOUSAND BOOMS AND BUSTS
WITHIN RECENT MEMORY WE HAVE SEEN THE JUNK EQUITIES OF THE SIXTIES THE HEATED THIRD WORLD LENDING OF THE SEVENTIES AND THE THRIFT CRISIS OF THE EIGHTIES
THESE PROBLEMS OF THE RECENT PAST PALE IN SCOPE NEXT TO THE PERVASIVENESS AND TOTAL DOLLARS INVOLVED IN THE CURRENT CRAZE
IF THE PARTICIPANTS IN THIS CRAZE AWAKEN NOW THE CORRECTION MAY STILL BE WITHIN TOLERABLE LIMITS FOR THE COUNTRY
IF NOT ALL OF AMERICA WILL PAY THE PENALTY BECAUSE THE DEBT IS HUGE AND WIDELY HELD AND THE BANKING STRUCTURE'S INTEGRITY WOULD BE AT STAKE
WITH THE U. S. GOVERNMENT AS ITS PRIME CUSTOMER TRACOR WAS HELPLESS WHEN DEFENSE SPENDING SLOWED
INTERNALLY MR. INMAN SAYS HE DISCOVERED THAT EXPENSES COULDN'T BE CUT AS EASILY AS BANKERS HAD FORECAST
AND FEES WERE HIGHER THAN EXPECTED
MR. INMAN CALLS IT ALL PART OF MY EDUCATION
THE OPERATING RATE IS STILL KIND OF LOW BUT IT'S COMING BACK SAID PRISCILLA LUCE SENIOR ECONOMIST AT WHARTON ECONOMETRIC FORECASTING ASSOCIATES IN PHILADELPHIA
THERE IS SOME CAUSE FOR OPTIMISM
SHE SAID EXPORT GAINS HAVE SPURRED SOME OF THE IMPROVEMENT
IT'S SO SHUNNED THAT ALTHOUGH MOST MANAGERS GOING UP THE LADDER ARE OCCASIONALLY REQUIRED TO FIRE ONCE HAVING ASCENDED TO THE TOP THEY DELEGATE THE JOB
ANDREW SHERWOOD A NEW YORK MANAGEMENT CONSULTANT SAYS THAT ONLY ABOUT FIVE PERCENT OF CHIEF EXECUTIVES DO THEIR OWN FIRING
THESE ARE PEOPLE WHO ARE COMPULSIVE BUILDERS HE SAYS
THEY LIKE ACQUIRING COMPANIES MAKING PROFITS GO UP AND RECRUITING PEOPLE
FIRING ISN'T WHAT THEY'RE EMOTIONALLY GEARED FOR
THEY FIND IT REPUGNANT
DEFENDERS OF THE FOOTNOTE ARGUE THAT IT MAKES SENSE AS TAX POLICY
WHY THEY ASK SHOULD WEALTHY BEST SELLING AUTHORS GET SUBSTANTIAL TAX DEFERRALS WHILE MOM AND POP MANUFACTURERS FOR EXAMPLE CAN'T
AS A RULE OF TAXES IT'S A GOOD RULE BECAUSE YOU DON'T WANT PEOPLE TAKING DEDUCTIONS BEFORE THEY GET THE INCOME SAYS ONE CONGRESSIONAL AIDE
IT'S THE TIME VALUE OF MONEY PRINCIPLE
MR. AMMAN FORTY NINE YEARS OLD SAID HE BELIEVES WESTERN UNION'S DEBT AND EQUITY HOLDERS WILL SUPPORT THE RESTRUCTURING
HE ADDED THAT THE RESTRUCTURING MUST BE COMPLETED IN THE NEXT FEW WEEKS BECAUSE THE COMPANY IS RUNNING SHORT OF CASH
WESTERN UNION HAS SAID THAT IF ITS PLANS ARE DEFEATED IT WILL FILE FOR REORGANIZATION UNDER CHAPTER ELEVEN OF THE FEDERAL BANKRUPTCY LAWS
THE CONFRONTATION IN FEDERAL COURT MAY BREAK NEW GROUND IN BANKRUPTCY LAW
OTHER COURTS NOTABLY THE ONE IN CHARGE OF THE MANVILLE CORPORATION CHAPTER ELEVEN PROCEEDINGS HAVE SET UP TRUST FUNDS TO PAY LARGE CLASSES OF INJURY VICTIMS
BUT MANVILLE'S TWO POINT FIVE BILLION DOLLAR TO THREE BILLION DOLLAR TRUST INCLUDES PROVISIONS THAT ALLOW IT TO EXPAND IF FUNDS PROVE INADEQUATE TO PAY ASBESTOS RELATED CLAIMS
SO FAR NO JUDGE HAS ATTEMPTED TO FIX AN ABSOLUTE CAP ON A GROUP OF CLAIMS AS HUGE AND UNCERTAIN AS THOSE FACING ROBINS
ANOTHER BANK TRADER ATTRIBUTES THE DOLLAR'S REBOUND TO FED OFFICIALS' INCREASED OPENNESS ABOUT THEIR ACTIVITIES
THEY'RE TRYING TO GET THE BIGGEST BANG FOR THE BUCK RIGHT NOW THE TRADER SAYS
THEY WANT PEOPLE TO RUN OUT AND SAY THE FED'S BUYING THE FED'S BUYING
THAT'S WHAT'S SIGNIFICANTLY DIFFERENT ABOUT THE FED'S INTERVENTION THIS YEAR
DOW PRESIDENT FRANK POPOFF SAID IN A STATEMENT THAT BOTH PRICE AND VOLUME INCREASES BOLSTERED EARNINGS
THE COMPANY'S STRONG COST CONTAINMENT EFFORTS ALSO HELPED
COSTS REMAIN STABLE VOLUME HAS INCREASED AND THERE IS NO WEAKNESS APPARENT IN EITHER THE PRODUCT LINES OR GEOGRAPHICAL AREAS MR. POPOFF SAID
FOR ONE HUNDRED YEARS WYOMING HAS BEEN RIDING A ROLLER COASTER
WHEN COMMODITY PRICES RISE PEOPLE RUSH TO WYOMING FOR SHORT TERM WORK AT BOOM TOWN PAY
GOVERNMENT REVENUES LARGELY UNDERWRITTEN BY ENERGY COMPANY TAXES EXPLODE
WHEN COMMODITY PRICES SOUR PEOPLE PULL OUT OFTEN WITH THEIR MOBILE HOMES TRAILING BEHIND
AND REVENUES SLUMP
BUT MR. PETERSON SAYS THERE STILL IS AN IMAGE PROBLEM
IF WE HAVEN'T WORKED WITH A COMPANY BEFORE THE NATURAL REACTION IS WHY THE HELL ARE YOU BRINGING IN ACCOUNTANTS TO WORK IN THE PLANT
YET WE PROBABLY HAVE THE LARGEST MANUFACTURING CONSULTING PRACTICE IN THE WORLD
HOPING TO PREVENT LONG COSTLY DISPUTES OVER WHAT DOCUMENTS DEFENDANTS HAVE TO SURRENDER JUDGES GRANT BLANKET PROTECTIVE ORDERS
THE ORDERS TYPICALLY BAR PUBLIC DISSEMINATION OF RECORDS AND DEPOSITIONS EVEN AFTER A SETTLEMENT OR VERDICT
PLAINTIFFS' LAWYERS GENERALLY HAVEN'T BALKED AS LONG AS THEY CAN GET THE INFORMATION THEY NEED TO PREPARE FOR THEIR TRIALS
IN THE NEW CONSUMERIST CHILE THIS IS A MAN WHO DOESN'T EVEN OWN A CAR
THE SON OF A RETIRED AIR FORCE OFFICER HE LIVES QUIETLY WITH HIS WIFE AND TWO DAUGHTERS IN A SMALL HOUSE IN SANTIAGO
HE PREFERS THE SCIENTIFIC AMERICAN TO THE WEEKLY NEWS MAGAZINES
HIS TRAINING WAS AS A MINING ENGINEER NOT AS AN ECONOMIST
AMONG HIS RECENT READING THE EYE OF THE FLY

DOCTOR SULLIVAN HAD CONCLUDED THAT EVEN IF HE PUSHED THE FULTON NOMINATION THROUGH THE WHITE HOUSE AND THE SENATE THE PRICE OF VICTORY WOULD BE TOO HIGH

S. E. C. CHAIRMAN DAVID RUDER PRESENTED THE UNANIMOUS POSITION OF THE FIVE MEMBER COMMISSION AT A MEETING YESTERDAY OF SECURITIES REGULATORS IN MELBOURNE AUSTRALIA
MR. RUDER SAID THAT AN EFFECTIVE REGULATORY FRAMEWORK FOR A GLOBAL MARKET SHOULD INCLUDE EFFICIENT SYSTEMS FOR DISSEMINATING MARKET DATA ON PRICES AND TRADING VOLUME AND FOR EXECUTING TRADES
<NOISE> HE ADDED THAT ULTIMATELY ALL COUNTRIES SHOULD SET UP AUTOMATED SYSTEMS FOR CLEARING AND SETTLING EQUITY AND DEBT TRANSACTIONS AND THAT MANY SUCH SYSTEMS SHOULD BE LINKED
THE GOVERNMENT SOURCE WHO REQUESTED ANONYMITY SAID THE MEASURE WOULD ALLOW FOR THE CONFISCATION OF FUNDS IN ADDITION TO FINES AND IMPRISONMENT
LOCAL PRESS REPORTS SAID FINES OF UP TO FIFTY MILLION LUXEMBOURG FRANCS ONE POINT FOUR MILLION DOLLARS AND PRISON TERMS OF UP TO FIVE YEARS COULD BE IMPOSED

THE NEW GOVERNMENT HAS STARTED TO LOWER PERSONAL INCOME TAXES AND AT THE SAME TIME IT HAS BEGUN TO BRING ITS OWN SPENDING UNDER CONTROL
IN THE NINETEEN EIGHTY SEVEN BUDGET THE HIGHEST RATE OF INCOME TAX WAS LOWERED TO FIFTY EIGHT PERCENT FROM SIXTY FIVE PERCENT
THIS IS PART OF A WORLD WIDE MOVEMENT THAT FRANCE MUST FOLLOW TO KEEP ITS MOST ENERGETIC AGGRESSIVE AND BRIGHT YOUNG PEOPLE AND TO ATTRACT INVESTORS
THE NEW TAX LAW'S LIMITS ON RETIREMENT BENEFITS FOR EXECUTIVES SPUR GREATER INTEREST IN CERTAIN TRUSTS THAT HELP SAFEGUARD DEFERRED COMPENSATION UNTIL RETIREMENT TIME
SUCH TRUSTS AREN'T COMPLETELY INVIOLATE CREDITORS CAN CLAIM THE MONEY AFTER A BANKRUPTCY FOR INSTANCE
BUT THEY ARE CONSIDERED BETTER THAN A MERE PROMISE TO THE EXECUTIVE
<NOISE> THE DIET IS A ONE HOUSE LEGISLATURE APPORTIONED BY DISTRICT RATHER THAN POPULATION LIKE THE SENATE AS OPPOSED TO THE HOUSE
THIS MEANS THAT JAPANESE FARMERS HAVE TREMENDOUS CONTROL OVER JAPANESE POLITICS
FOOD PRICES IN JAPAN TAKE FORTY PERCENT OR MORE OF THE AVERAGE PERSON'S WAGE
WITH HOUSING TAKING ANOTHER FORTY PERCENT AND THE FACT THE JAPANESE ARE GREAT SAVERS THEY ARE LEFT WITH ALMOST NO DISCRETIONARY INCOME
THIS IS WHY THEY CANNOT DEVELOP A DOMESTIC MARKET
THEY DON'T HAVE MONEY TO SPEND EXCEPT A SMALL AMOUNT OF SAVINGS THAT THEY SPEND ONLY ON SPECIAL OCCASIONS OR FOR UNUSUAL BARGAINS
CONSEQUENTLY LLOYD'S AND SOME BROKERS MAY BE FORCED TO INCREASE THEIR SHARE OF THE SETTLEMENT PAYMENT

BETTER TO DROP IT DIRECTLY ON SEOUL

BUT HE SAID IT'S BALANCED AT FIFTEEN DOLLARS TO SIXTEEN DOLLARS A BARREL
THAT IS TWO DOLLARS TO THREE DOLLARS A BARREL LESS THAN THE EXPORTERS WERE RECEIVING LAST YEAR
IF THERE IS A REDUCTION IN SUPPLY AS A RESULT OF THE JOINT MEETINGS PRICES WILL SHOOT UP MR. HAMM SAID
CARBIDE'S SABOTAGE THEORY IS WEAKENED PARTLY BECAUSE IT HASN'T DISCLOSED ALL ITS EVIDENCE
THOUGH ITS ATTORNEYS SAY THEY HAVE INTERVIEWED THE ALLEGED SABOTEUR EXTENSIVELY THEY WON'T DISCLOSE HIS NAME OR WHEREABOUTS OR DESCRIBE HIM
THEY ALSO DECLINE TO SAY WHETHER THEY UNDERSTAND HIS MOTIVES OR HAVE ANY WITNESSES
STANFORD NOW CHOOSES NOT TO REQUIRE ITS UNDERGRADUATES TO STUDY THEIR WESTERN HERITAGE BUT THAT HISTORY DOES YIELD CERTAIN LESSONS
ONE OF THEM IS THAT MINORITIES THAT DO NOT RESPOND EFFECTIVELY TO ATTACKS FROM THE MAJORITY MERELY ENCOURAGE FURTHER ASSAULTS
PERHAPS THE HOOVER OVERSEERS SHOULD KEEP THAT IN MIND WHEN THEY PONDER THE LATEST AFFRONT TO GLENN CAMPBELL NEXT WEEK
THE OFFER IS A BRILLIANT DEFENSE CONTRIVED BY SANTA FE'S INVESTMENT BANKERS AT SALOMON BROTHERS AND GOLDMAN SACHS

<NOISE> THE NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF REALTORS IS THROWING SEVERAL PARTIES AND PROUDLY BOASTS THAT EIGHTY NINE OF ITS MEMBERS ARE DELEGATES OR ALTERNATES TO THIS CONVENTION
DISCUSSION OF THIS SUBJECT BETTER DESCRIBED AS BROODING ABOUT IT IS FILLED WITH MISCONCEPTIONS
ONE OF THESE IS THE GREAT CONCERN WITH THE U. S. HAVING BECOME A NET DEBTOR
WHAT IS MEANT BY THAT IS THAT AMERICANS APPARENTLY OWN FEWER ASSETS ABROAD THAN FOREIGNERS OWN IN THE U. S.
MANY PEOPLE HAVE POINTED OUT THAT THESE CALCULATIONS ARE SPURIOUS BECAUSE THE ASSETS ARE NOT ALL VALUED ON THE SAME BASIS
IF ALL ASSETS WERE VALUED AT TODAY'S PRICES THE NET DEBT OF THE U. S. WOULD CERTAINLY BE MUCH SMALLER THAN IT NOW APPEARS AND MIGHT BE A NET ASSET

THE TRANSACTIONS MAY HAVE BEEN DIRECTED MAINLY AT DEFENDING THE SAGGING LIRA IN THE EUROPEAN MONETARY SYSTEM IN WHICH EIGHT EUROPEAN CURRENCIES FLOAT WITHIN SPECIFIED LIMITS
BUT THEY ALSO HAD THE EFFECT OF HELPING THE DOLLAR BY INCREASING THE SUPPLY OF MARKS IN THE MARKET
FOR ENVIRONMENTAL TREATMENT WHICH LIKE MR. KIRK RELISHES AN EXTREMELY LOW PROFILE THE OIL SPILL HAS BROUGHT A WAVE OF ATTENTION
IN FACT WHEN WALL STREET LEARNED THAT THE PUBLICLY HELD COMPANY WAS HIRED TO HANDLE THE MULTIMILLION DOLLAR CLEANUP THE CONCERN'S STOCK SHOT UP ALMOST TEN PERCENT
YESTERDAY IN THE NEW YORK STOCK EXCHANGE COMPOSITE TRADING ITS STOCK CLOSED AT TWELVE DOWN TWENTY FIVE CENTS
STATE WORKERS ARE ANOTHER CONSTITUENCY
ONE IN FOUR WORKING PANAMANIANS OWES HIS LIVELIHOOD TO THE GOVERNMENT AND THE GENERAL EXPECTS HELP FROM ALL OF THEM
DOWN THE STREET FROM MR. SANCHEZ'S OFFICE CARLOS A GOVERNMENT MECHANIC SAYS HE GOES TO MANY PRO *NORIEGA* DEMONSTRATIONS
THE IMPACT WILL BE ENORMOUS
THE REPUBLICANS' STRONGEST CASE AGAINST THE DEMOCRATIC NOMINEE HIS NAIVETE ON NATIONAL SECURITY ISSUES WILL DISAPPEAR
THE SUSPICION OF A SELECTION BASED ENTIRELY ON POLITICAL INSTEAD OF *SUBSTANTIVE* GROUNDS WILL BE UNDERCUT
AND A MESSAGE THAT THE CURRENT VICE PRESIDENT IS LARGELY IRRELEVANT WILL BE STRONGLY DELIVERED
MR. TUCKER'S HARD HITTING CAMPAIGN HAS IN TURN APPALLED TOP UNION LEADERS WHO SAY HE HAS TARNISHED THEIR REPUTATION AS ONE OF THE LABOR MOVEMENT'S CLEANEST ORGANIZATIONS
THE STATEMENTS OF AN UNDERCUT DEMOCRATIC UNION MAY BE IN BED WITH MANAGEMENT HURT THIS UNION SAID MR. BIEBER
I RESENT THOSE STATEMENTS
MR. DELCHAMPS SAID THIRTY PERCENT OF THE COMPANY'S STOCK HOLDINGS IS HELD BY PEOPLE WHO HAVE AGREED NOT TO SELL THEIR HOLDINGS BEFORE OCTOBER THIRTY FIRST
ANOTHER TWENTY FIVE PERCENT IS HELD UNDER THE COMPANY'S EMPLOYEE STOCK OWNERSHIP PLAN
MOST OF THE PEOPLE IN THE FORMER CATEGORY ARE EXPECTED TO EXTEND THE NO SELL AGREEMENT FOR ANOTHER YEAR HE SAID
O. T. C. BROKERS ALSO STRESS THAT THEIR STOCKS OFTEN OUTPERFORM LISTED ONES ON A LONG TERM BASIS
AND OVERALL THE NASDAQ COMPOSITE INDEX IS UP THIRTEEN PERCENT THIS YEAR TWICE AS MUCH AS THE DOW JONES INDUSTRIAL AVERAGE
ALSO THEY NOTE THE TINY STOCKS THAT GENERALLY TRADE UNDER THREE DOLLARS A SHARE HAVE ALWAYS TAKEN BIG PERCENTAGE MOVES UP OR DOWN WHEN THEY MOVE AT ALL
THESE MIXED FEELINGS OF FRUSTRATION WITH AND GRATITUDE TOWARDS THE AUTHORITIES ARE PART OF THE EVERYDAY LIFE OF A FOREIGNER DOING BUSINESS IN KOREA
<NOISE> IN FACT SUCH CONTRADICTIONS ARE WHAT SEEM TO MAKE THE KOREAN WORLD GO ROUND
A WESTERN BUSINESSMAN NEEDS TO BE READY FOR THEM
<NOISE> HERE ARE A FEW HARD LEARNED FACTS OF KOREAN BUSINESS LIFE
THERE ARE ALSO BROKER FINDERS THAT GET FEES MERELY FOR MATCHING BORROWERS AND LENDERS OF STOCK
BROKER FINDERS CAN ALSO INCLUDE THE BROKERAGE FIRMS THEMSELVES
THE GOVERNMENT IS INVESTIGATING WHETHER ALL THE PAYMENTS THAT FLY TO AND FROM SUCH BROKER FINDERS ARE LEGITIMATE
WE ARE EXTREMELY SELECTIVE SAYS PAUL SUCKROW DIRECTOR OF FIXED INCOME AT OPPENHEIMER MANAGEMENT CORP.
I DON'T THINK SOME ISSUES ARE GOING TO MAKE IT HE SAID
EVEN CAUTIOUS MANAGERS SUCH AS MR. SUCKROW ARE SEEING THE IMPACT OF THE CAMPEAU DEBACLE
HE SAID HIS FIRM OWNS A SMALL AMOUNT OF THE FEDERATED SENIOR DEBT
ALTHOUGH THE BONDS ARE SECURED BY BANK CREDITS THEY HAVE ALSO FALLEN IN PRICE RECENTLY
THE COMPUTER ALSO CAN DISPLAY A PATTERN SHOWING HOW PEOPLE NORMALLY PLACE THE TONGUE TO PRODUCE SAY AN S. SOUND
A DEAF PERSON CAN THEN TRY TO MATCH THE PATTERN BY PLACING THE TONGUE AGAINST THE ELECTRONIC PALATE

DREXEL FINANCED THE KOHLBERG KRAVIS BUY OUT OF BEATRICE LAST YEAR
MR. LAY SAID THE LOSSES OCCURED IN LATE SEPTEMBER AND EARLY THIS MONTH A TIME OF PARTICULAR VOLATILITY IN OIL MARKETS

THEIR GUESSES WERE WRONG ON BOTH SIDES OF THE MARKET
IN A STATEMENT TIMEPLEX SAID ITS DIRECTORS VOTED TO POSTPONE THE ANNUAL MEETING WHICH WAS SCHEDULED FOR YESTERDAY
A NEW DATE HASN'T BEEN SET
A UNISYS SPOKESMAN SAID THE COMPANIES HOPE TO COMPLETE THE ACQUISITION WHICH REQUIRES TIMEPLEX HOLDERS' APPROVAL AND GOVERNMENT CLEARANCE IN ABOUT FOUR MONTHS
AT THE MEETING SHAREHOLDERS APPROVED AN INCREASE IN AUTHORIZED COMMON SHARES TO TWENTY MILLION FROM FIFTEEN MILLION
THE ADDITIONAL SHARES MAY BE USED FOR BENEFIT PLANS TO OBTAIN ADDITIONAL FINANCING OR TO MAKE ACQUISITIONS
THE COMPANY HAS ABOUT TEN POINT EIGHT MILLION COMMON SHARES OUTSTANDING
THE U. S. OF COURSE HAS A VAST AND IN MANY PLACES EFFICIENT INFRASTRUCTURE
THE COUNCIL STUDY PUT A VALUE OF ONE TRILLION DOLLARS ON THE PARTS IT MEASURED
BUT GOVERNMENT OWNED FIXED CAPITAL SUFFERS ALONG WITH PRIVATELY OWNED PLANT AND EQUIPMENT WHEN ECONOMIC POLICIES DISCOURAGE LONG TERM INVESTMENT
THE GREATEST SCOURGE OF INVESTMENT IS OF COURSE INFLATION WHICH EXPLAINS WHY THE NATIONAL INFRASTRUCTURE SUFFERED PARTICULARLY DURING THE NINETEEN SEVENTIES
USER FEES SIMPLY COULD NOT KEEP UP WITH THE SOARING COSTS OF LOANS AND CONSTRUCTION
HIGHWAY CONSTRUCTION HAD THE ADDED PROBLEM OF REDUCED YIELDS FROM GASOLINE TAXES BROUGHT ABOUT BY ENERGY SHORTAGES AND SHORTAGE ENFORCED CONSERVATION
THE MEASURE WAS A BOLD MOVE FOR A PRESIDENT WHO HAS COME TO VIEW INERTIA AS THE BEST FORM OF SECURITY
THE SUSPENSION EFFECTIVELY WILL SLASH SALARIES AND CUT AN ESTIMATED EIGHT POINT THREE BILLION FROM FEDERAL SPENDING THIS YEAR
THE AIM IS TO HOLD THE BUDGET DEFICIT TO FOUR POINT NINE PERCENT OF ECONOMIC OUTPUT DOWN FROM A PROJECTED SEVEN PERCENT
THIS IT IS HOPED WILL HELP STOP HIGH INFLATION FROM SPIRALING INTO HYPERINFLATION
THE THINK TANK MEASURED EXPENSE RATIOS WHICH ARE A FUND'S OPERATING COSTS AS A PERCENTAGE OF ASSETS
FOR INVESTORS HIGH RATIOS ARE CLEARLY OF CONCERN
IT CUTS INTO *POTENTIAL* RETURN EVEN WHEN A FUND IS DOING WELL
AND IT LEAVES A FUND WITH LESS OF A CUSHION IN CASE PERFORMANCE SOURS
ALMOST UNNOTICED IN DISCUSSIONS OF THE PROCUREMENT SCANDAL IS THE FACT THAT THIS ELABORATE INDEED TORTUOUS SYSTEM SEEMS TO HAVE WORKED AT LEAST ON ITS OWN TERMS
NOBODY WAS ABLE TO THROW A CONTRACT DIRECTLY
INSTEAD WHAT SOME CONTRACTORS SEEM TO HAVE DONE IS TO BUY INSIDE INFORMATION THAT WOULD ALLOW THEM TO PREPARE A BETTER PROPOSAL
NINE MONTH RESULTS ALSO INCLUDE A TWELVE MILLION NET LOSS FROM THE DISPOSITION OF TRUCKING OPERATIONS
ABOUT EIGHT MILLION OF THE TRUCKING CHARGE WAS TAKEN IN THE THIRD QUARTER
YEAR EARLIER RESULTS WERE RESTATED FOR ACCOUNTING CHANGES
N. E. C. CORP. AS ONE EXAMPLE BEGAN DONATING MONEY TO M. I. T. IN THE NINETEEN SEVENTIES
ONE DONATION OF ONE MILLION WENT TO CREATE A C. AND C. SOFTWARE PROFESSORSHIP
C. AND C. IS THE N. E. C. CORPORATE SLOGAN IT STANDS FOR COMPUTERS AND COMMUNICATIONS
THE BIG PROBLEM IS THAT DOCTOR THANOS CAN NO LONGER USE SO CALLED PASSIVE LOSSES FROM THESE PROPERTIES TO OFFSET HIS SALARY OR EARNED INCOME
THE DISALLOWANCE OF PASSIVE LOSSES IS BEING PHASED IN OVER FIVE YEARS
REAL ESTATE DEPRECIATION SCHEDULES ALSO HAVE BEEN LENGTHENED REDUCING THEIR VALUE
WHILE THE U. S. FOCUSES ON THE IRAN CONTRA HEARINGS MORE SOVIET ARMS FLOW INTO NICARAGUA
MORE THAN THREE HUNDRED MILLION WORTH OF WEAPONS WERE DELIVERED TO THE SANDINISTAS IN THE FIRST HALF OF THIS YEAR ACCORDING TO U. S. INTELLIGENCE
THAT'S ABOUT NINE TIMES THE DIRECT U. S. MILITARY AID PROVIDED TO THE CONTRAS IN THAT PERIOD
THE SOVIET EQUIPMENT IS JUST POURING IN ONE RANKING PENTAGON OFFICIAL TOLD THE A. P.
THE NICARAGUANS ARE CONSOLIDATING THE MILITARY BUILDUP AND ADDING TO IT EVERYTHING IMAGINABLE

BUT AT LEAST THE MARKET DIDN'T CRASH

EXCLUDED ARE GAINS ON REAL ESTATE IN THE FOURTH QUARTER AND PENSION ASSETS IN THE THIRD QUARTER PLUS THE EFFECT OF THE RESERVE ADDITION

IN A RELATED MATTER A REVIEW COMMISSION ADMINISTRATIVE LAW JUDGE ON OCTOBER EIGHTEENTH THREW OUT THE OSHA CITATIONS AGAINST MAXWELL
THE CITATIONS ISSUED IN APRIL NINETEEN EIGHTY SEVEN <NOISE> CHARGED RECORD KEEPING VIOLATIONS
THE OFFICIAL DISALLOWED OSHA'S INSTANT BY INSTANT CITATION WHICH PROPOSED A TOTAL FINE OF SIX HUNDRED AND NINETY THOUSAND
THE OFFICIAL SAID OSHA DIDN'T ISSUE THE CITATION WITHIN SIX MONTHS A- SPECIFIED BY LAW FROM THE TIME AN OFFICIAL INSPECTION BEGINS
TO CURB DOMESTIC CONSUMPTION AND SALVAGE THE TRADE SURPLUS BRAZIL'S ECONOMIC PLANNERS RECENTLY IMPOSED A TOUGH PACKAGE OF TAX AND PRICE INCREASES
THE RESULT BRAZILIANS LAST WEEK RIOTED IN THE STREETS OF BRASILIA IN THE WORST VIOLENCE IN THE COUNTRY'S CAPITAL IN ITS TWENTY SIX YEAR HISTORY
AND A GENERAL STRIKE HAS BEEN TENTATIVELY SET FOR DECEMBER TWELFTH
RATES ARE DETERMINED BY THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN THE PURCHASE PRICE AND FACE VALUE
THUS HIGHER BIDDING NARROWS THE INVESTOR'S RETURN WHILE LOWER BIDDING WIDENS IT
THE PERCENTAGE RATES ARE CALCULATED ON A THREE HUNDRED AND SIXTY DAY YEAR WHILE THE COUPON EQUIVALENT YIELD IS BASED ON A THREE HUNDRED AND SIXTY FIVE DAY YEAR
THE LASTEST DISCLOSURES ARE AN OUTGROWTH OF THAT PROBE
ALREADY THE DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION HAS ACCUSED DELTA AIRLINES AND EASTERN AIRLINES OF ENGAGING IN UNREALISTIC SCHEDULING AT ATLANTA'S HARTSFIELD AIRPORT

PROFITS OFTEN EXCEED TEN TIMES THESE INVESTORS' ORIGINAL STAKE
