SUCH TRUSTS AREN'T COMPLETELY INVIOLATE CREDITORS CAN CLAIM THE MONEY AFTER A BANKRUPTCY FOR INSTANCE
BUT THEY ARE CONSIDERED BETTER THAN A MERE PROMISE TO THE EXECUTIVE
THE DRUG AZIDOTHYMIDINE OR A. Z. T. IS THE FIRST PRESCRIPTION DRUG FOR ACQUIRED IMMUNE DEFICIENCY SYNDROME TO GET FEDERAL FOOD AND DRUG ADMINISTRATION APPROVAL
A. Z. T. IS MARKETED UNDER THE NAME RETROVIR BY BURROUGHS WELLCOME COMPANY AT AN ANNUAL RETAIL DOSAGE COST OF ABOUT TEN THOUSAND DOLLARS
IT ALSO IS THE MOST EXPENSIVE PRESCRIPTION DRUG PROMPTING FEARS THAT SOME INSURERS WHO NORMALLY PROVIDE PRESCRIPTION DRUG COVERAGE WILL BALK AT ITS PRICE
NOW THE ISSUE IS IN THE HOUSE'S LAP

BUT THE STATE CONSTITUTION MAY REQUIRE THE MONEY TO BE RETURNED DIRECTLY TO TAXPAYERS
THAT APPEARS MORE IN LINE WITH REPUBLICAN THINKING
REPUBLICANS ASKED HOW TO DISBURSE THE SURPLUS SPLIT FIFTY FIFTY BETWEEN SCHOOLS AND PERSONAL TAX REBATES
HARRY TRUMAN WHISTLE STOPPED THE COUNTRY IN NINETEEN FORTY EIGHT CAMPAIGNING AGAINST A PAROCHIAL DO NOTHING CONGRESS THAT WOULD NOT ENACT HIS LEGISLATIVE PROGRAM
HE STRUCK A CHORD IN THE AMERICAN PEOPLE NOT ONLY WINNING A STUNNING UPSET BUT ALSO DEFEATING SCORES OF REPUBLICAN CONGRESSMEN IN THE PROCESS
TRUMAN RECOGNIZED THAT A PRESIDENTIAL CONTEST IS NOT JUST A RACE AMONG CANDIDATES BUT ALSO AN OPPORTUNITY TO DEBATE GREAT ISSUES SUCH AS THE PROPER SEPARATION OF POWERS
THE CONTEST THEN ISN'T IDEOLOGICAL
IT'S CHARACTER PERSONALITY EXPERIENCE
IT'S CULTURAL AS MUCH AS ANYTHING ELSE

A SENIOR ADMINISTRATION OFFICIAL HOWEVER CALLED THE GORBACHEV STATEMENT A WATERSHED EVENT BECAUSE IT WILL INCREASE EXPECTATIONS AMONG SOVIET PEOPLE FOR WITHDRAWAL
COMPLETION OF THE TRANSACTION WHICH ALSO REQUIRES APPROVAL BY REGULATORY AGENCIES AND HOLDERS OF OTHER SECURITIES MUST BE COMPLETED NO LATER THAN NOVEMBER THIRTIETH UNDER THE AGREEMENT
IF IT DOESN'T CLOSE AS EXPECTED BY SEPTEMBER THIRTIETH THE CASH PRICE PAID BY NOVA FOR EACH POLYSAR COMMON SHARE WOULD RISE TEN CANADIAN CENTS
THE CASH PRICE WOULD RISE FIFTEEN MORE CENTS TO FOURTEEN POINT SEVEN FIVE CANADIAN DOLLARS A SHARE IF THE TRANSACTION CLOSES IN NOVEMBER THE SIDES SAID
TRANSAMERICA SAID ITS CONSUMER LENDING BUSINESS ACHIEVED RECORD RESULTS IN THE QUARTER WITH CONSUMER LOANS SECURED BY REAL ESTATE GROWING TO TWO POINT FIVE BILLION DOLLARS
ITS LEASING BUSINESS ALSO POSTED RECORD RESULTS

NEITHER THE VOLUNTEER DOCTORS NOR THE SCIENTISTS CONDUCTING THE EXPERIMENT KNEW WHICH VOLUNTEERS WERE TAKING ACTIVE ASPIRIN AND WHICH WERE TAKING PLACEBOS
HOWEVER A SEPARATE COMMITTEE WAS SET UP TO MONITOR THE RESULTS OF THE EXPERIMENT AS IT PROCEEDED
IT WAS THIS COMMITTEE THAT IN DECEMBER DECIDED THAT THE BENEFITS OF THE ASPIRIN IN REDUCING HEART ATTACKS WERE SO CLEAR THERE WASN'T ANY NEED TO CONTINUE THE EXPERIMENT

WHAT BOTHERS THESE PEOPLE IS NOT THAT MRS. THATCHER POSES A DANGER TO THE SO CALLED UNIFIED EUROPEAN MARKET
MRS. THATCHER IS NOT OPPOSED TO THIS
BRITAIN'S OWN MARKETS ARE MORE OPEN THAN THOSE OF MOST EUROPEAN COUNTRIES LONDON IS WAY AHEAD OF THEM ON CAPITAL MOVEMENT HAVING ABOLISHED EXCHANGE CONTROLS ALTOGETHER
THE CAUSE OF THE OUTRAGE IS THAT EUROPEAN UNITY IS THE DEVICE THROUGH WHICH THE REGULATORS AND SOCIALISTS HOPE TO EXPAND THEIR GRIP ON THE CONTINENT
RATES ARE DETERMINED BY THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN THE PURCHASE PRICE AND FACE VALUE
THUS HIGHER BIDDING NARROWS THE INVESTOR'S RETURN WHILE LOWER BIDDING WIDENS IT
THE PERCENTAGE RATES ARE CALCULATED ON A THREE HUNDRED AND SIXTY DAY YEAR WHILE THE COUPON EQUIVALENT YIELD IS BASED ON A THREE HUNDRED AND SIXTY FIVE DAY YEAR
LAST YEAR SPONSORS OF A STRONG ACID RAIN BILL CLAIMED TO HAVE A TENTATIVE ONE VOTE MAJORITY ON THE COMMITTEE IN FAVOR OF THEIR BILL
THE MEASURE WAS CO SPONSORED BY ONE THIRD OF THE HOUSE AND SUPPORT APPEARED TO BE GROWING

THE F. S. L. I. C. FUND IS SUPPOSED TO COVER INSURED DEPOSITS OF EIGHT HUNDRED AND NINETY BILLION IN THE NATION'S THREE THOUSAND FEDERALLY INSURED THRIFTS
EVEN THE BANK BOARD'S STATED ONE POINT NINE BILLION OF RESERVES IS THE LOWEST RATIO OF RESERVES TO DEPOSITS EVER

THE THIRTY EIGHT YEAR OLD DOCTRINE A CREATION OF THE F. C. C. REQUIRES BROADCASTERS AIRING CONTROVERSIAL MATERIALS TO GIVE OPPONENTS FREE AIR TIME TO RESPOND
SUPPORTERS OF THE DOCTRINE SAY IT ENSURES THAT MINORITY VIEWPOINTS RECEIVE A HEARING ON TELEVISION AND RADIO
BUT DETRACTORS SAY THE REQUIREMENT VIOLATES THE FIRST AMENDMENT RIGHTS OF BROADCASTERS AND INHIBITS THEM FROM RUNNING PROVOCATIVE PROGRAMS
NOT LONG AGO TENNECO WAS CONSIDERED AN UNLIKELY RESTRUCTURING CANDIDATE
ITS HEAVY DEBTS AND DEPRESSED ENERGY AND FARM EQUIPMENT BUSINESSES MADE IT APPEAR IMMUNE TO RAIDERS
BUT THE COMPANY'S IMPROVING BUSINESS PROSPECTS AND ASSET VALUES HAVE CHANGED THAT
IN YOUR ARTICLE YOU NOTED THAT A COMPANY'S HISTORY OFTEN JUST WALKS OUT THE DOOR WHEN KEY EMPLOYEES RETIRE OR MOVE ON TO OTHER JOBS
THE FIRMS WE HAVE WORKED WITH HAVE ALL BEEN DETERMINED TO AVOID THIS FORM OF CORPORATE AMNESIA
ALTHOUGH NOT ALL OF OUR CLIENTS HAVE EXTENSIVE ARCHIVES THEY HAVE ALL RECOGNIZED THE VALUE OF HAVING A CORPORATE ORAL HISTORY PROGRAM
UNFAIR OR NOT THE QUESTIONS HAVE BEEN ASKED ABOUT BOTH THE REVOLUTION'S ROUTE AND ITS GOALS HOW MUCH VIOLENCE WILL THERE BE

HOW MANY WHITES WILL LOSE THEIR JOBS
HOW COMMUNIST IS THE A. N. C.
HOW MUCH WILL THE GOVERNMENT CONTROL THE ECONOMY
STEW LEONARD WHO RUNS STEW LEONARD'S A LARGE GROCERY STORE IN NORWALK CONNECTICUT ACCOMMODATED ALL FOUR OF HIS CHILDREN THIS WAY
HE FIRST NAMED HIS OLDEST SON PRESIDENT
THEN HE SET UP A BAKERY BUSINESS IN THE STORE FOR HIS DAUGHTER
FOR HIS YOUNGER SON HE CREATED AN OPEN AIR FARMER'S MARKET IN DANBURY CONNECTICUT WHERE HE ALSO IS BUILDING A SUPERMARKET FOR THE SON TO RUN <NOISE>
AND MR. LEONARD'S OTHER DAUGHTER
SHE BECAME DIRECTOR OF THE COMPANY'S HUMAN RESOURCES DEPARTMENT

SHE HAD CHARM IN FRONT OF THE CAMERA AN EXPERTLY CRAFTED FACADE BUT INSIDE SHE WAS IN TURMOIL

IN EXCHANGE FOR ITS INTEREST IN ARGO'S OIL AND GAS PROPERTIES SENECA SAID IT WILL REFINANCE SOME OF THE ARGO DEBT
IN ADDITION SENECA SAID IT AND THE SUCCESSOR CORPORATION TO ARGO WILL ENTER INTO A JOINT VENTURE TO EXPLORE AND FURTHER DEVELOP THE ARGO PROPERTIES IT IS ACQUIRING
BUT SIX YEARS OF HUGE TRADE DEFICITS AND BUDGET DEFICITS HAVE CHANGED ALL THAT
BY THE END OF LAST YEAR THE DEPARTMENT SAYS FOREIGNERS HELD TWO HUNDRED AND SIXTY FOUR BILLION DOLLARS MORE THAN U. S. ASSETS THAN AMERICANS HELD OVERSEAS
SOME ADMINISTRATION OFFICIALS DOUBT THE ACCURACY OF THOSE NUMBERS BUT NO ONE QUESTIONS THE TREND
THE COMPLEX PLAN GRADUALLY GIVES THE COMPANY TO THE DEBT HOLDERS SAID CHARLES E. BAYLESS FINANCIAL VICE PRESIDENT
IN CONTRAST IF THE UTILITY BEGAN BANKRUPTCY PROCEEDINGS THEY THE DEBT HOLDERS WOULD GET IT RIGHT NOW HE SAID
IN EITHER CASE THE INTERESTS OF THE UTILITY'S COMMON SHAREHOLDERS WOULD BE SUBSTANTIALLY DILUTED HE SAID

LAST YEAR WAS THE WORST SINCE NINETEEN EIGHTY ONE IN THE RAW NUMBER OF DOWNGRADES AND THE SECOND WORST ON A PERCENTAGE BASIS
SOME SEVENTY ONE PERCENT OF ALL CHANGES IN DEBT RATINGS WERE NEGATIVE LAST YEAR COMPARED WITH SEVENTY THREE PERCENT IN NINETEEN EIGHTY TWO
THE BEST YEAR OF THE PAST SIX WAS NINETEEN EIGHTY FOUR IN WHICH FIFTY ONE PERCENT OF REPORTED CHANGES WERE DOWNGRADES
THE NEW GOVERNMENT HAS STARTED TO LOWER PERSONAL INCOME TAXES AND AT THE SAME TIME IT HAS BEGUN TO BRING ITS OWN SPENDING UNDER CONTROL
IN THE NINETEEN EIGHTY SEVEN BUDGET THE HIGHEST RATE OF INCOME TAX WAS LOWERED TO FIFTY EIGHT PERCENT FROM SIXTY FIVE PERCENT
THIS IS PART OF A WORLD WIDE MOVEMENT THAT FRANCE MUST FOLLOW TO KEEP ITS MOST ENERGETIC AGGRESSIVE AND BRIGHT YOUNG PEOPLE AND TO *ATTRACT* INVESTORS-

HE PLANNED TO START A COMPANY TO IMPORT HANDMADE GOODS FROM EUROPE

MOST BIG TRADES HOWEVER ARE NEGOTIATED BY TELEPHONE AND THEN RECORDED IN THE SYSTEM'S COMPUTERS

THE COMPANY SAID DUE TO THE STORE'S ABOVE AVERAGE SIZE AND THE LEVEL OF SALES VOLUME IT HAS DEVELOPED <NOISE> THE STORE HAS NOT BEEN PROFITABLE

THE FIRST WAS A COMPOSITE TAPE THAT BROUGHT INFORMATION FROM VARIOUS MARKET CENTERS ONTO ONE TICKER TAPE

THOSE IDENTIFIED AS BENEFICIAL OWNERS HOLD AT LEAST TEN PERCENT OF A COMPANY'S EQUITY SECURITIES
<NOISE> UNLESS OTHERWISE NOTED CHANGES INVOLVED DIRECT HOLDINGS OF COMMON STOCK AND TOOK PLACE IN MAY NINETEEN EIGHTY EIGHT
COMPANIES ARE LISTED WHERE TRANSACTIONS GENERALLY AGGREGATE TEN THOUSAND SHARES OR ONE HUNDRED THOUSAND DOLLARS
MANY PARENTS IMPATIENT FOR CHANGE IN THE SCHOOLS RESPOND BY KEEPING THEIR KIDS OUT OF KINDERGARTEN AN EXTRA YEAR
<NOISE> MOTIVES ARE MIXED
SOME SAY THEY WANT TO PROTECT THEIR CHILDREN OTHERS ANGLE FOR AN AGE ADVANTAGE THAT WILL VAULT THEIR OFFSPRING TO THE HEAD OF THE CLASS THE FOLLOWING YEAR
MANY SCHOOLS ARE ENCOURAGING HOLDOUTS RESULTING IN WHAT SOME EDUCATORS CALL THE GRAYING OF KINDERGARTEN
FURTHER SIGNS OF STRONG U. S. ECONOMIC GROWTH ARE EXPECTED TO EMERGE FROM A LABOR DEPARTMENT REPORT NEXT FRIDAY ON THE NATION'S EMPLOYMENT PICTURE FOR AUGUST
<NOISE> IF SO FEDERAL RESERVE OFFICIALS MAY RAISE SHORT TERM INTEREST RATES FURTHER WITHIN A FEW WEEKS SEVERAL ANALYSTS SAID
THEY ALSO PREDICTED THAT BANKS WILL RAISE THEIR PRIME OR BASE RATES AGAIN TO TEN AND A HALF PERCENT OR ELEVEN PERCENT FROM THE CURRENT TEN PERCENT LEVEL
<NOISE> AS MANY EMPLOYERS ARE THE BIG BROKER IS ENDING A DEFINED BENEFIT PLAN THAT PROVIDED PENSIONS BASED ON SALARY AND YEARS OF SERVICE
DEFINED BENEFITS HAVE BECOME COSTLIER TO ADMINISTER BECAUSE OF NEW TAX AND ACCOUNTING RULES
AND EMPLOYEES TEND TO SEE A PENSION YEARS AWAY AS LESS VALUABLE THAN A PAYMENT HERE AND NOW
ALL OF THIS HAS LED MORE FIRMS TO ADOPT DEFINED CONTRIBUTION PLANS IN WHICH SALARY AND SERVICE DETERMINE ANNUAL PAYMENTS TO AN EMPLOYEE'S ACCOUNT
BUT THE COMPANY ALSO IS SUFFERING THE CONSEQUENCES OF SOME BASIC STRATEGIC ERRORS
FOR EXAMPLE ADVANCED MICRO WAS SLOW TO BEGIN PRODUCING CHIPS MADE WITH A FABRICATION TECHNOLOGY CALLED COMPLEMENTARY METAL OXIDE SEMICONDUCTOR OR CMOS
THEY USE LESS POWER AND RUN FASTER THAN CONVENTIONAL CHIPS BUT ADVANCED MICRO REMAINED COMMITTED TO AN OLDER TECHNOLOGY UNTIL NINETEEN EIGHTY SEVEN
INVESTORS CONTINUE TO FLOCK TO THE MORE CONSERVATIVE STOCK PORTFOLIOS
<NOISE> GROWTH AND INCOME FUNDS WHICH COMBINE HEFTY DIVIDENDS WITH THE GOAL OF CAPITAL APPRECIATION <NOISE> LED ALL OTHER STOCK FUND CATEGORIES IN SALES FOR JUNE
AMONG BOND FUNDS LONG TERM MUNICIPAL FUNDS CAPTURED THE TOP SPOT
WHEN HU YAOBANG WAS DUMPED IN JANUARY AS THE COMMUNIST PARTY'S SECRETARY GENERAL MR. ZHAO WAS ELEVATED TO THAT POST ON AN ACTING BASIS
THAT MADE MR. ZHAO A PROTEGE OF DENG XIAOPING THE DE FACTO HEAD OF THE PARTY AS WELL AS THE GOVERNMENT <NOISE>
IT IS A DELICATE POSITION REQUIRING HIM TO MANEUVER AMONG VARIOUS INTEREST GROUPS AND PERSONAL CLIQUES THAT MAKE UP CHINA'S TOP LEADERSHIP
<NOISE> IN THE CAREFREE DAYS BEFORE DEREGULATION IN NINETEEN SEVENTY EIGHT FIVE BIG AIRLINES HANDLED MOST OF THE PASSENGER TRAFFIC IN AND OUT OF LAMBERT SAINT
LOUIS INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT
THEN CAME THE AIR WARS
AFTER DECONTROL NINE MORE AIRLINES INVADED THE MARKET ALL TRYING TO LURE A SHARE OF THE TWENTY MILLION TRAVELERS WHO USE THIS AIRPORT EACH YEAR
IN ASIAN TRADING YESTERDAY THE DOLLAR REBOUNDED FROM WHAT SOME TRADERS SAID WAS AN OVERSOLD CONDITION
WEDNESDAY'S DECLINE TRIGGERED BUY ORDERS AND SOME TRADERS BOUGHT DOLLARS TO COVER SHORT OR OVERSOLD POSITIONS
BUT AFTER CLIMBING TO INTRADAY HEIGHTS OF ONE POINT EIGHT OH FIVE FIVE MARKS AND ONE HUNDRED AND FORTY ONE POINT SIXTY SIX YEN THE DOLLAR BEGAN SINKING AGAIN
SOUTHLAND WOULD HAVE ABOUT FOUR POINT EIGHTY NINE BILLION DOLLARS OF DEBT AFTER THE BUY OUT IS COMPLETED
THE COMPANY PLANS TO PAY OFF ABOUT ONE BILLION DOLLARS OF THAT BY THE END OF NINETEEN EIGHTY NINE LARGELY FROM THE SALE OF ASSETS
SOUTHLAND EXPECTS PROCEEDS FROM ASSET SALES TO TOTAL EIGHT HUNDRED AND SIXTY SEVEN MILLION DOLLARS BY THE END OF NEXT YEAR
BIDS TOTALING THREE HUNDRED AND SEVENTY SIX MILLION DOLLARS WERE SUBMITTED
ACCEPTED BIDS RANGED FROM SEVEN POINT ONE FIVE PERCENT TO SEVEN POINT ONE SEVEN THREE PERCENT
THE BANK HOLDING COMPANY SLATED ANOTHER FIFTY MILLION DOLLAR SALE NEXT TUESDAY
THE ADMINISTRATION EXPECTS ECONOMIC GROWTH TO REBOUND AFTER THE EFFECTS OF THE STOCK MARKET CRASH WANE
IT FORECASTS A THREE POINT FIVE PERCENT GROWTH RATE FOR NINETEEN EIGHTY NINE AND NINETEEN NINETY AND STEADILY FALLING INTEREST RATES AND INFLATION RATES
BUT FORECASTERS INSIDE GOVERNMENT AND OUT HAVE A POOR RECORD IN PREDICTING ECONOMIC TRENDS THAT FAR IN THE FUTURE
FOR A SHIP OR MISSILE GUIDED BY THE WRONG TIME SIGNAL THAT LITTLE GAP COULD MEAN ARRIVING AT THE WRONG DESTINATION
IF WE LET THE DIFFERENCE GROW SAYS MR. MCCARTHY WE COULD RUN INTO PROBLEMS OVER THOUSANDS OF YEARS
IT MIGHT BE NOON BY ATOMIC TIME BUT DARK OUTSIDE <NOISE>
MOREOVER SOME HOUSING SPECIALISTS SAY PERMIT ACTIVITY IS A POOR INDICATOR OF FUTURE STARTS ARGUING THAT IT REFLECTS CURRENT HOUSING ACTIVITY RATHER THAN PREDICTING FUTURE ACTIVITY
THEY PREDICT THAT INSTEAD OF FALLING HOUSING STARTS WILL IMPROVE IN COMING MONTHS IN REACTION TO INCREASING NEW AND EXISTING HOME SALES
ONE NOTABLE EXCEPTION TO THIS TREND WILL BE THE SOUTHWEST WHICH HAS BEEN BATTERED BY RECESSION AND A HOUSING GLUT
ANYONE WHO ACCEPTS THE JOB OF INVESTIGATING THE SPEAKER SHOULD BE PREPARED TO TAKE SOME HEAT
LAST WEEK COMMON CAUSE CALLED FOR AN INVESTIGATION OF MR. WRIGHT'S FINANCES
THE SPEAKER RETALIATED IN A PUBLIC STATEMENT AND HIS MINIONS IN THE LEADERSHIP SAID THE GROUP WAS DEAD ON CAPITOL HILL
BUT MR. EDELL HAS ARGUED THAT MRS. CIPOLLONE HEARD CONFLICTING MESSAGES ABOUT THE HAZARDS OF HER HABIT
IN A DEPOSITION READ TO THE COURT IN APRIL MRS. CIPOLLONE SAID SHE WAS INITIALLY ATTRACTED TO SMOKING BECAUSE OF ITS SEDUCTIVE CONNOTATIONS OF HOLLYWOOD AND GLAMOUR
THE CIGARETTE MAKERS' ADVERTISEMENTS REINFORCED THESE PERCEPTIONS AND OTHERS OF THE PRODUCT'S SAFETY THE PLAINTIFF CONTENDS
MR. AGEE SAID THE LOSSES WERE A DISAPPOINTMENT AND A SURPRISE TO THE BOARD TOO
THAT SUGGESTS THAT MR. AGEE MIGHT HAVE BEEN BROUGHT IN TO SHAKE THINGS UP
IN A TELEPHONE INTERVIEW FRIDAY MR. AGEE DIDN'T RULE ANYTHING OUT
MR. ICAHN WANTS TO GIVE HOLDERS A MIXTURE OF TWENTY DOLLARS A SHARE IN CASH AND ABOUT THIRTY DOLLARS A SHARE FACE AMOUNT OF DEBENTURES
ON SOME LEDGERS THAT MIGHT SEEM TO ADD TO UP TO FIFTY DOLLARS
BUT SOME INSIDERS APPARENTLY PREFER THIRTY SIX TO THIRTY EIGHT DOLLARS IN CASH
FOUR T. W. A. VICE PRESIDENTS THREE CURRENT ONE DEPARTED RECENTLY SOLD ALL THEIR SHARES AT THOSE PRICES
RATES ARE DETERMINED BY THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN THE PURCHASE PRICE AND FACE VALUE
THUS HIGHER BIDDING NARROWS THE INVESTOR'S RETURN WHILE LOWER BIDDING WIDENS IT
THE PERCENTAGE RATES ARE CALCULATED ON A THREE HUNDRED SIXTY DAY YEAR WHILE THE COUPON EQUIVALENT YIELD IS BASED ON A THREE HUNDRED SIXTY FIVE DAY YEAR
SUEZ WHICH HAD TO RAISE ITS CAPITAL SEVERAL TIMES LAST YEAR THROUGH RIGHTS ISSUES TO FUND ITS BELGIAN BATTLE SAYS IT CAN FUND ITS ACQUISITION OF C.
INDUSTRIELLE OUT OF ITS CASH HOARD OR THROUGH SHORT TERM LOANS
ONE SOURCE SAYS SUEZ IF VICTORIOUS WOULD LIKELY RESELL PART OF ITS STAKE IN C.
INDUSTRIELLE TO RECOUP PART OF ITS COSTS
IT COULD ALSO SELL OFF C.
INDUSTRIELLE ASSETS SUCH AS REAL ESTATE AND MINORITY INDUSTRIAL HOLDINGS ESTIMATED AT BETWEEN ONE BILLION AND TWO BILLION FRANCS

KITTENS NEED SOCIALIZATION
ONCE A KITTEN IS MORE THAN FOUR MONTHS OLD IT IS CONSIDERED MATURE ENOUGH BY THE A. S. P. C. A. TO BE ON ITS OWN DURING THE DAY

POLICE REPORTED FIFTEEN HUNDRED ARRESTS AS THEY ATTEMPTED TO CONTROL THE SIXTEEN THOUSAND HINDU RIOTERS IN THE INDIAN CAPITAL
THE RIOTING ERUPTED DURING A GENERAL STRIKE CALLED TO PROTEST A RECENT WAVE OF KILLINGS
MR. SCANLON EXPECTS BUSINESS TO BEGIN TAILING OFF ONLY AFTER APRIL FIFTEENTH UNTIL THEN PEOPLE WILL STILL BE MAKING CONTRIBUTIONS TO I. R. A.S FOR NINETEEN EIGHTY SIX
SUCH CONTRIBUTIONS EVEN IF THEY'RE MADE IN EARLY NINETEEN EIGHTY SEVEN QUALIFY FOR A FULL TAX DEDUCTION
A PERSON WHO PUTS TWO THOUSAND DOLLARS INTO AN I. R. A. CAN DEDUCT TWO THOUSAND DOLLARS FROM THE NINETEEN EIGHTY SIX GROSS INCOME IN DETERMINING TAXABLE INCOME
DEPENDING ON THE PERSON'S NINETEEN EIGHTY SIX TAX BRACKET THAT CAN SAVE UP TO ONE THOUSAND DOLLARS IN FEDERAL TAXES
MR. CRUZ SAID HE HAD SET DEADLINES FOR THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE REFORMS HE WAS PROPOSING

THERE ARE UNCONFIRMED REPORTS OF WORKERS STARVING TO DEATH HERE

BUT WITH EIGHTY PERCENT OF BUSINESS DONE IN THE LAST THREE MONTHS OF THE YEAR IT'S TOO EARLY TO FORECAST THE CHRISTMAS SEASON

HIS PROBLEM IS NOT LACK OF SELF ESTEEM

IN THE CURRENT DEBATE MR. BUSH IS USING THE A. C. L. U. TO PIN A LIBERAL LABEL ON HIS DEMOCRATIC CHALLENGER
BUT THE A. C. L. U. HAS RELIED THROUGHOUT MUCH OF ITS HISTORY ON REPUBLICAN SUPPORT AND HAS ALLIED ITSELF WITH REPUBLICANS ON NUMEROUS ISSUES
IN THE CURRENT CONTROVERSY SOME REPUBLICANS ARE TRYING TO MINIMIZE THEIR PAST INVOLVEMENT
TO BE SURE THE DEFICIT HAS DECLINED IN THE PAST FEW YEARS
BUT THAT DECLINE IS ENTIRELY THE RESULT OF A RISING SURPLUS IN THE SOCIAL SECURITY TRUST FUND
THAT MONEY SHOULD BE INVESTED TO HELP DEFRAY THE FUTURE RETIREMENT COSTS OF THE BABY BOOMERS INSTEAD IT IS BEING USED TO PAPER OVER THE DEFICIT

BUT SCALI MCCABE WON'T BE EARNING COMMISSIONS FROM THE PURCHASE OF MEDIA SPOTS FOR KIDS R. US

SCALI MCCABE WILL INSTEAD BE PAID ON A NEGOTIATED FEE BASIS FOR CREATING THE ADS
THE FEES WEREN'T DISCLOSED
BUT CRITICS CHARGED THAT THE COLLAR ACTUALLY ADDED TO VOLATILITY BY MAKING IT MORE DIFFICULT FOR INDEX ARBITRAGERS TO DO THEIR BUSINESS
MANY TRADERS ARGUE THAT SUCH ARBITRAGE HAS THE EFFECT OF SMOOTHING OUT VOLATILITY IN THE MARKETS
INDEX ARBITRAGERS BUY AND SELL LARGE AMOUNTS OF STOCKS AND STOCKS INDEX FUTURES TO TAKE ADVANTAGE OF BRIEF PRICE DISPARITIES BETWEEN THE TWO RELATED INSTRUMENTS
BANKERS TRUST'S QUARTERLY PROVISION FOR CREDIT LOSSES TOTALED FIVE MILLION DOLLARS COMPARED WITH TWENTY MILLION DOLLARS A YEAR EARLIER
BUT THE BANK HAD NET RECOVERIES OF THREE POINT ONE MILLION DOLLARS COMPARED WITH NINETEEN MILLION DOLLARS OF NET CHARGE OFFS IN THE YEAR EARLIER QUARTER
AND THE TOTAL ALLOWANCE FOR CREDIT LOSSES REMAINED UNCHANGED AT ONE POINT THREE BILLION DOLLARS
JOINT VENTURE PROJECTS THAT ARE STILL UNDER NEGOTIATION ARE TO BE SCRUTINIZED CHINESE OFFICIALS SAY
THOSE INVOLVING CONSTRUCTION OF HOTELS OR OFFICE BUILDINGS AREN'T LIKELY TO WIN GOVERNMENT APPROVAL
CHINA IS EXPECTED TO CONTINUE TO APPROVE MOST INVESTMENTS IN EXPORT RELATED INDUSTRIES AND IN PROJECTS COVERING ENERGY TRANSPORT COMMUNICATIONS RAW MATERIALS AND CHEMICALS
A SHORTAGE OF ENERGY AND RAW MATERIALS IS ALREADY WREAKING HAVOC IN MANY OF CHINA'S MAJOR INDUSTRIES
A FACTORY THAT MAKES NIKE SHOES IN GUANGDONG PROVINCE HAS TO RUN A GENERATOR THREE DAYS A WEEK TO STAY IN OPERATION
THE PLANT'S TAIWANESE JOINT VENTURE PARTNERS ARE STOCKPILING COAL AND OIL FOR POWER IN CASE THEIR SUPPLIES GET CUT OFF
MANY NEARBY CHINESE FACTORIES SIMPLY SHUT DOWN TWO OR THREE DAYS A WEEK FOR WANT OF ENERGY
MOREOVER TWO THOUSAND WORKERS AT THE TIANJIN ALUMINUM PRODUCTS FACTORY RECENTLY WERE ORDERED HOME BECAUSE THE COMPANY COULDN'T GET ENOUGH RAW MATERIALS
AT ONE POINT THIS YEAR SUPPLY SHORTAGES FORCED A THIRD OF THE NATION'S ALUMINUM FACTORIES TO CLOSE
MEANWHILE CIVIL RICO CONTINUES TO ATTRACT PLAINTIFFS WHO WANT TO TURN GENERAL BUSINESS DISPUTES THAT BELONG IN STATE COURTS INTO FEDERAL OFFENSES
FOR EXAMPLE A SMALL CONSORTIUM OF CONTRACTORS WHO CONSULTED ME HAD SUBMITTED THE LOW BID FOR A LARGE MARINA TO BE CONSTRUCTED ON LAKE MICHIGAN
THE SECOND LOWEST BIDDER RECENTLY FILED A CIVIL RICO ACTION CLAIMING THAT MISREPRESENTATIONS WERE MADE BY THE SUCCESSFUL BIDDERS USING THE TELEPHONE THEREBY COMMITTING FEDERAL WIRE FRAUD
NO MATTER WHAT THE DETERMINATION OF THE SUIT THE LOW BIDDERS ALREADY HAVE FELT THE STING OF SUCH POISONOUS WORDS AS RACKETEER
SUCH RESULTS ARE CAUSING SOME WALL STREET PROFESSIONALS TO TAKE THE JANUARY INDICATOR LESS *SERIOUSLY* THAN THEY USED TO
IN PUTTING LESS EMPHASIS ON SOME OF THESE TRADITIONAL *BAROMETERS* SAYS EUGENE PERONI DIRECTOR OF TECHNICAL RESEARCH FOR JANNEY MONTGOMERY SCOTT INC. IN PHILADELPHIA
THEY ARE NOT THE MOST SCIENTIFIC THINGS AROUND

THE REAL ISSUE IS NOT THE DOLLAR AMOUNT OF U. S. FOOD EXPORTS BUT WHETHER THOSE EXPORTS ARE SOLD AT A PROFIT OR A LOSS

THE DIET IS A ONE HOUSE LEGISLATURE APPORTIONED BY DISTRICT RATHER THAN POPULATION LIKE THE SENATE AS OPPOSED TO THE HOUSE
THIS MEANS THAT JAPANESE FARMERS HAVE TREMENDOUS CONTROL OVER JAPANESE POLITICS
FOOD PRICES IN JAPAN TAKE FORTY PERCENT OR MORE OF THE AVERAGE PERSON'S WAGE
WITH HOUSING TAKING ANOTHER FORTY PERCENT AND THE FACT THAT THE JAPANESE ARE GREAT SAVERS THEY A(RE)- LEFT WITH ALMOST NO DISCRETIONARY INCOME
THIS IS WHY THEY CANNOT DEVELOP A DOMESTIC MARKET
THEY DON'T HAVE THE MONEY TO SPEND EXCEPT A SMALL AMOUNT OF SAVINGS THAT THEY SPEND ONLY ON SOCIAL OCCASIONS OR FOR UNUSUAL BARGAINS
BUT MANY TIBETANS CONSIDER THE DALAI LAMA TO BE THEIR RIGHTFUL POLITICAL LEADER AS WELL SOMETHING THE CHINESE CAN'T ACCEPT
TRAVELERS KEPT TIBETANS WELL INFORMED OF THE DALAI LAMA'S RECENT VISIT TO THE U. S. AND HIS CALLS FOR TIBETAN INDEPENDENCE

UNDER THE NEW SYSTEM SHOPS ARE ONLY SUPPOSED TO HANDLE TAPES THAT ARE PACKAGED IN THE COLOR CODED CASES
TAPES APPROVED BY ADULTS ONLY ARE IN RED CASES
TAPES THAT CAN BE WATCHED BY CHILDREN AGE THIRTEEN OR OLDER COME IN BLUE CONTAINERS
AND TAPES SUITABLE FOR ALL AGE GROUPS ARE PACKAGED IN GREEN
THE DIFFERENT COLORED CASINGS ARE MADE BY A LOCAL COMPANY
ACCORDING TO SOME PHYSICIANS THIS IS ESPECIALLY TRUE WITH BUSY YOUNG PROFESSIONALS
THEY REFUSE TO REST AND DEMAND TREATMENT WITH ANTIBIOTICS

HE HAS PUT ALL HIS BUSINESS INTERESTS THAT HAD TRANSACTIONS WITH THRIFTS INCLUDING THOSE WITH LOANS FROM LINCOLN INTO A BLIND TRUST

TO AVOID ANY CONFLICT OVER SALARIES THEY PUT HER FORTY SIX THOUSAND DOLLARS ANNUAL INCOME IN A SAVINGS ACCOUNT AND LIVE OFF HIS THIRTY ONE THOUSAND DOLLAR INCOME
I LOOK AT IT AS SEVENTY SEVEN THOUSAND DOLLARS THAT WE MADE TOGETHER SAYS MR. STEPHENS

HOUSING STARTS IN THE CITY SET A RECORD LAST YEAR AND ARE ON THE SAME PACE THIS YEAR

MR. WASHINGTON GREW UP IN CHICAGO POLITICS
AS A TEEN AGER HE DISTRIBUTED LEAFLETS FOR HIS FATHER ROY A PRECINCT WORKER ON THE SOUTH SIDE
AFTER SERVING AS AN ARMY SERGEANT ON GUAM DURING WORLD WAR TWO HE EARNED A LAW DEGREE FROM NORTHWESTERN UNIVERSITY
HIS MARRIAGE TO HIS HIGH SCHOOL SWEETHEART ENDED IN DIVORCE IN NINETEEN FIFTY ONE
BUT HE ADVANCED THROUGH A SERIES OF DEMOCRATIC PATRONAGE JOBS TO ELECTION TO THE STATE LEGISLATURE AND FINALLY TO CONGRESS IN NINETEEN EIGHTY
THE MOST ACTIVE ISSUE WAS INTEL THE BIG SEMICONDUCTOR COMPANY WHICH ROSE ONE FOURTH TO TWENTY EIGHT AND ONE FOURTH
BUT SOME OTHER BIG ELECTRONICS SHARES SURGED LATE IN THE DAY
S. C. I. SYSTEMS CLIMBED THREE QUARTERS TO FOURTEEN AND THREE EIGHTHS ON TWO HUNDRED AND NINE THOUSAND ONE HUNDRED SHARES
<NOISE> THE TEXSTYRENE CASE ALSO ILLUSTRATES THE SPECIAL RELATIONSHIP BETWEEN DREXEL AND EXECUTIVE LIFE INSURANCE COMPANY A *SUBSIDIARY* OF FIRST EXECUTIVE CORPORATION IN LOS ANGELES
DREXEL KEPT NINE MILLION DOLLARS OF THE TEXSTYRENE BONDS IT HAD BOUGHT BACK FROM ITS EMPLOYEE ACCOUNTS FOR A HUNDRED AND SIX AND A HALF FOR ONLY TWO TRADING DAYS
IT THEN SOLD TEN MILLION DOLLARS OF S- TEXSTYRENE BONDS FOR A HUNDRED AND EIGHT POINT TWO TO EXECUTIVE LIFE
WHEN THE FEDERAL RESERVE EARLIER THIS MONTH RAISED THE DISCOUNT RATE IT DIDN'T INCREASE ITS POPULARITY
G. O. P. POLITICIANS PUBLICLY DAMNED THE MOVE WITH FAINT PRAISE AND PRIVATELY WORRIED THAT THE FED WAS CREATING A RECESSION THAT WOULD WIPE OUT GEORGE BUSH
DEMOCRAT MICHAEL DUKAKIS WAS A LITTLE UNCOMFORTABLE BUT ALLOWED AS HOW HE COULD SEE THE NEED FOR THE MOVE
MR. BRIGHT IS A *QUINTESSENTIAL* TEXAS BUSINESSMAN WHOSE FORTUNES HAVE PLUNGED IN RECENT YEARS ALONG WITH THE STATE'S
WITH INTERESTS IN ENERGY REAL ESTATE AND BANKING MR. BRIGHT HAS HAD AN UNLUCKY HAND IN EACH OF TEXAS' MOST TROUBLED INDUSTRIES
FORBES MAGAZINE ESTIMATES THAT MR. BRIGHT'S FORTUNE HAS BEEN HALVED TO THREE HUNDRED MILLION FROM SIX HUNDRED MILLION A FEW YEARS AGO

THE RESULTS INCLUDED A HUNDRED AND TWENTY FOUR THOUSAND DOLLARS FROM TAX BENEFITS AND DEBT RESTRUCTURING

THE RESULTS INCLUDED FORTY SEVEN THOUSAND DOLLARS IN INCOME FROM TAX BENEFITS
TO BE SURE ON A LOT OF SCORES THE SUMMIT WAS A SUCCESS

<NOISE> IMMEDIATELY AFTER THE ACCIDENT BRITISH AIRWAYS BEGAN CHECKING ITS OTHER JETS FOR CRACKS
IT FOUND CRACKS MORE THAN TWO INCHES LONG IN THIRTY SIX ENGINES ALL OF WHICH IT REMOVED FROM PLANES
<NOISE> EVEN AFTER SPARE ENGINES WERE INSTALLED THIRTEEN JETS WERE GROUNDED
THE REMAINING OFFSETTING COLLECTIONS OF MORE THAN THREE MILLION DOLLARS COMES FROM USER FEES WHICH ALSO CLEARLY ARE NOT TAXES
A USER FEE IS A SPECIFIC CHARGE FOR A DIRECT BENEFIT RECEIVED
LIKE AN ASSET SALE BUT UNLIKE A TAX A USER FEE DOES NOT INVOLVE COMPULSION
ONE CHARACTERISTIC OF USER FEES IS THAT THEY REVEAL HOW MUCH GOVERNMENT PROGRAMS ARE REALLY WORTH TO DIRECT RECIPIENTS IN THE MOST DIRECT AND MEANINGFUL WAY POSSIBLE
<NOISE> ONE OF THE STRONGEST ARGUMENTS THAT A GOVERNMENT PROGRAM IS WORTHWHILE OCCURS WHEN IT HAS A USER FEE AND THE FEE COVERS COSTS
<NOISE> THE REVERSE IS ALSO TRUE AND THAT IS ONE REASON SOME *BENEFICIARIES* OPPOSE USER FEES
THE IMPROVED RESULTS STEM LARGELY FROM GOLD SALES AT THE COMPANY'S GOLD BAR OPERATIONS IN NEVADA WHERE PRODUCTION BEGAN IN JANUARY
WE THINK WE CAN SUSTAIN PRODUCTION OF FORTY FIVE THOUSAND TO FIFTY THOUSAND OUNCES ANNUALLY FOR AT LEAST TEN YEARS MR. WEAVER SAID IN AN INTERVIEW
ATLAS ALSO CONTROLS ABOUT FIFTY THOUSAND ACRES CONTIGUOUS TO GOLD BAR AND EXPLORATION EFFORTS ARE BEING EXPANDED

THE FLIGHT FROM CRETE WILL LAST FOUR TO SIX HOURS DEPENDING ON WINDS AND OTHER FACTORS

HUMANA TRIED TO DEFEND ITSELF THROUGH DIVERSIFICATION AS DID THE OTHER LARGE CHAINS HOSPITAL CORPORATION OF AMERICA AMERICAN MEDICAL INTERNATIONAL INCORPORATED AND NATIONAL MEDICAL ENTERPRISES INCORPORATED
THE IDEA WAS THAT IF A HOSPITAL OWNER ALSO HAD AN INSURANCE PLAN IT COULD STEER PATIENTS TO ITS INSTITUTIONS THROUGH FINANCIAL INCENTIVES
THE PATIENT POOL MIGHT SHRINK BUT THE COMPANY COULD GRAB A BIGGER PART OF IT

SINCE THE GUIDANCE SYSTEMS ARE SIMILAR IN ALL THREE TYPES ARE WE ALSO BANNED FROM PROVIDING THEM TO OUR ALLIES
CRUISES ARE ESSENTIAL OF COURSE BECAUSE THEY CAN CARRY CONVENTIONAL WARHEADS AND THUS DEFEND EUROPE WITHOUT THREATENING A NUCLEAR EXCHANGE
BUT THE U. S. GAVE UP ALL GROUND LAUNCHED CRUISES AS PART OF THE I. N. F. BECAUSE WE SAID IT WAS IMPOSSIBLE TO DISTINGUISH BETWEEN NUCLEAR AND CONVENTIONAL

ALMOST AN EXCESS OF DIGNITY YOU MIGHT SAY
THE NORMALLY PLODDING SEARS IS NOW COPYING WARD'S SPECIALTY STORE SCHEME
<NOISE> ON WEDNESDAY IT AGREED TO BUY WESTERN AUTO SUPPLY COMPANY ITS THIRD SUCH VENTURE INTO SPECIALTY RETAILING IN RECENT MONTHS
LATER THIS YEAR SEARS PLANS TO OPEN SELF CONTAINED APPLIANCE AND HOME SHOPS TO COMPETE WITH WARD
SEARS IS ALSO FOLLOWING WARD'S FORAY INTO SELLING MORE BRANDED MERCHANDISE ESPECIALLY IN APPLIANCES
AND IT IS BRANCHING OUT OF MALLS TO OPEN SMALLER NEIGHBORHOOD STORES THAT COULD WHITTLE AWAY WARD'S CUSTOMER BASE
SO FAR WE'VE FOUND THAT FEDERAL EMPLOYEES HAVE DEALT WITH THIS ISSUE <NOISE> WITH A GREAT DEAL OF SENSITIVITY AND COMMON SENSE
BUT THERE IS A NEED FOR CLARITY
THESE GUIDELINES WILL SERVE AS *REASSURANCE* TO OUR MANAGERS
IT HAS NOW BEEN ELEVEN NIGHTS SINCE THE ARREST OF FRANCIS SEOW *FORMER* SOLICITOR GENERAL AND LAW SOCIETY PRESIDENT IN SINGAPORE

IT HAS REFUSED REQUESTS TO SEE HIM FROM BOTH HIS FAMILY AND HIS LAWYER

THE POSTS HAD BEEN VACANT SINCE EARLY NINETEEN EIGHTY SEVEN <NOISE>
MR. GILMARTIN HAD BEEN DIRECTOR CORPORATE PLANNING FOR THE PARENT COMPANY
HIS BEST PITCH IS HIS SINKER AND IT'S A GREAT ONE
BUT HE'S GOT TO PINPOINT IT TO MAKE IT EFFECTIVE AND THAT'S REALLY DIFFICULT TO DO INNING AFTER INNING AND GAME AFTER GAME SAID DEMPSEY
HE WAS ABLE TO STAY IN GROOVE LONGER THAN ANY PITCHER I'VE SEEN
IT'S STUDY AND ATTITUDE AND CONCENTRATION AND WHO KNOWS WHAT ELSE
ALL I KNOW IS THAT WHEREVER I PUT MY GLOVE TONIGHT THURSDAY IS MOSTLY WHERE THE BALL WENT

SO WHILE THE SUBSIDIES ARE A GREAT HELP MOST FARMERS COULD PROBABLY MANAGE WITHOUT THEM
YET BECAUSE FARMERS HAVE SO MUCH INFLUENCE POLITICIANS CONTINUE TO SUPPORT WHAT IS IN EFFECT A WELFARE SYSTEM FOR FARMERS

IT WANTS TO CONCENTRATE INSTEAD ON DEVELOPING A NEW SIXTEEN TON TRUCK
BUT MR. ASPIN WON'T LET THAT HAPPEN

MONTREAL TRUSTCO IS THE PARENT OF MONTREAL TRUST COMPANY
A CANADIAN TRUST COMPANY IS SIMILAR TO A U. S. SAVINGS AND LOAN ASSOCIATION
THAT DECISION CAME EASILY

NOW THEY'RE TRADING AT TEN TO TWELVE TIMES EARNINGS

UNCONVINCED THE HARRISBURG CITY COUNCIL IN APRIL PASSED AN ORDINANCE REQUIRING LOCAL EMPLOYERS WITH TEN OR MORE EMPLOYEES TO GIVE UP TO TWELVE WEEKS OF UNPAID PARENTAL LEAVE
HARRISBURG IS BELIEVED TO BE THE FIRST U. S. CITY TO PASS SUCH A STATUTE AND IT IS MUCH STRICTER THAN ANY STATE LEGISLATION
FOR INSTANCE WISCONSIN PASSED A PARENTAL LEAVE LAW IN APRIL WHICH PROVIDES ONLY SIX WEEKS OF UNPAID LEAVE AND EXEMPTS COMPANIES WITH FEWER THAN FIFTY EMPLOYEES

IT CAN BORROW INTERMEDIATE TERM FUNDS FROM THE BANK SYSTEM WHICH WOULD ALLOW MERITOR TO MORE CLOSELY MATCH ITS ASSETS AND LIABILITIES
ITS DEPOSITS ARE STILL INSURED BY FEDERAL *DEPOSIT* INSURANCE CORP.

HE'S A BIG POT BELLIED SKINNY LEGGED GUY AND IT KINDA FIT

WHEN STOCKS ARE RISING PORTFOLIO INSURERS DON'T HEDGE AND INSTEAD RIDE THE MARKET HIGHER
WHEN STOCKS ARE FALLING PORTFOLIO INSURERS SELL STOCK INDEX FUTURES IN EFFECT CUSHIONING THE VALUES OF THEIR STOCK PORTFOLIOS FROM THE FULL BRUNT OF A DROPPING MARKET
THE IDEA ACCORDING TO WALL STREET PROPONENTS IS TO PROVIDE PROTECTION AT A LOW COST
SOME REPORTERS WERE MORE ORIGINAL

THAT'S WHY MAGAZINE EXECUTIVES SAY COVERS HAVE TO REACH OUT AND GRAB BUYERS
FED OFFICIALS ARE PARTICULARLY PLEASED WITH THE DOLLAR'S NEW FOUND STRENGTH
THEY SEE IT AS A VOTE OF CONFIDENCE IN THEIR CONDUCT OF MONETARY POLICY IT REDUCES THE THREAT OF INFLATION AND EASES PRESSURE FOR FURTHER INTEREST RATE INCREASES
ECONOMIST DAVID HALE SAYS THE DOLLAR'S STRENGTH IS DIMMING THE PROSPECT OF AN EIGHTY NINE RECESSION AS WELL AS AN EIGHTY EIGHT FINANCIAL CRISIS

OUR MAJOR COMPETITORS INCLUDE SUCH NON MARKET ECONOMIES AS CHINA AND RUSSIA

THE SHARES CARRY AN INITIAL ANNUAL DIVIDEND RATE OF FOUR POINT SIX TWO FIVE PERCENT

IN A FOREST NEAR HERE THIRTY PEOPLE ARE STANDING IN A CIRCLE WITH THEIR HANDS AROUND EACH OTHER'S SHOULDERS
THEY ALL TURN SIDEWAYS AND PLOP DOWN ON EACH OTHER'S LAPS
THEN EACH GIVES THE STRANGER SITTING IN HIS OR HER LAP A BACK MASSAGE
NEVERTHELESS SOME ANALYSTS SAY THAT THE FED ALREADY MAY BE TIGHTENING CREDIT SLIGHTLY
THEY POINT TO RECENT INCREASES IN THE FEDERAL FUNDS RATE WHICH IS THE RATE ON RESERVES THAT BANKS LEND EACH OTHER OVERNIGHT
THE FUNDS RATE AVERAGED ABOUT SEVEN AND FIVE EIGHTHS PERCENT YESTERDAY AND TUESDAY UP FROM AN AVERAGE OF SEVEN POINT FOUR THREE PERCENT IN THE WEEK ENDED OCTOBER SEVEN
THESE ANALYSTS ARGUE THAT THE INCREASE WAS ENGINEERED BY THE FED
TAX TALK BY JAMES BAKER AND HOWARD BAKER RILES ADMINISTRATION CONSERVATIVES
IF THE PRESIDENT SIGNS OFF ON SIGNIFICANT TAXES THERE'LL BE A LOT OF SCREAMING AND SHOUTING SAYS A WHITE HOUSE AIDE
BUT DESPITE THE RHETORIC ANY TAX BILL ACCEPTED BY THE WHITE HOUSE IS LIKELY TO DO LITTLE TO REDUCE THE RED INK
SEVERE NEW TAXES PROPOSED BY THE HOUSE ON TAKEOVERS ALSO APPEAR DOOMED
BUT OTHERS NOTABLY WELLS FARGO INVESTMENT ADVISERS PRESSED ON
WE FELT THAT THE FUTURES MARKET REFLECTED ACTUAL TRADING LEVELS AT THE TIME SAYS FRED GRAUER THE HEAD OF THE WELLS FARGO AND COMPANY SUBSIDIARY
MANY STOCK PRICES HADN'T BEEN UPDATED IN SEVERAL MINUTES HE EXPLAINS AND IT WAS LIKELY THAT SUBSEQUENT STOCK TRADES WOULD BE AT EVEN LOWER LEVELS
BY DAY'S END WELLS SOLD FOURTEEN THOUSAND FUTURES CONTRACTS AMOUNTING TO NEARLY TWO BILLION DOLLARS
THE GUIDE LOOKS DOWN AND PULLS AT HIS SOCKS
LATER HE SAYS WHEN THE RUSSIANS LIBERATED SMOLENSK A NEW COMMISSION FOUND GERMAN BULLETS IN THE SKULLS OF THE OFFICERS
AND THE METHOD BY WHICH THEY WHERE SHOT IN THE BACKS OF THE HEADS WAS A GERMAN METHOD
AND THEY FOUND GERMAN WEAPONS
THAT IS WHY THE RUSSIANS SAID IT WAS DONE BY THE NAZIS IN NINETEEN FORTY ONE
AND THAT IS EVERYTHING I KNOW
STAN WEINSTEIN THE EDITOR OF THE PROFESSIONAL TAPE READER WHICH ALSO RANKED NEAR THE BOTTOM OF THE SURVEY DISAGREES WITH SEVERAL ASSUMPTIONS IN MR. HULBERT'S RANKING METHOD
FOR EXAMPLE MR. WEINSTEIN DISLIKES THE WAY MR. HULBERT CALCULATES ENTRY AND EXIT PRICES
HE SAYS MR. HULBERT SHOULD USE PRICES MIDWAY IN MR. WEINSTEIN'S RECOMMENDED *RANGES* FOR STOCK PURCHASES OR SALES
MR. HULBERT CUSTOMARILY USES MARKET PRICES EITHER THE OPENING PRICE OR THE AVERAGE PRICE FOR THE DAY SHORTLY AFTER THE RECOMMENDATION WAS MADE
IT IS A MISSION THAT REMAINS RELEVANT IN THE POST SEGREGATION ERA
MANY CURRENT MOREHOUSE STUDENTS WERE OFFERED SCHOLARSHIPS BY PREDOMINANTLY WHITE SCHOOLS BUT CAME HERE INSTEAD
FOR EXAMPLE ARCHIE RICH A DETROIT PAROCHIAL SCHOOL GRADUATE TURNED DOWN A DIVING SCHOLARSHIP FROM MICHIGAN'S OAKLAND UNIVERSITY IN FAVOR OF MOREHOUSE
I'VE ALWAYS FELT A STRONG RESPONSIBILITY TO THE BLACK COMMUNITY HE SAYS
MOREOVER A WESTERN FIRM HAS TO MAKE SOME CALCULATION OF WHETHER MR. GORBACHEV WILL SUCCEED IN HIS EFFORTS TO ACTIVATE THE SOVIET WORK FORCE
PAST EXPERIENCE AND CURRENT REPORTS INDICATE THAT HIS CHANCES AREN'T GOOD
ROWLAND EVANS AND ROBERT NOVAK REPORTED FROM MOSCOW LAST WEEK THAT PARTY APPARATCHIKS AND DISAFFECTED SOVIET WORKERS ALREADY ARE UNDERMINING REFORMS
THE BIG SPENDER ROUTINE ASKED ABOUT MY LIQUID ASSETS I TOLD ONE CALLER OF THE ONE THOUSAND DOLLAR IN MY MONEY MARKET FUND
LUNCH MONEY HE SNIFFED
BELIEVE IT OR NOT I'VE SPENT AT LEAST THAT ON LUNCH A COUPLE OF TIMES
U. S. BANKS IN JAPAN CURRENTLY CAN TRADE IN SOME SECURITIES BUT ARE BASICALLY CONFINED TO DEALING WITH THE ONE HUNDRED AND TWENTY LARGEST JAPANESE FINANCIAL INSTITUTIONS
THEY CAN'T DEAL WITH EITHER RETAIL CUSTOMERS OR CORPORATIONS
THEY CAN UNDERWRITE JAPANESE GOVERNMENT BONDS BUT THE SHARE OF SUCH BUSINESS REMAINS VERY SMALL
A MAN WHO DOES THIS THE CONGRESSMEN PROFESS TO BELIEVE CAN'T BE TRUSTED
CERTAINLY HE CAN'T ASSOCIATE WITH THE BOY SCOUTS WHO INHABIT CAPITOL HILL HEARING ROOMS
OFF WITH HIS HEAD
A RECENT VOTING STUDY BY THE COMPETITIVE ENTERPRISE INSTITUTE TRIES TO MEASURE WHAT CONGRESSMEN ACTUALLY DO TO LOWER COMPETITIVE BARRIERS AND END CORPORATE SUBSIDIES NOT WHAT THEY SAY
IN THE LAST SESSION OF CONGRESS THE AVERAGE HOUSE MEMBER VOTED WITH C. E. I. ONLY FORTY PERCENT OF THE TIME
MEMBERS OF THE COMPETITIVENESS CAUCUS FARED WORSE THAN THE HOUSE AS A WHOLE THEIR AVERAGE SCORE WAS ONLY TWENTY NINE PERCENT
G. O. P. REPRESENTATIVE TOM DELAY OF TEXAS CALLS THEM MEMBERS OF THE PROTECTIONIST CAUCUS
WHATEVER WE THINK ABOUT THE CURRENT GOVERNMENT IN IRAN IT IS AMONG THE PLANET'S MOST VITAL TERRITORIES
OUR SHARED ENEMY HAS FIVE DIVISIONS ON IRAN'S NORTHERN BORDER
THIS LOOMING SOVIET PRESENCE THREATENS NOT JUST AFGHANISTAN SOUTH OF THE SOVIET UNION AND EAST OF IRAN BUT THE PERSIAN GULF
THE WARM WATER PORT THE CZARS DREAMED OF IS WITHIN REACH
WE WILL HAVE A LOT MORE THAN SOME KUWAITI TANKERS TO WORRY ABOUT IF THE SOVIETS GET THEIR PAWS ON THE OIL SPIGOT TO WESTERN EUROPE AND JAPAN
IN SHORT FALL OF IRAN TO THE AYATOLLAH WAS BAD NEWS FOR THE WEST THE FALL OF IRAN TO THE SOVIETS WOULD BE UNTHINKABLE
JOHN JENNINGS VICE PRESIDENT OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY OF THE PHARMACEUTICAL MANUFACTURERS' ASSOCIATION SAID DOCTOR PECK MAY HAVE TWO SCIENTISTS BELOW HIM HANDLING DRUG REVIEW
TWO PORTALS INSTEAD OF ONE HEADED BY TWO FINE SCIENTISTS MAY MEAN SPEEDIER HANDLING OF NEW DRUG APPLICATIONS DOCTOR JENNINGS SAID
BUT IF THAT DOOR IS JUST PAINTED ON HE ADDED IT MAY NOT CHANGE A LOT
THE EXPERIMENTAL VACCINE IS MADE FROM THE VIRUS FROM WHICH SMALLPOX VACCINE IS MANUFACTURED
GENES FROM THE SURFACE PROTEIN OF THE HUMAN IMMUNODEFICIENCY VIRUS OR H. I. V. WHICH CAUSES AIDS ARE INSERTED INTO SMALLPOX VACCINE VIRUS USING BIOTECHNOLOGY TECHNIQUES

IN MAINE A KEY SPOKESMAN IS A FORMER STATE LEGISLATOR
BURNUP AND SIMS HAS INTERESTS IN TELECOMMUNICATIONS AND SOFT DRINKS AMONG OTHER THINGS

NO ONE COLLECTS BASKETS OR DISPLAYS THEM

BURGER KING ALSO MAKES BLACKS WAIT THREE TO FOUR TIMES LONGER THAN WHITES FOR APPROVAL OF A NEW OR EXPANSION FRANCHISE THE SUIT SAYS

THE OLD GLASS STEAGALL ARGUMENTS AIMED AT LIMITING RISK AND DANGERS THAT BIG BANKS WOULD END UP CONTROLLING INDUSTRY LOOK MORE AND MORE DATED
INVESTMENT BANKS PROVIDE BILLIONS IN BRIDGE LOANS FOR CORPORATE RESTRUCTURINGS AND TAKEOVERS
INVESTMENT BANKS SEEKING MORE CASH WILL BE ABLE TO TEAM UP WITH COMMERCIAL BANKS WITHOUT HAVING TO LOOK ABROAD AS GOLDMAN SACHS DID TO FIND JAPAN'S SUMITOMO BANK
THAT LINE MAY BE WEARING THIN WITH PRIVATE BANKS
THEY WOULD LIKE TO SEE MORE EVIDENCE OF SOUND POLICY MOVES
OTHERWISE WHY KEEP POURING GOOD MONEY AFTER BAD
IN THE FEBRUARY TWENTY SECOND ACCORD THE U. S. AND ITS ALLIES ASSERTED THAT THE DOLLAR HAD DECLINED ENOUGH
THEY PLEDGED TO INTERVENE JOINTLY IN THE FOREIGN EXCHANGE MARKETS TO KEEP EXCHANGE RATES AT ABOUT THEIR CURRENT LEVELS

MR. TRUMP HAD CHARACTERIZED HIS PURCHASES OF U. A. L. STOCK AS AN INVESTMENT IN A COMPANY WITH *UNDERVALUED* ASSETS
HE HAS SPOKEN OUT FREQUENTLY AGAINST U. A. L. MANAGEMENT IN RECENT WEEKS

I'M NOT RETIRING FROM WORK HE SAID
I'M GOING TO WORK HARD <NOISE>
DESPITE ALL THIS THE NEW S. E. C. CHAIRMAN SAYS HE CAN HANDLE THE CHALLENGES FACING THE AGENCY
THEY COULDN'T HAVE A BETTER PERSON ON THE JOB AT THIS TIME MR. RUDER SAYS
I COME WITH NO BAGGAGE WITH NO PRECONCEIVED IDEAS ABOUT THE BEST REGULATORY METHOD OR THE BEST WAY THE MARKET SHOULD OPERATE
I COME WITH VERY STRONG CONCEPTUAL SKILLS WITH VERY STRONG HISTORICAL KNOWLEDGE OF THE RELATIONSHIP OF THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION <NOISE> TO THE REGULATION OF THE SECURITIES MARKETS
RATES ARE DETERMINED BY THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN THE PURCHASE PRICE AND FACE VALUE
THUS HIGHER BIDDING NARROWS THE INVESTOR'S RETURN WHILE LOWER BIDDING WIDENS IT
THE PERCENTAGE RATES ARE CALCULATED ON A THREE HUNDRED AND SIXTY DAY YEAR WHILE THE COUPON EQUIVALENT YIELD IS BASED ON A THREE HUNDRED AND SIXTY FIVE DAY YEAR
THAT SAME ORGANIZATION HAS REMAINED IN PLACE EVER SINCE

T. L. C. GROUP SAID YESTERDAY THAT IT HAS A FIRM COMMITMENT FROM DREXEL BURNHAM LAMBERT INCORPORATED ITS INVESTMENT BANKER TO FINANCE ITS ACQUISITION
A DREXEL SPOKESMAN SAID HE EXPECTS THE FINANCING TO COME THROUGH A COMBINATION OF BANK LOANS AND HIGH YIELD BONDS
DREXEL FINANCED THE KOHLBERG KRAVIS BUY OUT OF BEATRICE LAST YEAR
DAVID FLEISCHER AN ANALYST AT PRUDENTIAL BACHE SECURITIES THINKS TENNECO BY NINETEEN NINETY OR NINETEEN NINETY ONE COULD EARN EIGHT DOLLARS A SHARE FROM EXISTING OPERATIONS
THAT WOULD BE A SIXFOLD INCREASE FROM NINETEEN EIGHTY SEVEN PROFIT WHICH HE PUTS AT ONLY ONE DOLLAR TWENTY FIVE CENTS A SHARE
TENNECO STANDS TO BENEFIT GREATLY FROM A PICK UP AT ITS OIL AND GAS AND FARM EQUIPMENT BUSINESSES HE SAYS
IT WOULD HAVE BEEN BETTER TO GET THESE POLICY CHANGES WITHOUT THE CHAOS OF A DECLINING MARKET SAYS HARVARD ECONOMIST LAWRENCE SUMMERS
BUT IF THE MARKET GETS PEOPLE TO DO WHAT THEY SHOULD HAVE BEEN DOING ANYWAY IT MIGHT HELP
TO BE SURE THE STOCK CRASH DOES RAISE THE RISK OF RECESSION
THE BENEFITS MENTIONED ABOVE WILL BE OVERWHELMED IF CONSUMERS AND BUSINESSES ARE BADLY SHAKEN AND DECIDE TO SHARPLY REDUCE THEIR SPENDING
AN UNUSUALLY WEAK CHRISTMAS BUYING SEASON OR WIDESPREAD SHELVING OF BUSINESS INVESTMENT PLANS COULD EASILY CAUSE THE MARKET'S PROBLEMS TO SPREAD THROUGHOUT THE ECONOMY
WHETHER THAT HAPPENS DEPENDS FAR MORE ON PSYCHOLOGY THAN ECONOMICS
WE EMPHATICALLY REJECT THE IDEA THAT THE EXECUTIVE BRANCH SUBVERTED THE LAW UNDERMINED THE CONSTITUTION OR THREATENED DEMOCRACY
THE PRESIDENT IS EVERY BIT AS MUCH OF AN ELECTED REPRESENTATIVE OF THE PEOPLE AS IS A MEMBER OF CONGRESS
IN FACT HE AND THE VICE PRESIDENT ARE THE ONLY OFFICIALS ELECTED BY THE WHOLE NATION
STANLEY NABI EXECUTIVE VICE PRESIDENT OF BESSEMER SAID THEY'RE NOT REDUCING THEIR OFFER IF YOU CALCULATE THE OFFER'S VALUE AS OF THURSDAY'S CLOSE
I FIGURE IT WAS WORTH SIXTY FIVE DOLLARS AND EIGHTY FIVE CENTS A SHARE ON THURSDAY
WITH FRIDAY'S REVISION IT'S WORTH SIXTY EIGHT DOLLARS A SHARE
THE REVISED TERMS ARE NO LESS ATTRACTIVE THAN THE ORIGINAL TERMS IN THE POST CRASH MARKET

THE TREASURY RULES HOWEVER CONTAIN MODIFICATIONS OF THE S. E. C. RULES DESIGNED TO IMPROVE PROTECTION OF PARTIES INVOLVED IN REPURCHASE AGREEMENTS
IN SUCH AGREEMENTS CALLED REPOS ONE PARTY SELLS GOVERNMENT SECURITIES TO ANOTHER WITH THE UNDERSTANDING THAT THE SELLER WILL REPURCHASE THEM LATER AT A SPECIFIED PRICE
THE PROPOSED MODIFICATIONS WOULD APPLY TO GOVERNMENT SECURITIES BROKERS OR DEALERS THAT ARE ALREADY REGISTERED AS WELL AS TO NEWLY REGISTERED ENTITIES

COMPANIES WORLD WIDE HAVE BECOME TECHNOLOGICAL TOWERS OF BABEL MS. BENCSIK SAYS FULL OF MISMATCHED MACHINES INCAPABLE OF COMMUNICATING
THAT'S NOT A NICHE FOR DATAPOINT'S NEW NETWORK PRODUCTS SHE SAYS
THAT'S AN ENVIRONMENT
THE LOOK AND FEEL CASES ARE GENERATING CONTROVERSY IN THE INDUSTRY
COMPANIES BRINGING THE SUITS SAY THEY ARE DEFENDING THE REWARDS DUE THOSE WHO DEVELOP INNOVATIVE SOFTWARE FROM COMPANIES THAT ARE SELLING CUT RATE COPIES
BUT OTHERS ARGUE THAT NEW SOFTWARE ALWAYS BORROWS FROM THE OLD
THEY SAY LOTUS IF ITS SUIT SUCCEEDS WILL STIFLE INNOVATION AND DISCOURAGE THE SPREAD OF STANDARDS THAT HELP COMPUTER USERS MASTER SOFTWARE MADE BY DIFFERENT COMPANIES
M. FIFTEEN NOTED THAT IN THE NINETEEN FIFTIES AS A REPRESENTATIVE OF A FIRM OF TIMBER MERCHANTS LORD WILSON HAD MADE NINETEEN VISITS TO THE SOVIET UNION
<NOISE> A FORMER M. FIFTEEN OFFICER JAMES MILLER TOLD THE SUNDAY TIMES THAT HIS CASE OFFICER HAD ASSURED HIM THAT LORD WILSON WAS A SOVIET AGENT
A GROUP OF M. FIFTEEN ZEALOTS UNDERTOOK APPARENTLY ON THEIR OWN TO DRIVE HIM FROM OFFICE
AIRLINES ALSO ROUTINELY HOLD THE LAST FLIGHT OF THE DAY TO A CERTAIN CITY FOR CONNECTING PASSENGERS
<NOISE> THAT'S SO THOSE PASSENGERS WON'T BE STUCK IN A CITY ALL NIGHT
<NOISE> WHILE THE PRACTICE OBVIOUSLY D- BENEFITS MANY FLYERS IT MEANS THAT CERTAIN FLIGHTS WILL ALWAYS BE PRONE TO DELAYS
<NOISE> ANOTHER ALTERNATIVE IS PROVIDED BY COMMUNITY FOUNDATIONS COLLECTIONS OF SMALLER FUNDS DONATED BY MANY INDIVIDUALS
<NOISE> THE ENDOWMENTS ARE POOLED FOR INVESTMENT PURPOSES BUT GRANTS ARE ISSUED UNDER THE INDIVIDUAL DONORS' NAMES
FUNDS CAN BE STARTED FOR AS LITTLE AS FIVE THOUSAND DOLLARS AND CONTRIBUTIONS ARE DEDUCTIBLE AT THE FIFTY PERCENT LIMIT
IF THE PROPOSED TRANSACTION IS COMPLETED COCA COLA WILL BE LEFT WITH HUGE BORROWING CAPACITY
COCA COLA SAID ITS PRO FORMA DEBT WOULD BE REDUCED TO ABOUT NINE PERCENT OF TOTAL CAPITAL
<NOISE> THE COMPANY'S DEBT WAS TWENTY SIX PERCENT OF CAPITAL AT THE END OF THE SECOND QUARTER ITS TARGET RATIO IS THIRTY FIVE PERCENT
THE COMPANY SAID IT INTENDS TO PURCHASE THOSE SHARES TENDERED AT OR BELOW TWENTY EIGHT DOLLARS A SHARE
SHARES TENDERED AT HIGHER PRICES WILL BE RETURNED TO HOLDERS TORCHMARK SAID
IN NEW YORK STOCK EXCHANGE COMPOSITE TRADING FRIDAY TORCHMARK CLOSED AT TWENTY SEVEN DOLLARS AND SEVENTY FIVE CENTS UP A DOLLAR TWENTY FIVE
IT IS CALLED LIPOPROTEIN A. OR SIMPLY L. P. A.
SCIENTISTS PRONOUNCE IT EL PEE LITTLE A.
IT WAS SPOTTED TWENTY FIVE YEARS AGO BUT LONG *IGNORED* BY MAINSTREAM HEART RESEARCHERS
NOW A SERIES OF DISCOVERIES HAS MADE IT THE FOCUS OF A NEW STRATEGY TO UNDERSTAND ATHEROSCLEROSIS THE ARTERY CLOGGING DISEASE THAT IS THE NATION'S LEADING KILLER

BUT NATWEST THEN PUSHING TO DISLODGE BARCLAYS AS BRITAIN'S TOP COMMERCIAL BANK WAS MORE RELUCTANT TO COMMIT ITSELF TO A SIMILAR POSITION IN INVESTMENT BANKING
MOST IMPORTANT IS THE ATTITUDE MR. LIM SAYS
C. E.'S ATTITUDE IS GOOD
WESTINGHOUSE'S ISN'T

R. M. J. SENIOR OFFICIALS WHO OWN FORTY NINE POINT NINE PERCENT OF THE BROKER'S EQUITY WOULD CUT THEIR HOLDINGS TO TEN PERCENT
RATES ARE DETERMINED BY THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN THE PURCHASE PRICE AND FACE VALUE
THUS HIGHER BIDDING NARROWS THE INVESTOR'S RETURN WHILE LOWER BIDDING WIDENS IT
THE PERCENTAGE RATES ARE CALCULATED ON A THREE HUNDRED AND SIXTY DAY YEAR WHILE THE COUPON EQUIVALENT YIELD IS BASED ON A THREE HUNDRED AND SIXTY FIVE DAY YEAR
HOURLY COMPENSATION AT *NONFINANCIAL* FIRMS ROSE AT AN ANNUAL RATE OF THREE PERCENT IN NOMINAL TERMS BUT FELL ZERO POINT EIGHT PERCENT WHEN ADJUSTED FOR INFLATION
SECOND QUARTER HOURLY COMPENSATION ROSE AT AN ANNUAL NOMINAL RATE OF TWO POINT SIX PERCENT <NOISE> BUT FELL TWO POINT TWO PERCENT ON AN INFLATION ADJUSTED BASIS
UNIT LABOR COSTS INCREASED AT A ZERO POINT FOUR PERCENT YEARLY RATE IN THE THIRD QUARTER AFTER A TWO PERCENT RATE OF GAIN IN THE SECOND QUARTER
OTHER GAFFES MAKE VOTERS QUESTION HIS GRASP OF ISSUES
AT A NEWS CONFERENCE HE CONFUSED TACTICAL NUCLEAR WEAPONS WITH NUCLEAR ENERGY PLANTS
THE AVID JOGGER EVERY MORNING AT SIX A. M. A MOUNTAIN CLIMBER ONCE A WEEK COME CLOSE TO CONCEDING INTELLECTUAL FAILINGS
KEMP'S CAMPAIGN TAKES ON AN INCREASINGLY DESPERATE TONE
IN ONE SURE SIGN OF A CANDIDACY IN TROUBLE HE LASHES OUT AT CRITICISM FROM A LIGHTLY REGARDED T. V. COMMENTATOR
EVEN SOME SUPPORTERS NOW SAY PRIVATELY THAT HE SHOULD AIM FOR THE VICE PRESIDENTIAL NOMINATION
BUT HIS LONGTIME HOSTILITIES WITH DOLE LEAVE A SPOT ON A BUSH TICKET AS ABOUT THE ONLY POSSIBILITY

IF THEY'VE GOT SOMETHING TO SHOW US WE'LL TAKE A LOOK AT IT
THEY KNOW WHERE TO FIND US SAID ONE SOURCE
WE'RE NOT STONEWALLING THEM
MR. REAGAN VIGOROUSLY DEFENDED ATTORNEY GENERAL EDWIN MEESE WHO IS UNDER INVESTIGATION FOR HIS ROLE IN ADVANCING A MIDDLE EAST OIL PIPELINE ADVOCATED BY ONE OF MR. MEESE'S FRIENDS

WE'LL TAKE ALMOST ANYTHING

ANOTHER IS IF THE FEDERAL RESERVE EASES INTEREST RATES

MATSUSHITA ELECTRIC INDUSTRIAL WAS UNCHANGED AT TWO THOUSAND SEVENTY
N. E. C. ROSE TEN TO ONE THOUSAND NINE HUNDRED AND TEN
SONY ROSE TWENTY TO FOUR THOUSAND NINE HUNDRED FIFTY
HOWEVER PROFIT FROM FOREIGN TIRE OPERATIONS INCREASED THE COMPANY SAID
SOUTH AMERICAN TIRE OPERATING PROFIT ROSE SIGNIFICANTLY BECAUSE OF HIGHER SALES AND BETTER MARGINS FIRESTONE SAID MORE THAN OFFSETTING A SLIGHT DECLINE IN EUROPE
ALSO FOREIGN CURRENCY GAINS JUMPED TO SIX MILLION DOLLARS FROM ONE MILLION DOLLARS THE COMPANY SAID
EVEN MODEST RETRENCHMENT WOULD MARK A STARK CONTRAST FROM FIDELITY'S HEADY GROWTH OF RECENT YEARS
AT THE END OF NINETEEN EIGHTY THREE THE GROUP EMPLOYED ABOUT TWO THOUSAND PEOPLE AND HAD ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT OF AROUND TWENTY THREE POINT ONE BILLION DOLLARS
WITHIN FOUR YEARS STAFFING GREW FOURFOLD
ASSETS SWELLED TO AROUND EIGHTY FIVE BILLION DOLLARS JUST BEFORE LAST OCTOBER'S CRASH

<NOISE> AS FOR THE U. S. COMMENTS ON GERMAN INFLATION A TYPICAL GERMAN MIGHT RESPOND ZERO INFLATION
WHAT'S WRONG WITH THAT
MR. BROOKS'S ARTICLE AWAKENED MEMORIES OF MY TIME AS MR. HOOK'S STUDENT AT NEW YORK UNIVERSITY'S WASHINGTON SQUARE COLLEGE SOME TWENTY EIGHT YEARS AGO
ONE OF MR. HOOK'S MOST REMARKABLE PARABLES STILL STAYS FRESH IN MY MIND
HE TOLD OF AN OLD MAN DYING IN THE SPRINGTIME WHO CALLED HIS SONS TO HIS BEDSIDE
MY TREASURE HE SAID IS BURIED SOMEWHERE ON THIS FARM
YOU HAVE ONLY TO DIG TO FIND IT
HE DIED AND THE SONS WENT FOR THEIR SHOVELS
SURE ENOUGH THAT AUTUMN THEY FOUND AND SHARED THE TREASURE
THIS WAS SIDNEY HOOK'S PARALLEL FOR THE ADVANTAGES OF DEMOCRACY
S. D. I. PERPETUATES THE ILLUSION THAT MORE WEAPONS EQUALS MORE SECURITY
OUR DEPENDENCE UPON VIOLENCE TO RESOLVE CONFLICT IS A SHORT RUN SOLUTION TO A LONG TERM PROBLEM
IN ORDER TO ENSURE OUR SURVIVAL WE MUST CHANGE THE WAY WE THINK ABOUT CONFLICT
BY SPENDING BILLIONS OF DOLLARS ON DEVELOPING NONVIOLENT MEANS OF RESOLVING CONFLICT WE CAN BUILD A WORLD BEYOND WAR AND A SUSTAINABLE SECURE FUTURE FOR ALL PEOPLE

HE ACCUSED THE COMMITTEE OF WORKING HAND IN GLOVE WITH THE SPECIAL PROSECUTOR THREATENING TO INDICT HIS CLIENT AND USING DIRTY TRICKS BESIDES

HOWEVER HE ADDED I'M VERY IMPRESSED WITH THE BASS PEOPLE

BUT THEY'VE MADE NO COMMITMENT TO ME NOR I TO THEM

BUT HE SAID IT'S BALANCED AT FIFTEEN TO SIXTEEN DOLLARS A BARREL
THAT IS TWO TO THREE DOLLARS A BARREL LESS THAN THE EXPORTERS WERE RECEIVING LAST YEAR

THIS WARNING NOW REPRESENTS A MINORITY VIEW

LET'S JUST SAY IT'S NOT A ROARING SUCCESS SAID ONE WEST COAST FRANCHISEE OF THE WE DO IT LIKE YOU'D DO IT PROMOTIONAL THEME
A SUCCESSFUL AD CAMPAIGN WILL DRIVE SALES AND WE DON'T SEE THAT HAPPENING
A PILLSBURY SPOKESMAN SAID BURGER KING SALES IN THE FISCAL FOURTH QUARTER HAVE BEEN FLAT
MANY OFFICERS AT THE MARINES COMMAND AND STAFF COLLEGE IN QUANTICO VIRGINIA PRIVATELY EXPRESSED CHAGRIN TO A RECENT VISITOR
THEY FEEL THE UNFOLDING NORTH SAGA FEEDS A STEREOTYPE OF MARINES AS HEADSTRONG AND GIVEN TO MACHISMO BUT NOT MUCH ON INTELLIGENCE OR JUDGMENT
OLLIE IS TERRIFIC FOR THE MOVIES SAYS ONE YOUNG OFFICER BUT HE'S AN EMBARRASSMENT TO THE CORPS
BUT JACK CORBETT THE GROUP'S INTERIM PRESIDENT SAYS THE ORGANIZATION PREFERS HAVING POLICY DIRECTORS WITH EXPERTISE IN AVIATION
THE DUES HE SAYS ENTITLE MEMBERS TO SEVERAL TRAVEL ASSISTANCE SERVICES SUCH AS A HOTLINE FOR HELPING FIND LOST LUGGAGE
THE GROUP ALSO WILL LOBBY FOR IMPROVEMENTS IN AIRLINE SERVICE
WE THINK OUR BACKGROUND WILL HELP US COME UP WITH SOLUTIONS HE SAYS
MR. ADELMAN SAYS THAT CLEARLY SERVES MOSCOW
ARMS CONTROL SERVES THE SOVIETS MORE THAN IT SERVES US BECAUSE IT MAKES US MORAL EQUIVALENTS HE SAYS
JUST THROUGH A PRESS RELEASE THEY CAN GIVE THE IMPRESSION THEY FAVOR PEACE
HE ALSO POINTS OUT THAT NUCLEAR ARMS TALKS ARE ALSO WHERE MOSCOW BARGAINS FROM A POSITION OF STRENGTH BECAUSE OF ITS CONVENTIONAL MILITARY SUPERIORITY
TATE AND LYLE'S FINANCE DIRECTOR JAMES KERR MUIR SAYS THE STAKE WAS SOLD BECAUSE WE HAD NO FURTHER COMMERCIAL VALUE FOR THE SHARES
WE WERE NOT GOING TO BE ABLE TO BID AGAIN AND WE WERE HAPPY WITH THE PRICE WE ACHIEVED
TATE AND LYLE PAID AN AVERAGE OF ABOUT TWO HUNDRED SIXTY PENCE A SHARE FOR ITS STAKE

I'D CHARACTERIZE US AS UPSET HE SAID

I DID POLL ON THE FAIRNESS OF THE JUDICIARY COMMITTEE TO JUDGE BORK AND A FIFTY SIX PERCENT TO TWENTY PERCENT MAJORITY THOUGHT THE COMMITTEE HAD BEEN FAIR
I WOULD ALSO POINT OUT THAT AFTER THE CHAPPAQUIDDICK EPISODE OUR POLL FOR TIME MAGAZINE WAS WIDELY VIEWED AS THE MOST BLUNT AND UNSPARING OF SENATOR KENNEDY

THEY'RE VERY INDEPENDENT AND VERY JADED

THE TREASURY RULES HOWEVER CONTAIN MODIFICATIONS OF THE S. E. C. RULES DESIGNED TO IMPROVE PROTECTION OF PARTIES INVOLVED IN REPURCHASE AGREEMENTS
IN SUCH AGREEMENTS CALLED REPOS ONE PARTY SELLS GOVERNMENT SECURITIES TO ANOTHER WITH THE UNDERSTANDING THAT THE SELLER *WILL* REPURCHASE THEM LATER AT A SPECIFIED PRICE
THE PROPOSED MODIFICATIONS WOULD APPLY TO GOVERNMENT SECURITIES BROKERS OR DEALERS THAT ARE ALREADY REGISTERED AS WELL AS TO NEWLY REGISTERED ENTITIES

MOST U. S. BANKS WERE CLOSED ALTHOUGH SEVERAL OF THE LARGER FOREIGN EXCHANGE DEPARTMENTS REMAINED OPEN TO SERVICE CORPORATE AND INSTITUTIONAL CUSTOMERS AND TRADE WITH EUROPE
BUT EVEN THEY WOUND DOWN THEIR TRADING WHEN THE LONDON MARKET SHUT DOWN AROUND NOON EASTERN STANDARD TIME OR AFTER THE CHICAGO FUTURES MARKET CLOSED LATER IN THE AFTERNOON
WEST GERMANY IS PLAYING FOR THE LONG TERM SAYS PIERRE LELLOUCHE OF THE FRENCH INSTITUTE FOR FOREIGN RELATIONS
IT BELIEVES IT CAN GET EAST GERMANY BACK WITHOUT FALLING UNDER SOVIET DOMINATION ITSELF
MR. LELLOUCHE AND MOST OTHER FRENCHMEN DON'T THINK THIS IS POSSIBLE
ONE OF THE BEST KNOWN INTERNATIONAL STOCK PICKERS JOHN TEMPLETON NEARLY EQUALED THE INDEX WITHOUT ANY JAPANESE STOCKS IN HIS SMALL TEMPLETON FOREIGN FUND
HE DID SO VIA WINNING BETS IN SUCH MARKETS AS MEXICO CANADA AND BRITAIN
WE ARE VERY FORTUNATE HE SAID
HIS LARGER FUNDS WHICH CAN INCLUDE U. S. STOCKS DIDN'T FARE AS WELL
JAMES L. WINOKUR OF PITTSBURGH IS AN ART EXPERT AND TRUSTEE OF CARNEGIE INSTITUTE
IN NINETEEN SEVENTY SEVEN AND AGAIN IN NINETEEN SEVENTY EIGHT HE DONATED TEN PERCENT INTERESTS IN FORTY FOUR ART WORKS TO CARNEGIE'S MUSEUM
EACH GIFT ENTITLED IT TO POSSESSION FOR A PROPORTIONAL PART OF A YEAR BUT THE MUSEUM DIDN'T EXERCISE ITS RIGHT
IN NINETEEN SEVENTY NINE WINOKUR DONATED HIS REMAINING EIGHTY PERCENT INTEREST IN FIVE WORKS THE MUSEUM THEN TOOK THOSE FIVE
WINOKUR VALUED THE ART HIMSELF AND TOOK PROPORTIONAL CHARITABLE DEDUCTIONS FOR EACH OF THE THREE YEARS
MR. GORBACHEV'S EFFORTS TO MODERNIZE THE SOVIET ECONOMY RAISE THE PROSPECTS OF WIDENING COMMERCIAL TIES BETWEEN EAST AND WEST
MOSCOW'S DECISION TO WITHDRAW FROM AFGHANISTAN HAS REDUCED U. S. FEARS OF SOVIET EXPANSION
MOST IMPORTANT MR. REAGAN LIKE BRITISH PRIME MINISTER MARGARET THATCHER FINDS THAT HE CAN DEAL WITH MR. GORBACHEV
THE SUPERPOWER CHIEFS HAVE NEGOTIATED ARMS CONTROL AGREEMENTS AND TALKED OF ENDING THE ARMS RACE
JUST BEFORE THE OCTOBER NINETEEN GLOBAL EQUITIES CRASH HONGKONG BANK ECONOMISTS EXPRESSED SIMILAR CONCERN ABOUT THE SPECULATION THAT THEN DOMINATED THE LOCAL STOCK MARKET
THEIR PROPERTY REPORT RECALLS THE EQUITIES CRASH AS A REMINDER THAT ASSET VALUES CANNOT DEFY GRAVITY FOR EVER
THIS WARNING NOW REPRESENTS A MINORITY VIEW
BLAME IT ON A LOCAL NINETEEN FIFTY SEVEN ORDINANCE THAT BARS WORLDLY EMPLOYMENT OR BUSINESS EXCEPT WORKS OF NECESSITY AND CHARITY ON SUNDAY
RECREATION RELATED BUSINESSES SUCH AS MOVIE THEATERS AND BOWLING ALLEYS ARE ALSO EXEMPT
THE PURPOSE OF THE BAN IS TO KEEP DOWN TRAFFIC THE TOWN SAYS
WE KNOW THAT THESE THEORETICAL ECONOMIC CONCEPTS DO NOT ALWAYS WORK OUT PERFECTLY IN THE REAL WORLD
ON THE OTHER HAND WE KNOW THAT THEY ARE ESSENTIAL IF WE ARE TO UNDERSTAND AND EXPLAIN PRICES INTEREST RATES AND INVESTMENT DECISIONS
THESE CONCEPTS HAVE WORKED ABOUT AS WELL IN SANTIAGO AND SYDNEY AS THEY HAVE WORKED IN TOKYO AND SAN FRANCISCO
THERE ARE ALSO BROKER FINDERS THAT GET FEES MERELY FOR MATCHING BORROWERS AND LENDERS OF STOCK
BROKER FINDERS CAN ALSO INCLUDE THE BROKERAGE FIRMS THEMSELVES
THE GOVERNMENT IS INVESTIGATING WHETHER ALL THE PAYMENTS THAT FLY TO AND FROM SUCH BROKER FINDERS ARE LEGITIMATE
JOHN F. LEHMAN JUNIOR THEN SECRETARY OF THE NAVY PERSONALLY HEADED THE EFFORT
HE IMPOSED A NOVEL COST CONTROL SYSTEM
CONTRACTS FOR THE SHIPS WERE TO BE LET AT FIXED PRICES
NO DESIGN CHANGES WERE PERMITTED UNLESS PERSONALLY SIGNED BY MR. LEHMAN OR THE CHIEF OF NAVAL OPERATIONS
THE SYSTEM WAS ABANDONED IN THE SPRING OF NINETEEN EIGHTY SEVEN SHORTLY AFTER MR. LEHMAN LEFT OFFICE
OTHER PLANNED FEATURES OF THE OSAKA AIRPORT SUGGEST THAT THE PLANNERS HAVEN'T LEARNED THE LESSONS OF NARITA
THE NEW AIRPORT WILL BE CONSTRUCTED ON A MAN MADE ISLAND IN OSAKA HARBOR
ACCESS WILL BE BY A SINGLE DOUBLE DECKER BRIDGE FOR CARS AND TRAINS MAKING THE AIRPORT VULNERABLE TO CIVIC UNREST OF THE KIND THAT HAS PLAGUED NARITA

<NOISE> SUCH BUSINESSES ARE LESS SEVERELY CYCLICAL THAN COMMODITIES BASED ONES

THE BIG DIFFERENCE DISTURBS EUROPEAN OIL MEN
NOW THE TWO UNITS ARE FOR SALE FOR FIFTY THOUSAND DOLLARS AND TWO HUNDRED FORTY THOUSAND DOLLARS MAYBE HALF THEIR PEAK VALUES OF THREE YEARS AGO

BEING A LIBERAL IS NOT LIKE BEING A DEMOCRAT

IT DOESN'T HAVE ANY MORAL IMPLICATIONS

IT MIGHT BE NOON BY ATOMIC TIME BUT DARK OUTSIDE
MOREOVER SOME HOUSING SPECIALISTS SAY PERMIT ACTIVITY IS A POOR INDICATOR OF FUTURE STARTS ARGUING THAT IT REFLECTS CURRENT HOUSING ACTIVITY RATHER THAN PREDICTING FUTURE ACTIVITY

ONE NOTABLE EXCEPTION TO THIS TREND WILL BE THE SOUTHWEST WHICH HAS BEEN BATTERED BY RECESSION AND A HOUSING GLUT

THAT SUGGESTS THAT MR. AGEE MIGHT HAVE BEEN BROUGHT IN TO SHAKE THINGS UP

MR. ICAHN WANTS TO GIVE HOLDERS A MIXTURE OF TWENTY DOLLARS A SHARE IN CASH AND ABOUT THIRTY DOLLARS A SHARE FACE AMOUNT OF DEBENTURES
ON SOME LEDGERS THAT MIGHT SEEM TO ADD TO UP TO FIFTY DOLLARS
BUT SOME INSIDERS APPARENTLY PREFER THIRTY SIX DOLLARS TO THIRTY EIGHT DOLLARS IN CASH
FOUR T. W. A. VICE PRESIDENTS THREE CURRENT ONE DEPARTED RECENTLY SOLD ALL THEIR SHARES AT THOSE PRICES
RATES ARE DETERMINED BY THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN THE PURCHASE PRICE AND FACE VALUE
THUS HIGHER BIDDING NARROWS THE INVESTOR'S RETURN WHILE LOWER BIDDING WIDENS IT
THE PERCENTAGE RATES ARE CALCULATED ON A THREE HUNDRED AND SIXTY DAY YEAR WHILE THE COUPON EQUIVALENT YIELD IS BASED ON A THREE HUNDRED SIXTY FIVE DAY YEAR
SUEZ WHICH HAD TO RAISE ITS CAPITAL SEVERAL TIMES LAST YEAR THROUGH RIGHTS ISSUES TO FUND ITS BELGIAN BATTLE SAYS IT CAN FUND ITS ACQUISITION OF C. I. E.
INDUSTRIELLE OUT OF ITS CASH HOARD OR THROUGH SHORT TERM LOANS
ONE SOURCE SAID SUEZ IF VICTORIOUS WOULD LIKELY RESELL PART OF ITS STAKE IN C. I. E.
INDUSTRIELLE TO RECOUP PART OF ITS COSTS
IT COULD ALSO SELL OFF C. I. E.
INDUSTRIELLE ASSETS SUCH AS REAL ESTATE AND MINORITY INDUSTRIAL HOLDINGS ESTIMATED AT BETWEEN ONE BILLION AND TWO BILLION FRANCS
BASICALLY SAYS MS. BANK WE DON'T GIVE KITTENS TO PEOPLE WHO WORK
KITTENS NEED SOCIALIZATION
ONCE A KITTEN IS MORE THAN FOUR MONTHS OLD IT IS CONSIDERED MATURE ENOUGH BY THE A. S. P. C. A. TO BE ON ITS OWN DURING THE DAY

POLICE REPORTED ONE THOUSAND FIVE HUNDRED ARRESTS AS THEY ATTEMPTED TO CONTROL THE SIXTEEN THOUSAND HINDU RIOTERS IN THE INDIAN CAPITAL
THE RIOTING ERUPTED DURING A GENERAL STRIKE CALLED TO PROTEST A RECENT WAVE OF KILLINGS
MR. SCANLON EXPECTS BUSINESS TO BEGIN TAILING OFF ONLY AFTER APRIL FIFTEENTH UNTIL THEN PEOPLE WILL STILL BE MAKING CONTRIBUTIONS TO IRAS FOR NINETEEN EIGHTY SIX
SUCH CONTRIBUTIONS EVEN IF THEY'RE MADE IN EARLY NINETEEN EIGHTY SEVEN QUALIFY FOR A FULL TAX DEDUCTION
A PERSON WHO PUTS TWO THOUSAND DOLLARS INTO AN IRA CAN DEDUCT TWO THOUSAND DOLLARS FROM NINETEEN EIGHTY SIX GROSS INCOME IN DETERMINING TAXABLE INCOME
DEPENDING ON THE PERSON'S NINETEEN EIGHTY SIX TAX BRACKET THAT CAN SAVE UP TO A THOUSAND DOLLARS IN FEDERAL TAXES

FINALLY THERE'S THE WELFARE PROBLEM
NOT ALL WORKERS ARE AS LUCKY AS JOSEPH
SOME GET SICK OR INJURED AND LOSE THEIR JOBS
OTHERS WHO TURNED THEIR LIFE SAVINGS OVER TO BROKERS IN ORDER TO GET HERE DISCOVER THAT PROMISES OF MONEY MEALS AND LODGING WERE BOGUS
FEAR OF DEPORTATION PREVENTS THEM FROM GOING TO THE POLICE FOR HELP
THERE ARE UNCONFIRMED REPORTS OF WORKERS STARVING TO DEATH HERE
KODAK MAKES A BILLION POUNDS ANNUALLY MOSTLY FOR ITSELF
IT SELLS ABOUT TWO MILLION POUNDS TO SIX U. S. DISTRIBUTORS WHO RESELL TO OTHERS
KODAK KNOWS THE IDENTITY OF THE END USERS OF ONE MILLION POUNDS BUT CAN'T ACCOUNT FOR THE REST

IN SOME INSTANCES WE KNOW WHO THE DISTRIBUTOR SELLS TO THE SPOKESMAN SAYS
IN SOME CASES WE DON'T
PARDONING THOSE WHO HAVE EVADED TAX LAW APPROVES AND REWARDS PAST LAWLESSNESS AND ENCOURAGES FUTURE EVASION IN THE REASONABLE ANTICIPATION OF SUBSEQUENT AMNESTIES
ACCORDING TO THE IDEAS OF JOHN LOCKE WHOM OUR REVOLUTIONARY FOREFATHERS VIGOROUSLY DEBATED FREE MEN AND WOMEN MAY ENGAGE IN A SOCIAL CONTRACT
PERSONAL LIBERTY IS EXCHANGED FOR SOCIAL STRUCTURE AND STABILITY
LAWS CODIFY THIS EXCHANGE AND ARE INVIOLABLE TO BOTH PARTIES CITIZEN AND GOVERNMENT
AS MANY EMPLOYERS ARE THE BIG BROKER IS ENDING A DEFINED BENEFIT PLAN THAT PROVIDED PENSIONS BASED ON SALARY AND YEARS OF SERVICE
DEFINED BENEFITS HAD BECOME COSTLIER TO ADMINISTER BECAUSE OF NEW TAX AND ACCOUNTING RULES
AND EMPLOYEES TEND TO SEE A PENSION YEARS AWAY AS LESS VALUABLE THAN A PAYMENT HERE AND NOW
ALL OF THIS HAS LED MORE FIRMS TO ADOPT DEFINED CONTRIBUTION PLANS IN WHICH SALARY AND SERVICE DETERMINE ANNUAL PAYMENTS TO AN EMPLOYEE'S ACCOUNT

WHILE HE BELIEVES THE DOLLAR WILL MOVE LOWER AGAINST THE MAJOR CURRENCIES THE SOFTENING *EXPORT* MARKET IS PRESSURING JAPAN AND EUROPEAN EXPORTERS
THAT OF COURSE IS LIMITING THE ATTRACTIVENESS OF THESE COMPANY STOCKS
THESE STOCKS HAVE GONE UP TO SUCH AN EXTENT THAT THE PRICE EARNINGS MULTIPLE IS MUCH HIGHER ABROAD THAN HERE
THAT WOULD MAKE NON DOLLAR EQUITY INVESTMENT LESS ATTRACTIVE

SEPARATELY THE LABOR DEPARTMENT SAID AVERAGE WEEKLY EARNINGS OF U. S. WORKERS FELL POINT THREE PERCENT IN MARCH AFTER ADJUSTING FOR INFLATION AND SEASONAL FACTORS

THAT LEAVES RETAIL BROKERAGE FIRMS WITH A STARK CHOICE
THEY CAN MOVE ONTO THE INSTITUTIONAL FIRMS' TURF AND FIGHT FOR A TOP SPOT IN INVESTMENT BANKING

BUT CRITICS CHARGED THAT THE COLLAR ACTUALLY ADDED TO VOLATILITY BY MAKING IT MORE DIFFICULT FOR INDEX ARBITRAGERS TO DO THEIR BUSINESS
MANY TRADERS ARGUE THAT SUCH ARBITRAGE HAS THE EFFECT OF SMOOTHING OUT VOLATILITY IN THE MARKETS
INDEX ARBITRAGERS BUY AND SELL LARGE AMOUNTS OF STOCKS AND STOCK INDEX FUTURES TO TAKE ADVANTAGE OF BRIEF PRICE DISPARITIES BETWEEN THE TWO RELATED INSTRUMENTS
BANKERS TRUST'S QUARTERLY PROVISION FOR CREDIT LOSSES TOTALED FIVE MILLION DOLLARS COMPARED WITH TWENTY MILLION A YEAR EARLIER
BUT THE BANK HAD NET RECOVERIES OF THREE POINT ONE MILLION COMPARED WITH NINETEEN MILLION OF NET CHARGE OFFS IN THE YEAR EARLIER QUARTER
AND THE TOTAL ALLOWANCE FOR CREDIT LOSSES REMAINED UNCHANGED AT ONE POINT THREE BILLION
JOINT VENTURE PROJECTS THAT ARE STILL UNDER NEGOTIATION ARE TO BE SCRUTINIZED CHINESE OFFICIALS SAY
THOSE INVOLVING CONSTRUCTION OF HOTELS OR OFFICE BUILDINGS AREN'T LIKELY TO WIN GOVERNMENT APPROVAL
CHINA IS EXPECTED TO CONTINUE TO APPROVE MOST INVESTMENTS IN EXPORT RELATED INDUSTRIES AND IN PROJECTS COVERING ENERGY TRANSPORT COMMUNICATIONS RAW MATERIALS AND CHEMICALS
A SHORTAGE OF ENERGY AND RAW MATERIALS IS ALREADY WREAKING HAVOC IN MANY OF CHINA'S MAJOR INDUSTRIES
A FACTORY THAT MAKES NIKE SHOES IN GUANGDONG PROVINCE HAS TO RUN A GENERATOR THREE DAYS A WEEK TO STAY IN OPERATION
THE PLANT'S TAIWANESE JOINT VENTURE PARTNERS ARE STOCKPILING COAL AND OIL FOR POWER IN CASE THEIR SUPPLIES GET CUT OFF
MANY NEARBY CHINESE FACTORIES SIMPLY SHUT DOWN TWO OR THREE DAYS A WEEK FOR WANT OF ENERGY
MOREOVER TWO THOUSAND WORKERS AT THE TIANJIN ALUMINUM PRODUCTS FACTORY RECENTLY WERE ORDERED HOME BECAUSE THE COMPANY COULDN'T GET ENOUGH RAW MATERIALS
AT ONE POINT THIS YEAR SUPPLY SHORTAGES FORCED A THIRD OF THE NATION'S ALUMINUM FACTORIES TO CLOSE
MEANWHILE CIVIL RICO CONTINUES TO ATTRACT PLAINTIFFS WHO WANT TO TURN GENERAL BUSINESS DISPUTES THAT BELONG IN STATE COURTS INTO FEDERAL OFFENSES
FOR EXAMPLE A SMALL CONSORTIUM OF CONTRACTORS WHO CONSULTED ME HAD SUBMITTED THE LOW BID FOR A LARGE MARINA TO BE CONSTRUCTED ON LAKE MICHIGAN
THE SECOND LOWEST BIDDER RECENTLY FILED A CIVIL RICO ACTION CLAIMING THAT MISREPRESENTATIONS WERE MADE BY THE SUCCESSFUL BIDDERS USING THE TELEPHONE THEREBY COMMITTING FEDERAL WIRE FRAUD
NO MATTER WHAT THE DETERMINATION OF THE SUIT THE LOW BIDDERS ALREADY HAVE FELT THE STING OF SUCH POISONOUS WORDS AS RACKETEER
SUCH RESULTS ARE CAUSING SOME WALL STREET PROFESSIONALS TO TAKE THE JANUARY INDICATOR LESS SERIOUSLY THAN THEY USED TO
I'M PUTTING LESS EMPHASIS ON SOME OF THESE TRADITIONAL BAROMETERS SAYS EUGENE PERONI DIRECTOR OF TECHNICAL RESEARCH FOR JANNEY MONTGOMERY SCOTT INCORPORATED IN PHILADELPHIA
THEY ARE NOT THE MOST SCIENTIFIC THINGS AROUND
MR. WALTER WOULD BE RICH IF NOT FOR HIS AWFUL BUSINESS SENSE SAYS HIS BROTHER DANIEL A MARKETING EXECUTIVE
MY MOTHER SAYS GO HELP YOUR BROTHER
I SAY THE ONLY WAY I COULD HELP HIM IS WITH A GARBAGE TRUCK TO HAUL AWAY THE OLD COMPUTER MANUALS THAT LITTER HIS APARTMENT

IN VIEDMA MEANWHILE DEPUTY GOVERNOR OSCAR MACHADO EXUDES PROVINCIAL CONFIDENCE
HE HAS PUT UP A SIGN IN THE MAIN SQUARE WELCOMING VISITORS TO THE NEW FEDERAL CAPITAL
HE ACTUALLY BELIEVES HIS CORNER OF PATAGONIA WILL SOON BE ADORNED WITH NEW ROADS TELEPHONES EMBASSIES AND HOTELS
HE SAYS HE EXPECTS PRESIDENT ALFONSIN TO START COMING REGULARLY NEXT YEAR
IN MORE INNOCENT TIMES THE LEGAL PROFESSION WAS AN EXCLUSIVE CLUB THAT LOOKED AFTER ITS OWN
SQUABBLES WERE SETTLED BEHIND THE COURTHOUSE
LAWYERLY MISDEEDS WERE HUSHED UP OR HURRIEDLY RESOLVED
CLIENTS WOULD HAVE THOUGHT IT SCANDALOUS TO SUE THE FAMILY OR COMPANY LAWYER

HE DECLINED TO ELABORATE

IT'S WORSE THAN A JERRY BUILT HOUSE

HE HELPED US TO LOOK AT THE DIFFERENT OPTIONS SAYS ALFRED S. WARREN THE G. M. VICE PRESIDENT LEADING THE NEGOTIATIONS UNDER MR. JOHNSON
HE WAS VERY REFRESHING IN SOME OF HIS THOUGHTS AND IDEAS
BUT THE IDEAS NEVER BECAME REALITY
G. M. EVENTUALLY SIGNED A TRADITIONAL PACT PATTERNED CLOSELY AFTER FORD'S
FINALLY THOUGH THE CONSIDERABLE SUCCESS OF THE COLOR OF BLOOD RESTS IN THE CREATION OF BEM AND HIS STUMBLING JOURNEY OF DISCOVERY
AT LAST HE FINDS A MOMENT OF INNER PEACE AND JOY
YET IT IS A MOMENT QUICKLY ENDED
IN THIS BLEAK WORLD THE FUTURE WOULD SEEM TO BELONG TO THE TYRANTS AND TERRORISTS
FOR OVER HALF A CENTURY FEDERAL POLICY HAS SAPPED THE PRODUCTIVITY OF THE WORLD'S STRONGEST AGRICULTURE INDUSTRY
THE REAL ISSUE IS NOT THE DOLLAR AMOUNT OF U. S. FOOD EXPORTS BUT WHETHER THOSE EXPORTS ARE SOLD AT A PROFIT OR A LOSS
THE SOONER POLITICIANS STOP TRYING TO HELP FARMERS THE BETTER OFF THE MOST EFFICIENT PRODUCTIVE FARMERS WILL BE
ESPRIT IS NOW A LEANER COMPANY THAT OPERATES MORE CONVENTIONALLY
ACCORDING TO MR. FEDERICO THE OPERATIONS CHIEF EACH DIVISION NOW HAS A BUDGET TO FOLLOW FOR THE FIRST TIME
THE NEW EXECUTIVES IN ESPRIT'S SENIOR MANAGEMENT INCLUDING VETERANS FROM CALVIN KLEIN AND IZOD LACOSTE HAVE TIGHTENED MARKETING AND QUALITY CONTROLS
OFFICERS FOR MAJOR DEPARTMENT STORES SAY ESPRIT IS KEEPING CLOSER TRACK OF SALES AND OFFERING CLOTHES MORE IN TUNE WITH TODAY'S TASTES
THINGS ARE A BIT DULLER THIS YEAR
MR. BILZERIAN HAS SENT HIS BOY TO A LITTLE LEAGUE TEAM IN FARAWAY MINNESOTA WHERE THE FAMILY SPENDS ITS SUMMERS AND ISN'T COACHING A TEAM THIS YEAR
ALL THE ACTION APPARENTLY WILL BE IN THE COURTROOM
UNTIL NOW SANCTIONS BACKERS IN CONGRESS HAVE BEEN ABLE TO USE SOUTH AFRICA FOR THEIR OWN DOMESTIC POLITICAL PURPOSES WITHOUT TAKING INTO ACCOUNT THE FULL COSTS
THE SUFFERING THAT SANCTIONS HAVE INFLICTED ON BLACKS AND THE LOSS OF U. S. INFLUENCE IN THE REGION HAVE NOT IMPRESSED THEM MUCH
BUT THE NEXT ROUND WILL DO MORE SEVERE DAMAGE ON THEIR OWN CONSTITUENTS
THAT WILL BE SOMETHING TO THINK ABOUT AS THE SENATE DEBATES WHETHER TO SECOND THE SCORCHED EARTH POLICY THE HOUSE HAS ADOPTED

THE DIET IS A ONE HOUSE LEGISLATURE APPORTIONED BY DISTRICT RATHER THAN POPULATION LIKE THE SENATE AS OPPOSED TO THE HOUSE
THIS MEANS THAT JAPANESE FARMERS HAVE TREMENDOUS CONTROL OVER JAPANESE POLITICS
FOOD PRICES IN JAPAN TAKE FORTY PERCENT OR MORE OF THE AVERAGE PERSON'S WAGE
WITH HOUSING TAKING ANOTHER FORTY PERCENT AND THE FACT THAT THE JAPANESE ARE GREAT SAVERS THEY ARE LEFT WITH ALMOST NO DISCRETIONARY INCOME
THIS IS WHY THEY CANNOT DEVELOP A DOMESTIC MARKET
THEY DON'T HAVE MONEY TO SPEND EXCEPT A SMALL AMOUNT OF SAVINGS THAT THEY SPEND ONLY ON SPECIAL OCCASIONS OR FOR UNUSUAL BARGAINS
BUT MANY TIBETANS CONSIDER THE DALAI LAMA TO BE THEIR RIGHTFUL POLITICAL LEADER AS WELL SOMETHING THE CHINESE CAN'T ACCEPT
TRAVELERS KEPT TIBETANS WELL INFORMED OF THE DALAI LAMA'S RECENT VISIT TO THE U. S. AND HIS CALLS FOR TIBETAN INDEPENDENCE
WHEN THE CHINESE PRESS IN TIBET RESPONDED BY SAVAGELY ATTACKING BOTH THE PRO INDEPENDENCE MOVEMENT AND THE DALAI LAMA HIMSELF THE MONKS WERE MOVED TO ACTION

AND THE CHAIRMAN LEE A. IACOCCA SAYS CHRYSLER WILL ANNOUNCE A PERMANENT PLANT CLOSING EARLY THIS YEAR
UNDER THE NEW SYSTEM SHOPS ARE ONLY SUPPOSED TO HANDLE TAPES THAT ARE PACKAGED IN THE COLOR CODED CASES
TAPES APPROVED FOR ADULTS ONLY ARE IN RED CASES
TAPES THAT CAN BE WATCHED BY CHILDREN AGE THIRTEEN OR OLDER COME IN BLUE CONTAINERS
AND TAPES SUITABLE FOR ALL AGE GROUPS ARE PACKAGED IN GREEN
THE DIFFERENT COLORED CASINGS ARE MADE BY A LOCAL COMPANY
ACCORDING TO SOME PHYSICIANS THIS IS ESPECIALLY TRUE WITH BUSY YOUNG PROFESSIONALS
THEY REFUSE TO REST AND DEMAND TREATMENT WITH ANTIBIOTICS
BUT WHEN IT COMES TO THE FLU ANTIBIOTICS ARE USELESS
SUCH DRUGS ARE DESIGNED TO FIGHT BACTERIA NOT VIRUSES

<NOISE> MR. WASHINGTON GREW UP IN CHICAGO POLITICS
AS A TEEN AGER HE DISTRIBUTED LEAFLETS FOR HIS FATHER ROY A PRECINCT WORKER ON THE SOUTH SIDE
AFTER SERVING AS AN ARMY SERGEANT ON GUAM DURING WORLD WAR TWO HE EARNED A LAW DEGREE FROM NORTHWESTERN UNIVERSITY
HIS MARRIAGE TO HIS HIGH SCHOOL SWEETHEART ENDED IN DIVORCE IN NINETEEN FIFTY ONE
BUT HE ADVANCED THROUGH A SERIES OF DEMOCRATIC PATRONAGE JOBS TO ELECTION TO THE STATE LEGISLATURE AND FINALLY TO CONGRESS IN NINETEEN EIGHTY

MR. MARTENS SAID VITRO WASN'T PREPARED TO AGREE TO THAT CONDITION
<NOISE> HE SAID APPARENTLY ANCHOR IS CONCERNED THAT THE INFORMATION IT IS OFFERING TO PROVIDE WILL GIVE VITRO A BASIS FOR LOWERING THE PRICE
INDEED THE ACTIONS TAKEN BY ANCHOR GIVE VITRO A BASIS TO LOWER THE BID
IMMEDIATELY AFTER THE ACCIDENT BRITISH AIRWAYS BEGAN CHECKING ITS OTHER JETS FOR CRACKS
IT FOUND CRACKS MORE THAN TWO INCHES LONG IN THIRTY SIX ENGINES ALL OF WHICH IT REMOVED FROM PLANES
<NOISE> EVEN AFTER SPARE ENGINES WERE INSTALLED THIRTEEN JETS WERE GROUNDED
THE REMAINING OFFSETTING COLLECTIONS OF MORE THAN THREE BILLION DOLLARS COME FROM USER FEES WHICH ALSO CLEARLY ARE NOT TAXES
A USER FEE IS A SPECIFIC CHARGE FOR A DIRECT BENEFIT RECEIVED
LIKE AN ASSET SALE BUT UNLIKE A TAX A USER FEE DOES NOT INVOLVE COMPULSION
ONE CHARACTERISTIC OF USER FEES IS THAT THEY REVEAL HOW MUCH GOVERNMENT PROGRAMS ARE REALLY WORTH TO DIRECT RECIPIENTS IN THE MOST DIRECT AND MEANINGFUL WAY POSSIBLE
ONE OF THE STRONGEST ARGUMENTS THAT A GOVERNMENT PROGRAM IS WORTHWHILE OCCURS WHEN IT HAS A USER FEE AND THE FEE COVERS COSTS
THE REVERSE IS ALSO TRUE AND THAT IS ONE REASON SOME BENEFICIARIES OPPOSE USER FEES
THE IMPROVED RESULTS STEM LARGELY FROM GOLD SALES AT THE COMPANY'S GOLD BAR OPERATIONS IN NEVADA WHERE PRODUCTION BEGAN IN JANUARY
WE THINK WE CAN SUSTAIN PRODUCTION OF FORTY FIVE THOUSAND TO FIFTY THOUSAND OUNCES ANNUALLY FOR AT LEAST TEN YEARS MR. WEAVER SAID IN AN INTERVIEW
ATLAS ALSO CONTROLS ABOUT FIFTY THOUSAND ACRES CONTIGUOUS TO GOLD BAR AND EXPLORATION EFFORTS ARE BEING EXPANDED
MR. COX IS ACTING AS S. E. C. CHAIRMAN PENDING SENATE CONFIRMATION OF NORTHWESTERN UNIVERSITY LAW PROFESSOR DAVID RUDER AS JOHN SHAD'S SUCCESSOR
SENATOR TERRY SANFORD DEMOCRAT FROM NORTH CAROLINA HOWEVER HAS PUT A HOLD ON MR. RUDER'S NOMINATION CONCEIVABLY UNTIL SEPTEMBER
A SANFORD AIDE SAID THE SENATOR WANTS MORE TIME TO SCRUTINIZE MR. RUDER'S WRITTEN RESPONSES TO SEVERAL QUESTIONS ABOUT HIS REGULATORY VIEWS

SOME MONTHS BEFORE THE CRASH INTEREST RATES STARTED TO MOVE UP
HOME MORTGAGE RATES WENT UP ALMOST TEN TIMES AS FAST AS THEY CAME DOWN
THE MONEY SUPPLY GROWTH WAS MUDDLING AT OR BELOW THE LOWER END OF THE TARGET RANGE A PHENOMENON WE HAVE NOT EXPERIENCED FOR MANY YEARS
NOW THE PROJECT'S FOCUS IS PERFECTING A HUMAN ENGINE AN ATHLETE WHO CAN FLOAT LIKE A BUTTERFLY AND PEDAL LIKE A WORKER BEE
THE FLIGHT FROM CRETE WILL LAST FOUR TO SIX HOURS DEPENDING ON WINDS AND OTHER FACTORS
THAT IS COMPARABLE TO RUNNING TWO MARATHONS NONSTOP
SOME ATHLETIC EVENTS ARE LONGER BUT NONE ARE SO RELENTLESSLY DEMANDING
IF THE MODERN DAEDALUS LETS UP EVEN FOR A FEW SECONDS HE WILL PLUNGE INTO THE SEA

ACTUALLY SOMETHING RATHER LIKE THIS DOES HAPPEN BUT ONLY AMONG CERTAIN ELITE GROUPS THAT DEBATE SUCH DETAILED ISSUES
AND THE DEPTH AND OPENNESS OF THIS DEBATE UNQUESTIONABLY IS A MAJOR SOURCE OF STRENGTH IN OUR POLITICAL SYSTEM
THE ELITES MOREOVER ARTICULATE CHOICES AND CALL A NATION TO ITS IDEALS
SOME OF THE MOST THOUGHTFUL STUDENTS OF DEMOCRATIC GOVERNMENT BELIEVE THAT THE UPBRINGING AND TRAINING OF DEMOCRATIC POLITICAL ELITES ARE THE KEY TO THE SYSTEM'S SUCCESS

BROKERS AT MERRILL LYNCH REALTY RECALL A SALE THAT WAS DELAYED FOR A MONTH BY A ONE MILLION DOLLAR INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE LIEN ON THE PROPERTY
ANOTHER SALE WAS DELAYED WHEN THE LENDER DISCOVERED THAT THE OWNER HAD DIED BETWEEN THE TIME THE PROPERTY WAS POSTED FOR FORECLOSURE AND THE FORECLOSURE WAS COMPLETED

COMMERCIAL BANKS ARE SEEING THIS KIND OF BUSINESS BECAUSE SOME OF THEIR LINES LENDING TO BLUE CHIP CORPORATIONS FOR EXAMPLE HAVE DRIED UP
BIG COMPANIES NOW ISSUE THEIR OWN PAPER
THE OLD GLASS STEAGALL ARGUMENTS AIMED AT LIMITING RISK AND DANGERS THAT BIG BANKS WOULD END UP CONTROLLING INDUSTRY LOOK MORE AND MORE DATED
INVESTMENT BANKS PROVIDE BILLIONS IN BRIDGE LOANS FOR CORPORATE RESTRUCTURINGS AND TAKEOVERS

IN A SHORT SALE A HOLDER SELLS BORROWED STOCK THAT HE AGREES TO REPLACE LATER
IN EFFECT THE HOLDER IS BETTING THAT THE PRICE OF THE COMPANY'S STOCK WILL DROP ALLOWING HIM TO PROFIT BY REPLACING THE STOCK WITH CHEAPER STOCK

THE SUSPENSION EFFECTIVELY WILL SLASH SALARIES AND CUT AN ESTIMATED EIGHT POINT THREE BILLION FROM FEDERAL SPENDING THIS YEAR
THE AIM IS TO HOLD THE BUDGET DEFICIT TO FOUR POINT NINE PERCENT OF ECONOMIC OUTPUT DOWN FROM A PROJECTED SEVEN PERCENT
THIS IT IS HOPED WILL HELP STOP HIGH INFLATION FROM SPIRALING INTO HYPERINFLATION

UNCONVINCED THE HARRISBURG CITY COUNCIL IN APRIL PASSED AN ORDINANCE REQUIRING LOCAL EMPLOYERS WITH TEN OR MORE EMPLOYEES TO GIVE UP TWELVE WEEKS OF UNPAID PARENTAL LEAVE
HARRISBURG IS BELIEVED TO BE THE FIRST U. S. CITY TO PASS SUCH A STATUTE AND IT IS MUCH STRICTER THAN ANY STATE LEGISLATION
FOR INSTANCE WISCONSIN PASSED A PARENTAL LEAVE LAW IN APRIL WHICH PROVIDES FOR ONLY SIX WEEKS OF UNPAID LEAVE AND EXEMPTS COMPANIES WITH FEWER THAN FIFTY EMPLOYEES
THE NEW SERVICE DIFFERS FROM THE SHUTTLE IN SEVERAL WAYS
IT WON'T HAVE THE BACKUP PLANES THAT THE SHUTTLE USES TO ACCOMMODATE PASSENGER OVERFLOW
THE NEW FLIGHTS WILL INCLUDE ADVANCE SEAT SELECTION AND FIRST CLASS AND COACH SERVICE WHICH THE SHUTTLE DOESN'T
SHUTTLE FLIGHTS DEPART ON THE HOUR THE NEW SERVICE WILL OPERATE ON THE HALF HOUR

BUT THE LAW ALSO SAYS YOU PROBABLY NO LONGER CAN DEDUCT THE COST OF HIRING PROFESSIONAL HELP

INDIRECTLY AT LEAST WHAT HE WRITES IS OFTEN CRITICAL OF HER POLICIES A SITUATION THAT VISITING JOURNALISTS INVARIABLY ASK HER ABOUT
HE WENT TO SAY THAT SINCE THE NINETEEN SEVENTIES CHINA HAD DECIDED TO PROMOTE ECONOMIC AND CULTURAL EXCHANGES WITH THE U. S. AND JAPAN
BUT NO MIRACLE IS GOING TO APPEAR
ISN'T THIS OBVIOUS
A BIG COMPANY WOULD JUST HAVE CONTINUED WITH THE SAME BAD TEAM HE EXPLAINS
THEY WASTE HUGE AMOUNTS
THAT'S WHY WE AREN'T AT A DISADVANTAGE WITH THEM
MR. ADELMAN SAYS THAT CLEARLY SERVES MOSCOW
ARMS CONTROL SERVES THE SOVIETS MORE THAN IT SERVES US BECAUSE IT MAKES US MORAL EQUIVALENTS HE SAYS
JUST THROUGH A PRESS RELEASE THEY CAN GIVE THE IMPRESSION THEY FAVOR PEACE
HE ALSO POINTS OUT THAT NUCLEAR ARMS TALKS ARE ALSO WHERE MOSCOW BARGAINS FROM A POSITION OF STRENGTH BECAUSE OF ITS CONVENTIONAL MILITARY SUPERIORITY
THE DEPRESSION WASN'T JUST ONE LONG SLUMP AS THE POPULAR IMAGE HAS IT BUT A SERIES OF *RECOVERIES* ABORTED BY FURTHER RECESSIONS
THESE SLUMPS WITHIN THE SLUMP IN NINETEEN THIRTY THREE AND NINETEEN THIRTY EIGHT WERE BOTH PRECEDED BY LARGE INCOME TAX INCREASES
THIS FOLLY HAS NOT PASSED UNNOTICED BY KEYNESIANS
HERBERT STEIN EXCLAIMED IN HIS NINETEEN SIXTY NINE BOOK THE FISCAL REVOLUTION IN AMERICA
THE CONTINUING PROSPECT OF LOWER INTEREST RATES SENT STOCK PRICES UP SHARPLY
THE DOW JONES INDUSTRIAL AVERAGE CLOSED UP TWENTY EIGHT POINT ONE EIGHT POINTS AT NINETEEN FIFTY EIGHT POINT TWO TWO POINTS
VOLUME ON THE NEW YORK STOCK EXCHANGE TOTALED TWO HUNDRED ELEVEN POINT NINE MILLION SHARES UP FROM A HUNDRED AND SIXTY SIX POINT FOUR MILLION SHARES TRADED THURSDAY
ADVANCING ISSUES LED DECLINERS ONE THOUSAND FIFTY FOUR TO FOUR HUNDRED EIGHTY THREE
MR. REAGAN VIGOROUSLY DEFENDED ATTORNEY GENERAL EDWIN MEESE WHO IS UNDER INVESTIGATION FOR HIS ROLE IN ADVANCING A MIDDLE EAST OIL PIPELINE ADVOCATED BY ONE OF MR. MEESE'S FRIENDS
MR. REAGAN SAYS HE COULDN'T REMEMBER BEING TOLD ANYTHING ABOUT THE PIPELINE AND EXPRESSED EVERY CONFIDENCE IN MR. MEESE'S INTEGRITY
HE ALSO CRITICIZED THE LYNCH MOB ATMOSPHERE THAT HAS ACCOMPANIED INVESTIGATIONS OF HIS AIDES
BRITAIN'S FOREIGN SECRETARY CONFIRMED THAT BRITISH SECURITY FORCES KILLED THREE UNARMED IRISH REPUBLICAN ARMY GUERRILLAS SUNDAY IN GIBRALTAR
SIR GEOFFREY HOWE SAID A TERRORIST ACT HAS BEEN AVERTED
<NOISE> THE THREE TWO MEN AND A WOMAN REPORTEDLY WERE PLANNING A BOMB ATTACK ON A MILITARY PARADE TODAY IN THE BRITISH COLONY
THE SALE ANNOUNCEMENT WAS NOT WIDELY EXPECTED
BUT DESPITE THE ELEMENT OF SURPRISE THE NEWS HAD LITTLE NET EFFECT ON THE SECONDARY MARKET FOR NEW YORK BONDS
THERE ISN'T ENOUGH SUPPLY FOR THE ANNOUNCEMENT OF THE SIZABLE OFFERING TO HAVE MUCH IMPACT EXPLAINED ONE TRADER
I KNOW BUT IT'S CLOSE
ANOTHER IMPORTANT THING IS THIS
BEING A LIBERAL IS NOT LIKE BEING A DEMOCRAT
BEING A DEMOCRAT OR A REPUBLICAN IS LIKE HAVING THE RED PIECES OR THE BLACK PIECES IN A CHECKERS GAME
IT DOESN'T HAVE ANY MORAL IMPLICATIONS
BEING A LIBERAL IS BA:D
YOU CAN BE A GOOD DEMOCRAT IF YOU'RE NOT LIBERAL AND YOU CAN BE A BAD REPUBLICAN IF YOU ARE LIBERAL

IT IS NONE TOO SUBTLE WEDGE DRIVING HE TOLD REUTERS
IT'S PRETTY REASONABLE FOR PEOPLE TO TAKE A DIVE ON THIS ONE HE SAYS
I'M A LITTLE SCARED
I DON'T BLAME PEOPLE FOR NOT BEING HEROES
THINGS ARE A BIT DULLER THIS YEAR
MR. BILZERIAN HAS SENT HIS BOY TO A LITTLE LEAGUE TEAM IN FARAWAY MINNESOTA WHERE THE FAMILY SPENDS ITS SUMMERS AND ISN'T COACHING A TEAM THIS YEAR
ALL THE ACTION APPARENTLY WILL BE IN THE COURTROOM
MR. DUKAKIS IS IN FACT A FIRST GENERATION AMERICAN
HIS FATHER PANOS ARRIVED IN NEW YORK IN NINETEEN TWELVE AT THE AGE OF SIXTEEN
HIS MOTHER ARRIVED A YEAR LATER WHEN SHE WAS NINE
HE IS STRIKING NOW AT A TIME WHEN FINANCING FOR BIG DEALS IS READILY AVAILABLE AND THE STOCK PRICE IS DOWN

BUT IT ALSO RAISED IMPORTANT ISSUES OF CORPORATE LAW

LAWS AGAINST FRAUD SHOULD BE NO LESS APPLICABLE TO PLANT CLOSINGS OR MASS LAYOFFS

MR. MINOLI THE U. S. GENERAL MANAGER SAYS BENETTON RECENTLY DROPPED ITS STRATEGY OF SATURATING THE MARKET WITH SMALL STORES
NOW IT IS CONCENTRATING ON PROFESSIONALISM AND THE SERVICING OF EXISTING STORES HE SAYS
NEW STORES WILL BE LARGER OUTLETS CALLED UNITED COLORS AND WILL OFFER A MUCH BROADER RANGE OF MERCHANDISE
BENETTON PLANS TO HAVE TEN UNITED COLORS SHOPS OPERATING IN THE U. S. BY NEXT SPRING
MR. MINOLI ALSO ESTIMATES THAT AS MANY AS ONE HUNDRED SMALLER BENETTON STORES MAY CLOSE IN THE NEXT FIVE YEARS

INTELLIGENT PEOPLE IN LITIGATION OUGHT TO BE TALKING TO PEOPLE TO TRY TO RESOLVE IT HE SAID
THE BANKS SOUGHT TO ELIMINATE A MISMATCH BETWEEN THEIR ASSETS PREDOMINANTLY HELD IN NON POUND CURRENCIES AND THEIR CAPITAL KEPT IN POUNDS
WHEN THE POUND WAS WEAK DURING THE EARLY NINETEEN EIGHTIES THE VALUE OF SCANDINAVIAN BANK'S CAPITAL FELL STEEPLY IN PROPORTION TO ITS NON DOLLAR ASSETS

WE HAVE THE FLEXIBILITY TO DEFER MEDIUM AND LONG RANGE FINANCING SAYS MR. BLAKELY

AS FOR THE SECURITIES INDUSTRY IT IS SEEKING TO RETAIN THE REMAINING LINE OF DEFENSE AGAINST BANK INTRUSIONS

TO RAISE MEDIUM TERM DEBT JAPANESE COMPANY'S HAVE MOSTLY USED THE LESS REGULATED EUROMARKETS
THAT LEAVES THE OPTION OF A MILITARY STRIKE AT TERRORISTS OR THEIR BASES WHICH ARE MAINLY IN LEBANON'S BEKAA VALLEY AN AREA UNDER SYRIAN CONTROL
U. S. INTELLIGENCE AGENCIES HAVE IDENTIFIED AS POTENTIAL TARGETS THERE BUILDINGS KNOWN TO HAVE BEEN USED BY HEZBOLLAH FORCES AND THEIR MENTORS THE IRANIAN REVOLUTIONARY GUARDS
BUT THEY AREN'T CERTAIN WHICH FACTIONS USE WHICH BUILDINGS OR WHEN THEY ARE PRESENT
LAST WEEK THERE WERE REPORTS THAT AFTER THE OFFERING SHEARSON LEHMAN HAD A BIG UNSOLD CHUNK OF STOCK
IN A NARROWLY DRAWN STATEMENT VICE CHAIRMAN HERBERT FREIMAN DENIED SHEARSON HAD OFFERED A BLOCK TO SALOMON BROTHERS WHICH MANAGED THE SELLING BROKERS' FLOOR OPERATION
MR. FREIMAN WOULDN'T ELABORATE

THE PLANT'S FIRST UNIT BEGAN COMMERCIAL OPERATION IN NINETEEN EIGHTY THREE FOLLOWED BY THE SECOND UNIT IN NINETEEN EIGHTY FOUR

<NOISE> LEGO GOT ITS START IN NINETEEN THIRTY TWO AS A MAKER OF WOODEN TOYS IN THIS SMALL TOWN A HUNDRED AND FIFTY MILES WEST OF COPENHAGEN
TODAY IT HAS GROWN INTO ONE OF DENMARK'S STAR COMPANIES WITH FIVE THOUSAND EIGHT HUNDRED EMPLOYEES IN ONE HUNDRED AND TWENTY NINE COUNTRIES
CLOSELY HELD LEGO DOESN'T RELEASE FINANCIAL RESULTS
BUT COMPANY OFFICIALS DON'T QUIBBLE WITH ESTIMATES THAT WORLD WIDE RETAIL SALES OF LEGO BLOCKS LAST YEAR TOTALED SEVEN BILLION DANISH *KRONER* ONE BILLION DOLLARS
THE DIRECTORS DIDN'T INDICATE WHAT THE DIVIDEND RATE WILL BE ON THE SPLIT SHARES
THE COMPANY HAS BEEN PAYING FORTY CENTS QUARTERLY ON PRE SPLIT SHARES
THE LAST SUCH DIVIDEND WHICH WAS DECLARED JULY SECOND WILL BE PAID SEPTEMBER TWENTY FIRST TO SHARES OF RECORD AUGUST THIRTY FIRST

ABOUT FORTY PERCENT OF FALCONBRIDGE'S NICKEL OUTPUT COMES FROM ITS *SUDBURY* OPERATIONS

NOW I FOLLOW PRICES EVERY DAY IN THE PAPER
