BUT BOTH HAVE BEEN HEAVILY DISCOUNTED BY AS MUCH AS NINE DOLLARS A CASSETTE AND BOTH HAVE REBATE OFFERS
THE HOME VIDEO INDUSTRY IS HOPING THE MASSIVE PURCHASES OF BOTH CASSETTES WILL TURN MANY CASSETTE RENTERS INTO AT LEAST OCCASIONAL BUYERS IN THE FUTURE
INDEED TO INVESTORS ALL SHARES OF THE SAME STOCK ARE ALIKE THE INVESTOR DOESN'T CARE WHICH ONE HE BUYS
BUT TWO EXAMPLES OF THE SAME STAMP ISSUE CAN DIFFER GREATLY IN VALUE DEPENDING ON THE QUALITY OF SAY PERFORATIONS INK OR GLUE
BUYING STAMPS THROUGH A COMPUTER NETWORK SIGHT UNSEEN COULD BE HAZARDOUS

THE LACK OF MARKET DEPTH YESTERDAY ENABLED SEVERAL LARGE BUY ORDERS TO SPARK THE DOLLAR RALLY
ONE NEW YORK TRADER SAID HE WITNESSED THE CURRENCY'S VALUE JUMP AS HIS BANK EXECUTED A PURCHASE ORDER FOR TWO HUNDRED AND FIFTY MILLION DOLLARS IN SEVERAL CHUNKS

THE BIGGEST DANGER ECONOMISTS SAID IS A FREE FALL OF THE DOLLAR
THAT WOULD FORCE THE U. S. TO RAISE INTEREST RATES TO ATTRACT THE FOREIGN CAPITAL NEEDED TO FINANCE ITS CURRENT ACCOUNT DEFICIT AND INDIRECTLY ITS BUDGET DEFICIT
HIGHER RATES IN TURN COULD PLUNGE THE U. S. AND POSSIBLY THE WORLD INTO A RECESSION THAT COULD THREATEN THE INTERNATIONAL FINANCIAL SYSTEM

SOME OF ITS MOST SUCCESSFUL PICKS WERE QUITE SMALL COMPANIES WHEN FIRST RECOMMENDED

BUT THE CONTINUING DECONTROL OF THIS AREA ALSO SHOWS THAT THE REGULATORY RESURGENCY IS SELECTIVE
WHILE RULES ARE REVIVED TO DEAL WITH PUBLICIZED CONCERNS SUCH AS AIR AND RAIL SAFETY THE GOVERNMENT PULLBACK CONTINUES IN SUCH AREAS AS CONSUMER PROTECTION AND ANTITRUST ENFORCEMENT
TWO DESIRABLE RESULTS ARISE FROM PLACING CORPORATE GOVERNANCE DECISIONS AS CLOSE TO THE SHAREHOLDERS AS POSSIBLE
FIRST THE DECISION MAKERS CLOSEST TO THE ISSUE ARE LIKELY TO HAVE THE BEST INFORMATION WITH WHICH TO MAKE DECISIONS
SECOND THE OPPORTUNITY ARISES FOR EXPERIMENTATION WITH DIFFERENT RULES OF CORPORATE GOVERNANCE

THE TARGET WILL BE RAISED BECAUSE MEMBERS IT SEEMS ARE NOT PREPARED TO KEEP THE SPENDING CUT PROMISES MADE WHEN IT WAS SET
NEVERTHELESS SOME ANALYSTS SAY THE FED ALREADY MAY BE TIGHTENING CREDIT SLIGHTLY
THEY POINT TO THE RECENT INCREASES IN THE FEDERAL FUNDS RATE WHICH IS THE RATE ON RESERVES THAT BANKS LEND EACH OTHER OVERNIGHT
THE FUNDS RATE AVERAGED ABOUT SEVEN AND FIVE EIGHTHS PERCENT YESTERDAY AND TUESDAY UP FROM AN AVERAGE OF SEVEN POINT THREE FOUR PERCENT IN THE WEEK ENDED OCTOBER SEVENTH
THESE ANALYSTS ARGUE THAT THE *INCREASE* WAS ENGINEERED BY THE FED

IT CITED WEAKENED FOREIGN EXCHANGE AND GOLD RESERVES
SINCE THEN ITS MEDIUM TERM AND LONG TERM FOREIGN BANK DEBT HAS CLIMBED TO MORE THAN SEVENTY BILLION DOLLARS INCLUDING INTEREST ARREARS

BOTH NOTES ISSUES WILL PAY *ACCRUED* INTEREST FROM LAST THURSDAY
BOTH OFFERINGS ARE BEING UNDERWRITTEN BY GOLDMAN SACHS AND COMPANY AND AREN'T REDEEMABLE BEFORE MATURITY
THE LITTLE ROCK ARKANSAS BASED RETAILER SAID IT WILL USE PROCEEDS TO RETIRE DEBT TO FINANCE OPERATIONS AND FOR OTHER GENERAL PURPOSES
THE INVESTMENT UNIT SAID IT WILL USE PROCEEDS TO BUY CONSUMER ACCOUNTS RECEIVABLE GROWING OUT OF THE PARENT RETAIL SALES

INSTEAD THEY TRY TO BUILD CASES ON THE TESTIMONY OF CURRENT AND FORMER TENANTS

FAILURE TO COME THROUGH WITH A DEFICIT CUTTING PLAN HE ADDS WOULD MEAN AN OPPORTUNITY LOST

MANY CURRENT MOREHOUSE STUDENTS WERE OFFERED SCHOLARSHIPS BY PREDOMINANTLY WHITE SCHOOLS BUT CAME HERE INSTEAD

<NOISE> <NOISE> IT MIGHT BE SEEN AS A VICTORY FOR KODAK SAYS ALEXANDER
BROWN ANALYST OTIS BRADLEY IN A RECENT REPORT
<NOISE> YESTERDAY KODAK CLIMBED TWO AND THREE QUARTERS TO SEVENTY FIVE AND THREE EIGHTHS
IT REPORTED FIRST QUARTER PROFIT ROSE TO SEVENTY NINE CENTS A SHARE FROM TWENTY TWO CENTS A SHARE
THE PURCHASING MANAGERS' COMPOSITE INDEX REGISTERED FIFTY SEVEN POINT THREE PERCENT FOR JUNE FRACTIONALLY BELOW MAY'S FIFTY SEVEN POINT FIVE PERCENT
AN INDEX READING ABOVE FIFTY PERCENT GENERALLY INDICATES THAT THE ECONOMY IS EXPANDING WHILE AN INDEX BELOW FIFTY PERCENT INDICATES A DECLINE ACCORDING TO THE ASSOCIATION
<NOISE> THE INDEX HAS AVERAGED FIFTY FIVE POINT ONE PERCENT FOR THE FIRST HALF OF NINETEEN EIGHTY SEVEN
MANY PEOPLE HOWEVER CLAIM THAT IRRESPONSIBLE OWNERS NOT THE DOGS THEMSELVES ARE TO BLAME FOR THE HIGH INCIDENCE OF ATTACKS

MR. WASHINGTON GREW UP IN CHICAGO POLITICS
AS A TEEN AGER HE DISTRIBUTED LEAFLETS FOR HIS FATHER ROY A PRECINCT WORKER ON THE SOUTH SIDE
AFTER SERVING AS AN ARMY SERGEANT ON GUAM DURING WORLD WAR TWO HE EARNED A LAW DEGREE FROM NORTHWESTERN UNIVERSITY
HIS MARRIAGE TO HIS HIGH SCHOOL SWEETHEART ENDED IN DIVORCE IN NINETEEN FIFTY ONE
BUT HE ADVANCED THROUGH A SERIES OF DEMOCRATIC PATRONAGE JOBS TO ELECTION TO THE STATE LEGISLATURE AND FINALLY TO CONGRESS IN NINETEEN EIGHTY
BRANIFF CHAIRMAN JAY A. PRITZKER AND HIS FAMILY CONTROL NINETY FOUR PERCENT OF BRANIFF'S VOTING STOCK
BRANIFF'S PROPOSAL TO ACQUIRE PAN AMERICAN WORLD AIRWAYS WOULD GIVE PAN AMERICAN CORPORATION COMMON SHAREHOLDERS A FIFTY FIVE PERCENT INTEREST IN THE MERGED COMPANY
BRANIFF SHAREHOLDERS WOULD RECEIVE TWENTY FIVE PERCENT AND PAN AM'S UNION EMPLOYEES TWENTY PERCENT IN EXCHANGE FOR WAGE SAVINGS OF TWO HUNDRED MILLION A YEAR FOR FOUR YEARS
STILL COMPANY INSIDERS SAID THE RESTRUCTURING WAS ENTIRELY MR. AKERS'S PLAN AND WASN'T FORCED ON HIM BY THE I. B. M. BOARD
A DIRECTOR SAID THE BOARD LEARNED OF THE PLAN AT ITS MEETING LAST TUESDAY

<NOISE> HE WANTED AN ORGANIZATION WHICH RESOLVED MORE PROBLEMS BEFORE THEY GOT TO HIM
MOREOVER SOME HOUSING SPECIALISTS SAY PERMIT ACTIVITY IS A POOR INDICATOR OF FUTURE STARTS ARGUING THAT IT REFLECTS CURRENT HOUSING ACTIVITY RATHER THAN PREDICTING FUTURE ACTIVITY
THEY PREDICT THAT INSTEAD OF FALLING HOUSING STARTS WILL IMPROVE IN COMING MONTHS IN REACTION TO INCREASING NEW AND EXISTING HOME SALES
ONE NOTABLE EXCEPTION TO THIS TREND WILL BE THE SOUTHWEST WHICH HAS BEEN BATTERED BY RECESSION AND A HOUSING GLUT

<NOISE> RECENT COVERAGE OF THE CLOSING OF LONG ISLAND LIGHTING COMPANY'S NUCLEAR POWER PLANT BRINGS TO LIGHT A FASCINATING IRONY
<NOISE> THE VICTORY CELEBRATION OF THOSE WHO OPPOSED THE PLANT MAY BE SHORT LIVED
WITHOUT THIS PLANT LONG ISLAND STANDS A VERY GOOD CHANCE OF MAJOR SHORTAGES IN ELECTRICAL SUPPLIES DURING ITS EVER INCREASING PEAK DEMAND PERIODS
<NOISE> THIS LACK OF RELIABILITY WILL BE A SIGNAL TO BUSINESS AND INDUSTRY THAT LONG ISLAND IS NOT A DESIRABLE PLACE TO LOCATE
MEANWHILE LOCAL STATE AND NATIONAL TAXPAYERS WILL BE JOINING LILCO RATEPAYERS IN FOOTING THE BILL FOR THE UNUSED FACILITY
THESE SAME RATEPAYERS WILL BE FORCED TO PAY TOP MARKET PRICE FOR ELECTRICITY IMPORTED INTO THEIR SYSTEM
WITH MORE THAN THREE HUNDRED AND EIGHTY FIVE BILLION OF REPORTED STOCK ASSETS THE INVESTMENT ADVISERS CONTROL A SIZABLE CHUNK OF PENSION ASSETS AND PRIVATE PORTFOLIOS
INVESTMENT ADVISERS TEND TO BE SMALL PRIVATE PARTNERSHIPS WHOSE OWNERS MANAGE THE PORTFOLIOS
THEY ARE OFTEN KNOWN FOR MAVERICK INVESTMENT STRATEGIES AND HIGH FEES
AS THE MARKET CONTINUED ITS UPWARD MARCH IN EARLY JANUARY AN ALREADY MEAGER BEAR POPULATION DWINDLED FURTHER

A FACTORY THAT MAKES NIKE SHOES IN GUANGDONG PROVINCE HAS TO RUN A GENERATOR THREE DAYS A WEEK TO STAY IN OPERATION

MANY NEARBY CHINESE FACTORIES SIMPLY SHUT DOWN TWO OR THREE DAYS A WEEK FOR WANT OF ENERGY

AT ONE POINT THIS YEAR SUPPLY SHORTAGES FORCED A THIRD OF THE NATION'S ALUMINUM FACTORIES TO CLOSE

I DON'T CHOOSE TO LIVE THIS WAY

BUT LAST FALL MY DOCTOR TOLD ME TO CHANGE MY DIET AT LEAST UNTIL I LOWERED MY CHOLESTEROL LEVEL

CAMBRIDGE MASSACHUSETTS BASED GREENERY WHICH OWNS NINE POINT NINE PERCENT OF THE TRUST OPERATES NURSING HOMES
THE GOVERNMENT FACES A KNOTTY SURPLUS PROBLEM
U. S. STORAGE BINS HOLD ROUGHLY AN EIGHT MONTH SUPPLY OF CORN AND A TEN MONTH SUPPLY OF WHEAT WHEN A THREE MONTH SUPPLY WOULD DO

MR. KINNEAR CONCEDES THAT TEXACO IS BEING BATTERED BY ITS PENNZOIL DIFFICULTIES

FINANCIAL FLEXIBILITY IS REDUCED TO THE POINT WHERE TEXACO CAN'T FIX A MAJOR WEAKNESS DWINDLING OIL SUPPLIES

WE ARE ALL CONCERNED THAT THE REGULATORS CAN SIT BACK AND WAIT FOR CREDIT TO CARRY THE COMPANY OUT INTO THE HORIZON
BUT HE ADDED THE BANKERS ARE WAITING FOR COMMITMENTS FROM THE REGULATORS AND THE REGULATORS ARE WAITING FOR COMMITMENTS FROM THE BANKERS
THE TREASURY RULES HOWEVER CONTAIN MODIFICATIONS OF THE S. E. C. RULES DESIGNED TO IMPROVE PROTECTION OF PARTIES INVOLVED IN REPURCHASE AGREEMENTS
IN SUCH AGREEMENTS CALLED REPOS ONE PARTY SELLS GOVERNMENT SECURITIES TO ANOTHER WITH THE UNDERSTANDING THAT THE SELLER WILL REPURCHASE THEM AT A SPECIFIED PRICE
THE PROPOSED MODIFICATIONS WOULD APPLY TO GOVERNMENT SECURITIES BROKERS OR DEALERS THAT ARE ALREADY REGISTERED AS WELL AS TO THE NEWLY REGISTERED ENTITIES
I WAS STARTLED STARTLED ISN'T THE WORD REACTED ALVIN NOVICK A BIOLOGY PROFESSOR AT YALE UNIVERSITY
HE WARNED THAT FORCED TESTING SUCH AS CONTEMPLATED BY THE CENTERS WOULD DRIVE HOMOSEXUALS UNDERGROUND AND AWAY FROM COOPERATION WITH PUBLIC HEALTH PROGRAMS
RATIONAL PEOPLE WON'T COOPERATE IN RUINING THEIR OWN LIVES HE SAID
WITH LESS REGULATORY AND POLITICAL PRESSURE CONRAIL WAS ABLE TO ABANDON ABOUT FIVE THOUSAND MILES OF TRACK BETWEEN NINETEEN EIGHTY ONE AND NINETEEN EIGHTY SIX
ABOUT HALF OF THAT HAS BEEN TAKEN UP BY SHORT LINE RAILROADS NONUNION RAILROADS THAT HAVE CONTINUED TO PROVIDE THE SERVICE AT A LESSER COST
THEY BRING THE BUSINESS TO US AND WE HANDLE IT AS A TRUNK LINE

MITSUBISHI SUBSIDIZES ITS EMPLOYEES WHO BUY THE COMPANY'S SHARES BY PAYING TEN PERCENT OF THE PURCHASE PRICE
HE FIGURES THAT HE GETS A MUCH BETTER RETURN THAT WAY THAN BY PUTTING MONEY IN THE BANK
HE IS CREDITED WITH DRILLING THE PRESIDENTS OF TRUST COMPANY'S EIGHTEEN GEORGIA BANKS ON THOSE FUNDAMENTALS SETTING AMBITIOUS PROFIT TARGETS AND HOLDING THE BANKS STRICTLY ACCOUNTABLE FOR REACHING THEM
